[ ref:_00D24H3gm._5001o3uAyJM:ref ],***NO RESPONS FROM THE COMPANY***,21 November 2019 17:15,Fee from n26 on 74 EURO. ,21 November 2019 18:08,I replied and sending them the cancellation papers AGAIN!!!!,25 November 14:04 ,(employee no 3) Anselm promised me to see on this AGAIN ( ref:_00D24H3gm._5001o46Ohvu:ref ),***NO RESPONS FROM THE COMPANY (AND YES I CHECKED THE SPAM FILTER)***,2 January 2020 19:10,DEBT COLLECTION(KNP Collection Department) FOR N26 the bill is now on 171 EURO,UPDATE 15 MAY 2020,After reaching out to N26 with different mails after they reached out to me on Trustpilot. Still no refunding or any kind of customer service. They wrote that between 15-18 may they will see on the complaints I have sent to them. (Starting proceedings against N26 company by doing illegel actions, with my lawyer),UPDATE 28 MAY 2020,*I have received my refund and now the process is done after 9 months of misleading service from N26 I will not change the review because of its time. ,My  advice to other future customers is to stay away from this company. I ended up paying over 150 EUROS for a cancellation membership and didn't get any help from the customer service or any kind of conversation., I'm not the type of guy that reporting firms - but this time it's far beyond the limit!. text: N26 is a very poor choice if you want to work professionally. I opened up a bank account and had a payment processed by a publicly acknowledged client of mine, only to have the payment quarantined. N26 seems to be under the sway of authorities ignoring the fact that people have to do their business. I pay taxes, share my tax ID numbers, passport and everything only to have a bank that intercepts payments and keeps my monies away from me - an especially nice experience during coronavirus. I chose to work with N26 because I moved places and thought they might be a good additional banker while being mostly online. They are not.
company_reply: Hi,,In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out routine compliance checks on user accounts and transcations. title: No Response at all via email. My funds are stuck. Shocking customer service.
text: This is a follow on.  Absolutely terrible company.  Beginning of March they said they needed to close my account in April due to Brexit. So I called them about what account I can move the funds to as they requested.  So I was going to move my funds that day for them.  However, I came off the phone to receive an email. Now telling me that my account was blocked.  Very coincidental.   They then sent me emails asking for a bank account in which to send the funds to.  So I did what they requested.  I have now sent 7 emails in total and left messages through trust pilot and twitter and they do not respond to emails full stop.  They say they have not received.  I have every delivery receipt as I have been in the IT & Computing industry for 25 years.   We all say the bank is great.  But you don’t realise until you have an issue that there is no support or replies when you need to get something done. They blocked my accounts and I have no access to my funds.  Be warned that if you have money with this bank you could be refused access to it without any explanation or response to your requests or emails.  There is no formal supports and the address they give backoffice. support @n26.com.  No one replies and stated in forums that they have not received your emails.  Even my legal representative has written via email to them.  We are now seeking legal advice for holding my funds when I have asked for it to be transferred under their instructions.   People also need to look at possible compensation I have been told.
company_reply: Hey Christopher,,We apologise for the negative experience.,Could you please contact us via our Twitter support @ N26_Support, or send us a DM on Facebook. ,We still have reference number - 234253 open for you, please reach out so we can help you further.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

text: N26 & I settled a credit card dispute for a non-fulfilled order. ,Their support member Keith gave detailed and clear instructions regarding what, how and why I needed to do what I had to. title: N26 Business from hero to zero...
text: N26 Business - From hero to zero....,As a FinTech ambassador by nature, N26 was THE bank for my next business in October 2019 ... ,Unfortunately, it doesn't take my business name, only my personal name. That basically means that when my customer wants to pay the invoice send by my business, the (business)name/bank check always ends up negative. And no payments gets done. ,To change into my business name instead of my personal name, the 'support' desks' advised a legal name change of me as a person (into my business name) and provide a legal doc (passport or ID) of the change to have the name changed???? Sounds like someone is taking the p..s. Wow, truly shocked. ,And the point of a bank account is that you can actually receive and make payments! I should have been the targetted audience of N26's clientele, and I'm disappointed but see no other way than to switch to Holvi or Revolut to actually run my business and receive and make payments.
company_reply: Hey, ,Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review. ,We apologise for any misunderstanding with the accounts we are currently offering. The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name.,Our Customers' with this account receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using their Business Mastercard.,We would be happy to discuss your account in detail over on our social media platforms. You can find us on Twitter @N26_support or on Facebook. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: I would give N26 no stars if I could.
text: I would give N26 no stars if I could. Bank card did not arrive.After the event, was advised they do not accept commercial addresses for issue of the card, despite the registration system/chat line initially saying it was acceptable! Chat line cut me off twice so had to explain the issue three times. They did not understand that not everyone in Spain has access to the postal system so rely on PO boxes, which again they do not accept for issue of the bank card. They clearly have not researched the Spanish market well because it was their assertion that every home in Spain has a postal address!  Further I did not receive any kind of contract to see the full terms and conditions so was shocked to find I was on a 12 month contract (???) and that if I wanted to close the account immediately I would have to pay the full 12 months' 'fee' for the You account.  I naturally believed I could close the account with no penalties 'at any time' as they said.,All in all, N26 are a sorry excuse for a bank. Does any bank offer you a 12 month contract for their services?? I have just thrown away 108 euros on this shoddy outfit but quite frankly I am just glad to be free of them. Stay well away.
company_reply: Hey Janet, ,Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. ,We apologise for any mixed messages regarding the accepted postal address. For purposes of security the 1st card ordered must be delivered to a residential address. This is a part of our security protocol to protect our customers'.,A copy of the contract and our terms and conditions for the premium accounts would have been sent to the registered e-mail address in a welcome e-mail. ,Please reach out to us via our social media platforms. You can find us on Twitter @N26_Support or Facebook. We are very active here and would be happy to discuss the case thoroughly with you. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

I can read the FAQ section and if I need help it’s getting lately much easier to chat with someone; but the answers one get are no way answering what you meed to know but rather standard replays. ,So one either think the person sitting there is not very smart or just a computer or not allowed to; and this would be bad!,Once started to work with a bank there are issues that need a in depth vision and a big portion on problem solving skills!!
company_reply: Hi Dorothea,,We're really glad to learn that you have been enjoying your banking experience thus far.,We regret to learn that your experience with our customer service has not reflected your banking experience. We can assure you that all of our agents are trained in the same manner and to the highest quality. They are also offered follow-up training and support to ensure they are always knowledgeable and up to date with all new processes and topics that they will need to assist our customers with. In the event an agent is unsure on a topic they are assisting a customer with, they can reach out to senior support for help.,If you are ever left feeling unsatisfied by your customer service experience, please note that you can always reach out to our social media support channels over on Facebook or via Twitter at @N26_Support, where we would be more than happy to help you.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hey Adnan, ,Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. ,We apologise for any frustration caused by our security measures. You may like to see more on this topic on our helpful blogpost: ,https://n26.com/en-eu/blog/what-is-psd2,Please reach out to us via Twitter @N26_support, we are very active here and would be happy to help. We have made case number - 33552 for you.  Please quote this when reaching out over Twitter.,There is a process in place to help you regain access to your account that we can talk you through. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: As long as nothing goes wrong
text: As long as nothing goes wrong, it's amazing... Second something goes wrong you're screwed. I've used and continue to use the service for the last 3 ish years as my daily bank so I've given it a fair chance and my experience can be broken down to that one line of "As long as nothing goes wrong, it's amazing",Customer service is great, until you need to do something that "Isnt allowed in their policy" then they will leave you hanging for weeks without response. At one stage they locked my bank account and refused to open it again accusing me of committing fraud, two long weeks later the realised they made a mistake, opened it again and didnt even say sorry, that was around a year ago. ,Equally they refuse to accept bank transfers from foreign currencies instead of just converting them to euros... seems like a pretty basic service to offer even if just for the major currencies like USD,CF and GBP.,All that said, they're still better thaan traditional banks, just seems like upper management have awful at their job.

title: An apparently opaque and unresponsive non-service
text: I have good credit, no arrests (e.g.), but when I applied for a free N26 account so that a colleague outside the US could send me some money without paying a large transfer fee, I was denied. I spent time on the phone with customer service trying to find out why, and I was told nothing. N26 refused to provide any information whatsoever.,This policy should change immediately: people who spend time applying to use a service (that is, would-be customers) deserve some minimal explanation of why that service would refuse to work with them. This explanation could even be built into the application to save both parties time, and to preserve the reputation of the service as customer-oriented.
company_reply: Hey, ,Thank you for your interest in opening an account with N26.,We apologise for any frustration caused during the sign-up process. As a fully licensed banking service we follow strict security protocols. ,If you wish to discuss this further please reach out to us on support-us@n26.com. Alternatively you can find us on Twitter on @N26US_Support. ,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team.

title: my application got rejected because I'm Ukrainian
text: N26 does not accept applications from Ukrainian nationals with permanent residence permit in Germany for no good reason.,I will change this review once you add Ukraine to your list, which, btw includes many tiny exotic countries far away from Europe. You just don't make any sense!

title: Don't go for their metal card
text: Don't go for their metal card. You pay almost €17 for very little benefit. They don't even offer automatic overdraft protection, even if you are making a great salary. If you ask for it, they give you a BS answer that they can't change it manually, it's all automatic. Bail from this cheapo bank. Others offer far better services and coverage for less to no fees. It's a ripoff and you can find much better in Europe without the fees.
company_reply: Hey David, ,Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. ,We take our customers' feedback seriously to help us enhance user experience. ,As a fully licensed mobile bank we follow stringent regulations to make sure our customers' have the best and most secure experience whilst banking.,We consider many factors toward your creditworthiness. Being a long-time customer or making your N26 account your main account will have a positive impact on your overdraft application.,This decision is an automated process. If you don’t qualify right now, you can apply again another time when your financial circumstances have changed.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: I had a very bad experience with N26
text: I had a very bad experience with N26. They have a nice concept but whenever you change phone number or change ID document this is very complicated to sort it out. ,They don't update your ID document and if you don't remember the number of your outdated ID you cannot identify yourself anymore. ,There is no phone number, no one you can actually talk to to solve your problem. So there is only their automatic chat.,That helpdesk chat is a very poor service with no follow-up and it looks like it is a robot and not real employees behind this chat.
company_reply: Hey Nathalie, ,Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.,We apologise for any frustration caused by our security protocols. As a fully licensed bank we follow stringent regulations. The security of our customers' accounts is our top priority. ,When using our live-chat function you can type 'Human' at any point to be put through to our dedicated agents. Alternatively, you can send us an e-mail from your registered e-mail address to support@N26.com.,We are also happy to help you over on our social media platforms. You can find us on Twitter (@N26_support) or Facebook (@N26). We are very active here and would be very happy to help you with the contact data on your account. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: It is truely an innovative bank…
text: It is truely an innovative bank compared to any conventional banks -no matter how good they may be! ,I have not yet entirely moved to N26 but it doesn’t only save me some money already, more importantly -I believe- I am saving time! ,Money comes and goes... time however is finite! ,I love your quick and efficient response regardless what’s required!! ✓ ,However I would like to see a temporarily valid, virtual card for single online payments. ,And perhaps a multi banking feature as well?! ,Either way, it’s a win-win-way to go!

title: Moved to Metal
text: Moved to Metal, Card didn't worked, got a wrong new card, now waiting for a card again.,First my Metal Card didn't worked, then it worked, anyway the customer service wanted to send a new one which was a You card (wrong card). I asked the Customer Service if it is right and got the answer yes, I can activate it and it is my new backup card. Activated it and simultaneously Metal card got deactivated. Now a new Metal card is send to me again.,Have to switch payment details for all services I use now for the 2nd time and when I get my second new Metal card for the 3rd time. ,What a horrible experience!
company_reply: Hey Henrik, ,Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. ,We apologise for the mix-up with your new N26 card. We offer a 2nd (You) card to our premium Metal customers' for extra peace of mind. This enables you to keep one card at home and the other on your person. ,We have opened case number-56433 for you. Please reach out to us via our social media channels so we can look into what has happened in this case thoroughly. ,You can find us on Twitter (@N26_support) or over on Facebook (@N26). We can resolve this issue for you quickly.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: STAY AWAY
text: STAY AWAY, this is not a bank, the service they provide resembles more PayPal or Klarna.,Was with N26 for 2 years, regular income of 2000 euros circa. Requested a loan or an overdraft of 1000 euros and was rejected due to risk, which I found quit strange as I am a risk analyst myself. Customer service was rude. Moved to commerzbank and was granted an overdraft immediately based on my income, permanent work contract and schufa. This is not a bank, if you will ever need a loan for a car, mortgage etc.. this is not the place. Better to open an account at an establish bank to build history and good credit score and not to spend time with this experimental "bank". STAY AWAY!
company_reply: Hey Alex, ,Thank you for your review. ,We are sorry to hear of the trouble you had after requesting an overdraft from us. ,We would be happy to look into this further for you. title: Best bank I've ever had
text: Best bank I've ever had, and I've had 4 others in different EU countries. I LOVE that it works equally well in the entire eurozone (it was perfect because I lived in the Netherlands and in Austria), there are no ridiculous fees for every little thing. It took less than 10 minutes to open an account, and I've had it for 2-3 years now and am just as excited about it as when I opened that account. N26 banking is very transparent, the app is user-friendly and has a lovely design and customer service is easy to reach and very quick to respond.

title: Account cancelled without notice
text: Account cancelled without notice [edit - clarification - I was given 21 days to move my funds] citing failure to comply with terms and conditions but no detail given despite the contract saying they should. I’m certain I have complied with everything required and my situation is simple and funds supplied from main stream personal accounts so little doubt of compliance with everything. The same has happened to four people I know in my country of residence - all with different but equally legal situations.,Update after reply - having re-read the contract many times I can still see no reason for cancellation and no wrongdoing on my side or my friends. Response from customer service very slow and just delaying waiting for me to go away. The review stands and if I could remove the remaining star I would.,Edit - still no reason provided (contrary to the terms that say I have a right to correct). Was fobbed off for three weeks and finally told I could still access messages after account closure but on day of closure my log-in was removed... surprise surprise a message the next day, but I can’t get it!
company_reply: Hey Sean, ,Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. ,We apologise for any inconvenience caused by the account closure. ,As a fully licensed mobile bank we follow stringent regulations. When the account was first opened you would have received our terms and conditions via e-mail, you will be able to check through these.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Bad first experience during verification
text: If you newly moved to Germany and can't speak German yet, better avoid this company. Their video verification agents can only speak German and will question you like "how did you get a job in Germany if you cannot speak German" and will hang up even if they can speak English. I got hanged-up 4x already because I can only speak with them in English.,Update 24.03.2020:,> I signed up with another account while my phone was in English, and finally I was connected to a English-speaking agent. I was able to get verified finally. So far, the app looks okay and time will tell how useful it will be for someone who already uses Revolut and Transferwise. Thus, bumping the rating a little bit and changing the review title.,> I was informed that the verification agents are not N26 employees but are outsourced from a company called IDNow. But even so, N26 has the responsibility to maintain and monitor the quality of service being provided by these third party providers who are doing work on behalf of N26.

title: N26 is the bank of my trust but has some issues.
text: N26 is the bank of my trust. But I don't know whether that is good or not. As a Cyber Security Consultant I am aware of the attack methods and dangers of storing your money in a pure online bank. Nevertheless, in other banks, too, the money is now lying on some kind of server. ,The reason for my mediocre rating is customer service. My account was blocked two years ago in the middle of a vacation because the algorithm discovered "anomalies". Unfortunately, I was only contacted after 72 hours, which is just unfortunate. For me and the bank. That caused an enormous loss of trust. Moreover, in such cases a callback service cannot be reached directly, you first have to wait so long in the chat and then you can request a callback when you have really explained what it is all about. Small support cases are handled well via chat.,I like N26 and also recruit friends for this bank, because MoneyBeam alone has enormous advantages. Also the possibility to withdraw money for free everywhere is just great. Nevertheless, the bank still has a long way to go if it wants to win the trust of many new customers.
company_reply: Hey Leon, ,Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback. ,We are happy to hear you are enjoying using some of the account features we offer such as MoneyBeam. As we continue to grow this year we will be adding many more features that we hope you will love using. ,As for the your account being blocked last year, we apologise for the inconvenience this caused you, especially as you were on holiday at the time.  As a fully licensed bank security of our customers' accounts is the top priority. ,Should you wish to discuss any concerns regarding your account further we would be more than happy to be contacted over our social channels. You can find us on Twitter @N26_support or Facebook @N26 where we are very active. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: NEVER OPEN AN ACCOUNT WITH N26 IF YOU WANT GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE
text: Opened my account whilst on holiday in India,Unable to access my account to validate my card because, quote.... ,The N26 computer gets confused between gmail and googlemail accounts  ! ,Customer services had me walking 8 miles round trip three times in blazing heat to use the card in an ATM as part of their two point safety measure. ,Why not just register my mothers maiden name or ask the amount held or some other questions like any "normal" company  ? ,After a whole day wasted on the telephone I then had to write a release note with proof of ID and send it via email so the staff can request the closing of my account.... Still not guaranteed. ,Having already proved who I am I then had to take pictures of said proof and documents then send via email... ,So much for German efficiency... ,NEVER AGAIN,As you will see from the reply from the bank they still totally ignore the customer and customers views. ,There is NO law which says you have to use the N26 system of validation, being forced to find an ATM is their invention NOT LAW. ,Yes we now have a 2 tier security system by law BUT they could devise a system which is customer friendly.... N26 have taken ZERO account for any customers with disabilities or people of age who are less mobile... ,A disgusting response from N26 but after my experience I would expect nothing less.... ,They have offered me the princely sum of £30 compensation after totally ruining a whole day of my holiday in India because their staff failed to do their job properly...... You are obviously a company who thinks they have got it right, your arrogance is totally offensive and I for one will never deal with you again and I highly recommend people find an alternative rather than have to deal with staff who cannot read (basic requirement) and do not understand their own company procedures. ,Also they assume I knew I was changing my phone number.... Truth is it is best not to assume anything..... I had my telephone stolen ,One word...... PATHETIC!
company_reply: Hey Stephen, ,We are sorry to learn of this negative experience with our security procedures. ,As a fully licensed mobile bank we follow stringent security regulations. One of the main foundations is two-factor authentication, this feature is here to stay in the banking sector to protect our customers' accounts. ,We would always advise, if possible, letting us know of a phone number change before it happens, especially before travelling to another country such as India. ,You may like to read our helpful blog on this subject - https://n26.com/en-eu/blog/what-is-psd2,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Problems with connecting to customer service
text: I've had a really horrible experience with them.  When signing up, they linked my card with my American phone number and then I learned there system doesn't accept this even though it was set up this way based on their advice. It took over a week to sort out the problem and I could not access any of my money.  Then recently I tried to withdraw from an atm and the atm canceled my withdrawal. I tried another and the same thing happened.  This was on a Friday night.  They debited my account for it.,Their system of customer service does not let you call. Instead, you have to use an online chat system that logs you out if you are inactive, however, they constantly ask you to wait while they figure out the problem.  They will offer to call you but not specify a time except "within the next several days from 7-11." ,Once I finally did reach a customer service representative on the phone, we eventually worked out the atm issues. I just wish that it wasn't such a process to speak with someone on the phone and the online chat was more empathetic.
company_reply: Hey,,Thank you for taking the time to leave us a detailed review.  ,We are sorry to learn of this difficulty with our two factor authentication process. ,Should you like to discuss the experience in detail case number - 54247 is still open for you. You can find us on our Twitter @N26_support or Facebook platforms. ,We would like to discuss your case and find a way to turn this negative experience around. ,All the best, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: N26 is not secure
text: N26 is not secure, they allow you to steal your money days after you have authorized a transaction. Never keep money on the N26, you can wake up one day and not be there anymore. I bought a ticket on 01/20, traveled on 01/27, on 01/30 I was charged, complained, and they stopped responding to me, saying that a charge is normal 10 days later.
company_reply: Hey Vinicius,,thank you for reaching out. Please be assured that your account and money is always safe with us, as the safety of our accounts is our highest priority. Please find our statement on security in the following link: https://n26.com/en-de/security,It seems that what you have experienced is the authorization of the amount by the merchant that you bought the ticket from. When you buy something online or offline with your card or your card details, not to be confused with your bank details such as your IBAN, the merchant first authorizes the amount before deducting it from your account. ,To authorize the amount means that the merchant reserves the amount for deduction before finally deducting it from your account. After the amount was authorized  the merchant has 12 days to deduct the amount from your account, otherwise the authorization will expire which mean the amount would have never left your account. ,Most of the merchants chose to deduct the amount which they have authorized on the same day the authorization happened, but some merchants take their time and deduct the amount a few days later, but as mentioned before not later than 12 days. This is the case that most likely happened to you. ,You can always check which amounts have already been deducted from your account and which ones were just authorized by downloading and checking your balance statement. All amounts listed there are the ones that have been deducted from your account or credit transfers your account has received. The authorized amounts which have not yet been deducted are only visible in your transactions list. ,You can easily download and check your balance statement by clicking on the three dots at the upper right corner of your app and selecting the option to download your balance statement. ,The authorization is a normal banking procedure offered by most credit card providers such as Mastercard. ,We are sorry if this caused any inconvenience for you. ,We gladly offer to take a look at your transaction and check what exactly has happened. Feel free to contact us on Twitter @N26_Support or Facebook https://www.facebook.com/N26/ and we'll help you out and answer all your questions regarding this topic.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: cander Suffer compliance check
text: My account has been blocked. For no reason. ,A little background. I am a stage 3 cancer sufferer. With terminal prognosis. I am on end of life support. And have cancer riddled through my body. ,I have been with N26 since the beginning and trusted N26 with my money. ,I use my money to travel to and from hospital to receive life saving chemotherapy. I have no family. ,It’s just me. I now have no way of supporting myself. I can’t buy and food or purchase any electric. My electric ran out 18 hours ago. ,I have no electric in my house. Therefore can not use heating or to cook any food. I can not shower or wash myself apart from in the sink. ,I have started to self harm now because of the terrible life I already have. And that cancer is taking my life at only 32 years of age. And I didn’t think my life could get any worse. ,Why would my bank leave me with no access to money. My money from sickness will be paid on Friday with no access to it. This is money that is paid to help me live. I can’t not pay my rent. ,I feel like there is no end. And I just want to kill myself before the cancer takes my life anyway. ,Why would N26 do this to me,Told me compliance check. And nothing not a single communication from them. Disgusting. I just want to die
company_reply: Hey, ,We apologise for any inconvenience caused by our security protocol. As a fully licensed Mobile Bank we follow strict security regulations to protect our customers’ accounts. ,Please reach out to us over on our social media platforms. We are very active here and would love to help. You can find us on Twitter @N26_Support and Facebook.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Overall 5*

title: the Worst bank.
text: N26 is quite possibly the worst bank out there. Around 9 days ago my account was locked with my money in there so I complained in the hope my account would get unblocked, they did nothing and told me I would have to wait, and then a few days ago my remaining balance was removed from my account and the transfer said N26 had taken it themselves, so I wanted to know why. But yet again the reply was we can’t disclose that information or tell you how long it’ll be till you get it back, I have recently spoken to my solicitor about filing a lawsuit against N26 as it is illegal to remove money from someone’s account without there permission in the UK, I urge anyone that has been treated unfairly by N26 to please email me at David.todd98@(icloud.com), so that I can use this to show how many of us have been treated so unfairly by this terrible bank.
company_reply: Hey David, ,Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. ,We apologise for any inconvenience caused by our security protocol. As a fully licensed Mobile Bank we follow strict security regulations to protect our customers’ accounts. ,In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular and routine checks on user accounts. We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you. ,In the event your account is blocked, we will make contact with you via email. For this reason, our customer support team is unable to advise further on these situations via alternative communication channels.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Nothing for EU residents
text: If you live in Europe as a permanent resident, you cannot open an account with them. They don't accept your ID card. You probably have to have a citizenship first.,After I received their reply, I've checked the list of documents they accept. For the vast majority of countries they don't accept residence permits, so my review still stands.,I wish I knew about it and didn't waste my time trying to sign up.
company_reply: Hi,,It's not necessary to obtain citizenship to sign up for an account with N26. As a licensed bank, we are obliged to securely verify the identity of all potential customers. To verify your account, it is necessary to hold one of our currently supported documents, which can be viewed here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/account/how-to-prove-my-identity,We are always working to add more and more accepted documents to this list, so we hope that we'll be able to onboard you in future.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

We follow these processes to ensure our users accounts are kept safe and secure. ,If you have any further questions feel free to reach out to us via email to support@n26.com. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Inefficient problem solving
text: Inefficient problem solving by the support center. Although they answer fast and are always kind via chat, it seems that the security procedures are almost made to exhaust the client. I had several issues with my account where I made a couple of wrong attempts to type in my pin code, or when I had to unpair my device due to device upgrade, and more instances when my account got blocked. I would normally appreciate the security measures taken to protect my account however when I am ready to answer all security questions and my account is still not re-opened after the 5th person I speak with on the support team, and after following ALL the instructions, then something is clearly wrong!,With N26 everything is done online, hence some technology like face recognition would be useful, rather than forcing an ATM withdrawal multiple times just to identify me as my own account owner, but then still not being able to re-open my account. Probably the most frustrating service I have ever encountered, and what makes it unbearable is that my own finances are then being frozen. ,Recommended to stay away if you don't actually have the time to spend hours on the chat for basic requests.
company_reply: Hey Roberta, ,Thank you for the feedback. ,We would like to kindly remind you that we have set up a reference number ready to help with your case.  ,Please come and speak to us on our Twitter support @ N26_Support, or over Facebook @N26 and quote code - 68821.,We are a fully licensed mobile bank and must follow strict security regulations to protect our customers’ accounts. We apologise for any inconvenience caused by our security protocol.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Chat service better than expected
text: I did a lot of research before electing my new mobile bank solution. I signed up with N26 in the end. ,Immediately, I had a problem because I entered the wrong email during signup. So I couldn't log in, but enough details about me were saved on the system to prevent me from signing up again ("Contact CS").,I Googled my way to the support page and opened a chat. Went through verification twice with two agents that disconnected. Not sure if it was my internet or their system.,Started looking for competitors. Read more reviews, especially about customer service. Considered Revolut again. Then I decided to give the N26 chat one more try. Third time lucky, Miran came through and the chat was stable through the great customer service. ,Now I'm awaiting an email so I can sign up again, but from a CS standpoint, this was an acceptable experience. Getting hold of someone to help you is usually the shi*tiest part of the journey, so happy they're accessible on a Saturday morning for someone who isn't even a customer yet. Some services force you through a login procedure, which I wouldn't have passed since I don't know in which way I mis-spelled my email address. And wouldn't have been able to verify that email anyway since I can't access my non-existent, mis-spelled email account.,User error fixed by service provider. THAT'S customer service.,Thank you, Miran.

title: I love the product, but the customer service ...
text: I love the product and user experience, but the customer support experience is still pretty poor especially when you have to talk to a person. They seem to blindly follow procedures and try to close cases fast instead of looking for solutions that work for both them and the customer.,More seniority and customer centric approach would serve them well.
company_reply: Hey Andreas,,Thanks for your feedback.,We regret to learn that you've been left disappointed by your customer service experience. ,All of our agents are trained in the same manner and to the highest quality. Our agents are also offered follow-up training and support to ensure they are always knowledgeable and up to date with all new processes and topics that they will need to assist our customers with. In the event an agent is unsure on a topic they are assisting a customer with, they can reach out to senior support for help. We apologise that this was not reflected on your recent contacts with us.,Please feel free to reach out to our Twitter Support Channel @N26_Support, where we would be happy to help with any queries you may have.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Patient, Helpful, Informative & Resourceful.
text: Had a very patient & friendly agent who went the extra mile to get the problem solved, he was very helpful, informative & resourceful and we had the problem fixed after an hour or so, very pleasant experience that left me satisfied, its a great service without a doubt!

title: Non existent customer service. Arrogant agents. Outrageous bank policies.
text: Rude and arrogant agents. I was unable to open an account without any reason. Robotic agents kept saying “we can’t open an account and won’t provide you any further information”. I went online and left some negative reviews on this bank and got a response saying that I was unable to open an account because my identity can’t be verified. Why agents couldn’t tell me that at first place???? I got back to customer service saying I’m ready to provide any information to verify my identity and again I got the same automated response “we can’t open an account and won’t give you any further information”. This is outrageous. Of course you can’t verify my identity by just asking my name and date of birth! All online banks in the US ask for photos of IDs, social, selfie etc to verify identity. Why can’t you? Absolutely terrible.
company_reply: Hey Anton,,Thank you for your interest in opening an account with N26. We’re sorry if we are unable to offer you an account. As a bank, we have to follow strict legal requirements for every account we open. Unfortunately, occasionally this means we are not able to open accounts due to these restrictions. Due to legal constraints, we are not able to give you any more information.,Best,,N26 Support

title: Their referral program SUCKS!
text: I have joined their referral program and for weeks I am waiting to receive my referral bonus. I don't know where to begin, so many things were off and misleading or confusing:,1. Spend 30 EUR, get 30 EUR you said. My girlfriend spent 30 EUR, waited for a month to receive the card and all the trouble. but then in those small letters with terms of conditions of the program we see that she needs to spend 30 EUR AT ONCE. do a better wording next time can you?,2. ANother friend just booked his plane tickets with his new card. this happend 3 weeks ago. Bonus? Still pending, because their support people just keep saying 'It may take up to 60 days' to receive the bonus. 60 days? WHY???,3. Even though I am still waiting for 60 days to be completed for (hopefully) receiving my bonus, another friend of mine already did receive his bonus. Which is super annoying, seems like it is quite arbitrary, some receive bonus right away whereas the rules just apply for some others, apparently.,4. I contacted their support agents for a proper explanation and I don't really want to give into the details of the quality of their support agents. They are just a nightmare.
company_reply: Hi Burhan,,We're sorry that you have had some issues with our referral bonus system, and would be happy to clear this up for you.,Provided that all conditions for referral are met, the bonus will be paid to you within 60 days. This is the absolute maximum amount of time the bonus can take to be paid out, and does not necessarily mean that it will take the full 60 days.,To receive your reward your friend must meet all our requirements:,1 - Complete their sign up using your referral link or personal code.,2 - Activate their Mastercard.,3 - Complete 1 (in-store, online or ATM) transaction with their Mastercard worth a minimum of €15 (or €30 in your case) ,As noted, this would need to be one single transaction, and not a number of transactions adding up to €30.,Please feel free to reach out to us over on our Twitter Support channel over at @N26_Support if you need any assistance.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Nothing to offer over existing banks except abusive customer service.
text: Simply dreadful. They are now leaving the UK, so this review is somewhat pointless, but perhaps could serve as a warning to our European friends.,n26's excuse for leaving the UK is due to brexit. Except they entered the UK market post brexit. So really it's just an excuse. I suspect the real reason they're leaving the UK is because frankly they have nothing to offer over our existing great banks except a level of customer service that we left behind in the 80's. That they managed to retain such a low number of customers should tell you all you need to know.
company_reply: Hi Jamie,,With the UK having left the EU, we will soon no longer be able to operate in the UK with our European banking licence. As a result, we will be leaving the UK in the coming months. We understand this is disappointing for our customers, and we are sorry to be leaving.,You can use your account and app as normal until it is closed on 15 April 2020. ,We'd be happy to investigate the issues you have had with our customer service. You can contact us over at @N26_Support on Twitter.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Great digital bank IF you don’t have a…
text: Great digital bank IF you don’t have a problem. If you do the support is sketchy and the app locks you out from time to time (not great for a digital bank). I also think they could have handled the cancellation of UK accounts post Brexit in a more transparent way. They knew they were going to do this and kept signing people up and charging for cards.

We are grateful for your support and have planned our next steps to ensure this process is smooth for you. title: Do not trust N26
text: Do not trust N26 - they will not help you if you experience any fraud on your account. ,My boyfriend was a victim of fraud recently due to fraud that took place whilst using an ATM. He lost 2000 euros as a result. N26 lied to us, and said that Mastercard had made the decision not to refund the funds back to his account. We followed this up with Mastercard, who confirmed it was in fact N26 who made the decision.,For 6 weeks, we have been trying to get help via N26's support and complaints department, but they will not help us. They have said that the decision has been finalised, there are no extra steps to help us.,We have repeatedly requested that they assist us to get CCTV from the time of the withdrawal to prove that my boyfriend did not access these funds. We have also referenced N26 terms and conditions that state that they will refund funds lost due to ATM fraud, and they have now simply stopped replying. Out of everyone we spoke to from N26's support and complaints department, not one member of staff offered any words of sympathy or acknowledgement for the hellish experience my boyfriend is going through. Very poor customer service indeed.,I have spoken to several other N26 customers that have also lost funds due to the actions of N26. These customers were only able to get their funds back through lengthy EC dispute resolution processes. It has become painfully clear that N26 do not care about customers and their money, their inexperienced staff only care about closing tickets, and they will simply ignore any messages containing evidence relating to serious fraud. There's nowhere you can visit in person, there is no number you can call - as a customer, you are completely powerless in this situation. ,Alternative reviews you might read about N26 simply relate to customers who have never had any issues or lost any money, but that is a very precarious position to be in as a customer. Think carefully about whether you want to take that risk when you are selecting a bank. Better to go with a bank that will actually help you when things go wrong.
company_reply: Hi Genevieve,,We regret to learn of this situation.,In the event you have experienced card fraud on your N26 account, our dedicated chargeback team will open a dispute with MasterCard once they have been alerted to the issue. ,They will then investigate the case thoroughly in accordance with MasterCard Terms & Conditions. It seems that in your case, we were unable to return these funds after conducting the appropriate investigation. ,We are sorry that this was not the resolution you had hoped for.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: I have found N26 very good
text: I have found N26 very good. I particularly appreciate the livechat service where you can type "human" and actually interact with a person! Obviously, not all the customer service reps are top-notch but overall they are good, they get things done and resolve questions. title: Transparency and Immediacy
text: No hidden charges, quick and simple ways to pay people and receive money, great financial products you can add on and manage 24/7, and everything is right there in front of you and super simple to use. Another very simple but deceptively powerful feature is just the immediacy of the app and how it shows the incomings and outgoings of your finances right there, right now. ,Seeing and being notified immediately of what you've paid for and what you've received (including the recurring (automated) bill payments) meant I immediately got a hold of my finances and could control them. I was then able to stop using a credit card with another bank and quickly began saving. I have N26 to thank for that.

title: I have a very bad experiences with N26
text: I have a very bad experiences with N26.  Due to upgrade of their system, they require to download the software and started 2 way authentication.  It just happened that I changed phone no and couldn't login even though I have the updated software.  I tried to contact them to explain the situation, they just asked me to re-submit all the relevant documents and take photo as new to sign up.  However, over a period of nine months now, I spread over 5 or 6 times to do this again as every time they just send you message either the photos are not clear and documents are not readable things like that.  It was frustrated as I tried to hard just for re-verification of my identity.  The support were slow and only when I complained that they moved.   The processes up till now was not successful and I decided to give up.  I have queries over the support and how they deals with this.  The Open chat never able to open, even I sent them the screen shots, they never replied and so not able to contact them via chat but only emails.  They stop you to escalate to the manager level but you don't seem to find their support management make sense.  Anyway, I am a bit concerned and so just to alert those and hope this will not happen to you.
company_reply: Hey, thank you very much for taking the time to write this detailed review.,We are sorry for the inconvenience.,We would gladly look into this matter for you, to help you out with this.,Unfortunately, we are unable to assist via Trustpilot.,Therefore, we would like to ask you to reach out to us privately via Twitter: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 ,Or Facebook:,https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/,We will escalate this case for you, so that you are finally be able to use your account again normally.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Social Media Support.

company_reply: Hey,,Thank you for your kind feedback. ,We’re really happy to hear you love our app! We hope that as you continue banking with us we will earn that missing star.,As for your IBAN not being accepted, merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of Regulation No 260/2012).,If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please contact your relevant national authority directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn’t accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).,Best, ,Customer Support Team

title: Beware: HOLDING OVER £7000
text: Beware: HOLDING OVER £7000,Sent my partner a faster payment on 21st january 2020 which wasnt received for £7000+.,Live chat said wait 24 hours.,Waited, and nothing happened so i sent a smaller transfer to test and it went through fine. ,Contacted N26 Live chat who said they that their was an issue and its being investigated. ,I didnt hear back for a few days.,I emailed N26, on about 25th January and auto response is that they will contact me within 1-2 working days.,Needless to say, no one has contacted my and its now been 16 days that my £7000+ has been missing. ,I have raised a complaint with resolver which they are also ignoring so once it reaches a months time I will contact the financial ombudsman.,Just be careful guys this bank can not be trusted it seems.
company_reply: Hey Zoe,,thanks for your message.,We would like to help you further in this case.,If a customer sends a higher amount of money, we have to check for the correct sort code + account number in addition the name of the account holder.,Both of this have to match, otherwise, due to the Anti-Money Laundering, we have to send back the money to the sender.,This process can take time up to 10 days. After this you should have received your money back or it went through to your partner.,This is a normal procedure every bank has to full fill. We understand that you are worried, but this is all in the normal behaviour of the rules.,By now you should have already received your money and we hope that you will never encounter this again.,You can contact us at anytime directly on our Twitter/Facebook Channel or directly in your N26 App through the live chat.,Best Regards,,Your N26 support team.

title: Disrespectful bank
text: I'm very disappointed with this bank.,When I open my account I was in Brazil with a number from there, and then I changed my number for a European number but I forget to change my number in my app, but yesterday they asked me to do an authentication by a code which it was sent in my old number, that I don't have access anymore.,I contacted the chat yesterday(31/01) and I talked with a guy who calls Nycoloas, he explained me the procedure, that I had gone to ATM and made a withdrawal and came back to chat give to him the rest of the information, and he gave me a code and told that someone would call me until 24 hours and I would have to give the code, and then they would change my new number. Until this point ok, because I understand that this is the procedure, but they didn't call me, so I decided to do another chat on Saturday (1/02/2020).,My second chat was with Leonor, I give all my information again and explained that I was waiting for the call but I didn't happen yet, and I was needed to use the app urgently. Leonor told me that the had an intern problem, and my first request didn't happen, so he gave me another code and told me to wait because it was in priority. Now, after more than 24 hours of my first request, I've just tried again to talk on chat.,Now, Fabio talked with me, I had to give him all the information again, and he told me that I will need to go again in an ATM, make a withdrawal and then come back AGAIN to the chat for someone to continue the procedure. ,What he told me: "It seems that there was a problem with the verification so I will have to kindly ask you to perform a new ATM withdrawal attempt so that we can properly verify you and request",I cannot understand this messy, the first time ok to do all these verifications and also the withdrawal, but if you, as a bank have any problem with the procedure, you had to contact me, you have my email and my new number. If I hadn't tried again to talk on chat, I would be waiting until I don't know when...,I don't know when they will solve my problem, and how much time I will need to contact them.,This is super disrespectful to the clients.,I don't recommend this bank who doesn't' have a minimum of respect with their clients.

When you need to change your mobile phone number in the future we would recommend getting in touch via livechat before the number has changed. ,Should you wish to discuss this in more detail, please reach out to us on our Twitter Support channel @N26_Support. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: N26 is just faboulous
text: N26 is just faboulous, Dutch banks can learn a lot from them. They have two kinds of accounts, one is free and the other one is a business account. I have been using a free account from N26 since the beginning of 2018. What I like most about them is that they offer a Maestro debitcard, which you can use in literally every shop in The Netherlands. They also offer 5 free ATM withdrawals per month. Where else do you get that? I am super pleased with their services, and never had any issues since I started to use them. And what I like the most: they are completely free of charge. The ING charges 1.25 euro per month just for holding a bank card. That's kinda lame if you ask me. The only thing I'm missing is to pay online with IDEAL with N26, but I've heard rumours they are planning to introduce this as well. The minute N26 offers the possibility to pay with IDEAL, I will be closing down my account at ING. ,Keep up the great job you're doing N26, greeting from a very happy customer. :))

company_reply: Hey, ,Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. ,When paying for petrol the merchant (Total) will often take a reservation of funds that is greater than the amount you will pay. They are able to hold funds in reservation for 10 working days before taking payment and releasing the extra amount back to your balance. ,The best way to check on whether your payment is in reservation or has been taken is by downloading your balance statement in the N26 app. Should the payment show on there it will mean the funds have been taken and are no longer held in reservation. ,In the case of a merchant making an error by not releasing the reservation back to your balance, please let us know. We will be able to open a dispute for you and retrieve the funds. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Where do I begin..
text: Where do I begin... I got this card in September of 2019. I decided in November to activate it and put money on the card. That date was November 22, 2019. Later that day I went to use the card to make a purchase and the card got declined.. I was curious as to why because I know I deposited money onto the card. I called customer service to see what the problem was. I was told that the account was chosen for "verification" and that it was "temporarily" suspended. They told me that the verification department would get back to me thru email within 2 to 3 business days. Ok no problem.. it was annoying but I get it. I called a week later to see why I had not received any emails. Customer service had no idea of the procedure and could not transfer me to the verification department. They said they deal in email only. This makes no sense to me but ok. I called every week for 2 months. Its now January 27th and still no word. my account is still suspended and I have no idea why. The department has not sent me any word. Customer service supervisors have no ideas. I receive emails with surveys attached on how the service has been to me and statements but No word as to when I will have access to my money. I am beyond frustrated. All I want is my cash back and to never deal with this bank again. they have robbed me of my money and I don't know who to call for help on this. I'm considering legal action. Get it together N26 and get me my money ASAP.

company_reply: Hi Gordon,,We are glad to learn that your issue has been resolved.,We are sorry you had an issue with the live chat support. We can assure you the agent would not close the connection intentionally - if they transferred it to an alternative agent, it would then go to another queue and out of their hands, so they would have no option to close the chat at that point. It is possible there was a connection error on some side, and we apologise for this. ,We will review the correspondence you had with the agent on chat. You can get back to us on Twitter should you need anything.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Awesome fintech service.

I cannot think how classic bank entities will be able to compete against fintechs having apps like N26 on the market once the latter start offering the usual financial services.

title: Bad experience with N26
text: Bad experience with N26,I’ll start with something positive, it’s easy to open a N26 bank account and the app is very user friendly. But closing your account is not so simple... I opened an account and saw somewhere you get Loungekey access with the N26 metal and then contacted them SPECIFICALLY to confirm if I have the lounge Key access  before upgrading to the N26 metal card. It then turns out it’s only offered to UK customers.... I then said that in that case I want to cancel my metal membership as this is why I upgraded. Their response...sorry you’ll need to pay the cancellation fee or keep it for one year..... This was not my mistake yet I have to pay for it
company_reply: Hi Willem,,We're sorry that you were not aware that LoungeKey was not offered with an N26 EUR Metal account. This is currently only available for N26 UK Metal accounts.,If you view the specific benefits of the Euro Metal account, LoungeKey is not listed: https://n26.com/en-eu/metal ,There is a revocation period of 14 days for the Metal account. If this period has passed, the agreed upon fees for the remainder of the contract would need to be paid before the account is cancelled: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/membership-plans/how-to-cancel-my-n26-you-or-n26-metal-membership,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Unreliable
text: Unreliable. ,Did not deliver my card.,Did not bother contacting me about it. ,Didn't apologise or take responsibility since "it is DHL that deals with cards in Europe". Thank you for the condescending remark.,Were absolutely incapable of finding out why it had not been delivered, or give an alternative solution.,Meanwhile, I am in Germany and I have no means of payments in Euros, so I must use my British card for which I loose incredible amounts on the exchange rate. My salary is stuck in my N26 account. ,A warm thank you to N26.
company_reply: Hi Seb,,We're sorry that you have had some issues with the delivery of your card.,Your card is automatically issued upon your account being verified, and is then passed on for delivery. If you opt for standard delivery, there is no tracking link provided. Usually delivery is done within 10 days unless otherwise stated, and if it has been longer than this we would be happy to reorder for you free of charge after contacting us via live chat. ,In the meantime, you can avail of our Cash26 service to withdraw cash without your card: https://support.n26.com/en-de/getting-started/cash/what-is-cash26,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Do not deposit your money into this…
text: ## UPDATE,I have received my money, but better management must be taken in cases like this. If there are no branches, there must be a  emergency contact.,How a bank can operate this is is astonishing, the total disregard for the someones money that's used to pay for daily expenses. Whatever their issue is, they haven't even asked for my side or further information. Sadly at this point I'm now in the lengthy process of going through the Financial Ombudsman Service and HM Courts.,If only I could go back and never of signed up for this bank. If you want a bank that will freeze and take your money without explanation and then have no contact number or branch, maybe it's for you. My account has only ever been used to accept UK transfers and pay for goods, no cash has ever been handled.,I will documenting the legal process via Youtube, and actively working to warn and promote awareness of this bank, it's totally unacceptable. I'm currently speaking to a few media companies and updating them on the case. Stick with a high street bank, where you can talk to someone and resolve issues. The best you'll get here is a 1-2 day response automated message, the support live chat can't help with anything.
company_reply: Hi Bumonte,,We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this has caused.,In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out regular routine compliance checks on user accounts. As a regulated institution, we are obliged to do this to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. On occasion, the result of these compliance checks will indicate that we must terminate our business relationship, and we will inform you of this via email.,This compliance process is overseen out by a dedicated internal team, who will reach out to you via email with further updates. For this reason, our customer service agents cannot advise further. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: It is easy to use and convenient
Fraudulent Bank
text: Last week after looking at my deposits and withdrawals I noticed $116.71 was missing from my account due to bank error  ... I used the chat feature on the app and explained the situation ... the chat representative basically refused to help... a contacted the bank again through the chat feature told the representative my issue and he provided me with the customer service phone number. I called in and told them the issue. The representative opened a ticket and told me it would be 3 business days for someone to get back to me ... I called again the next day to get an update and was hung up on by a supervisor. I called back again the representative Dondre stated he could see the bank error with my balance and he would work to get the ticket expedited to get my money back to me. Of course I didn’t receive a call or email so I’ve been calling repeatedly.. I have been hung on numerous times and treated in despicable manner. I only want MY money back that’s all. This is the bank’s mistake and I should not have to beg to get my money back. This is my money that I worked for and entrusted to this bank and they have taken advantage of me. Please beware of this bank and their practices before doing business with them. I would hate for another customer to go through  what I’m going through with them. It’s horrible to do this .... the bank just takes your money and refuses to give it back !!!

title: Perfect, but not for Amsterdam
text: I have just arrived in Amsterdam and N26 was by far the easiest and fastest banking account to open. It works perfectly and I really can´t complain about the Bank. I wish I could keep N26, but I´m having some difficulties here in Amsterdam,,1 - You only get a Master Card and many places here in Amsterdam only accept Maestro.,2 - For every service that requires your account info for automatic debit (Gym membership, Cell Phone Plan, Internet Plan, etc...) they only accept Dutch banks. So basically, I am not able to use my N26 account for absolutely nothing here in Amsterdam. It´s a shame as I really like the service, the app and all the conveniences that comes with the package.
company_reply: Hey Pedro! ,Thanks for your feedback. ,We’re really happy to hear you are enjoying using N26. To make banking more convenient for our users in the Netherlands you can order a Maestro card within your app. You can see more here: ,https://support.n26.com/en-de/getting-started/cards/how-to-order-my-maestro-card,We hope this information will enable you to continue banking with us so we can earn that missing star! ,Best, ,Customer Support Team

company_reply: Hi Diamante,,As a licensed mobile bank, we are under strict obligation to securely verify the identity of all users.,In order to verify an account with us, it is necessary to hold one of our supported documents, which can be found here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/account/how-to-prove-my-identity,When signing up, if you have indicated to the app that you hold a document which is currently not supported, it will automatically inform you that we are unable to verify your document at the moment.,We apologise for any disappointment. We are always hoping to add more and more documents to our supported list, and we will amend this list as soon as there are any updates.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Froze my account and won’t give me my money!!
text: I actually used to love N26, it was everything I wanted from a bank, til I filed a dispute. The dispute process wasn’t too bad. I have to fill out dispute forms and answer questions in regards to the transactions, 24 hours later I was advised my case was open. Within a day or two the funds were back in my account and N26 closed the dispute in my favor but immediately froze my account.  This was 6.5 days ago, no explanation haven’t other than my account is frozen and they will update me when they are done with researching account. I have emailed 4 times and no response, I have called multiple times and get told a specialist will get back to me and nothing! I have used private chat and talked to 5 support team members and initially I was told specialist would get back to me with a day, never heard a word back. All the other reps just tell me that a specialist is researching my account and I have to wait til they are done. They can not give me a time line, can not tell me why, can not do anything except continue to block me from accessing my money!  That’s the only checking account I have and those are the only funds I have to my name and I can’t even access them! I’m beyond frustrated with this bank! I filed a claim with BBB in regards to them holding my funds with no explanation and no response from N26! I do not recommend banking with them!
company_reply: Hi Stacy. This usually means that there is a routine check on your account. As a fully fledged bank, we have to periodically run these checks. N26 Customer Service has no further information about this. We will reach out to you once we can provide details to you via email as soon as we have an update for you. ,Best,,Your N26 support team

company_reply: Hi Peter,,If you wish to close your N26 account, you just need email support@n26.com, stating your full name, your N26 IBAN and the date in which you wish for the account to be closed. The account can only be closed once the balance is at zero.,If  you have a premium account for which you pay a monthly fee, it is necessary for the agreed upon monthly fees for the remainder of the contract to be paid. This  contract would have been why you received a notice stating your account will be renewed in 3 months. You can find out more about this here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/membership-plans/how-to-cancel-my-n26-you-or-n26-metal-membership,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Be careful about exchange rates and hidden fees
text: Be careful about exchange rates and these hidden fees.. I live in Denmark and should pay EUR 14.99 to Germany  - N26 transferred that to DKK 117,12 and took an Exchange rate at 0,13381, which means the total end up being EURO 15,67!!
company_reply: Hi Erik,,If you are sending to an institution that can process SEPA transfers, there would be no fee for the transfer. If you are transferring to a currency other than Euro or to an institution that cannot process SEPA, it's necessary to use a currency exchange service such as TransferWise. They would charge a small fee, depending on the amount being transferred: https://n26.com/en-eu/transferwise,We do not charge any fees whatsoever on incoming transfers. If you have been charged a fee on a transfer you have sent to N26, this would be charged by the sending institution.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hi,,We're sorry to learn of this situation.,Should you ever have issues accessing your account, you can reach our chat service daily for assistance, so that we can ensure you regain access as soon as possible. You can open a chat via the following link, and you do not need to be logged into the app. You just need to select "Open a Chat" at the bottom of this link: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/other/how-to-contact-n26,It is only possible for a transfer to be made out of your account after the transfer itself has been confirmed within the one device that is paired to your N26 account. We would like to learn more about this situation, so we invite you to contact us via our Twitter Support Channel over at @N26_Support so we can help.,If you change your phone number often, we advise you to firstly contact us via chat on the device which is paired to your account. This is so you can verify yourself in the app before speaking with an agent. If you are logged into the mobile app, you can then initiate a chat, and the agent will arrange a callback to amend your number.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Thought I canceled my account within…
text: Thought I canceled my account within the 14 day period. Found out I just canceled my 1 year membership. They now expect me to pay them 202.82 euros for something I haven't even used and I didn't even received the Metal card yet. Such a scummy move.
company_reply: Hi Niels,,We're sorry to learn of this situation.,If you choose to cancel your metal subscription from within the app, this will only cancel the renewal, rather than the current contract. This is advised in the email we send to you following opting to cancel within the app. If the legal revocation period of 14 days expires, this would mean the agreed upon fees for the remainder of the contract would still stand.,You can find out more about cancelling your premium membership here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/membership-plans/how-to-cancel-my-n26-you-or-n26-metal-membership,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hi Wayne,,We're sorry to learn of the issues you have had with our referral program.,To receive your bonus, your referrals must meet all of the following requirements:,1) Complete their sign up using your referral link or personal code.,2) Activate their Mastercard.,3) Complete 1 (in-store, online or ATM) transaction with their Mastercard worth a minimum of €15.,If any of these steps are missed, the referral bonus would not be paid out.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

To change my phone number, for instance, I had to contact them and get a code that I had to confirm to a second operator who called up after the first contact. Sounds bureaucratic but I appreciate that when it comes to protecting my money.

title: Bad customer service.
text: Verification process is shameful for N26.,They keep asking you to do things that are not in their demo video or anywhere else. Agent told me that he hears himself twice and that I should, "put on earpiece", "get a headphone", then he hang up. After calling back he started to argue with me that I need to have headphones and he doesn't hear me. I told him that demo video does not tell me that I need to have headphones and he replied to my every comment, but at the same time claimed that he doesn't hear me. I told him that problem is at his end and he needs to sort it, but he replied "Aahhh, if it's my problem, then don't call me back!" Obviously I told him to F@@K Off. Clearly he was hearing me, but choose to be rude and did not back down if I wouldn't please his will and get headphones.,I will not trust to hold my money to someone who is treating potential customers as sheeple, also would not recommend to do that to anyone.,N26 let me know how can I delete all my credentials from your system which I have supplied to you so far?
company_reply: Hi,,We regret to learn you had a negative experience when trying to complete account verification.,In the event the agent is having issues with the audio, they may ask you to connect headphones to your device so that they can proceed with verifying you without causing you any further unnecessary delay.,Please email support@n26.com from your registered email address with the request to erase your details, and we can do so for you.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

text: 3RD REVIEW of this Shody Bank whom suddenly closed my account and 3 months ago.,Have sent emails and asking to return my Positive Balance which was nearly £1000 and they have hardly replied over 3 months two standard automated replies.,Over 1 month now have involved Ombudsman and guess what they have not even replied to the Ombudsman.,DISGUSTING BANK DON'T REPLY ILLEGALLY HOLDING FUNDS AND BLOCKS YOU FROM COMMENTING ON THERE FACEBOOK.,Have sent so many emails without reply and then on these reviews will come up with there standard automated BS saying it's procedure.  3 Months to return funds and still waiting horrible bank horrible service hopefully when Ombudsman investigate will be seeking compensation for more than the amount you have witheld!!!!!!!!!!!,Just watch when they reply on here will say this is not official channel to discuss -  It would be good if emails are replied as you can't be bothered to reply to me or the Ombudsman can't wait to seek a lot of compensation for the amount of crap I am having to go through!!!!!!!!!!!
company_reply: Hey Ali, thanks for taking the time to write a review.,We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this has caused.,In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out regular routine compliance checks on user accounts. As a regulated institution, we are obliged to do this to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure.,For security reasons, we cannot disclose further information through here, but we will contact you via email once our compliance checks are complete with an update, as we are unable to advise on an account which is currently undergoing review.,As soon as this is finished, we will reach out to you via your registered email address.,Best Regards,,Your N26 support team.

title: My metal card inccident
text: I am currently travelling for a month around asia,I use the N26 metal card,I have found that the card is slightly heavy and thick for the atm machines in laos.,The machine swallowed my card and being a weekend caused me some anxiety..i contacted n26 on my app...they did try to help but i felt that they didnt understand that my card was lost in an atm...i used the app to lock my card which gave me peace of mind..i recovered my card from the local bank today...but i immidiatley transfered my balance to another card with fear of my metal card getting stuck again as i am now in cambodia ...i will continue to use n,26 when i got home as i am happy with them...thankyou for listening

title: After 3 Months, I am very happy with N26
text: I have opened a Bank account at N26, October 2019 as a non-EU citizen expert residing in Germany. After testing couple of months, I've moved my main savings to my N26 account. So far compare to other German Banks, I must say that N26 provides a much more professional service even better than Deutsche Bank. ,If you are expert moving to Germany and interested in online banking then this is the right place for you. To sum up everything:,N26 is brilliant because:,-Super fast internet banking + modern user interface,-If you are non-EU, other Germans bank may reject opening an account to you. N26 has no such discrimination policy.,-Gives you good portfolio and money management spaces,-Opening an normal account is free,-Unlike other German banks it has no unmentioned service fees,What N26 needs to improve:,-With normal account you can withdraw only 5 times from ATM,-It has no EC Karte but only debit card which might be quite tricky if you ever end up in small German towns where they only take cash or EC-Karte.,Overall: I am highly satisfied.

title: Bad customer service. If you value your time stay away.
text: It ridiculous to believe they don't hear me during verification after long 2 days of waiting to speak with someone. ,They keep asking you to do stupid things to do like, "go pick an earpiece", "get a headphone" and finally "call back". Calling back takes like your entire working time.,And yes just to add, after waiting for them over hours to answer for verification, they act rather hasty and impatient. Like seriously I believe if someone waited for you for more than two hours, you shouldn't be the first to leave the room. Bad customer service I would say.
company_reply: Hi Philip,,We apologise that your verification experience has not been as smooth as expected. We will pass this on as feedback to our verification partner.,In the event the agent is having issues with the audio, they may ask you to connect headphones to your device so that they can proceed with verifying you without causing you any further unnecessary delay.,We would also recommend that you try the verification with an alternative mobile device. You can then switch back to your chosen device once verification is complete.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hi Zoe,,If you opt to open an N26 premium account, this is a paid membership with added benefits. This account comes with a year-long contract, the terms and conditions of which must be actively agreed to by customers before proceeding with account opening. There is a legal revocation period of 14 days (or 30 in the UK). During this time, it is possible to cancel the premium membership without charge. If this timeframe has passed, the agreed upon fees for the remainder of the contract must be paid. You can find out more about this here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/membership-plans/how-to-cancel-my-n26-you-or-n26-metal-membership,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team
