text: I like N26 because is easy to use and the opening of the bank account was with no fuss.,Being such a cutting edge type of bank I can’t believe that N26 allows dynamic currency conversion on their cards. This option should be block and only allowed if the customer requires it. I just came back from an overseas trip where dynamic currency conversion was applied automatically and I had to argue each time with the merchant to get charged in local currency. Dynamic currency conversion charge you 6 to 12% above actual currency conversion!!! I would provide 5 stars if N26 would better protect the customer blocking this option.

text: Does not accept Portuguese citizen card for identity verification.,Just ridiculous...,N26 should learn a bit more about the maning of the European Union and should not discriminate people based on their national citizen cards, especially within European Union citizens who live in Germany...,Update:,N26: As per your answer, I wonder which "strict" german or EU regulation tells you to ignore an EU National citizen Identity document for a citizen authentication... ,You are deliberately doing citizenship discrimination in Germany and that's unacceptable. Outside of the EU I'm happy to use my passport. but inside the EU for sure it will not be some stupid N26 manager that will force me to use it... ,Stay with your "strict" BS and wait until you get fined or sued... company_reply: Hi Hugo,,As a regulated bank, we are obliged to carry out a strict verification process to ensure we have thoroughly verified all users.,The Portuguese national ID card is currently accepted to open an N26 account outside of Germany, but within Germany you will just need to use your Portuguese passport instead: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/account/how-to-prove-my-identity,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: the Height of inefficiency
text: Just spent several hours with them on a chat trying to solve a ridiculously simple issue - I got one digit wrong in my phone number when I signed up. Their security procedures are incredibly complex just to have that fixed. After countless hours, cash withdrawals with a card with no PIN number, and repeating all my details endlessly, I’ve given up. In this day and age I find it hard to believe that correcting a single digit on a phone number can entail such complex procedures and such a waste of time and energy. There are much simpler options elsewhere.
company_reply: Hi Saleem,,As a regulated online bank, we are obliged to follow strict security procedures and verification when dealing with customer accounts. We apologise for any stress caused, but we can assure you that the security of your account is of utmost importance to us. In the event you have provided any incorrect information, we must ask you to carry out our verification process so that we can amend this information. We do this so that we can ensure we are speaking with the account holder.,If you still have not resolved this, we'd be happy to help. Please reach out to our Twitter Support channel over at @N26_Support so that we can assist.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Disappointed with customer service but I want to give another chance
text: I’ve been so far disappointed a few time with the customer support:,First, they are not available around the clock. This bank is supposed to attract people who travel, although they are not open for a long period of day time when you are in North America for example. ,Second, the bank had so many issues with my +1 North American phone number, leaving me stuck, impossible to access my account or my services because I couldn’t receive confirmation codes through text messages. Travellers also change SIM cards all the time. So all # should work. ,Because of that, I’m afraid of relying just on that bank. I think it’s not the right bank if you travel to North America, from my experience. ,Last, it’s too bad you can’t deposit money directly from a debit/credit card or Apple Pay like you can do it on Revolut. ,I know, it can’t be perfect, but I’ve seen better systems. Although, the app is slick, and when it works it’s awesome. I decided to give them a last chance and went full on for the metal card. It’s a bit expensive compare to other banks, but the perks seem to be very good. I hope I won’t be disappointed  and next time I’ll be able to leave a 5 stars review.
company_reply: Hi Florian. ,Thanks for the feedback.,We do apologise for the experience with the American number. We now have a system in place for preventing that happening again. ,As for the top up, we are working on adding something in a future update. As soon as we do, we  will be sure to announce this on social media as well as our blog.,If you need anything, please feel free to contact us via the Live Chat from within the app or web app, or on our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.,Best,,Your N26 support team.

text: They quickly answered my question and solved my issue. title: Useless
text: Organised a card with this lot before going to Australia, did everything I was asked to do. First transfer was great, but on the second transfer £1000 went missing for no apparent reason and I’ve now had to get my bank to put a trace on it and it’ll take weeks to get it back, if at all! Defeated the purpose of getting the card as I’m now stuck in Australia and having to use my own bank card which I could’ve done in the first place!!! Luckily I had funds in my UK account, otherwise I would be left here with no money through no fault of my own!!! Totally useless, and definitely won’t recommend.

title: Beware - not everyone can make online payments!!! Poor customer support.
text: N26 is a great bank, IF you DON'T have to contact customer service. ,Now you may think, "Hey if everything they offer works, then there should be no problem. Meaning if I can pull my money and make purchase with my card. Perfect!",And THAT'S the problem. The very foundational core features of any bank, is being able to:, ,1 deposit money ,2 withdrawal money ,3 and make purchases (this is the problem),However, with N26, you can't always make purchases. ,They have a problem with making online transactions using 3DS (secure online payment service), which forces you to login via the N26 app, and approve the online transaction you are trying to buy.,However, the app always gives me an error saying, "Error: No internet connection", after I login to the app and try to approve the purchase.,Clearly, I have do an internet connection, as I have to login first to the app.   ,This has been going on for a YEAR now. And yes, I've always made sure, I have the latest version of the app, deleted the app, and re-installed the app countless time, made sure I've enable all push notifications. ,I've tried getting a new card shipped to me, the app kept on giving me errors while trying to complete the process, charges me twice for the new card, and after 1 month, the card still hasn't arrived (even though they say it only takes 10 business days),Now you might think, I'm just a rare case. I called my one friend who also has n26 (lives in a different country) as well, and he told me he has the same exactly problem. (and no one has been able to help him either),Now, here is the REAL problem, not one N26 Customer Service rep, has any idea that this problem exists, and they give me the same go around ("do you have the latest version of the app etc.. etc..") and they keep telling me to email in a support ticket. Which I have, several times, and all I get is a response, that someone will reach out to me in 7 business, and it's been MONTHS and still not a world on how to resolve this issue.  Heck, I can't even get a new card shipped to me. ,And this is the crazy part, I'm paying THEM money, for something they claim, they save you money on! Which is making purchases with no FX charges - and I can't! ,I'm actually losing money as I have to wire money out of my n26 account into another account so I can make a online purchases.,I can't even make a fundamental transaction online, and they are claiming to be a modern high tech fin "bank", and, in Germany of all countries. Yet, no refunds, no reply from customer support, I can't get even order a new card. Very unprofessional!!! ,Just a tip N26, maybe stop scaling your user base, if you can't keep up with the customer support? There should be bank regulations for this. ,It's been 1 year, I've been potential enough.
company_reply: Hi Pablo. Thanks for the feedback.  Can we ask if you are running the latest version of the app? This will have fixed some of the issues you experienced.  I know we do say this, but usually this will fix a lot of issues. Also, have you ever tried the troubleshooting steps? Please make sure you phone number is up to date and that you have your card with you before you start these steps, as you will need it to repair the phone.,step 1: unpair your device in the app,step 2: uninstall the app,step 3: turn off the device for 2 minutes,step 4: turn the device on again and reinstall the app,step 5: re-pair your device.,If none of  these steps help, then please contact us on our Twitter support page so we can escalate this for you straight away.,Best,,Your N26 support team.

company_reply: Hi Aliya,,We apologise for any inconvenience caused as a result of this situation.,In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. title: Insurance benefits. Read the conditions!

Was considering upgrading to their “You” card which for a monthly fee, offers other benefits including travel insurance, medical insurance while abroad, cancellation cover and other benefits.,Cover is provided by Allianz insurance and when I downloaded the terms and conditions I discovered that to avail oneself of any of these benefits, EVERYTHING has to have been paid for using the new card. Flights, accommodation, car hire, everything.,As I have already paid for some of these using another card, needless to say I will not be upgrading.,Just thought this should be made aware to current or future customers.
company_reply: Hi Brian,,Thanks for your feedback, and we're really glad to hear you are enjoying your N26 standard account.,It is correct that in order to be covered by the travel insurance we offer in conjunction with Allianz on our premium accounts, the trip would need to be booked with the N26 Mastercard. We're unable to insure trips bought with a non-N26 card.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hey Tom,,Thanks for your feedback.,All of our premium contracts come with a 12 month contract. There is a legal revocation period of 14 days in which you can revoke your premium account without charge. If this period passes, the fees for the remainder of the contract which was agreed upon would need to be paid.,Security is a huge priority for us at N26. If you require to amend any sensitive information on your account, we would require you to contact us via live chat so that we can verify your identity accordingly before making any changes to your account. At times, we may request additional verification to ensure that we are absolutely speaking with the account holder.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Why I left N26 - PART III - How did this all end ?
text: Why I left N26 - PART III - How did this all end ?,After I understood that customer service wouldn’t help me, I decided to try something by myself. I connected an old account (which country was set to France) to try and download the app. It didn’t work. I then tried searching for the app in the playstore on some Japanese friend of mine’s phone. It worked. That’s how I realised the problem wasn’t about the country, but about my Android version. I was wrong the whole time. And the most amazing thing is that the customer service was never able to tell me that the app had been recently restricted to Android 6.0 and later, not even the one who asked me about my phone version and to whom I clearly stated that my Android version was 5.0.,The customer service of N26 is awful. Their staff are not trained at all. They don’t know the very basics of how to use the app, which is a crucial part of online banking. N26 doesn’t give a crap about it’s customers.,Anyway, a few days later I received a nice email from them telling me I had violated their terms of use and my account would be closed a month later.,I contacted the customer service to explain to them I was in Japan for only a year and I had just come back to France. I showed them my Japanese resident card, with the expiry date, but they replied it wasn’t an acceptable document; only an electricity bill (or something similar) with my name on it would be accepted. But I am now staying at my parents place and have no bill with my name on it.,I found it amazing that they didn’t need a proof of me living outside of the EU to close my account, but they needed one to prove I’m living in the EU in order to cancel the account closure. Basically they need no proof to accuse a customer of violating their rules; but the customer has to provide proofs to prove he didn’t. Super nice.,I could have fought and argued about it with the customer client, but I decided that if it was all the respect they give their clients I didn’t need them anymore. So I let them close my account.,Now, in 2019 most people living abroad need to have a bank account in both the country they come from and the country they’re living in now. As a bank that boasts being modern and innovative, you would expect N26 to understand that. But apparently, they don’t. ,I would understand it if I needed a loan, since they would have trouble recovering it if I wasn’t paying and living outside of the EU. But that wasn’t the case; I had a regular bank account, which was blocked (meaning any payment that would put my balance below 0€ would be refused). So I really don’t see any valid reason for them forbidding their clients from living abroad.,After this problem, I started looking for another online bank. So I tried looking for “best online banks for European expats”. What made me cringe is that N26 appeared in almost all of them, even though they are literally forbidden to expats. And it’s actually the case for most online banks, so I realised people who write these kinds of tops have most of the time no idea what they’re taking about, and haven’t tried any of the banks they recommend.,SO IF YOU’RE A EUROPEAN EXPAT LOOKING FOR AN ONLINE BANK ACCOUNT, WATCH OUT. MOST OF THEM (INCLUDING N26) ARE HOSTILE TO PEOPLE LIVING OUTSITE OF THE EU. Now you can trick them into believing you still live in the EU by using your old phone number and giving them the address of your parents, but be aware that if anything happens and they discover it your bank account will be closed.,So what’s my online bank recommendation for EU expats ? ,After doing some very long and frustrating researches, I am now using Transferwise. It’s one of the only bank that will let you use a phone number from outside the EU and not require a proof of residence to open an account. I checked with them and living in Japan appears to be tolerated.,Other than that, the perks is that the card is totally free, and that it has a very useful that let’s you transfer money in many countries for the price of a local transfer, which is super convenient if you need to regularly transfer money from a country to another.,The downside is that all the currency conversions are subject to a 1% fee. It is pretty low, but still above the 0% that some other online banks might offer (usually for a paid card). So depending on how much money you want to transfer, TransferWise might be a good option.
company_reply: Hi Pierre,,Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.,We regret that this has been your experience with us, and we can understand your frustration. ,Your devices are most secure when they’re up to date. When the latest PSD2 regulations were introduced in September of this year, we amended our system requirements for accessing the N26 app. All customers were notified of this change in the months leading up to this so it would be possible to make alternative arrangements. We're sorry if this was not communicated to you. Our system requirements can be found here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/account/can-i-download-the-n26-app-on-my-smartphone,We are also sorry to learn that you have not had a positive experience with our customer support.  All of our agents are trained in the same manner and to the highest quality. Our agents are also offered follow-up training and support to ensure they are always knowledgeable and up to date with all new processes and topics that they will need to assist our customers with. In the event an agent is unsure on a topic they are assisting a customer with, they can reach out to senior support for help.,We do not intend to come across as hostile to any customers, and we regret that you feel this way. We operate across 26 markets in Europe and now in the US, which is why we believe we can be a good option for those who are travelling or moving between countries. If an N26 customer is moving outside of a supported location for longer than 18 months, it is no longer possible to avail of our service as you would no longer be a permanent resident of a supported country - we would classify this as you not living in a supported country for at least 6 months out of the year. A requirement of opening and thus maintaining your account would be that you are a permanent resident of one of the 26 supported locations in which N26 operates, as listed in our account Terms and Conditions.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hi Johannes,,As a licensed mobile bank, we are obliged to securely verify the identity of all potential customers. All users are subject to the same verification process, in which you submit your application and documents, to be reviewed by our specialised verification team. Sometimes, the result of the review of your application will indicate that we cannot currently offer you an N26 account.,We apologise for any disappointment caused.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hi Kasia,,We're sorry that you had such issues with receiving your N26 card. Once your account is verified, your card is automatically produced and passed to our courier to be delivered to your chosen location. It should really take no longer than 10 working days once this has happened. If your card does not reach your family member also, could you please let us know? You can contact us via @N26_Support on Twitter.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Very suck after service!
text: The security of this bank is good, however, it‘s not easy to deal with their agent. I did faced two rude agents when I am opening the account. Then last Wednesday, my purse was stolen by pick pocket in Germany. Then I need to block my card and reorder another one with €6 for the new card. When the new card came, I can’t activate with the 10 digit number below my name, no matter with iPhone or my laptop. I contacted the agent name James and he said he will send me an email after this because my card has a bug. Then after few days, still no news yet. Then I contacted the agent again, the agent name Markus told me that just wait, and wait and wait and wait, then he cut my line after this. Then I contacted another agent name Ana. She told me maybe is my mistake, and ask me clean the cookies, use chrome, and everything to log in the card. But then still cannot resolve the problem. I ask her how was it, she said wait few days again, I told her all my money was lock inside the bank, she said there‘s no time frame was given on this case. and from 9.12.19 to 23.12.19, I still do not receive any update from email or even a call! Such a poor after service! Shame on you N26!
company_reply: Hi Helen,,Thank you for your feedback on our security, as we take this very seriously.,We regret to learn that your purse was stolen and that the following interactions with our customer support team were not satisfactory. We would not wish to aggravate a stressful situation such as this and we're sorry that this was your experience. ,If you are still experiencing this issue with your card, could you please send an email to support@n26.com or contact us via our Twitter Support Channel, @N26_Support, where we are very active and would be happy to assist.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Phishing Germans
text: I tried to sign up, information on verification of identity process is very vague, doesn't describe whether a valid provisional driving license is valid (It is apparently valid, I found out after 9 weeks of waiting for a response from their customer service team) I finally got the finicky photo ID verification done and dusted after SIXTEEN attempts using a top of the range phone with an excellent camera. Once I had done that my application was pending review, I thought fair enough. Then, literally a day later, I received an email telling me that they couldn't open my account and they couldn't tell me why. I'm not even joking, The words in their email were "at this point we can't tell you why" I read through their terms of service and they're liable to keep your information including any photo ID that you send them, they are not a real bank and should not be trusted, regardless of their claims. I highly suggest that you bank with a trusted highstreet outlet and not with these online German thieves. They're phishing for your data and they're doing it via. Legal loopholes.
company_reply: Hi,,As a fully licensed mobile bank, we are obliged to securely verify the identity of all potential customers. All users must undergo the same identification process in which we review your chosen document & application. Occasionally, the result of our verification review will indicate that we are unable to offer you an N26 account at this time. We understand that this may be frustrating and we apologise for any disappointment caused.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Something is VERY wrong with these guys
text: there seems to be something very wrong with these guys. ,they sold me a platinum/metal card which is meant to come with benefits like insurance and airport lounge access which is still payable monthly.,Not to talk of the fact that their cards are not accepted in various places and they put unnecessary holds on them.,they claim to be affiliated with allianz insurance but in reality are employing some sort of thugs to answer their phones and bully customers. ,due to flight cancellation i made a claim over a month ago, i am yet to receive a penny, each call i make to their insurance company sends me back to N26 and each time i make a call to N26 they send me back to allianz, so they have me in a constant forever loop.,it is a miracle that no one has bothered to investigate these companies, i dont know if their directors have any idea of how their businesses are being run. i made some research and found them on linked in so after this i will be sending them a very detailed letter about their activities.,the last time i complained about their services, they shut down my account and told me they will not be having me on board as these are their policies etc etc. i went through those policies carefully and spoke to my lawyers and sent them a detailed response which they then replied by opening my account and giving me 12 months fee waive but with access to all benefits still.,now knowing fully well how much of a very poor service they have i will be looking to write to their owners, if no response i will write to the financial services and i will keep going till they eventually get an investigation started. ,My advice to whoever wants or is dealing with them at the moment is to be extremely careful as this company can cause you troubles ahead! please be careful!!!!,PS: I am very sure they will try to close my account after this post, stay on this page i will update shortly :)
company_reply: Hi Claude,,We regret to learn that you have had some issues with your metal card and the corresponding insurance.,Your N26 Mastercard is accepted worldwide with any merchant that can accept Mastercard. If the merchant cannot accept this, we sadly have no influence over this. If the merchant can accept Mastercard and you experience some issues with the card, we encourage you to contact us via live chat so that we can investigate. If it is an issue with a contactless transaction you are having, we encourage you to try via Chip and PIN instead.,Any insurance package offered with one of our premium cards is provided by Allianz. We are not permitted to discuss any insurance specifics or advise on insurance matters as this needs to be handled by Allianz themselves, as they are the provider and outline the terms and conditions of the insurance, and in turn this insurance is one of the benefits of the N26 Mastercard. They can be contacted via email at n26warranty.nl@allianz.com.,Please also feel free to reach out to us via our Twitter Support channel @N26_Support should you need any assistance, as we are very active there.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Bank has many customers who have used…
text: Bank has many customers who have used flaw in their system to create loads of fraudulent activity. Have not been helpful in getting the money back.
company_reply: Hi Denise,,We're sorry to learn that you've experienced an issue retrieving some funds.,Security is a huge priority for us at N26. When an account application is made, every single user must undergo strict verification in which they provide us their details, and must present us with their valid passport/ID card so that we can review this and open their account provided there are no discrepancies. ,We recommend that all users remain vigilant with who they send funds to. It is paramount that you only ever transfers funds to an account of a person you know, as it can be difficult to retrieve bank transfers as they must be authorised by the customer themselves within the app. If you have sent funds to an N26 account from another account, it is necessary to contact the sending bank so that they can initiate an official Payment Investigation to track the funds. We can also initiate Payment Investigations, but only if the funds were sent from your N26 account.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hi Ana,,We're sorry that you feel this way.,We do not offer French IBANs. All N26 accounts, with the exception of accounts opened in Spain, will receive a German IBAN. ,If you have opted for an N26 paid premium account such as Metal or You, it is possible to revoke this without charge within the first 14 days of the account being opened. If it has passed this timeframe, the remainder of the agreed upon fees must be paid. It is possible to close a premium account at any time once the fees have been paid.  The usage of the account is not a factor in this. You can learn more about this here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/membership-plans/how-to-cancel-my-n26-you-or-n26-metal-membership,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hi Anne,,Before signing up to the N26 Metal account, it is necessary for the customer to actively consent to the terms & conditions of the account. The account cannot be opened without you agreeing to these conditions. There is a 14 day revocation period in which the customer can choose to cancel the account without charge, but if this timeframe passes, it is necessary that the remainder of the agreed upon fees are paid.,You can learn more on how to cancel your Metal account here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/membership-plans/how-to-cancel-my-n26-you-or-n26-metal-membership,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Decent customer service line, terrible systems
text: Decent customer service line, hassle free to set up but payments arrive later than every other bank. Which for me is a show stopper. Everyone else in my office has recieved their monthly pay and expenses. I regularly recieve mine later than the others. Today nothing has arrived in my account. Its 1pm. I'm due to fly out of the country in 3 hours and can't tell how stressful this is.,Support helpfully told me that in January they will be able to give me an overdraft.,That's really not helpful. ,Would be a great bank if they could get the basics right. ,Currently they can't.,Update : it was a bacs transfer, and it arrived at 5pm. Everyone else recieved theirs by 8am.,This weeks expenses arrived at 8.30 in the morning so I've moved the ranking up to 2 stars. I guess it was just n26 being understaffed or under resourced at the end of last month. ,Or perhaps they just enjoy an extra days interest. ,If receiving your money in a timely manner is not a priority then n26 are a fantastic bank. ,If they can solve this issue I will come back and rate them a 5.
company_reply: Hi Omri,,We're sorry that you've been having issues receiving payments. ,We follow SEPA regulations when it comes to sending and receiving transfers. Provided the sender's bank can process SEPA transfers, all transfers should arrive to you within 1 working day. This can stretch to 2 working days, depending on when it was initiated. If the sender can process instant transfers, it is now possible to receive SEPA instant transfers on your N26 account: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/payments-and-transfers/how-long-do-transfers-take,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: I’m honestly done with this bank!!
text: I’m honestly done with this bank. It says that it’s contactless but it’s not. You can’t even withdraw money from any ATM machine. The only thing you can do with this card is to make online payments. I would not recommend this bank to anyone. Even the machines used in supermarkets and restaurants don’t work on this card. It needs to be fixed ASAP!!
company_reply: Hi Nicole,,We're sorry to learn that you have been having difficulty with your card.,N26 cards have the ability to make contactless payments. Please ensure firstly that your card has been fully activated within your mobile app. You can learn how to do so here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/cards/how-to-activate-my-card,Before you make a contactless payment, you will need to complete an ATM withdrawal first, but this can only be done after activating the card within the app. Please note that contactless will disable for security reasons if you have not used the card for a Chip and Pin transaction in the last 5 transactions. You can re-enable contactless again by simply completing a card transaction.,Your N26 card can be accepted worldwide with any merchant that accepts Mastercard.,Please reach out to our customer support so that we can investigate any potential issues with your card. Just go to My Account > Support > Support Chat in your mobile app.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: No account for You!!!
text: I tried to open an account and received the "we can't open one for you or tell you why not" email. See below what I left for a survey from N26:,I did not open an account as I was informed via email N26 could not open one for me and no explanation was given.  I assume since I am an American although I am a legal resident in Italy.  After the denial I requested N26 discard any of my personal information and was asked if I wished to close my pre account.  I did not know I had a "pre account" so I answered yes.  I was then advised to download any data I needed from my account before it was closed. Hilarious as I never opened the account.  Now I am asked to give a survey as to why I closed my account, the account that never existed...,If this is German precision banking I want no part of it.  I am absolutely amazed at how dysfunctional this process has been and what a waste of my time as well.,So, if you are thinking about N26 it might be OK but my experience was these guys are suffering from the old "left hand doesn't know what the right is doing" syndrome.
company_reply: Hi John,,Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.,As a licensed mobile bank, one of our obligations is to ensure that we have securely verified all users. Occasionally, the result of our verification process will indicate that at the present moment, we are not able to currently offer you an N26 account, and we are not at liberty to discuss further due to our internal processes.,We apologise for any disappointment caused as a result of this, and we appreciate the feedback you have given in regards to the communication you received from us. We will take this on board., ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Terrible in so many ways
text: Get ready, because this is going to be one of those long reviews you won't forget.,Terrible in so many ways. Here are just a few things that happened to me during my time with N26:,- I have been abroad to several countries (USA, South Africa, etc) and none of my N26 cards worked -- I was sometimes able to withdraw cash, but most most of the time it was impossible. Things work fine as long as you stay in the EU (including Iceland, Switzerland etc) but do NOT rely on N26 when travelling abroad. Funny enough, a woman at the JFK airport told me that she sees a lot of people with "transparent cards" (the debit card of N26 is transparent and very easy to recognize) having problems paying for train tickets or get cash at the airport.,- No support, no support, no support. Nothing feels worse than being in a foreign country with no cash, cards that don't work and no support to call because it's 11pm in Germany or it's Sunday or whatever. Again, do NOT use N26 when you go abroad. Definitely open an account with a proper bank that has a trustworthy history and that will give you cards that are guaranteed to work all over the world. And a bank you can call 24/7, too.,- I was once locked out of my account for an "indefinite" amount of time because the phone number I'd used to register to N26 used to belong to another person before me. Again, calling N26 was useless and I had to find this person myself (who thank god used to work at my company) and ask them to unlink their old phone number to their N26 account. During that time I was unable to withdraw cash or access my account on the app.,- My money once disappeared temporarily just to come back a day later or so. Customer support apologized and said that a "bug" was preventing me to see how much money I had in my savings.,- The app has a TON of bugs, some of them have been there for years now. Like the savings/investments section is totally messed up, the numbers didn't even add up (like 1000€ and 15€ of interests would give a sum of 1010.97€ or some other random numbers unrelated to tax deductions or anything). On top of the usual glitches you have to get used to, I remember there was a time when the app was just crashing on startup but that got fixed fast thankfully,- update from 03.01.2022: I have moved out of Berlin but N26 is still causing problems. My landlord in Berlin tried (wrongly) to charge me for January's rent. I got a message in the morning from N26 saying that a direct debit was coming from the landlord at 6pm and that I didn't have sufficient funds to cover the rent, because I have since moved my money to another bank. I immediately contacted N26 asking them to block the direct debit from the landlord, and I also informed the landlord of their mistake. Long story short: N26 gave me a form to fill out in order to block the direct debit, and I immediately filled it out and sent it back (this was early in the morning). Of course, N26 notifies you of a direct debit less than 24 hours before it happens, but they take up to 3 days to process the requests to block direct debits. So there's that. Meanwhile the landlord had entered my direct debit in the system, and they couldn't cancel it, so they agreed to refund me in case it was deducted successfully. Eventually, the direct debit came because N26 didn't block it, but I was charged 3€ because that's what happens when someone tries to charge you and you have no money on your account. I immediately talked to customer support and talked to Charikleia (who told me I can use their name for my trustpilot review), asking if I could be refunded the 3€ fee which *was a charge beyond my control*. I explained that I did everything in my power to notify N26 and block the upcoming direct debit, but because of N26's failure to react quickly to its customers' requests, they didn't block it and I was unfairly charged. The support agent was not helpful at all, and they "explained" that those "fees cannot be refunded because they are automatic", something that is obviously untrue and fails to explain what I should have done in order to prevent the fee. So apparently N26 warns you of the fact that you might incur into a fee, but when you tell them to BLOCK the payment that causes the fee, they don't do it. So in the end they happily charge you.
company_reply: Hi Omar,,We regret to learn of the issues you had during your time with N26.,Your N26 Mastercard can be used worldwide with any merchant that has the capability to accept Mastercard. As long as the account limits have not been exceeded, there should be no issue, but if you contact us via chat we can look into any failed transaction.,Our support is available 7 days a week, including Sundays, from 7am - 11pm  CET. This also includes support on our social media channels. We look forward to implementing 24/7 customer service again in the near future, as this was a service we recently offered.,It is only possible to use a phone number once with N26. Therefore, if it is in use by another account, it cannot be entered again on our system. We're sorry that you encountered an issue with this.,If a bug or issue is encountered when using the app, we appreciate our customers reaching out to us to inform us, so that we can advise the next steps. Customer experience is of huge importance to us and is the basis of what we do, and we hope to resolve any issues they are facing as smoothly as possible. We understand that this was not your experience with us, and we apologise for this.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

Our handle is @N26_Support.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Went well for a while, but unable to fix problems.
text: On Thursday night or Friday morning, N26 decided to close my account or cancel my card or both. Since then I am unable to access my cash or card services. I have been a customer for over 2 years. I have an available balance. I am still in a queue. On Friday, I will have no food in my fridge and a medical service I am paying for will be blocked, not to mention, I am already dealing with payment rejected fees and my credit score is falling.,Does N26 have a cashflow problem? Why are you doing this to me?  I have spoken to more than 6 agents now, three of them just ended the chat (yeah, ppl, don't join a bank with webchat as a support portal). The agents that actually respond say they cannot find a problem, it is in a queue.,What is going on? Nobody knows. Every agent tells me they do not know and it is in a queue, it is being escalated etc. Nobody knows what is going on.,There are many banks to choose from, don't choose this one.,#N26FailedMe,EDIT: In tonight's installment of 'customer service', day 5: The rep and I have worked out that I can get my money if I moneybeam it to another person and ask them to withdraw that money as cash. Think about how ridiculous this sounds.,EDIT2: 8 agents, and counting.,EDIT3: I am now 9 agents deep! Still no help. This agent has suggested I buy another service from N26 so that I can have a temporary workaround...smh.,EDIT4: A final update for tonight. I was only on the chat for nearly 3 hours and I have to wait 3 days for a replacement card and maybe somebody might, at some point in the future, email me. This brings my total time on this at many hours and still no guaranteed fix. I am also out of pocket for more than €100 so far and counting in late fees and planned activities I have had to forgoe that are not refundable. I hope N26 has a plan to reimburse me, then compensate me. One can dream the world is fair, I guess...,EDIT5: Nothing happened today. I was told I would get an email and replacement card within 3 days. This update just to let you know neither of these things happened today. Here's hoping an email crawls out of N26 sometime tomorrow, I know how hard it is to type and press send, sometimes...,EDIT6: I got an email! It says nothing more than:,"Thanks for the feedback!,Your issue is escalated and we are working on it. As soon as I receive the outcome, I will update you via email.,Have a great day,",So, not much better than dealing with a bot, really (totally a bot, come on). A new card arrived, it works! So far.,Finally, I should bring to your attention the number of fake positive reviews on this website for this product. N26 pays people to leave positive reviews as 'ambassadors'. The reviews you see below that have promo codes are paid reviews. Sure, it's free money for you and the reviewer, but don't believe them.,If you open an account at this 'bank' I will be disappointed in your decision and I am sure you will too.,Thank you for coming to my TED talk. Bank somewhere else.
company_reply: Hi Gund,,We regret to learn that this situation has happened to you, and we can assure you that we will take your feedback on board. ,We are glad to hear that your replacement card is working for you without issue, and we encourage you to reach out to us again if there are any issues with this card. We are also active on our Twitter Support channel where we would be happy to assist you. Our handle is @N26_Support.,If you wish to officially raise the remaining points in your review, please reach to one of our secure channels, such as chat or email (support@n26.com)  so that we can make sure this is seen to for you. Trustpilot is not an official form of communication with N26, so we are unable to do so through here, but if you wish to officially raise this then we would be happy to assist you so that it is reviewed by the correct department.,Customers can visit Trustpilot of their own accord and leave reviews based on their experience with us, or visit the site after contacting our customer service, but we do not partake in paid reviews. Every N26 customer receives a promo code, which can be found directly in the app in the "Refer Friends" section. Many customers will include their promo codes when leaving a review - we do not indicate to customers whether they should do this, as they are free to share their promo code as they please.,We hope that your situation can be resolved for you in a timely manner, and we apologise once more for any upset or inconvenience caused by this.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Think twice
text: No doubt, they will answer and pretend that they are approachable and can sort any problem as their customer service is very good, in fact they are quicker to respond on here than for their own support but…,I’ve taken an N26 ‘You’ card and membership. When I received the mail saying my card was on its way, on the mail it said “Follow your wanderlust Relax: your trip is covered if you’re sick and can’t make it. And with free foreign ATM withdrawals and foreign medical coverage, based on the Insurance General Terms and Conditions, you can go wherever your heart takes you.”,I could not find any details of what was covered with that insurance when I logged into the app.  I ‘spoke’ to customer services who said they would look into it as this insurance only relates to the ‘Metal’ account. That’s when I realise that they obviously made a mistake, but as I pointed out to them it is a rather BIG mistake. How many other similar emails have they sent out and how many have been misled like me? Customer service just casually dismissed it and said we can swap you to a Metal account (an assurance for £120 extra a year on top of the £4.90/month. Hmmm let me think!) As they are a financial institution you‘d think that, one, such a mistake would be impossible and 2 they would be equipped to deal with this efficiently and swiftly.  What else have they told me wrong about this account? This is worthy of trading standards getting involved. They have a flat hierarchy apparently (the joy of new business start-ups, who don’t want to pay their staff very much and say no managers, you are all important), so when they said the case had been escalated I don’t know where, Germany? May be they need a serious manager that can actually take important decisions. Debiting the membership fee was the only thing efficient and swift about N26. I was casually brushed aside, they said that ‘as a gesture of good will’ (which mean I could not care less, take those crumbs and go away) they would reimburse my first £4.90. I have since as it is my right (within 30 days) cancelled my account all together. What would I have done better in their shoes, admitted my mistake (they did) admitted that it was a major issue (they did not) offered the insurance for a year as promised in the email (that is not a gesture of good will, it is what they have to do since THEY told me I had insurance, I did not make it up). I’ve been advised to go with N26 by a friend who never had issues with them. I think this is the main thing as always, if you have problems on your account, everything goes well, if you have the tiniest issue then they let themselves down very badly. How long can you keep your fingers crossed that nothing goes wrong with them? I’ve since done some research online and realised that there are banks around that offer same/better deals with no fees. Their product is not unique and their approach to customer services really does not make them stand out, shop around!!!  Anyone is allowed a mistake but what sorts the great from the weak is the way you handle your mistakes. I do not put feedback lightly on anything but I feel strongly about this and I hope this will help people in thinking twice. ,*** You already know what happened I've sent you 3 detailed emails about it in the last 2 weeks. Got answers from Dylan Jessica..... You have just chosen to ignore the problem that's why I cancelled the account. ***,***They pretended they cared (as they do every time on trust pilot). I sent them all the details again as requested but after 4 days still nothing. I rest my case ***,***once again. Nice little touched to say they ve looked into it and it won't happen again. It should have not happened in the first place!! Plus it s how you dealt with it with me that matters and it was shocking***
company_reply: Hi Chris,,Thank you for taking the time to leave this feedback. ,We'd really like to take a further look into what exactly went wrong here so that we can amend this. It is correct that there is no insurance package offered for N26 UK YOU accounts, and we regret that this misinformation was provided to you. This was an error on our side that we can understand is frustrating.,We'd appreciate it if we could gather some further information so that we can investigate accordingly. In the interest of security, we're unable to do this publicly as we would need to verify some account details. Please note it is possible to contact our Twitter Support Channel, where we are very active.,Update: Please be assured that we have consulted on your case internally and figured out the error made here, so that we can assure it is not made in future. We regret that you decided to close your account with us due to this situation, and we appreciate the feedback that you have provided us with so that we can learn from this. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hi Danielle,,We do not send out any document to you with an ID number. The ID number they are referring to is on your own document which you chose to sign up with. We are unable to tell you which document you used, as this would be a security risk. ,To ensure we are speaking with the account holder, we have to ask a specific set of verification questions. These are questions that the account holder knows the answers to, or can find the answers to. If they are answered incorrectly, we need to assume that it is not the account holder, therefore we must terminate the correspondence. This is done in the interest of account security. You can always open a new chat when you have the correct information.,We apologise for any inconvenience and hope you understand that the security of your account is of utmost importance to us, which is why we carry out strict verification before discussing any sensitive information.,Please note that you can also reach out to us via our Twitter Support Channel, where we are more than happy to help.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: This is one of the worse company's I…

Use TransferWise, Monese, PayPal, revolut or any of provider do not let seethrew and metal bank cards lure you into this scam.,Tried to complain but no one cares and I get passed on to other people. company_reply: Hi Scott,,We take matters such as these very seriously, and we regret to learn of the negative experience you had with our verification provider when trying to verify your N26 account. Please be assured that we will investigate this matter.,Our inbound phone line is available within the mobile app for N26 Metal customers, and this is a free line. It is not possible to call us by other means, so it would not have been N26 that you were communicating with via telephone on this occasion. Everyone, whether a customer or not, can contact us via live chat, which is also free: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/other/how-to-contact-n26,We are unable to track an incoming payment into your N26 account, as we are the recipient bank. We can only track a transfer that was initiated from your N26 account. It is necessary to contact the sender, so that their institution can initiate an official payment investigation to track and trace the funds. This differs from a transfer confirmation, which simply states that the transfer was initiated.,We can assure you that we do not sell your data or pass it on to third party providers.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Brilliant online banking
text: Brilliant online banking. Reliable customer service. I would definitely recommend

title: Experts on the support chat, immediate help..
text: I got a new card back home and left for an international trip right away (China). On the plane I read that I have to use the card in my home-country first before it is possible to use it internationally.,Right when I landed I contacted the support chat and got immediate response. The issue was solved before I received my luggage and I could use the card on ATM without delay.,Great, can only recommend the bank with this great service available.

title: Horrible bank - bad tech, terrible customer support & impossible to cancel account
text: Horrible bank - please avoid. ,I dont know how they got such a high review. Business accounts cost 9.90 a month - very hard to cancel, must pay till the end of the year. ,No help with transactions that I did not approved - ended up pay 60 euros for stuff I didnt buy. ,very bad support. ,The tech is limited - takes 5 days to load up a balance with no fast payment transfers available - unlike various other online banks. ,harder to cancel than a gym membership - perks arent interesting. ,the customer support reps are confusing and dont understand their products - the app is very glitchy and slow.,look into revolut or transferwise etc these banks have better tech, better support, and way better terms. ,dont waste your time with this bank unless you like getting screwed over by a startup bank. ,It’s not banking 2.0 - you are better off with a traditional bank account or literally sending a money transfer via mail or delivering it yourself to the recipient.
company_reply: Hi Mike,,Our Standard Business accounts are free. If you opt for a premium Business YOU account with an annual membership, there is a monthly fee. This must be actively agreed to before sign-up. There is a legal 14 day revocation period, and if this timeframe passes then the agreed upon fees for the remainder of the contract must be paid. You can cancel the renewal of the contract from directly within the mobile app at any time up to 30 days before the renewal date. If you wish to close the account, the fees would first need to be paid.,If you notice a transaction that was not made by you, we can initiate a Mastercard chargeback dispute to claim these funds back: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/fees/how-to-dispute-a-transaction,If the charge is linked to a bank transfer, we can initiate a Payment Investigation, however bank transfers need to initially be confirmed from directly within the paired device.,Bank transfers made via SEPA take 1 banking day to appear on your balance. This can stretch to 2 banking days, depending on when the transfer was initiated. If you are awaiting a transfer into your account and it is taking longer than this, it's important to reach out to the sending institution, as under SEPA regulations it should not take longer than 2 banking days. ,We look forward to implementing SEPA instant in future.,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: RUBBISH
text: RUBBISH.  8 mins to open an account simply isn't true.  I completed the forms online.  Was then told to download the app, which I did.  Couldn't login as hadn't completed security check (got that from CS advisor), so hit open account, that wouldn't work either as there was a fault.  Best he could do was ask for my registration to be deleted and for me to start again.  I had to wait a couple of weeks for that to be done. What a total waste of time,EDIT,I have since spoken to someone who was extremely helpful and enabled me to fix this issue.  I now have an N26 account and have to say it's pretty good.  Glad I went through the hassle.,FURTHER EDIT (3rd Feb 2020),Have now been using the bank for a while and new users should be aware of the following.  This bank won't currently accept my salary from the company I work for.  I have to get it sent to my old bank and then transfer it across.  I am using an app to help me manage my bills, this is the only bank that doesn't link in to that.  I also want to use another app that rounds up my transactions to help save, and this seems to be one of the few banks that won't allow this either.  All a bit style over substance if you ask me.
company_reply: Hi Alasdair,,We're sorry for any issues you had when signing up.,If you have filled in your details online, you then need to login to the mobile app to complete the verification step of account opening. At this point, you would have also received a confirmation email of account opening. If you do not receive this email, it usually indicates an error being made when completing your application.,You would have already opened an account, which is why there was a fault when you hit "Open an Account" again, as the details would have already been registered in our system, preventing you from signing up again.  ,Please feel free to reach out to us via live chat or our Twitter Support channel if you need any assistance signing up.,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: AVOID N26
text: AVOID N26,It started with a "security check", meaning they wanted me to upload my passport picture again. OK, no problem I did that, but they locked me out of my account anyway. Then the problems with dealing with support started. Anyway I have now been without access to my account for 3 months. I cannot get any support person to allow me access. I have even tried to close my account, but they will not let me do that.
company_reply: Hi Mark,,As a licensed bank, N26 is legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals. We regret to learn that the re-verification process did not go as expected for you, and we would like to resolve this as soon as possible. ,Please reach out to us via our Twitter Support channel, or via live chat: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/other/how-to-contact-n26,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: N26 Claims Low Fees But Has High Fee…
text: N26 Claims Low Fees But Has High Fee Partners,Despite a very helpful article by N26 (in N26 Magazine) on how ATM companies trick consumers and overcharge at foreign ATMs, N26 turns around and partners with the company that claims to be the pioneer in this ATM scam (commonly called "Dynamic Currency Conversion").  Recently, Cardronics announced a partnership with N26. Cardtronics has previously described themselves as "the first independent ATM operator to offer dynamic currency conversion",N26 - how can you possibly  go and  steer  your  customers into a product you know is a ripoff? How does this support your claims of  being transparent and low fee?

title: N26 digital bank
text: I have been using N26 for a while now, although I had my doubts initially and find it exceptionally good. Set up in minutes, the card is shipped for free, no fees for using abroad and the app is amazing. What's not too like :) Use my code to sign up: larysak0548 I have opted for the free account for now, so make sure that you choose the option that suits you best. I would suggest opening a free account to begin with, as it's a very good alternative to traditional banking. And no charges. Hoping to make a  transition to digital banking only overtime.

title: N26 is a good bank
text: N26 is a good bank, better then any other in Germany. ,They are especially good for foreigners in Germany or perhaps where they operate also because they offer support in multiple languages.,They are an online bank, I hate cash, so having no branches its not really a negative aspect for me.,The features they offer are somewhat limited from what I would want, no multiple ibans in other countries, no joint account, can't have virtual credit cards and more.,But its far from their slogan "no bull***t banking", its a tech bank, but they still have bull***t on top of it, they stopped innovating for the past 2 years and that is very sad.,Get back on innovation and you will grow even further.

company_reply: Hi Shir,,We regret to learn that you haven't had a positive experience with our customer service.,In the interest of account security, we are unable to amend any sensitive information in relation to your account without the card. This is due to the unique identifier the card has, along with other verification information we will ask to ensure that we are speaking with the account holder. It is also an option to reset your verification so that you can provide your documents again, in the event your card has not arrived.,You can also reach out to us at any time via our Twitter Support channel, where we would be happy to assist.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

text: Initially this was a good experience, easy opening, good user interface. I thought I would never need support so I ignored the reviews from other people. The one day I needed support though now, I learned that I should have stayed away from this dodgy company...,No phone number, support is a bot that is as useless as speaking to my calculator from 1985. Not that the humans are better and I am not even sure they are humans. They seem to only answer with scripted BS replies. You cannot escalate, you cannot ask for a manager. Nothing.,I read all the press about the terrible service and how unethical this business model was set up to be. Now I know: it was all true.,Friendly advice: STAY AWAY! Revolut seems to be a lot better and they actually enjoy helping their customers.
company_reply: Hi,,Thanks for taking the time to leave your review. We regret to learn you feel this way.,When connected to our chatbot, if you wish to speak with a human, you can simply type "/human" into the chat. Our agents are trained in the same manner and to the highest quality. They are also offered follow-up training and support to ensure they are always knowledgeable and up to date with all new processes and topics that they will need to assist our customers with. In the event an agent is unsure on a topic they are assisting a customer with, they can reach out to senior support for help or to escalate your issue.,You can also reach our to our Twitter Support channel where we are very active. We would be more than happy to assist there with any queries you may have.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hi Anthony,,We regret to hear that your card did not reach you within the 10 working day timeframe. You can reorder a card from directly within your mobile app, but if you wish for us to action this for you, it's necessary to contact us on live chat. You can reach out to live chat by going to My Account > Support > Support Chat in your mobile app. If connected to our chatbot, you can always type "/human" to be connected to the next available agent. You can also log in to our web app at https://app.n26.com/login from a desktop and select "Support Chat" after you login. Chat can also be accessed at the bottom of the following link: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/other/how-to-contact-n26,We are also active on Twitter, so it is possible to speak with a member of our social media team via the N26 Support Twitter channel. We'd be happy to advise you as best we can through there.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: [Hidden Fees!] They steal money from your account without notice
text: I track every single transaction on every account I have. ,N26 magically goes down faster than any other because of 2 things:,1) They add additional fees to the transactions days later..., so if you spend $20 you might see $20.20 at first, which already has fees, but then you might see $21 or $22.10 several days later. (i.e. additional fees),2) They lower your balance based on invisible transactions, today I literally found my balance to be 30 Euros less than it should be and I reviewed all my transactions, I didn't miss a single one, that money was literally stolen by N26.,I will use this card less from now on.
company_reply: Hi Vittorio,,Thanks for taking the time to leave your feedback.,We do not charge any additional fees to your transactions after they have been made, and we also do not charge a fee on any POS transaction in any currency. Sometimes in your mobile app, you will see a small blue dot next to a transaction - this will notify you that your transaction is subject to a small change as the transaction is settled. This would usually happen if a transaction is made in another currency than that of your account. ,When you make a purchase with your N26 card, it can take a short while for the merchant to collect the transaction - this happens with any bank. So you may make a transaction, but the funds will be reserved in your account for a few days until the merchant actually debits them. This is why you may see a transaction appear twice, if a number of days pass between the transaction being initiated and then cleared, although only one amount will debit.,You can always reach out to us via live chat and we will be more than happy to go through your transaction history with you. You can also view your balance statements in PDF format at any time within your mobile app or web app. On the web app, just login to https://app.n26.com/login and select the icon to the left of the "+" symbol.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Appalling customer service
text: Compared to Australian banks, these Muppets idea of online is ridiculous. I'm fairly certain everyone is dropping their account and they are going under because their customer service is appalling. ,I've waited almost a week for a "phone specialist" to call me. Chased them up daily as soon as the online chat opened EU time. Was promised a call within 24 hours every time, but never did. I decided to just send the letter to close the account, and let that happen whenever someone at N26 decided to do some work. Funnily enough, then got a call at midnight, Australian time but there's just silence on their end! So since I'm half asleep I hang up. Got back on the chat, because how can I sleep now? And what do you know? Back to square one. Set up a new call with a new code and wait next to my phone 24 hours a day for God knows how long.,Edit to respond to N26 reply. They were made aware of my time zone from the first contact, when I expressed concern about what time I would be called "within a 24 hour period". When I was not called after 3 days I would have accepted a call at any time of day. When I finally spoke to a human being after 7 days, at 3am my time, I almost laughed out loud when they asked if I wanted them to call back at a better time. ,I also made an effort to access the chat daily at 5pm Aus Time, which is when business starts at N26, 7am EU time. So they had an entire business day, in their time zone, to call me. It still took 7 days and me telling them I wanted to close my account. Also, their system doesn't let them call while I'm on the chat. So my choice is waiting in radio silence for a call that will never come, or trying to get information and further delaying my call.
company_reply: Hi Phoebe,,Firstly we regret that you were put in such situation. We arrange callbacks within the next 24 hours, and we apologise as you were not called in that timeframe. If you are in another timezone, it is necessary that we are informed by you so that we can arrange your callback at a suitable hour, as we are operating on Central European Standard Time.,You can contact us also via email at support@n26.com, and we also have a Twitter Support channel where we would be happy to assist you with this case. We hope that this can be resolved for you as soon as possible.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Cheap and cheerful with poor customer service.
text: I opened an account with N26 and tried to use their account switching service. Numerous problems, not just with the transfer, and Customer Service is utterly useless. It uses a computer driven Bot to give you answers that are contained in the FAQ section of the web site – what is the point of that? Getting through to a human takes time, and then the online chat operates like a typical call centre that cannot actually give answers or solve problems.,This is a cheap and cheerful account that has limited functionality – you get what you pay for. Just pray that noting goes wrong with any transactions, as getting it sorted is well nigh impossible. I would NOT recommend this as a main bank account.
company_reply: Hi David,,Thanks for taking the time to leave your feedback.,In the event you are connected to our Chatbot and cannot get an answer which is sufficient for your query, you can always enter "/human" to be connected to the next available customer support agent in realtime. ,All of our agents are trained in the same manner and to the highest possible quality. Our agents are also offered follow-up training and support to ensure they are always knowledgeable and up to date with all new processes and topics that they will need to assist our customers with. In the event an agent is unsure on a topic they are assisting a customer with, they can reach out to senior support for help. ,Our support center can also be accessed here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started,You can also always reach out to us via email at support@n26.com, or via our Twitter Support channel where we will be more than happy to help out.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: I love N26
text: I love N26, everything is made so easily and the service is really good too. I love the spaces you can create for your money savings and that the App automatically categorizes your debits.

title: stay well clear
text: Been a customer of this bank for just under a year, paying a £15 fee per month for my mental card, a few days ago my account was blocked with a substantial amount of money in it, and no access to my cash and no help from their customer service team what so ever, this is my main account and I receive my salary and pay my bills via this account subsequently I am late on my rent and have no money to buy shopping and put food on the table, basic human necessities. I have read hundreds of cases similar to mine, and wouldn’t want this to happen to anyone else, as it has caused me severe stress.
company_reply: Hi Gemma,,In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. ,We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We will continue this correspondence via your registered email address.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hi Aaron,,We take matters such as data requests very seriously, and we regret to learn that this has happened. ,If your account has been closed by you in the last 6 months, you can request your data via the following link: https://app.n26.com/your-data/request/former-user,Please send us an email to support@n26.com from the email address that was linked to your account and we can resolve this for you. You can also contact us via our Twitter Support Channel, or our live chat service.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Can't access my money
text: Was fine, but don't ever change your phone number because then you won't be able to access your funds. Customer service will make you do an ATM withdrawal and say they will call you back within 24 hours and never will. Have contacted them twice a day for 3 days with no progress.
company_reply: Hi,,We regret that you were put in such situation. We arrange callbacks within the next 24 hours, and we sincerely apologise as you were not called in that timeframe.,We'd love to get this resolved for you. You can reach out to us via our Twitter Support channel and we will be more than happy to escalate your case.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: When will N26 have a switching service…
text: When will N26 have a switching service for countries outside Germant - ie France for instance.,All mainstream banks offer this as a service - to incentivise customers to switch and be sure that their DD's and Mortgage paymets etc are switched.,N26 Support Chat line did not even know what switching was.
company_reply: Hey,,Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.,This is a feature which we are interested in offering in future, as we understand it's importance to many of our customers, however we currently have no information that we can share. We'll pass your request on, and we also encourage you to email ideas@n26.com with any suggestions you have to improve the overall customer experience.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Easy to use

title: Horrible
text: When it works, it's good. But any incident - and life is full of them - starts a painful interaction. I somehow could not get SMS messages to log in anymore. It turns out it's something to do with new EU legislation, and I need to go through a procedure to reinstate the account. Easy, no ? Nope,They made me go to a bank machine and withdraw money - cost me $3 in fees. Then call and give them the details. OK. Then wait for someone to call me in the next 48 hrs. What ? What happens if I'm in the shower, or driving, or somehow I just don't have the phone handy ? Tough, they say, you have to start over with another withdrawal. ,Incredible, in the digital era. An account one cannot rely on, and therefore has to be closed. Life is too short for these gimmicks.,PS. Sure enough, they called me at 4AM EST and then again at 5AM when my phone is on silent, and I missed the call. I call this: no customer respect
company_reply: Hi,,We regret to learn of the recent experience you have had with us in relation to new 2FA guidelines.,In the event you are unable to receive the SMS code, we will arrange a callback so that this can be provided to you. We have to ensure that we are speaking with the account holder, so it is asked of you to carry out a particular type of verification in which we can ensure this. If you are in another timezone, it is necessary that we are informed by you so that we can arrange your callback at a suitable hour, as we are operating on Central European Standard Time.,Please note that you can also contact us on our Twitter Support channel so that we can escalate your case from there.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Absolutely non sense

I had to contact during normal working hours, anyway I managed to reach one and no solution. I asked how a Debit card balance to be -744 Euros and no answer.,Complete nonsense.

title: Complete disaster
text: Complete disaster. I have never dealt with such an inefficient customer service.,It has been ok until I had my card and passport stolen abroad. I rang them up for help and I had my account frozen.,I was not able to pass their identity verification test because I did not have my original passport.,I have been waiting for two months for them to return my positive balance to another bank of mine.,Stay away !
company_reply: Hi Luca,,We regret to learn of the recent experience you had with us.,If this situation arises and you have access to your paired device, you just need to contact us via live chat so we can assist. You can also block and reorder the card from directly within the mobile app, or via the web app by logging into https://app.n26.com/login from a desktop. Then, when you have a new document which can be used for verification, you can then send this to us to be updated in our system.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Final update: disastrous experience
text: Final update: got my money, but it was disastrous...,Some facts:,. Account suspended without access for almost 2 months,. My 7,700EUR fund were held hostage when I needed most, got in complicated financial situation meanwhile,. 18 emails sent (N26 replied only 1/4 of them),. 7 extensive chats with their service with the same reply 'it's currently in process',What I think worked? I sent an email yesterday, threatening them I will post on social media all the emails, transcripts I have with them. Finally got their reply few hours later. Then at the end of the same day, they wired my money and closed my account.,Conclusion: Do not leave your money with N26, everything works well until you have an issue (which will 100% happen at least once at some point of your banking relationship!). Mine was the re-verification process that I undertook while abroad, in an unsupported country. I was blocked straightaway and their service couldn't solve it at ALL since. Had to close my account. But to get my money back it was full of stress and anxiety. They are absolutely not responsive.,You'd rather want a "face" from your bank, not some chats from which sometimes I suspect bots behind. It was a very frustrating experience.
company_reply: Hi Dung,,We are glad to learn that this situation has been resolved.,These cases are processed internally by an alternative department, which is why our customer service agents are unable to provide further information when you start a chat with them. For security reasons, it is also not possible for us to assist via Trustpilot, or any alternative social media channels, as they are not official forms of communication with N26. For this reason, the correspondence is kept to your registered email address. ,We apologise for any stress caused by this situation, and regret that this was your experience with us.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team
