title: N26 Truffa-Chat e nebulosa politica di rinnovo contrattuale
text: Card without no added fees by paying with the terminal yet with monthly fee too high, compared with other similar online banks.,Awful customer care with chat which crashs and you must relog with password and reexplain everthing to the new employee.,For a financial service, it is mandatory to assure quick and skilled customer care with clients.,Unclear and "cloudly" policy in order to renew the contract, mails arrive by the spam folder so you risk to pass over the term to dismiss the service and you must face the new different contract with another policy but, due to the poor chat, you don't understand the new conditions because the chat crashs and they don't write you clearly the new conditions through the mail.,Everything made unclear in purpose to get you confused,-----------------------------------------------------,Carta senza costi aggiuntivi al momento di pagare con il pos ma con canone mensile troppo caro, se paragonato ad altre carte della concorrenza.,Servizio assistenza clienti pessimo, con chat che va in crash spesso e bisogna rifare il log-in con password e riscrivere di nuovo tutto al nuovo operatore.,Per un servizio finanziario è imprescindibile garantire una comunicazione quasi immediata e competente al cliente.,Assistenza clienti tramite mail impraticabile dato che rispondono dopo giorni e con diversi operatori, ignari della comunicazione precedente.,Nebulosa politica di rinnovo contrattuale, con mails che arrivano nello spam e non sono ricevute immediatamente, orientata a circonvenire il cliente al rinnovo del contratto, con clausole differenti ma che non sono spiegate e chiarite da N26 a causa del loro inabile e carente servizio chat assistenza clienti.
company_reply: Hi Gordon,,Thanks for taking the time to leave your feedback.,There is only a monthly fee if you opt for an N26 premium account - our standard accounts have no fee. ,In the event you are disconnected from a chat, as long as you contact from within your mobile app and are verified, there is no need to explain your prior situation - the agent can refer to the past chat history in order to assist with your query.,We have no influence over emails being sent to your spam folder - this would be down to either your settings in your personal email account, or your provider's settings.,Our legal documents are available via our website: https://n26.com/en-eu/legal-documents/,You can also reach out to us via our Twitter Support channel with any queries you may have!,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Rarely do I write bad reviews this bad…
text: Rarely do I write bad reviews this bad but this is ridiculous! I changed phones but kept the same number. You'd think it would be just an easy quick verification which I had all of the information plus jump through the hoop of going to an ATM and getting back with them right away to get my code so I can verify my new phone since it will not receive SMS text from N26. Which they verified is a continuous problem. After 4 or 5 drop chats and of course having to relog back on and wait and after two unsympathetic customer service reps, I was told that I would receive a call within an hour. Well an hour came and gone and of course no phone call. so I had to log back in and ask where my phone call was and the next customer service rep told me unsympathetically that it would take 24 hours to receive the call. So I have to keep my phone on and around me for 24 hours, and heaven forbid anything happened where I'm away from my phone, just to get access to MY MONEY.  The second star is because I have had to contact customer service before one or two other times and issues have been resolved quickly so I wanted to be fair. ,But this journey this evening started at 6:30 in the evening and lasted until after 10:00 at night and is still not resolved. It may take another 22 hours.
company_reply: Hi Kim. Thanks for the feedback. We do apologise for the experience you had. Did you ever manage to get this sorted? We would be happy to help you if you contact us via the Live Chat from within the app or web app, or on our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: The Worst Company in History and They Have My Money
text: UPDATE:,After 24 hours of being tied to my phone, they told me not to worry, someone would be calling me in the next few hours. ,24 hours later, still nothing. I contacted them again. ,They told me I needed to go to an ATM and withdraw money and return to them within 24 hours so they can schedule a new call. ,I didn't get the first call. I'm certain. I have never actually hated a company before. ,Oh, and when I asked to contact someone else, all I could get was the complaints email address. There is no way to talk to anyone higher up than the chat support people.,********,I have been trying to regain access to my account for almost a month now. The hoops they have you jump through in order to identify yourself would be laughable if it wasn't so enraging. ,You have to talk to them in the chat; and then go to an ATM and withdraw money (which incurs fees where I live now); and then come back to them and talk to them again within 24 hours. I received each step of that process in a different conversation with them. No one told me as I wrote it here. It was "go to an ATM." Then, after I did "No you have to tell us within 24 hours of the withdrawal." Okay, did that. "No, you have to have talked to us within 24 hours so we know it's you." ,Then, once you finally get through that, they want to give you a "confirmation callback" with a special access code they gave you in the chat. This amazing system is that they will "call you within 24 hours",Within 24 hours. ,Absolutely no way to get a smaller window. I don't know, maybe most of their clientele don't have jobs or lives or anything better to do with literally an entire calendar day, but having to wait by the phone for 24 hours really makes me angry. And if you miss the call? Well screw you you'll have to start all over again.,Not to mention that the reason for all the troubles is that I moved to a new country and my old phone number no longer works. So, now there's a 9 hour time difference but I have to get all of this done during their business hours. I'm not allowed to talk to the branch of the company that is in my current country. No, that would be too easy.,This is the absolute worst scam of a "bank" I've ever seen. I can't imagine how this is something that is really happening in this day and age. I cannot access my own money because they've held it hostage by their theatre of security. I don't feel secure, I feel insulted.,Because, you can give them all of your personal information; offer to send photos of your passport; recite every identifying factor of your person, and they still won't do a damn thing until you do their 48-hour dance of self-indulgence. It's absolutely disgraceful. ,Once I regain access and get my money out of their claws, I will be closing my account faster than you can say "sorry, it's been 25 hours: start over again."

title: Horribly confusing and time-consuming…
text: Horribly confusing and time-consuming process of opening and terminating your business account. After opening my account I decided to terminate it right away due to developments in personal life. Months later it turned out that I had only canceled some annual renewal and my account had been piling up fees. Customer support didn't bat an eye to the fact that I had attempted to cancel my account and had never used it, but immediately insisted that I pay a year's worth of fees for this account that had zero activity. No compromise.,The sheer amount of documentation on website and app are enough to throw anyone into confusion, but on top of that the constantly-crashing and bugged app caused my support chat to shut down 4 times.,I've never left a negative review anywhere, but as a product owner and service provider myself this uncompromising, money-grabbing attitude left me too bitter to not speak out.
company_reply: Hi Jay,,Thank you for taking the time to leave your review.,When you sign up for a premium N26 account, there is a legal timeframe in which you can revoke your account before being charged any fees or continuing with the contract. This revocation must be made via contacting us on live chat, or sending an email to support@n26.com from your registered email address. Once the revocation timeframe has passed, the contract continues as normal. Cancelling within the app cancels the renewal rather than the current contract, and this is outlined in the email sent after the cancellation is requested. We apologise if you feel this was not clear enough, and we will pass your feedback on internally.,Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: The security is just outrageous.
text: As a computer programmer, I can verify that the interface & usability of the application is good and easy for non-technical users. ,However, their recent increased security has completely destroyed my fond relationship with them. You have to have a working phone to access your account via 2FA. If you lose your phone, you have to wait for a new one and you cannot access your account/make payments & transfers. They completely lock you out of your account.,I understand security but they have taken this way too far. Every payment made on a computer demands that you verify this via your smartphone. Not only this, you have to have an up-to-date smartphone which would be unlikely for elderly users. ,I have an active account but I will close it as soon as possible. I'd recommend anyone reading this to think twice because I'm sure you will find yourself in a situation like mine.
company_reply: Hello Benjamin, thanks for your feedback.,We are sorry to learn that you don't like the 2 Factor Authentication security measure we implemented earlier this year.,As you know N26 is a full fledged bank and we need to satisfy very high security standards, that includes having a 2FA and having a modern smartphone which runs Android 6.0 or newer iOS11 or newer.,Of course we are a mobile bank and we try to be the simple bank everyone loves to use...,... but we are still a bank, and security is and will always be our top priority.,Have a nice day.

title: I want to tell you about my terrible…
text: I want to tell you about my terrible experience with N26, I'm extremely disappointed and feeling cheated by the company, or even bolder in the words “stolen” !!!  I opened a metal account in Ireland but I never received the card, when I returned to Italy, I decided to make a contact with the company and request an Italian account, because I would not return to Ireland, I informed the support my new address, informing that I should pay 45  € for a new card with updated address, but until then no one informed me that there would be restrictions, as one of the fundamental things to deposit money on the card, when I went to ncash I was informed that I had no possibility to deposit from Italy, only by transfer  or in Ireland, I was very nervous because I had paid 45 € plus the monthly fee of 16.90 account maintenance, I contacted support again, they said there was no solution, nonsense I was not advised by them, they suggested I pay all monthly, annual  € 190 so I can open an Italian account, no way!  I am very upset angry with the company, mercenaries, lack of respect for the customer, just tricked me into taking my money!  Friends who need digital account stay tuned with this company, do not trust!  don't offer solutions to repair the mistakes made, injury to me and disappointment ! I do not recomend ! I want My money Back 26
company_reply: Hi Karen,,Thank you for taking the time to leave this review.,We sincerely apologise for your recent experience with us, and we hope that this can be rectified.,We'd like to offer some background about how our CASH26 service operates. We currently do not offer the service across all of our markets, but we hope to expand this in future. The feature is linked to the country in which your Terms and Conditions are based, which is the country in which you initially opened your account. In your case, this country would be Ireland, and CASH26 is currently not offered in this location, or for customers with Irish T&Cs. It is not possible to change the country in which your Terms & Conditions are based - it is only possible to change your legal address. It is currently possible to use CASH26 if you have opened an account in Germany, Austria or Italy. This is why you would have been advised that the best course of action would be to close your account, so that you could then open an account with Italian Terms and Conditions.,We understand this is not convenient as you have a premium N26 Metal account, which has a monthly fee associated with it. In accordance with the contract which is signed when opening a Metal account, if the request is made to close the account whilst in the contract, the agreed upon remaining fees are requested by us.,Again, we apologise for this experience and we hope that we can resolve this issue for you as soon as possible. Please feel free to reach out to our live chat, email or Twitter Support so we can help.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hey Ben,,The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers’ data and account security. SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you’ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account. We apologise that you encountered an issue receiving the SMS. We will make sure to pass on your customer experience regarding our callback process. We apologise for the inconvenience this caused you. ,You can contact us on Twitter or send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: This review relates to an N26 online…
text: This review relates to an N26 online account in Germany. ,Possibly the worst company I have ever dealt with. Really, really, really bad. I would avoid an account at this bank at all costs, the awful service and systems could leave you without access to your money. ,I changed my mobile number, and went through the authorisation process. This involves making an ATM withdrawal. After speaking to five agents on the online chat, finally the process was successful, and I was told I would get a call back within one hour to verify the code. After waiting for two hours, and because it was already past 1:00am, I contacted chat again. They apologised, and said I would be called the next day after 7:30am. Thirteen days later, I am still waiting for the call.  ,After three days, I emailed the customer service email, and was told that messages are currently being answered in seven days. Perhaps I was lucky, because I received a reply in six days, asking for a phone bill with my name on it. I do not have a phone bill with my name on it, because my phone number is a pay-as-you go account, and is managed entirely online. I replied with this information two days ago, and have heard nothing. ,My salary within Germany is paid into this account, and all my payments are made online from it, including rent, phone bill, Rund­funk­beitrag (TV license). This means I can not currently make any payments online. I can withdraw cash, but of course N26 charges for cash withdrawals and deposits over a certain limit. I also have no way to check my balance. I usually have €1000 - €2000 in the account, not a huge amount, but significant, and as these are my only funds in Germany, the inconvenience is extremely significant. ,I have even asked to close the account. Guess what? I can't even close the account with my mobile number being authorised. Go back to square one, and repeat ad infinitum. ,I will be complaining to the German financial regulator. I have never dealt with any organisation which provides such an important service and which is so careless, uninterested, and so basically incompetent. Added to which, most of the agents were at least polite, but one was extremely rude. ,If just one person reading this changes their mind about opening an N26 account, I will have saved someone from a huge amount of trouble. Just go to a reputable bank. If I could give this company minus stars, I would
company_reply: Hi, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. ,Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise where we need to improve, so we appreciate this. ,We are truly sorry for the experience you had. I am sure we can help and get this escalated for you. Can you please contact us on Twitter support, we can help immediately from there. ,Best,,Your N26 support team.

With the recent 2FA we have introduced to our mobile app for an extra layer of security with your account, this is even more important. ,We understand that this may have been inconvenient and we sincerely apologise for this, however we are obliged to take the necessary steps required in order to ensure we are speaking with the account holder for the safety and security of your account. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team.

title: Been a customer since January 2019 its been Hell
text: Been a customer since January 2019 its been the worst experience of my life with them they closed my account down under, suspicion of fraud activity, unlawful money laundering or terrorist financing or other illegal activity, which is under A14.2 of there T&C. for a bank to tell me that im a terrorist I have my solicitors, FCA, FOS, GERMAN REGULATOR, READY TO PUT N26 on investigation. "bank of the year N26 they will close you down and call you a terrorist.",P.s this Ain't no joke look at other customer experience & look at the T&C.

We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. On occasion, the result of these checks will indicate that we must terminate our business relationship with you. ,We apologise for any inconvenience caused as a result of this.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Deposit Rejected
text: So attempted to open an account about March/April time.,Eventually after about 3/4 months was able to open an account.,Received my card thought all was well.,Setup my universal credit payment to go in to N26, universal credit always pay me on the 10th of the month by BACS.,Waiting all day on the 10th no sign of any money, called UC guaranteed me the money was sent, web chat with N26 assured me wasn’t received.,So today 11th spoke to UC again confirmed BACS credit from them rejected by N26 with no reason given.,N26 still have no record of rejection and and haven’t got a clue what’s going on.,I dread to think what would of happened to money if it actually got deposited, would I of been able to use it?,Definitely do not use N26 for any banking services, I wish I never did.
company_reply: Hi Colin, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. Something doesn't seem right here. I am  sure we can get this looked into for you. Can you contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Happy so far!

I’m an upgraded member and still waiting for my card so can’t comment on that yet :) ,I love the feature of being able to have multiple saving spaces. ,I think I will use this card to transfer money in and to use for small purchases to begin with such as on eBay and in my local shops and see how that goes. Then if all goes well, I plan to use N26 for savings as my current main bank account doesn’t offer savings accounts yet. All in all, so far, I’m happy. :)

company_reply: Hi Paul,,We are sorry to learn of your recent experience with us.,In this situation, we are the recipient bank, therefore we cannot track the payment as it was not sent from our system. We advise reaching out to the sending bank who can initiate "Payment Investigation" or their alternative, so that they can investigate further. If the transfer was made via N26, we have the capability to initiate an investigation.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Account is expensive and VERY limited
text: Account is expensive and VERY limited. You will not be able to have a joint account, nor can you wire funds to the UNITED STATES! You  have to use a third party. You also can't deposit a check!!  You also sign up for a year agreement when you open the account. I was not aware of this until I want to close it. I am basically giving them a free 17 bucks a month until my contact is up. To say I feel taken advantage of is an understatement. I would not recommend them.
company_reply: Hi Armand,,If you opt for an N26 premium account when signing up, there is a monthly fee associated with the account, which is listed upon agreeing to the terms and conditions. There is also a minimum contract period of 12 months which is made available to all potential customers before signing up. It is possible to cancel this contract, however the agreed upon fees must be paid.,You can easily transfer funds to a different currency using TransferWise from directly within your mobile app. Just go to the "Transfer" section and switch the currency to USD. You can also use the TransferWise website to carry this out. TransferWise are our trusted partner for processing international transfers.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: DO NOT OPEN AN ACCOUNT WITH THEM!!!!
text: I have been using this bank since a year with no problem. They ask for re-identification again after one year, It doesn't work out apparently because I have a different residence permit (spouse of an EU) than they want (the blue card) although it is the same one I opened the account with! I don't understand. I'm really disappointed and for sure won't recommend anyone in the future to open an account with them. I've been a costumer for this long to be shocked by the fact that they will close my account just because of my nationality and not being a European! it is a bit of discrimination to be honest. Plus I cannot access my account to take the money left inside because they blocked me from the app! like what the hell! they sent me an email saying that they can send me the money in another account that I have , what if i don't have another bank account ?? really disrespectful! I have been recommending my friends to open accounts with N26 but it is going to stop now! ,for the identification they ask for a video call and that's what i did, after the employer told me that I need specifically the blue card to be able to save my account (although my residence permit is valid until 2023 and I use it to travel in all the EU) they send me an email saying (((( We recently reached out to request you re-verify your identity with us. We perform these checks in order to ensure our customers’ privacy and account safety. As of today we have not received a response on your behalf. As a result, we're required to close your N26 account pursuant to §19 (1) of the General Business Conditions. )) LIES! I spoke to three of your agents and yet you couldn't fix my problem. NEVER AGAIN. i just want my money back.
company_reply: HI Maram, thanks for taking the time to let us know. Something doesn't seem right here. Can you please contact us on Twitter Support so we can get this looked into with you? You can send us a DM there. An agent will be glad to help out.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

It seems that the permit you hold is currently not accepted for verification purposes. We apologise for any disappointment caused.,You can access our support center and some FAQs via the following link: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: 8000 minutes to set up. Would actually be easier to set up in a bank
text: 8 minutes to set up. What a false claim. Let's go with the average first time and not an absurd time based on what is most likely a second or third run. ,Wouldn't accept my id on 3 occasions. ,Then I tried to call for a video call as advised.,First call hung up because it won't allow blue tooth headphones. ,Second time I got through but she immediately and quite unfriendly said I had to get out of my car to make the call for "security'.,I done this on my lunch and the van is the quietest place for me. She came across so abrupt, no hello or explanation. ,If the service is this poor before they have any of my money I can only imagine how bad it'll get if they had my money. ,Could be a great product, but poorly executed. ,A Michelin star meal, served on a bin lid.,#update 1.  I called again.  The operator only speaks German and asked me to call again.  Almost a week later.,Guess what,  I didn't love another failed attempt.,#update 2. Called again, this time just a black screen, no operator.  When the call hung up, the app started to refresh itself and 30 minutes later is still refreshing. THE FUTURE! Don't worry N26. I like the challenge now and will continue until my account is set up to see how long it takes. Then I'll see how long it takes to delete . I've actually joined revolut since.  It's very good.
company_reply: Hey, thanks for your feedback.,We are sorry to learn about your experience with N26, especially about our verification process.,The verification process is a very delicate moment and it needs to be executed with specific criterias, i.e. you should be in a room with good lights and where we can hear you clearly.,We would love if you tried back again to perform the verification process with us, we're sure you're going to love it this time.,Have a nice day.

title: Always perfect and I'm loving it.
text: Always perfect and I'm loving it.,In Germany, most of the banks charge monthly fee and you need to have Anmeldung (Residence Registration). That was a spectacular experience within the app.,Of course, there's no maintenance fee per month or year. You can use Apple Pay which I always use at supermarkets. Google pay is also available.

title: Horrific Customer Service/Card declines
text: I have had the absolute worst experience with N26 since getting my debit card 2 months ago. My gym membership, spin class membership, venmo transfers, and ATM transactions all get declined and for various reasons. One came back that my zip was wrong (false, I triple checked it, made sure it was accurate on the site), the ATM said my card was expired (doesn't expire until 2024), another said my card was marked as lost or stolen...etc. ,When I contacted customer support, they researched it, then said that there were "no declined ATM transactions", basically insinuating that I made the whole thing up. Yeah, OBVIOUSLY if it spits my card out saying it's expired, there's not going to be a transaction to decline. They basically said I was entering my information wrong and offered no solutions. I've now racked up late fees with my gym membership and spin class membership, can't transfer any money out of my account, and have no help. ,Needless to say, I'm closing my account based on customer service alone.

title: I'm a new N26 client
text: I'm a new N26 client. Account setup was challenging, perhaps because I'm an American living in Italy. Using the app, it asked for a photo of my identity card or passport. I used my Italian identify card and received a message that it didn't match my selected form of identification. This took two weeks before I was informed of the problem and my account was reset so I could try again. Again, my Italian identify card was rejected without explanation. I tried to send a photo of my permesso di soggiorno but the app wouldn't accept it. finally, after a total of more than a month, I tried again using my US passport. Success in less than 15 minutes. It would be helpful if N26 provided reasons for when an application is not initially accepted. Now that the account is set up it seems to be a very good service. I've had one issue with the debit card being declined but that was resolved via chat.

title: Since the new update in September
text: Since the new update in September, I have not been able to pair my phone. The online support suggested I set my confirmation code again. Big mistake !  tried to but that doesn't work either. Which means that I do not have a confirmation code now, nor is my phone paired. Their reply - wait for a phone call in the next 24 hours. Well it's been almost 16 hours, and tomorrow is a full day at work so I can't see how this will be worked out, on 'their time' whenever they have enough time to call.,This is all rather scary.
company_reply: Hey,,To avoid any further delays in logging into your account, we’ll provide you with the required authentication code through other means.  In order to do so, we ask that you first contact us again via live chat from our Support Center so we can verify you. We’ll then be able to guide you through the next steps to log into your account again. ,You can contact us via the Support Center by clicking on “Open a Chat” at the bottom of this article:,https://support.n26.com/en-de/getting-started/other/how-to-contact-n26,Please do this at your earliest convenience and we’ll be happy to get this sorted for you.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Beware of N26
text: Beware of N26, the other bad reviews have it right. ,When it works it's great: modern, in english, fast. But when you have an issue you better prepare yourself for the worst, most stressful situation ever. They are simply not prepared to deal with the issues regulations and app woes present them with. They have a terrible Customer Support setup that makes it difficult for you to get a fast solution to any issue. Furthermore, while you are trying to sort things out you're blocked out of your account and you don't have access to bank statements, balances, or anything. That means you're in the dark as I have been for a month in a half. They ask for "patience" and "trust" and I'm pretty sure they're braking banking rules all the time with these practices. ,They tell you "you can still use your card"...sure, but what about transfers, 2 step verification, knowing if no fraudulent transactions have happened...Silence. They cannot deal with real world problems in a professional manner. This is a startup playing to be a grown-up bank.,So if you like to live dangerously, go ahead, but please don't make it your main bank. It is not simply there yet, might never be since they actually were better in the beginning.
company_reply: Hi J,,We apologise for any inconvenience caused as a result of our re-verification process.  N26 is legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals, and this should only take a few minutes to complete - we regret that you did not have this experience, and we will take your feedback on board.,We hope that this has since been resolved for you. Please feel free to reach out to our Twitter Support channel, so that we can take a further look into this issue.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: One word DIABOLICAL
text: One word DIABOLICAL. AVOID.,As you can see same response received and what is the point of giving a reference number when they send a standard email asking to explain again and again about the situation. Waste of time. I will probably get the same reply again.
company_reply: Hey, thank you for your feedback.,Could you please precise your situation so we can assist you ? ,You can also reach out to us by sending an email at : support@n26.com or by opening LiveChat at the bottom of the following page : https://support.n26.com/en-de/fixing-an-issue/other/how-to-contact-n26,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: Absolutely terrible customer service
text: Absolutely terrible customer service. I have been trying to close my account with n26 for 2 months, I had no idea a "bank" could make things so difficult, everything time I speak to a rep via chat or email I get a different often contradicting response.,They did nothing when I told them I had lost my n26 card. ,Do not bank with n26, find a proper bank with standards even if its more effort to set up
company_reply: Hello Alex.,We are very sorry to learn that your experience was not as we intended it to be.,We would like to learn more about your situation and help you, but obviously it would not be safe for you to send us your personal data on this public post.,Please write us at support@n26.com .,Of course we take your security very seriously and we want to assist you with your lost card.,Regards,,Your N26 Team

title: Pairing not working
text: I use N26 account for over half a year. It worked OK until the new app was installed in September.,Today I have not been able to pair my smartphone. Neither could my husband, who also has N26 account. When we try several times to log in hoping that the pairing would finally work. This is totally frustrating. We are unable to make urgent transfer.
company_reply: Hello Vera, thanks for your feedback.,We are constantly monitoring the status of our apps and it does not seem that we are detecting anything unusual.,We would love to help you, but we need to carry out a more thorough investigation, that's why we ask you to contact us privately (it is not safe for you to write your data in a public post).,Write us a mail at support@n26.com ,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: I've never had such a nightmarish…
text: I've never had such a nightmarish experience with a bank before. Right now, for example, I have to "pair" my brand-new smartphone with my account because for certain transactions, such as payments to another bank account, you cannot use only the web app, as is the case with every other bank where I have account, but you also have to go on N26's smartphone app and "confirm" the transaction. The problem? Although I've done everything I'm supposed to do, the N26 Android app REFUSES to "pair" my smartphone with my account. I have an important payment of nearly 800 euros I need to send no later than today, but I'm blocked from "confirming" it. I could tell more horror stories, as my wife also has struggled mightily with N26 and their obviously deeply flawed smartphone app, but I'll leave it at that... The worse part, however, is N26's clear inability and unwillingness to address and fix these issues. Every time I've gone on their customer chat line I've been made to feel that I'm the one causing the problem, not their ridiculous complicated system of "verification," exacerbated by their faulty software and customer service support system.
company_reply: Hello Thomas, ,Even though we are very sorry to learn about your experience we would like to thank you for your feedback.,As you probably already know we have adopted a double factor verification to maximise the safety of our customers.,Some banks adopt a verification code sent via SMS, other banks use a physical code generator, we send a notification directly on your mobile app in order to confirm a payment.,We would like to help you understand what didn't quite work in your verification process, but of course we need further information.,Please contact us at support@n26.com , and feel free to report anything you feel like, we will do everything in our power to solve your situation and to improve our service.,Of course we do not believe it is your fault if something didn't quite go as intended, we are sorry if we made you feel that way.,Thanks again for the time you put for writing this feedback and we are looking forward to have the chance to support you again.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: Terrible customer support
text: Terrible customer support, was just chatting to a guy called Anselm and he was very dismissive and unhelpful.
company_reply: Hello Sebastian,,we are very sorry to learn about your experience with our customer support agent.,Of course we don't mean to be dismissive and unhelpful. That is why we are working everyday from 7 AM to 11 PM 7 days a week to be always there for you whenever you need us.,For some cases you can also write us on Facebook and Twitter in English, French, Spanish, German and Italian.,We encourage you to contact us again, we will do whatever we can to meet your service expectations.,Regards,,Your N26 Team

title: Their customer service is a nightmare

Had to contact them 4 times and it's not finished : cannot have access anymore to my account cuz I changed my phone number and didn't think about changing the registered number with a new one. The asked me a withdrawal so I did and they had to call me. First time : I missed it I was driving and they called twice but in the SAME minute : how smart is it. Then contacted them back and they never called me back. So annoying and loosing time. Do not recommend it
company_reply: Hey Alma, thank you for reaching out. We're very sorry about this.,Please be aware that we’re currently experiencing a high volume of enquiries. As a result, the wait times to receive your call back may be a bit longer than usual, 48 hours in total.,Thank you for your understanding.,Best,,Your N26 team.

We'll get back to you as soon as possible.,Best,,Your N26 team.

title: The way N26 handles (new) customer…
text: The way N26 handles (new) customer problems is a disaster. ,For two days I tried to get my ID verified through the newly installed N26 app by trying to take (several) pictures of my passport. ,The in-app camera "take picture"-button does not respond however, so it is not possible to make a picture of my passport (only to view it in their app. Also, my phone-camera and everything else on my phone (Samsung S9) works properly, so it is clearly the problem within their app..,When I contacted the customer support (only available through chat), all the help i get is a "copy-paste"-standard reply; that I need to reinstall the app. Tried to reinstall the app four times now. ,When not possible to send the ID pictures via email, because of fraud reasons, that's ok. ,But try then to make a decent app that works on 99% of the phones,Finally decided to not use n26. What a bunch of amateurs
company_reply: Good morning, thank you for your comment.,We are very sorry that you could not verify your identity within the app. What you can do is download the app on another smartphone and take the pictures of your ID there directly.,Please note that as soon as your identity is verified, you can pair another smartphone (your Samsung S9 in this case) and use the app with it.,We hope this answer helped you out.,Regards,,Your N26 team.

I wonder what would happen if I have a real problem with my money... not worth the try.

title: Exceptionally awaful at everything
text: There are so many things wrong with this bank. The app and online banking are missing numerous basic functions - such as saving regular payees or managing direct debits.But the worst thing about them is their customer service. I had my phone stolen so I couldn't access my account. It took hours and hours waiting to get through to someone. Then I had to go through re-verification - sending my ID and selfies - and wait until they got back to me. The process takes 10 days! 10 days without access to your bank account! And they really couldn't care less. Their attitude is 'this is the way it is, live with it.',I've taken my banking elsewhere.,03/10 Response to N26:,No, my card isn't working. Being able to receive money is no good if I can't send payments or use my card. Same boiler-plate response, no help or support. They think it's OK to lock people out for 10 days. Ridiculous.,07/10,Still locked out. Borrowed all I can from friends and family. Literally eating beans on toast twice a day with the little I have left. Late bills are piling up. N26 is ruining me and they don't care.

As a result, the wait times to connect to a customer service agent may be a bit longer than usual. ,Concerning your N26 account, please note that during the re-verification, you could still use your card, your direct debits were collected and you could still receive incoming transfers.,We thank you for your understanding.,Best,,Your N26 Team.

title: Read. DO NOT open an Account. Here's why....
text: Do Not. No matter what you may have heard or what you may read. Do not open an "account" with N26.,A bank- or any consumer business- should be judged by how it performs in its worst moments and not its best. N26 is a perfect example. This innovative start-up has gained customers and market penetration but has done so at the expense of its customers: its' tech platform is unstable and its customer service is non-existent. Truly- you'll get five answers for a question but NEVER get a person on the telephone. Though N26 promotes itself as an online bank, that's a ruse. When problems arise its ability to solve them requires the sort of traditional intervention of staff to solve problems that can't be solved by an algorithm. And its investment in staff is abysmally low. I've been locked out of my account- while traveling overseas- for three weeks now. Despite assurances that my debit card would continue to work it does not (see below). I've had to make costly compromises to how I bank myself abroad that have wiped out any advantage that N26 promotes- and has cost me hundreds of dollars. Prior to this debacle I had bad consistently bad experiences over the past 18 months: five terminated / dropped online conversations and a wait as long as 90 minutes for an ONLINE chat. No kidding- an online chat. I'm told by insiders that N26 spends 10,000x more money on customer acquisition than it does on customer service. ,N26 is focused on building a paying customer base but fails miserably in terms of customer service. When I received a response a week or so after my account was locked it came from the "Complaints Department" (not a Customer Service Department as you would expect.) To wit, I'm not a complain I'm a customer- a distinction that's lost on this tone-deaf company.  Its founders are worth over $100 million while customers' needs are ignored. This is why banking gets a bad name and tech founders a reputation as entitled predators.
company_reply: Hey, thank you for reaching out.,We sincerely apologise for this situation.,Please be aware that we’re currently experiencing a high volume of enquiries. As a result, the wait times to connect to a customer service agent may be a bit longer than usual. ,Concerning your N26 account, please note that during the re-verification, you can still use your card, your direct debits are collected and you can still receive incoming transfers. We just need you to upload your ID into the app so we can re-verify   your identity.,Thank you for your understanding.,Regards,,Your N26 team.

title: creation tres simple et CB gratuite…
text: creation de compte tres simple et CB gratuite. 0 frais. hotline performante. Une néo banque parfaite !

title: DO NOT USE
text: I wish I had read reviews of this bank before I made the mistake of signing up for it. I got an account, transfered money into it, and immediately learned that I would never be able to log into the app or the website because I had an American number and the two-factor authentication cannot go through. Infuriating! I didn't close my account, and I used the card once to withdraw cash from an ATM successfully. Then, my card was stolen and I was unable to log into my account but somehow figured out a way to 'block' my card temporarily. The next day, I got a notification that a purchase had been authorized - so it was NOT blocked? I called the US support number, who had no record of my account existing since I opened it abroad, and didn't even have the support number that I was supposed to call. There IS no support number. I had to open a chat and it took five different chats and several hours to even get someone to block my account. They said someone will call me "within 24 hours" to pair my phone to my account and let me in. He wouldn't even let me see which purchases were attempted. I am withdrawing all of my money and canceling this account immediately. I have never been more stressed out from a banking experience! Unbelievable that I cannot access my own account while some stranger is off spending my money!
company_reply: Hey Lily,,we are sorry to learn about your experience.,The two factor authentication is obviously intended for security reasons. As a bank with an official license from the ECB we are compelled to do anything in our power to maximise our customer's security, that's why we asked you to provide us with a phone number.,Have you contacted us right after you realised that you couldn't go through the authentication process with your American phone number?,We believe we could have helped you figuring out a way to log into your account.,Without our customer being authenticated within the app we cannot provide personal information, let alone transaction information because it would not be safe.,We encourage you to contact us again in the future, we will do everything in our power to help you out.,Regards,,Your N26 Team

title: Extremely buggy app, and the app is all they have
text: Withdrawal - We tried to withdraw some money from the ATM, We got a notification that the transaction was successfully authorized, and the amount was deducted from the account. But the ATM didn't give any cash. Later we found out an explanation on their website saying "It happens". Why don't you fix the issues you have, rather than writing articles to decorate the bug as a feature???,Foreign transfer - I wanted to perform a foreign currency transfer. I tried two times, and both failed giving an "Unexpected Error Occurred" red banner and a forever spinning "Processing" banner. Then we contacted support to see what's wrong. And we got the most stupid and hilarious response ever. He said that they use Transferwise as a service to do foreign transfers which THEY HAVE NO CONTROL OF. Then they asked me to contact Transferwise DIRECTLY to get my problem sorted. I myself is a software engineer who has years of experience in the Payments industry, so I know how things work. Why would you ask your customer to contact YOUR 3rd party service which the customer has ABSOLUTELY NO CONTRACT with????? That's the most stupid and ridiculous answer ever. ,Getting a bank statement - Getting a full bank statement for official purposes is a nightmare. Support told us they don't issue certified bank statement including the history of transactions. You can only get a statement verifying your current balance (which is ridiculous)
company_reply: Hey, thank you for taking the time to write this review.,We are sorry that you feel that way. We are always looking to improve the quality of our services and are always open to your observations. ,If you wish to give feedback or have any ideas that could improve your experience (concerning app improvements, ideas for new features, quality of Customer Service...), you can send an email to : ideas@n26.com and we'll make sure to forward it to the relevant teams. ,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: A word of warning to anyone considering…
text: A word of warning to anyone considering N26.,No SWIFT payments. You can’t get paid from people internationally unless they use transfer wise. If you are being paid by your employer or receiving funds for a sale you cannot expect everyone to send funds via a 3rd party, adding an unnecessary 3rd person.,Live Support via chat only. Answers feel like they are template responses 99% of the time. It doesn’t feel like a bank and feels like an underpaid student with no financial qualification is on the other end.,To break free from this shambles of a company I paid 11 months N26 you @ 110 euros to leave them and it took 2 over 2 weeks for them to close my account after repeated emails and chats asking them to do so.,You could argue I should have researched before I signed up. True. But I just expected the above as a given.
company_reply: Hey, thank you for taking the time to write this comment.,We are very sorry that you feel that way.,First, concerning SWIFT payments, it is indicated in the Terms and Conditions of your account that N26 only supports SEPA payments. You can find the info about this here : https://support.n26.com/en-fr/getting-started/payments-and-transfers/how-to-make-transfers-in-foreign-currencies,Our phone support line is reserved to Metal users. Our agents can help you via LiveChat everyday from 7 am to 11 pm.,Finally, if you had subscribed to a premium account, you had 14 days to revoke it without any fees. Afterwards, it is indeed mandatory for you to pay the remaining fees, as written in your contract.,We hope this answer was useful.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: Fingers crossed.
text: I'm so surprised by the amount of unhappy N26 customer reviews I've read.,I have been a N26 customer for 2 months and I have not had any issues what so ever.,Set was easy, I received the account and card very promptly, transferring and using the app is so simple. Just the fact that I have  total control myself over my account and making payments has been quick and effortless, cannot fault it 10 out of 10 from me. Hopefully this will continue.

title: They got all my funds without notice or explanation!
text: They had a second identification check up while I'm living abroad and their system cant support my foreign passport online unless I go back to Germany to present it "again" to the local post office. All my funds are frozen and my only option is to close the account and transfer all my funds to my bank account abroad, but their system also don't recognize my other bank. I'm trying to contact their customer support every day without response, explanation, update or estimate to have this problem solved. I have bills to pay and there's no landline to call, they are only an online bank and completely dismissive to all my attempts to resolve this situation! I feel helpless!!! My worse experience with a bank! Get your funds out of this bank ASAP!,------,Waw! This answer from n26 to my review is just but a politically correct answer. You know things are not working this way, I'm trying to contact you but nothing. No answer, no estimate, and obviously I can't proceed with the identification process unless I return to Germany. What are u talking about? This is your politically correct answer to keep fooling your future customers? You are the worst bank experience! All wrong! It's been a month and I'm still waiting for my funds to be transfered without access to my account. The app doesn't work, I can't complete the identification, no answer by email or any update or estimate for this situation to be resolved from the chat.
company_reply: Hey Erika, thank you for your message. ,We sincerely apologise about this situation.,As a licenced bank, we’re legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. ,Once you start the process to verify your identity again, you’ll still be able to use your card to make purchases, receive money, have full benefits of any overdraft & credit, and direct debits will still be collected. ,When verification of your ID is complete, you’ll have full access to your account features and app.,We thank you for your understanding.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: No card sent

Deliveries in some specific areas in the following countries (Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain) may take longer. Please consider this before taking any action regarding a card re-order.,If the delivery fails and your card is returned to us, we’ll let you know via email so you can confirm your address. ,We hope this message was useful.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: Stay away from this bank
text: Stay away from this bank! There are no other options in Germany for non-German speakers, but save yourself some time, effort and stress and don't sign up with N26.,Every single step has been a hassle. I signed up two months ago and I've still not been able to use it. The startup video process took an hour, many assistants just hung up when I didn't speak German.,I tried transferring money from my EU home country but it wasn't accepted. Upon trying to figure out why, they had no information to give me, and my bank of 15 years in my home country told me that this was N26's problem, not theirs. I've repeatedly tried to fix this, but they refuse to help me further.,They've recently updated their login process to ask for phone verification, and they didn't tell me before implementing this. I've had trouble with sim cards here as well, and my phone number changes all the time. I tried changing this through the customer chat and they asked me if I could go to an ATM to make a transaction in order to verify myself. Just to change my phone number! Up until recently, all they've asked for a login has been an email and a password.,The principle to have to go verify myself like that is just wrong. I've complained about that and they don't listen. I've asked for a different way of verifying myself (my bank in my country have many means of verification) and they asked me about my 5th transaction in my bank. I haven't even had 1 transaction! I answered that, and apparently the answer was wrong and the assistant closed the chat. I've asked the customer service 4 times now, having waited several hours on and on, and they just transfer me to other assistants or the internet connection is abrupted on their side.,Highly unprofessional.
company_reply: Hey Linn, thank you for taking the time to write this review.,We are sorry for the trouble you've experienced concerning your verification. Note that you can change the langage of contact by clicking on Account > Settings > App Settings > Language. ,If your incoming transfer is outside of the estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. We can't investigate incoming transfers, but we've collected a few reasons why your SEPA or foreign currency transfer could have failed : https://support.n26.com/en-fr/fixing-an-issue/payments-and-transfers/why-did-my-sepa-transfer-fail,Regarding re-verification, please note that as a licensed bank, we’re legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. ,Once you start the process to verify your identity again, you’ll still be able to use your card to make purchases, receive money, have full benefits of any overdraft & credit, and direct debits will still be collected. ,When verification of your ID is complete, you’ll have full access to your account features and app.,Finally, if you have any ideas on how to improve your experience and our services, you can send an email to : ideas@n26.com and we'll forward your suggestions to the relevant teams.,We thank you for your understanding.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: Very Amateurish
text: After using N26 for several months without complaint, they suddenly updated their app.  It was a mandatory update, and they disabled older versions.  This new update had the feature of a cryptographic signature requiring a direct download from the Google Play Store.  This is a problem for me because I don't agree with Google's terms and conditions or privacy policy.  I download my apps elsewhere.,Other banks use a cryptographic signature to verify the integrity of the app, not that I have agreed to Google's t&c.  This is like the old days when companies required you to have a Windows computer to use their services.,Anyway, this app upgrade abruptly made my account unusable and blocked most of my payment options.  It was days before I was able to get through to customer service on their chat window, and was obviously not the only one with a problem.  I asked them to close my account and transfer the balance, and they are unable to give me a time frame for completing this.
company_reply: Hey Patrick, thank you for reaching out.,We sincerely apologise for the trouble you've experienced with the app.  ,We are obligated to ask your for certain security measures, like updating the app in order to give you the best services and insure that your informations remain safe. ,This said, we are always looking to improve the quality of our services and if you have any ideas on how to ameliorate your experience, you can send an email to : ideas@n26.com and we'll make sure to forward your suggestions to the relevant teams.,We hope this answer was useful.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: I was hacked but N26 addressed the…hacked
text: I was hacked but N26 addressed the issue very promptly

title: I withdraw €100 on saturday
text: I withdraw €100 on saturday! And they charged me 3 × €100 on my account! Had to fight to get a refund! Only  got 100€ back...still waiting for my other 100€!,It takes them 2 sec to steal our money and 12 days to give it back!,No solutions given,Very poor customer service  very dissapointed and donc know if I will ever see my 100€ again
company_reply: Hey Luc, we sincerely apologise for this situation.,Your N26 Mastercard is a debit card, which means banking in real-time. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:,- Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can’t cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires (and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest).,- Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. ,Sometimes you’ll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire. If it doesn’t, please reach out to Customer Service (Account > Help > LiveChat).,We thank you for your understanding and hope this answer was useful.,Best regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: No customer support. beware
text: The bank may be convenient, but when you need help they will not be there for you.,Only way to communicate is via chat, where they cut you as soon as they can. No customer service nor support whatsover. this is very alarming when you have trusted your money with a bank
company_reply: Hey Sandy, thank you for reaching out.,Our customer service agents are available and fully able to assist you everyday including Sundays and bank holidays, from 07:00 to 23:00. ,You can also contact us by sending us an email at support@n26.com. Make sure to send it from your address linked to your N26 account so we can see your previous interactions and fully understand your situation.,We thank you for your understanding and hope this answer was useful.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: They say they are available 24/7
text: They say they are available 24/7. Maybe for others but not me. I have been waiting for an agent for more than an hour. I did it 3 times today and still, I could not get to chat with anyone to explain my problem.,So, what's my problem? I cannot log in into my account. The error was " ... too many fail attempts" though I only tried once. ,Then I changed my password, re-install the apps and log in using new network and new password. Same error.,So I contacted N26 via chat (apparently this is the only way?). I have waited for so long already. ,I thought I found a solution for a good bank.
company_reply: Hey, thank you for taking the time to write this review.,Our customer service agents are available and fully able to assist you everyday including Sundays and bank holidays, from 07:00 to 23:00. Please be aware that we’re currently experiencing a high volume of enquiries. As a result, the wait times to connect to a customer service agent may be a bit longer than usual. ,You can also contact us by sending us an email at support@n26.com. Make sure to send it from your address linked to your N26 account so we can see your previous interactions and fully understand your situation.,We thank you for your patience and hope this answer was useful.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: Easy setup and super user friendly

title: Great

title: Beware of N26
text: I have used N26 for almost 2 years and in that time they have turned into a joke!! There customer service is now nonexistent as they have got rid of all their telephone numbers. They are an online remote bank that you can't contact. Their chat feature is a deception so new customers think that their is a way to contact them.,I am waiting for a new debit card as my old one cracked into pieces. You are required to pay and it still takes them 2 weeks to get the card to you. In the meantime the latest version of the app has unpaired my account from my mobile so I cannot transfer my money to a usuable account. The only thing they can say on the chat is "be patient"!!,Well patience gets you nowhere when you need to live.,My advice, find a reliable bank because N26 is not. It shouldn't be allowed to call itself a bank when it is only a glorified prepaid debit card.
company_reply: Hey James, thanks for reaching out.,The phone line is reserved to Metal users, but our customer service is available via LiveChat everyday including Sundays and bank holidays, from 07:00 to 23:00. ,Regarding your card delivery,  the estimated timeline  is 10 working days. Deliveries in some specific areas in the following countries (Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain) may take longer. Please consider this before taking any action regarding a card re-order.,Also, note that you can order your card in Express, which takes 3 working days to arrive and costs 25 euros.,We thank you for your understanding and hope this has been useful.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: It's a new Internet banking and for me…
text: It's a new Internet banking and for me it works if I have a problem it's soon sorted

title: All is fine and works..
text: All is fine and works... but there is a big minus, the direct debits. Direct debits will end up to be forced upon your account even if you do not have any money to cover the bill in the account and also even if you do not have any overdraft. So they will bounce the first time but in about 2 months time you can expect that this direct debits will be forced upon your account even if you don't have the money to pay them or have 0 money in your account. So you will be forced into minus and the next time money flows in your account it will be taken away. So be careful, especially if you are getting Hartz IV or if you are having a bad financial time.,Update: NO, you have NO control over direct debits in this situation, it happened to me so it will happen to everybody, or am I a special case?
company_reply: Hi there, thanks for taking the time to let us know. Our mobile app is designed for you to stay up to  date on the amount you have in your account to avoid going into a negative balance. You are always in complete control of this. ,We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: AWFUL BANK AND CONTACT SERVICE
text: This bank has been a nightmare. The re-verification process didn't work out because I'm not living in Germany anymore, I opened my account with my Chilean passport but now is no supported, so they just freeze my account and now I can't get access to my money. They sent me an email so they can close my account and send the remaining funds as soon as I give a new IBAN. I did that 2 weeks ago! This electronic bank is a JOKE. Contact support is not helpful at all they just ask for your email and after a few security questions they just say, "sorry the cancelations departments work independently from us, we don't have access to the info". I'm so angry, I just want my money back. But no one gives a solution.
company_reply: Hey Pamela, we are very sorry to read about your experience with us. ,As a licenced bank, we’re legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. ,If you sent your cancellation request, it will be taken into account by the relevant department and you will receive a reply once your account has been closed and your funds sent to your IBAN. There is indeed no way for our customer service agents to make this process quicker. We are sorry about this.,We thank you for your understanding.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: Do not bother about this bank if you…
text: Do not bother about this bank if you have an american mobile phone number. You need to be able to receive text messages to login and they cannot seem to figure out how to send such to a US number despite the fact that everyone else on earth can. Their website says contact customer service if you have a US number but when you do you get twenty different stories ands weeks of run around with the utimate bottom line that they can' fix it and you have to have a EU phone number. Do not waste your two weeks like I did. They are useless.
company_reply: Hi Carl, thanks for the feedback. We do apologise for that. However, we have since resolved the issue. You just need to come on the chat from within the app or support center and we can get this sorted for you.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Stolen card
text: Stolen card. It's the only bank which charges you for issuing a new card in case of robbery. I cannot understand that. Strongly will recommend you to choose other electronic banks.
company_reply: Hey Tomas, we are very sorry to read about your experience with us.,The fee will be charged for the replacement of cards which were lost, stolen or misappropriated or in case of other unauthorised use of the card. This does not apply, where the circumstances that have,led to the replacement are imputable to the Bank or where the Bank is responsible for these circumstances. In other cases, the fee will only be charged if the issuing of a replacement card results,from circumstances for which you bear responsibility and under which we are not legally obliged to supply a replacement card.,You can find more informations about this here : https://docs.n26.com/legal/01+DE/01+Account/en/13account-pricelist-en.pdf ,We thank you for your understanding.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: The bank I can trust
text: Since the moment I opened my account until my very first - and only - issue, which they solved  extremely fast, I knew I could count and trust N26. The communication is extremely clear, the support is effective and their app and security never let me down

title: Excellent experience with the customer…
text: Excellent experience with the customer care - immediate responses and quick solutions. My case was also not the easiest one: I had lost my device paired to the N26 account and then needed to pair my account to another device.

title: Nightmare Bank
text: I admit that I was pretty naive when I signed up for n26.  As an American expat living in Europe I found the traditional banks slow, bureaucratic, and difficult to work with.  N26 seemed like the perfect answer.  I was interested primarily in the convenience it offers.,What I should have been more concerned about was accountability.  With n26, there is none.  There isn't anyone you can go to if something goes wrong.,Something went very wrong, in my case.  And because n26 support is such a black hole I still can't really even say what it was.,Essentially, I was frozen out of my app and then the web account went too.  I'm not some nefarious character and don't have any financial irregularities: I get a regular paycheck and pay rent and utilities every month, go to the same grocery stores, etc.  I have a US passport and a German Blue Card.  I'm not sure how my account was flagged but it was.,And every interaction with support has ranged from frustrating to miserable as I explain again and again how I need to access my account.  After two weeks of this--contacting support every single day--I was told that my account needed to be closed and to send an email to support to transfer the funds.  This was over a week ago and still I have not received any of my money back or any kind of update.  It took another two hours and four separate support chats this morning just to verify that my email was received.  But the agent STILL could not say when I would receive my funds.,In the meantime, I am unable to receive my paycheck, pay my rent or bills - life has ground to a halt.  I've never been in this position before.  ,So please, before you sign up for n26, consider the worst case scenario.  And if convenience really means that much to you, ensure you've got a backup account somewhere else.
company_reply: Hey Leah, thank you for taking the time to write this review.,We are sorry to read about your experience with us. ,We apologise for your situation, but as a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users and we never close an account without warning you and always have a reason to do so.,If your account is closed, you'll be contacted by email. Please note that from this point, our Customer Service agents will not be able to give you any informations as your case will be handled by our Backoffice department. ,You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions. ,Thank you for your understanding.,Best,,Your N26 team

title: I like this bank
text: I like this bank. No complications to open or use your bank account, and you can use it in all Europ and the fees outside Europe for withdrawing are not high.

title: Customer service was great ...
text: Customer service was great .... took a while to sort problem out but satisfying result ...would recommend

text: If you want an online Bank with great rates easy to use apps, fast ,clean sleek ,safe then N26 is for you. Customer service are at the top of their game and the customer experience is their top priority

title: The worst customer service ever....
text: The worst customer service ever....,I checked wether I was an eligible user first. Then I attempted to create an account by completing the process of scanning my passport.,Something went wrong (possibly because the app did not recognize my official government passport) and I got blocked.,Tried again but evidently my data had been flagged. I got prompted to contact customer support. I do just that and the very unhelpful chat boy tells me to write an email to have the account unlocked. I do that and receive no response (for 3 months that is). Finally I get around to contact the customer service again. Chat girl is online this time, asks all bunch of security questions and finally tells me that she cannot help and she will contact an internal department to get this fixed. Chat girl says that I will receive and email and before I can type “but”... she’s gone... I doubt I will ever receive an email or any sign from these folks.,Customer service paints the picture of a company. Do the math...
company_reply: Hey, thank you for reaching out. ,We are very sorry to read about the experience you've had with us. ,Could you please send us an email at : support@n26.com from your address linked to your account so we'll be able to read your past interactions, understand exactly the issue and get back to you with a solution ?,We thank you for your patience and sincerely apologise again.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: Same customer representative  hangup…
text: Same customer representative  hangup two times during verification process.She  was arrogant, impatient,cold person.She definitely is not for this kind of job.I hope that someone listen that calls. Terrible weekend  experience.How you treated us,on same way you can except how we will treated you.
company_reply: Hey Nino, ,Even though we are very sorry to learn about your experience we would like to thank you for your feedback.,Please contact us at support@n26.com , and feel free to report anything you feel like, we will do everything in our power to solve your situation and to improve our service.,Of course we do not believe it is your fault if something didn't quite go as intended, we are sorry if we made you feel that way.,Thanks again for the time you put for writing this feedback and we are looking forward to have the chance to support you again.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: Which online Bank?
text: There are more and more online banks available now and after a little research and ensuring Bank N26 is a fully licences bank I decided to sign up. Great customer service faster and better than the Big 4 high street banks in the UK. The app has all the features you need to manage your account and card. Clear breakdown of expenses and faster transfer to other banks. Any online transactions require approval through the app giving you peace of mind on your account security. Make you own mind up do your research, I’m very happy with my decision.

title: God damn disgraceful bank. Nationality decides whether you are allowed sign up!
text: God damn disgraceful bank. I seen an add on Instagram about it and checked comments, one said ,“didn’t let me sign up as my nationality was Israel.” ,I thought surely this wasn’t true. I decided to try this for myself to see. ,IT WAS TRUE. Select any Jewish country or a country that’s ever been at conflict with America and you’ll find it comes up that you cannot ,1)get past personal details even with valid credentials,Or 2) tells you they do not have service in your country.,I am not sure about anyone else here but that’s a little short of what we would call RACIAL DISCRIMINATION. This is a disgusting thing for a bank to do. I will not be signing up and will absolutely recommend that nobody else does. Racism will not be supported!
company_reply: Hey Viktor,,N26 welcomes customers from around the world. We are obligated to verify your identity by checking a passport or national ID card before opening an account. ,Unfortunately, our partner is currently unable to verify all passports not because of nationality, but security features. We're sorry that you felt this way.  ,You can find a list of accepted documents in this article from our Support Center: https://support.n26.com/en-fr/getting-started/personal-information/how-to-prove-my-identity,Thank you for your understanding.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: It was very difficult but after getting…
