title: Horrible bank!!!
text: I would strongly recommend for anyone to stay far away from this bank. They change the agreements with you without telling you and they have the ABSOLUTE WORST and most rude service people in the world. You get no help at all if you have an issue. Stay far far away!!!
company_reply: Hey, thank you for taking the time to write this review.,Please contact us at support@n26.com , and feel free to report anything you feel like, we will do everything in our power to solve your situation and to improve our service.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: Easy to set up
text: Easy to set up. Everything explained upfront. A simple but easy to use bank account.

title: Reality check
text: What they'll sell you:,Business You account, THE account for traveling working freelancers! 1 business card and one card for your personal expanses! So convenient! And an insurance too! And yes, after you explained your personal situation as a digital nomad I still totally recommend this account for you! ,You want this, you need this look at all these fancy colored cards!,Reality:,- The personal card for personal expanses is a Maestro card. You can’t pay abroad with a Maestro for your daily coffe, shoppings, hotel stays or anything else. You can order things online. Or withdrawl money. So you can walk the streets with a lot of cash money in your pockets. Feeling unsafe. Oh and of course you have to pay an exchange rate everytime you withdraw. Yes, you will pay hundreds of extra euro’s a year for that.,- This is Online banking but you, dear traveling working freelancer, need a mobile cellphone number in every country you will travel to. You can’t log in or use support chat if you don’t have one. Even better, we’ll freeze your account. And no we will not get back to you about your complaint about that in de chat. Nor help you with that. You can ofcourse use your expensive phone contract from your home country. Problem solved right?,- The ensurance is just for 3 months at a time max. Good luck with that full time remote worker.,- Oh and if you buy something, let’s say a camera in Japan. We’ll take that money from your account twice. And return that 2nd payment 10 days later. And yes we do that every time. You don’t mind do you? , - And you didn’t really think we would actually help you with ANYTHING in the chat did you….
company_reply: Hi Rinske, ,Thanks for taking the time to leave your feedback.,It is possible to use your N26 You Business Mastercard for personal expenses if you so wish. We recommend using the Maestro should you want to distinguish purchases between the two cards, but you are free to use your Mastercard as you see fit. The withdrawal fee of 1.7% in a foreign currency is waived if you are a You account holder, however the Mastercard currency conversion rate will still apply. ,We accept international phone numbers, so there is no need to change between numbers if you are travelling. It is not necessary to be logged in to use the support chat, as you can access the live chat from directly within the N26 support center. You can also use live chat from our webapp on a desktop: https://app.n26.com/login,If you find yourself being double charged in a certain country and this puts you in any sort of financial difficulty, please reach out to us immediately on live chat so that we can ensure these funds are returned to you as soon as possible.,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: You need to do an upgrade to make…
text: You need to do an upgrade to make possible save account details (bank account a d sort code) to make easy the payments
company_reply: Hey, thank you for your feedback !,As a Mobile Bank, it is very important to us to insure great services on the app. Updates are indeed mandatory in order for you to keep using N26, and for everything to work.,This said, we are always looking to improve the quality of our services and if you have any idea on how to improve your experience, please send us an email at : ideas@n26.com and we'll make sure to forward your suggestions to the relevant teams.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: First app ever seen !
text: First app ever seen !,Since the update of the app everything is going wrong. My phone wasn't recognize as a paired device anymore, only solution is to receive an sms code. The system doesnt work and I never received any sms.,I'm abroad travelling and without access to my money... I let you imagine the chaos.,So I search for help and try to contact the support (there's no phone number). And that's where the fun begin, tried for days to contact them never worked. It appears to was because it doesnt work on my samsung S9 ... thankfully I could use my iPad. One time out of two you deal with an AI who doesnt help you, sometimes they just hang up on you.,Finally after days they solve my problem, I'm relieved and happy ... for 6hrs !!! Same problem go on again, phone not paired anymore, doesnt receive the SMS.,I'm actually trying to get someone on the support chat.,Don't go to this bank you would only regret it !!,I'm gonna send the email to close my account !!
company_reply: Hey Florian, we are very sorry about this situation.,If you do not have access to your N26 app, you can always start a LiveChat with us by clicking on "Open a chat" at the bottom of the following page : https://support.n26.com/en-de/fixing-an-issue/other/how-to-contact-n26,Our agents can help you everyday (including Sundays and bank holidays) from 07:00 to 23:00.,We thank you for your understanding and hope this answer was useful.,Best,,Your N26 Team.

title: No security or support form n26
text: Recently was scammed online.  The scammers used the n26 payment portal.  Two chat agents have ignored my explanation and closed chats on me without answering my questions.  They got back to me days later saying there was nothing they could do.  No explanation or details have been provided.  I've been a customer for years and the one time I really need help they're not there for me.  Still waiting for some kind of explanation. . . .,PS the agent said there was no way to reach them by phone.  A quick google will show you that that's not the case.
company_reply: Hi,,We're sorry to learn of this situation.,If you have made a card payment to someone else and you do not receive your goods, or they are not as advertised, it is possible to dispute this via a Chargeback. This is a relatively simple process where we dispute the card charge with Mastercard to claim your funds back. The chargeback process also applies if your card has been stolen or used where you did not authorise it. ,If you have sent funds via a bank transfer, the necessary step would be to initiate a Payment Investigation to track the funds. As you have to confirm a bank transfer yourself from within your own mobile app, and enter your unique PIN, it can be more difficult to retrieve the funds, but a Payment Investigation can be started.,It is possible to contact us via phone from directly within your mobile app if you are an N26 Metal customer. You can contact us 24/7 in English via live chat from your mobile app, web app, or through the N26 Support Center.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Great bank with decent customer…
text: Great bank with decent customer service. N26 are constantly improving and as a new customer from a foreign country I found the whole sign-up experience to be excellent and their overall customer care to be improving. Love using the card and bank - being in total control over my money is such a huge plus and thoroughly enjoy that N26 has basically allowed me to take control over my money!

title: Avoid.
text: Reported a serious issue with their service, they have been telling me for about three years that they are investigating and will get back to me soon.,I would happily continue the negative review but support team lying and going silent should be enough to avoid a company. There are better alternatives to N26.,Update: my case was resolved (after three years) with a full explanation of what the issue was. Still think it's too long when your money is involved.
company_reply: Hey Georgio,,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. We understand your disappointment, and apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused you.,You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) We also offer support on Twitter.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Stay away
text: Stay away! Terrible customer service. You cannot talk to anyone beside by chat after waiting for an hour and trying 3 times to resolve an issue and they always find a new step to delay the procedure. They use an unsecured method to verify your identity. Like going to a ATM and type a wrong PIN. Well, duh anyone can do that if they steal my card and purse with passport. Then they can't verify what you did because they don't think about ATM fees or exchange fees added. So you stay 1h waiting each time for nothing and you are stuck out of your account, everything is based on your phone app.The agent shut me off at the end because I was telling her how insecure their method was. I still can't access my funds and worrying to have provided all my personal information to chat people thru internet connections now and still not have access to my money. My husband also can't access his own account as the new app is not compatible with his phone so they asked him to buy a new phone. Unbelievable. The day we can access our accounts again, we move everything out!
company_reply: Hi Audrey, we do apologise for the experience you had. Sounds like there was some miscommunication here. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. We would be happy to help you if you contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Secure and best support, however only 1 currency
text: Great, fast live support and a lot of security measures, which is essential for a mobile bank.,However, UK account can only bank transfer money internally in the UK (unless you pay by card), which is unfortunate. Some competitors offer several accounts at the same time (for example UK+EU+US), which makes it easier to transfer money into another acc.

title: N26 is amazing
text: N26 is amazing, fast, efficient and with 24/7 live support via the brilliant and easy to use app. I've happily recommended N26 to friends.

title: Very bad
text: Very bad. Problems when joining. And then account closed after a few months with no reason given. Poor phone app with painful login. The bank comes up with excuses about terms and conditions. But I don't have any problems at all with other banks!
company_reply: Hi David. As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users.,You won’t encounter issues when using your bank account if you don’t breach our terms and conditions.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Amazing!
text: Amazing and easy to use

title: By a mistake my friend helped me open a…
text: By a mistake my friend helped me open a N26 you account. I found out that it is a wrong account when I saw a negativ balance. I didn't understood why it is negative. I contacted the customer service and found out the account is N26 You. I wrote them to close the account it is a mistake. But the answer I got was I had 14 days to that and now it is too late and I must pay for one year or 10 € a month fees to close the account or just keep it until one year is finished. Why they don't charge you from the beginning. It's not a bank. They are a new kind of thieves. The last answer I got from the customer service ,(Hey Keyvan,,Thanks for your reply. We've received your cancellation request. However, we're not able to proceed with the cancellation because you have 11 monthly payments remaining for a total of 108,90 €.,Please make sure you have sufficient funds in your N26 account so we can deduct the fees and end your N26 Metal as soon as possible.,Have a great day,,Wojciech,N26 Customer Service,N26 Bank GmbH | Managing Directors: Markus Gunter, Richard Groeneveld,Kurfürstenstraße 72 | 10787 Berlin | Germany,HRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg) | VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096) ,DO NOT OPEN An ACCOUNT IN THIS PLACE.
company_reply: Hey Keyvan, when you sign up for an account you have to accept the terms and conditions of signing for a premium account such as You. It states in this process, that there is a 14 day period in which you can cancel. Apologies if you missed this deadline. We will pass on your feedback.,Best,,Your N26 support team.

title: Great experience!
text: It is sad to read some of the "bad" reviews in here for these guys.,You have to bear in mind, they are still a bank and have to adhere to security protocols for our safety.,I imagine there must be easier and simpler ways to do it, however, compared to "traditional" banks, they are extremely simple and effective.,I definitely recommend it.

title: It’s been a year and nothing has happened
text: For a year it hasn’t been possible to activate my card. After getting a new phone I haven’t been able to link my account to the new phone and without an activated card I can’t do that. So for months I haven’t been able to access my account, let alone my money! In the support chat they said I had to email them which I did. After giving them every information they needed they said they couldn’t help me any further via email and I had to use the chat using a reference number. After doing so the person said he couldn’t help me and they would email me. When I asked to check in my records on my issues (another request I had sent months earlier was to send me a letter via post where it would show my address for registration purposes in my new home) he said that there was nothing showing and I just had to wait for them to email me. ,I’ve never experienced such bad customer service and little knowledge. I’ve spoken to at least 10 different people in the last year and nothing has happened so far! All I want now is my money and to close the account! I can not recommend this bank AT ALL!!!
company_reply: Hi there, sorry you had a bad experience. Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. We would be happy to help you if you contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out and get this escalated for you.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

We would like to assist but you have not specified the issue you had. We would be happy to help you if you contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: No access to account
text: Before I start complaining and explaining my current situation, I want to start off by saying that I was initially very happy with N26: A mobile bank! This was great for my, since I frequently travel abroad. A Debit card that I can use around the world and connect to all kinds of apps (my usual bank doesn't have this option). For about half a year, this worked great for me and would recommend N26 to people in need of something similar.,Then came the moment when I suddenly had to verify my account using the 2-step authentication. Usually, that shouldn't be a problem, but I'm using a different phone number now (old phone got stolen). After chatting a few times (since there is no phone number available), they called me back with a lot of questions to confirm my identity. So far, everything made sense and my number was changed to the correct number. All was good again :),Or so I thought. Then It was time to verify my login by inserting the SMS code I would receive by SMS. You might have guessed it at this point, but no code would ever be sent to my phone. I did receive some kind of error and tried to have the SMS message resent a couple of times, but with no positive result. The number must be correct, since they also managed to call me back.,It's 5 days later now and I still do not have access to my bank account. If have no idea how much money is still on that account and have no way to transfer it to another. The only way for me to know for sure if there is enough money on that account for anything, is by getting cash out of the ATM and pay for everything in cash (which means I also pay the €2,00 fee every time I get money out of an ATM). ,So since last Friday i've been contacting customer service by using the 'live chat'. The service agents keep telling me they will be in contact 'today' or 'tomorrow'. Today marks day 5 after first contact. Today I spoke with a service agent who told me it could take a 'few weeks'. At this point I didn't know what I was reading. A few weeks being unable to check my own balance, let alone transfer funds to pay bills! He did not seem to appreciate it very much when I told him waiting for weeks wasn't really an option for me.,Now, I work in customer service myself and have seen some crazy things, but never as crazy as having to wait a few weeks before I can access my account. I understand (and appreciate) that there are security protocols. But when I give all my personal details and tell them the exact amounts and locations of my last transactions to confirm my identity, they still can't help me at all and the only thing for me to do is wait.,Moral to the story: Great app when everything works, but customer service has a lot to learn. Make sure you change all your personal details in your account as soon as they change. Otherwise, you might end up like me feeling like being locked out of your car on a abandoned road with 150km to the nearest sign of civilization.,I will update the review as soon as the situation changes.,When it comes to customer service:, - not easy to reach on live channels. , - Not a very personal approach (although there were some friendlyl ones)Lots of templates that didn't really fit into the conversation, not feeling like agents are reading the situation actively. More like scanning for keywords., - chats get closed fast by agents if you don't respond fast enough., - follow-ups (call-backs, e-mails) didn't happen when promised.
company_reply: Hi Bill,,Thanks for taking the time in leaving us your review. Firstly we regret that you were put in such situation. We arrange callbacks within the next 24 hours, we apologise as you were not called within that timeframe. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. Your concern was not handled properly, and we are going to take steps to ensure that this situation does not repeat itself. We will also pass on your feedback regarding the chats current ending time due to inactivity. We really appreciate your feedback as it will allow us to improve our services and operations. ,If you are unable to reach our live chat within the app, alternatively you can contact us via our support center. At the bottom of the page there's a button "open a chat", here is the link: https://support.n26.com/en-fr/getting-started/account/how-to-prove-my-identity,SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers’ data and account security. SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you’ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account. We apologise that you encountered issues receiving the SMS. ,We value our customers and understand how important it is to offer exceptional service. If you have any concerns or suggestions please do not hesitate to contact us at support@n26.com. ,Best,,Your N26 support team

title: Misleading referral programme
text: I signed up to N26 using a referral code and was promised  £15 or €15 bonus. However now that I'm all signed up I've found out on live chat that it's the person who referred me who gets the referral bonus not me. I have been completely misled. Other challenger bank 2 way referral programmes are much fairer.
company_reply: Hi Andrea. apologies for the misunderstanding on this. I am sure we can get something sorted for you. Can you please contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

So the total amount of money may be different than the reality (that's how i made a payment and now ahve to pay the 3 eur fine that the transaction was denied due to lack of funds). Anyway...overall, i think it is worth the shto

title: Just tried setting up a UK account
text: Just tried setting up a UK account.  5 minutes later I get an email:,"Let’s try your ID verification again.,Hey Nicholas,,It appears that there was an issue with some of the data or documents you submitted and we were unable to complete the identity verification procedure. No worries, you’re able to try again!,To help you complete the process we’ll send you a follow-up email shortly with some additional tips on how to successfully complete verification.,If you’re unable to retry your verification in the app, reach out to our customer support and they’ll be able to give you more specific details on what went wrong and help you resolve the issue.",So I try to contact chat support three times because there was nothing wrong with my i/d and each time chat shuts down quickly with the message:,"There is a connection issue,Sorry that we are not able to chat with you. Try connecting again or come back later.",There's nothing wrong with my internet connection or with my UK driving licence.  This seems on first contact with it to be a joke company.,Tried a 4th time and 20 minute wait (so far) for chat assistance.  Ridiculous.
company_reply: Hi Nick, we do apologise for this. Can you try both WiFi and data connection for this, as some WiFi connections can cause an echo, which does not connect the call. Also, please check if your phone is listed on this page, as this can cause some issues. There are fixes on here should you be using one of these devices. ,https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/account/how-to-get-push-messages,Best,,Your N26 support team.

title: Exemplary service - thank you for your patience!
text: After a normal (lengthy) waiting time before the chat opened I got wonderful customer service from the agent (Stylianos) ,He remained calm and professional even when I jumped from one topic to another and now that I think back, I was definitely one of those “difficult” customers. He solved my case on the spot and patiently stayed on the line waiting for me to confirm that all my queries are answered.,Exemplary service - thank you - I will get my wife to join N26 ,too.

title: General view of the service
text: Customer Support:,- There is no phone number. It existed because I called it because of a technical problem and the impossibility of solving it due to the absence of the internet.,To date it means that if you find yourself without internet due to a technical breakdown of your phone or a local network problem, you will not have access to your account nor to customer support. Not really very well.,- Providing customer support exclusively through a chat, on a 7cmx12cm screen is not exactly the top of UX, especially when it comes to serious problems and not simple questions.,- Providing customer support via desktop PC chat offers several problems, such as authentication.,The authentication consists of the request for 3 questions, of which the third asks you to communicate the fifth charge to your account or the names of at least two companies with recurring charge and relative amount.,The problem is that the agents in question do not always offer you the possibility to say which are the recurring charges and if you cannot have access to the account to tell them the fifth charge received, they simply close the chat.,In addition to the agents that sometimes close the chat even without explanation, you can also add any connection problems, both on the phone and on the desktop.,In short, a truly painful experience. There is a lot of talk about making life simpler but a company with millions of euros in financing can't even get a phone line which could simply authenticate the call from the app itself like airbnb does.,- Bank Transfer Process,Since performing mobile operations does not represent maximum comfort, there is a desktop version that becomes useless, as instead of sending a text message with confirmation code for the bank transfer which could be easily read on screen without open the sms itself, N26 app sends a push notification that requires the manual confirmation of the transfer, unlocking the mobile phone screen and logging into the app.,How to make life complicated.,- Double authentication,Recently N26 has adapted to the European double authentication standard, obviously here too, it did it in the most complicated way possible.,1. I go to log into the bank account via my computer, I can't, the bank says I have to confirm the access on my mobile.,2. Meanwhile, via the bank's app, I receive a push notification asking me to confirm the access, but I can't do it at the first "tap", I must first unlock the screen, while the notification has disappeared from the screen.,3. To confirm, in any case, I have to log in to my account on the app installed in the mobile, to which you ask yourself what sense to log into the account on the mobile to confirm access to the account from the desktop, and you also wonder why not have sent a simple text message with a code, which, among other things, can be read on the screen without unlocking the cell and logging into the account.,4. I find out that you can actually request a text message, but to do so, in the pop-up that says "confirm access to your account" I have to click on "help", at the point a new pop-up opens, explaining that by clicking on "send" you will receive a text message with a confirmation code.,I do it, but then the bank's website tells me "sorry it's been too long",Considering that there are more chances that they will steal my phone than they have of accessing my PC or discovering user and password and accessing it from another PC, I would say that we are doing very well.,It is worth noting that between sending the SMS as the main solution and then eventually the push notification of the app, the banks had complete discretion on how to manage the token.,- Transparency,N26 is exactly like any other bank, if they can lie or deceive you for an advantage, they will do it without problems.,In principle, the monthly withdrawals were free and unlimited, the bank used a lot of leverage on this in their advertisements.,Then the free withdrawals were reduced to 5 monthly after which you pay to withdraw.,Even the bank account had to be free, but then they changed that too and now a questionable credit check is performed, if you don't get a certain score, they offer you a paid bank account. Arguable because it happened to a friend of mine who has absolutely no problems.,In essence, if you can avoid it, you avoid it.
company_reply: Hi Erik, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. ,Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise where we need to improve, so we appreciate this. ,Best,,Your N26 support team.

company_reply: Hey Cedric,,Thanks for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. ,You can check our system requirements here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/account/can-i-download-the-n26-app-on-my-smartphone ,If you are not receiving the SMS code we ask that you first contact us again via live chat from our Support Center. We’ll then be able to guide you through the next steps to log into your account again. ,You can contact us via the Support Center by clicking on “Open a Chat” at the bottom of this article:,https://support.n26.com/en-de/getting-started/other/how-to-contact-n26,Please do this at your earliest convenience and we’ll be happy to get this sorted for you!,Best,,Your N26 support team

We will pass on your feedback internally. ,Best,,Your N26 support team

title: N26 Service - Absolutely Abysmal Customer Service at N26 Bank
text: I have to say this N26 bank service is absolutely absymal and appalling. Your N26 account gets blocked for any number of "reasons" meaning a whole load of ridiculous "ID re-verification" palaver each time in order to unblock it.,N26 Customer service is practically impossible to reach. There is no phone service to reach N26 Bank, and if you can't get into your N26 account, then it can be nigh on impossible to reach their text "chat" service. ,N26 have now messed up my account again with some app update, which means yet again I can't get into my account - neither by the N26 website nor via the N26 app on mobile phone. Great. Now I have to spend hours chasing around trying to get into contact with the practically non-existent N26 "support". ,I am also very concerned about the risks of my N26 account suddenly being "frozen" for any of their numerous spurious reasons, which causes innocent people real problems. Plenty of examples of this kind of treatment from N26 can be found both here at the Trustpilot as well as elsewhere online.,N26's marketing promotions and general tone is also glib and irritating. Emails from N26 that address you with "hey", and pictures of happy smiling "support" people that you never can reach (they  probably don't even exist in reality, maybe they are just standard image library pictures)  N26 are a heap of dung with what must be the worst customer service of any bank. Avoid.
company_reply: Hi Ricky, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you.,We would be happy to help you if you contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.  Alternatively, you can use this link to come on the chat. From here, you do not need to sign in:,- ​​​​​​​The N26 Support Center. Scroll to the bottom of the page and you will see "Open a chat" in a green box: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/other/how-do-i-contact-n26,As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users.,You won’t encounter issues when using your bank account if you don’t breach our terms and conditions.,As for the marketing promotions, we are happy to get this turned off for you. You can do this in the app, or request it on chat or Twitter support.,Best,,Your N26 support team.

title: Be careful
text: Was waiting for them that they come to Switzerland. Now I received a mail that I can create my account. Trying to do so, I receive an error message `There is a problem with your personal information, contact support’. The button ‘contact support’ in the mail opens the N26 app on my phone and nothing more. No support here. The App support link on the App Store opens a ‘page not found’. After searching any support on their website, I found a chat support. A person named ‘Joao’ asked me for a few details and decided that the mail address I gave him was not ok. So he closed the chat with the comment ‘I appreciate the effort, but the information you have provided is not matching the one in our system (...) I will now have to close this chat. Have a great day!’. The information I gave them was fine, I triple checked it and they used it to send me information mails. Seems there is a huge support problem with N26, beside this, it is the first time a chat agent refuses to help and hangs up on me. I contacted them on their Facebook site, they replied and asked for two questions. I answered. Then no more reply. I reminded them and receive the same initial two questions seems to be a chat robot. I still can’t open an account since 2 weeks.,What a silly waste of time.
company_reply: Hi Jan,,Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We apologise that your sign-up did not go as anticipated.,When you receive a notification to contact support when signing up, this means that you have already registered your details with us in the past, and they are currently on our system. It can also indicate that you already have another active account with us. As you can only have one N26 account,  the system will block another application - at that point, you can either continue with your old sign-up attempt, or you can contact us on live chat so that we can remove the old application so that you can start again. You can also email us at support@n26.com from the email address you used on your application, so that we can wipe your old data.,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Teamm

title: Very disappointed with the service
text: Very disappointed with the service. I've been waitingsso much to see n26 entering Swiss market. Than, it come, with a terrible costumer service, no boardeless account, only offering euro in the Swiss market. Just sad about the services

If you have any suggestions for the improvement of our Swiss accounts, please send us an email at ideas@n26.com, which is our dedicated email address for collecting valued customer feedback.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Simple, fast and great experience
text: I love everything about it! How fast and easy was to setup an account, how the card looks like, how good are the exchange rates, how helpful is the support team and how fast things are done. Highly recommended!

title: Excellent service and great support
text: Excellent service and great support ,the only thing that bothers me is the Login button of the App...it is always fail once or twice to login with finger print  or with pass.,otherwise everything is outstanding .,خدمة ممتازة ودعم رائع,المشكل الوحيد الذي واجهني هو زر الدخول للتطبيق يفشل كم من مرة قبل الولوج للتطبيق و نوعا ما ثقيل,شكرا على الخدمات

title: Extremely easy and hassle free to sign…
text: Extremely easy and hassle free to sign up, no ridiculous fees like regular banks. Customer service excellent and can't do enough to help, and no long holding times like other banks

title: Hugely disappointing
text: * Edited to a summary.  ,Hugely disappointing! If something seems too good to be true, it usually is.  ,Summary of my issues with N26:,- In-app verification process failed (many, many times),- In-app video chat/ verification failed (and took many, many attempts to connect to a verification agent),- When answered, the in-app video chat/ verification agents did not speak English and abruptly terminated my video calls without reason (four times),- My requests to close my N26 account and delete my data were met with emailed auto-responses from N26 to "try again",- Since closing my N26 account (finally), I am still receiving unsolicited email from N26 addressed to another person (not me) i.e. my data have not been deleted.  ,I can't review my actual use of N26 because the verification process failed over and over again [...]*  ,I do not recommend signing up with N26 until major improvements happen, with particular regard to improving the poor quality N26 in-app customer support. Customer satisfaction is paramount to the success of any public-facing business. I am not confident that N26 can take care of my money securely! It's a real shame that I couldn't get to use my N26 account. The N26 service seemed like a perfect fit for my banking needs and my budget. I hope that N26 improves their service so that other customers don't have to share my experiences.
company_reply: Hi Macky,,We apologise that our verification process did not go smoothly for you. We appreciate your feedback and we will be sure to pass this on internally to our verification department, as it assists us greatly in learning from any mistakes and ironing out any issues faced by our customers.,Please note that upon removal of your data, we will email you to confirm that it has been done. This is why you would receive an email addressed to an illegible name such as "Sgquadhyaeao" - your data would be scrambled and made unreadable upon the request for the information to be removed, so the account cannot be linked back to anyone.,We hope this clears up your concerns about your data. Please do get back to us if not.,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: Can be barely be used in The Netherlands
text: Though the idea is great, the card they deliver can barely be used in The Netherlands. Even though they claim that the card can be used everywhere, most Dutch stores do not accept the card and some major banks do not allow the card to be used in their ATM's.,UPDATE:,Your N26 Mastercard is accepted wherever the Mastercard logo is shown. >> In The Netherlands it is NOT.,We apologise if you are having issues using your card with some merchants. >> Not some merchant, but MOST merchants.,Have you contacted our live chat support so we can take a closer look at this with you? >> Yes, they just claim that it should work everywhere, like a regular Dutch bank card. That is simply not true. It works at Jumbo supermarkets only, all other supermarkets are refusing the card. It does not work like any other cards and can barely be used here.
company_reply: Hey Robin,,Thanks for your feedback. Your N26 Mastercard is accepted wherever the Mastercard logo is shown. We apologise if you are having issues using your card with some merchants. Have you contacted our live chat support so we can take a closer look at this with you? ,- Your card is most likely not being accepted, as the merchant does not accept Mastercard. Please note that you can also order a Maestro card for use in the Netherlands, as it is more widely accepted there than Mastercard. You can do this from directly within your mobile app.,Best,,Your N26 support team

title: Excellent service and support

title: STRANGE GERMANS

Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions.,Best,,Your N26 support team

title: Overall I endorse N26
text: Overall I endorse N26. I am an American who studied abroad, in Germany, then Switzerland a year later. My experience: I was able to start my account in the U.S.A. but I needed a European phone number to verify, which I got when I was in Germany. A year later in Switzerland I was able to  change my phone number, after a long call to the N26 help line. But I love they have no atm withdrawal fees in Europe (for some amount per month). Also, it is much cheaper for me to transfer money to my N26 account than to use my American credit card. So overall, I have had a good experience with N26 as a U.S. citizen who is living in Europe for a few months.

title: The worst online banking
text: Very bad support, misinformation on their app and never protect customer rights. ,1. I got charged from the ATM without any information and N26 showed me this ATM on their app. When I asked them to investigate on it they said sorry we can not do something. We can just check our app. Sorry but if you show me that I have free withdrawals and show me some list of ATMs and then I got charged more you have to at least investigate on it and give me detailed information instead of saying sorry. ,2. Once I bought a flight ticket and in the last step when they asked me to approve the payment through 3D security I just declined because I found others. I cancelled it but it got charged. When I asked to investigate that they said they can not. If you can not protect my account with 3D security why you have it? If you give permission to the other system to charge me even if I decline it?,3. Every time when I write something to them I disconnect automatically and connect the new person and they ask to explain everything again and again. They always try to prove that the problem is on my connection which I tried mobile, wi-fi and ethernet. And this problem occurred in all of them.
company_reply: Hi Sanan,,Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.,We do offer an ATM map within the app, however this is simply a guide which indicates which ATMs around you can accept your N26 Mastercard. This does not mean that some of these ATMs may not charge you a private fee for availing of their service, however it should be displayed onscreen before withdrawing that a fee may be charged. We have no influence over private ATM fees, and therefore cannot refund them. In the event you are charged by N26 for a withdrawal once you have passed your free withdrawal limit, the maximum amount would be 2 EUR.,It seems that the authorisation to debit the funds from your account had happened with your attempted ticket purchase. This would reserve the amount for the merchant to collect for your purchase. As it was not completed, the funds will simply bounce back to your account without need for further action.,Please note that it is also possible to access live chat via desktop from within the web app in the event you are having issues with mobile. You just need to login to the following link to do so: https://app.n26.com/login,You can also open a chat from within the N26 Support Center.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: REPORTING THEM TO THE FCA - AVOID!!!
text: accidentally transfered money to my other account but one number was wrong on the sort code. They initialy told me not to worry and I will have this back in 2 weeks. Spoke with them today and they said it was recredited but I spent it before it showed which is absolute nonsense. Have the N26 Metal card so thought they may be able to help. The lady on the phone then advised that the balances on the app for UK customers is incorrect which has been an ongoing bug for some time. They dont tell you about this. I will be reporting them to the FCA.
company_reply: Hi Chris,,We would like to investigate this further for you. Can you kindly send us an email to support@n26.com, or reach out to our Twitter support page so we can help?,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: bank went wrong
text: I was using N26 for 8 months until I received email that I need to re-verify my identity. It came as a surprise to me that I am not able to do that anymore because N26 thinks that people from North Macedonia should not be able to use their services. This is a discriminatory politics of the bank especially to me as an already existing customer with regular income. I trusted the bank to keep all my incomes for 8 months and as a result I was asked to move to other bank. They advised me to open new bank account where they will transfer all my money. There was nothing to worry about they said. ,From this point I was not able to use the account as before. I was not able to check my bank statement on the application, was not able to do direct debit or receive money on the account. On the email I was informed that I will be able to do all of the above, but because of some unexplained reason I was not able. ,I ended without receiving my August salary on the account and not being able to transfer money for rent or electricity and at the same time I started to receive letters in my mailbox to pay all outstanding bills. I am risking to loss my apartment or have a bad SCHUFA score just because N26 changed its mind who can use their services and is taking so long to do the final step and transfer the money to the new account. I had already more then 10 conversations with chat support, through email and phone calls and everyone was ensuring me that it will be done soon. From last Wednesday I am not able to use the account at all. My money are trapped by N26 and I feel helpless and really worried.,I am sure that my case is not unique and other people are experiencing the same issue. I already advised a lot of Macedonians to start the process of closing the N26 account before N26 ask for that and end up in a loop without any sign of end.
company_reply: Hey Filip,,We apologise that you found yourself in this situation. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. Were you able to get further assistance regarding your transfer? ,You can contact us on Twitter or send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hey,,As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions. You can send us an email to support@n26.com for further assistance or contact us via our live chat support.,Best, ,Your N26 support team

title: Good and efficient bank account - but missing important features
text: I really like N26 and it has become my main account lately. But here are some important features I'm missing:,1) I can't get a second debit card - e.g. for my family to use,2) I can't get a second account for business usage,3) My sons can't get an account because of the minimum age restriction,4) Some functions are only accessible via the app - not in a browser,Otherwise, I can recommend N26

title: The best bank ever
text: It's even difficult to say what N26 could improve. Because the whole idea of the bank is just awesome. I honestly think that for a person with modest profits (not a rich one) just does not exist a better alternative than N26. I open my account while in a restaurant having dinner, It just took a few minutes, zero bureaucracy, only few hours later the service desk called me to solve an issue in my application, and in the same day I was approved. It's impossible to be faster. The fees are also cheap and the services are perfect.

title: Great and simple to use
text: I have been using N26 account for everyday spending and so far it has been great. App is very easy to use and I love the idea Of using spaces to save money for holidays and etc. As they are simple to set up and to transfer money into them, also once I pay money into them, they are not affected by transaction in the main section, even if there isnt enough money to cover a payment which is great as it prevents me from spending it until I have reached a goal.,The process Of setting the account up was simple and quick, card came fairly fast, considering it came from germany to UK. It would be better if delivery could be tracked as it requires a signature.,I had to contact customer service once and it was simple and my issue has been resolved really fast.,However it would be really useful if I was able to set up a list Of recipients instead Of having to manually Enter account number and sortcode every time.

title: Extremely efficient service but....
text: Extremely efficient service, the on-the-mobile mastercard is super handy BUT is makes no sense even for a bank in the 1950s to allow the customer to have an account on a single currency. You need to review this guys!

title: I am very happy with N26 bank
text: I am very happy with N26 bank! My experience has been that they efficient, competent and trustworthy!

We found that most customers prefer the live chat. However, if you want to speak to someone, you can request this on the chat. We would be happy to help with any issues you are facing. title: Simple and safe process
text: Easy, simple and safe process to deal with the bank account. Staff is very supportive.

title: When I enrolled to be a client at N26
text: I got a problem while verification, this takes alitte more time and finally, they fix it. thank you.
company_reply: Hi Khalid,,We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 is legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals.  We regret that the re-verification process did not go smoothly for you.,As we no longer offer the option to verify via Post Office, it is now necessary to complete the video verification process as is required with all N26 German accounts. Regrettably, our verification partner cannot accept all documents. We would never want our customers to believe we are discriminating them in relation to their nationality. The reason that a document cannot be accepted is usually due to the lack of security features on said document. Our current list of accepted documents can be found here, and we are constantly trying to add more to the list: https://docs.n26.com/cs/Support%20Center/Verification/201804-supporteddocs-DE-EN.pdf,We hope that a resolution for this issue has been reached, but we encourage you to reach out to us via support@n26.com or our Twitter Support channel if you require any further assistance.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Perfect bank
text: It is perfect solution for foreigners in Germany, especially if you don't speak German. I have been a customer almost for 2 years now and I should say online banking has never been so easy. Customer support is very helpful(in the rare cases that you need to use it) and the mobile app allows you to operate with your money extremely easy. I definitely recommend N26!!

title: It is a nice concept, but...
text: It is a nice concept, but I have had many issues with them, and it is never easy:,1st, the card wasn't being delivered - sure, it is not entirely their fault, but from my UX perspective, it was freaking frustrating ,2nd, I can't transfer money to a different currency - aside from a (IMO) huge flow issue, every time I tried, I received a system.error message like "could not establish connection with the server". I talked several times with customer support, and each time it was the same: reinstall APP, prey to God it works  - it didn't,  still doesn't ,3rd - I  was asked to revalidate my ID, and for some reason they could not do it (although it is the same ID I used while creating the account - my passport), and now I am locked out of the APP, which means no money transfers, no online payments, no nothing - just card payments (on POS) and ATM withdrawals, but that does not help me pay bills or rent - so I don't have full access to my money (and I am still waiting for a solution from their end, and it has been 3 days already).,If they fix their APP, and put in place the necessary processes to offer speedy solutions for critical issues (like mine), than it is wort it - if not, then maybe it's better if you go to a "normal" bank...,L.E. I decided to cancel my collaboration with them, and as they were sending an email of good-bye, with this in it:,"While this process is being completed you can use your card normally, make purchases and withdraw from ATMs, receive transfers, use overdraft services, insurance and credit services.",...in parallel they were also blocking my account, so, in fact, now I can't even use the card at a POS or ATM, so, I am totally blocked from reaching or using my money. Good thing I have a back-up, cause otherwise I would be totally screwed. ,I believe it is total chaos there, they do not have clear processes or user flows, it is A MESS.,My rating was 3/5, now I downgraded to 1/5, because it turned from bad to "oh my God, is this real life?! Is this a prank? Are there hidden cameras?"
company_reply: Hi Paul, thanks for taking the time to give us feedback. We use this to improve on what we do.,We apologise for the card being lost, we do everything we can to get this sent out straight away.,For TransferWise, we encountered an issue that was affecting some accounts. For the time being when we work on a fix, you can use TransferWise.com and log in with your N26 details there.,For the verification, we can help straight away with this. please come on the chat, at the end of this post there is a link, where you do not need to sign in.,If you need immediate assistance, please come on the Live Chat or Twitter support so we can help.,- ​​​​​​​The N26 Support Center. Scroll to the bottom of the page and you will see "Open a chat" in a green box: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/other/how-do-i-contact-n26,Best,,Your N26 support team.

title: Im a new client but

After so many issues, I now have a major one.,I ordered a new card as the one I have is losing the color due to the bad quality of card that they provide you.,A genius who ordered in the bank has deactivated my card when I have all my funds and salary on my account..,I am currently in canada travelling and guess what? I am unable even to pay for my lunch or to buy anything... I have to borrow money from people because their agents are not clever enough to order a new card and allow my current card active. I am most disappointed and sad. I am going on another trip soon and I just have the feeling you managed to ruin. You lost my trust! I do not recommend N26 to anyone. They do not care about you...
company_reply: Hey Myrelle,,We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. Our Customer Service Representatives are given a set of guidelines for compensation that they are supposed to adhere to. Your concern was not handled properly, and we truly apologise for the inconvenience it caused you during your travels.  We regret that we provided with such customer experience, it is the exact opposite of what we pride ourselves on.  If you have any concerns or suggestions please do not hesitate to contact us at support@n26.com,Best,,Your N26 support team

title: The bank of today
text: The best part about N26 bank is, it is an online bank and everything is at the tip of the fingertip. No hassle of too many paperworks or the need to visit a physical bank. The UI of the mobile app and the desktop version is clean and you get notified about transactions in real-time, which is very useful. The markup price when you use your MasterCard in other currencies is pretty decent compared to the money exchange outlets. Most of all everything is available in English even if you hold account in non-English speaking country which makes it all the while better than the rest. I would recommend N26 bank; been a customer since 2 years and I am very much satisfied with it.

title: Ive been using N26 Metal for 8 months…
text: Ive been using N26 Metal for 8 months or so, it was all good up until one day money that I transferred into my N26 account vanished. It’s been nearly two months now and at first they were having some answers but now they just tell me to wait they are sorting it out. DONT TRUST N26, it’s all good up until they make a mistake and it just drags on with no resolution.
company_reply: Hi Damian,,We're sorry to hear that this has happened to you. In these situations, we recommend that you contact the sending bank so that they can initiate an official Payment Investigation to track and trace the funds, and recall them if necessary. This differs from a transfer confirmation, which simply states the funds were sent. You can email a copy of the results of the investigation to support@n26.com so that we can have a look into it, also.,I hope that this has been resolved for you, but please feel free to reach out again if not.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team.

title: It’s all good and at the momento didn’t…
text: It’s all good and at the momento didn’t have any problem with my transactions.

title: Application rejected, useless support answers.

There is really no reason for a German bank to deny a German "model" citizen with no record or what so ever. In the last chat, they gave me auto-responses and abruptly closed the chat as I was typing. Totally useless, rude and ridiculous. Thanks for nothing Alexander S!
company_reply: Hi Lisa,,As a licensed mobile bank, we are obliged to securely verify the identity of all potential customers. On occasion, the result of our verification process will determine that you are currently ineligible for an account with us due to legal restrictions. We apologise for any disappointment caused.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: I don't have great banking needs and…
text: I don't have great banking needs and for me this app fills them nicely.,It is a good service and it is easy to use. Great customer care so far. I recommend it. ,One star removed for it is sometimes hard to manage the standing orders(direct debits). Another reason is that it is not clear that the card is not being accepted everywhere in Germany, it is widely accepted but there have been cases where I couldn't make purchases. I now always carry cash with me. They do however give you the possibility to get a free Maestro card that could be used instead of the main card to cover for this shortcoming.,So, this bank is good for me and I got my spouse to use it too.
