title: Shut out of newest version of N26 app
text: N26 is updating their app - making it only compatible for iOS 11 and up.  This means that I, as an iPhone 5 user, have to suddenly change banks.  Additionally, I was told I would have until September 14, 2019 to use the old app, but have also required me to verify my identity on the new app before September 3, 2019.  This moved my effective shutout date up almost two weeks - I had to really scramble last week to open my new account with Sparkasse.,If you are somebody who usually has the latest phones, this won't be a problem for you.  If you're like me and have a perfectly functional phone you're not eager to replace unless absolutely necessary, this will be an issue.  Have been satisfied with my experience for simple bank functions otherwise.
company_reply: Hi Ellie,,Your devices are most secure when they’re up to date, which is why we’ll no longer be releasing app updates for older iOS and Android versions. Updates to the N26 app are now only supported on iOS versions 11 and higher (the standard found on iPhone 5s handsets, onwards). We apologise for any inconvenience that this has caused you.,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: Horrible
text: Horrible, rude customer service. DO NOT USE THIS APP! I would rather talk to Nazis.
company_reply: Hey Osman, ,we're sorry to learn about your experience with our customer support.,Please tell us more and write us at support@n26.com .,We'd love to look further into it.,Have a nice day.

title: Worst and most frustrating experience of my life
text: I have worked with many mobile banks up until now and thought to find N26 quite convenient as well - until it was not.,One day, while I was trying to place a purchase which would not go through - kept getting notifications saying I will receive an e-mail.,I only received the mail 2 days later - after having complained on Twitter, not the company has absorbed all my funds and I can not reach my account anymore,,The customer service has not been helpful AT ALL - I have tried reaching everyone from the company but still have not hear anything, so I am escalating to file an official complaint and truly horrified that I do not have any idea on where my money is.,This is completely illegal and immoral. Will keep you posted in case I have further news yet this week has been sickening due to the late rent payments and bills I have suffered in paying since N26 decided to confiscate my hard-earned funds.,EDIT - I have finally received these back in my account after 10 days. I must still say that this was truly frustrating on my end and will never return to this bank again.
company_reply: Hi,,As a licensed bank, and in accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. If a possible infringement of our terms and conditions is found during these checks, it is possible that a suspension will be placed on the account.,We are glad to hear that this has been resolved for you, and apologise for any inconvenience caused.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Very simple and clear
text: Very simple and clear. Astonishingly responsive and interactive. A transfer from one account to another happens in seconds, even while you are already paying a bill.,No charges for the back account management makes sense to me, as we all know that the funds we put at disposal of the bank will generate benefits for the bank. I don't see why i would pay to have my money in an account knowing it is used to generate profits. In that case I would go back to cash only. i think N26 understands this position, and i am thankful for that.

title: Nightmarish
text: I opened an account with N26 almost a year ago and I have to do a re-verification. However, the documents I used to initially verify my identity have not been accepted for the re-verification and I cannot access my account. The customer service is horrendously inadequate and is ineffective at communicating or solving anything. For a bank that is supposed to be easy and transparent, it has proved to be unequivocally torturous and deceptive.
company_reply: Hi Kayne,,We are obliged to verify our customers at regular intervals, and we apologise for any upset caused as a result of this. You will still be able to use your N26 Mastercard as normal whilst we find a resolution for your issue. Please feel free to contact us via live chat or via email at support@n26.com if we can be of any assistance.,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: Great bank
text: Great bank. The only thing separating N26 from the other main banks in the UK is the overdraft facility. N26 does not offer this service unfortunately.

title: Support is amazing!
text: Support is amazing!,There is however a fee of 3€ if you don't have sufficient funds in your account and a payment is processed.,And with more than 5 withdrawls per month there is also a fee.,But still 5*!

title: I'm using N26 in Spain where banks are…
text: I'm using N26 in Spain where banks are really slow and customer service is not to die for. The speed of transfers through N26 is well above that of the Spanish banks and so are their apps (both on computer and phone). The partnership with Transferwise is also a plus, as I needed to transfer money to fund property purchases and it worked quite seamlessly. One time there was a problem, but customer service was very helpful (the same person followed up to make sure it was solved) and it was sorted. Overall, the experience with N26 is well above that of the local banks, so I'm pleased to work with them.

title: An excellent app
text: An excellent app, banking is made fun. It's so cool how easy everything is and nicely presented. It's everything I wanted in a bank. More trading options in the future would be a nice addition.

title: I compare N26 with my other account in…
text: I compare N26 with my other account in an old german bank, where they send me tons of papers, the contract is all in German and to solve anything I have to call them and hope that somebody will speak English. And sometimes they are not able to solve my problem and I need to go to an agency. With n26 I can solve everything online, everything can be in English, and if things get complicated I have chat support, where they can solve everything to me without I have to leave my place.

title: Only one query
text: Only one query - when accessing the account via mobile phone, there seems to be no way of logging out of the system. Otherwise not a bad idea at all...

title: I love this bank
text: I love this bank. Support chat agent was perfect. Love that you have all the spaces to save. 2 downfalls for me though is 1 you cannot save payees and 2 Samsung pay is not supported

title: very good service and nice customer…
text: very good service and nice customer support ,i am happy with n26 bank staff and services ,its nice application

title: I think you please accept other…
text: I think you please accept other countries digital secure I'D because everyone not having all necessary documents.

title: Easy and best banking experience at no…
text: Easy and best banking experience at no extra cost.

title: Very good bank - once you get through the registration process
text: Though the signup process should be easy, in reality, it can be a 40-50 minutes painful procedure getting to an agent who speaks english without severe accent and the quality of the call is sufficient for identification.,But once you get through this, man, the webbank and the mobile application is super-easy to use, and it is loaded with handy features like 'spaces', automatic expence categorization etc.

title: Fantastic, fast, efficient
text: I'm in Portugal, I completed my online application on Monday afternoon, opted to pay for fast delivery of my card, (expected 3 to 5 days), card arrived Wednesday morning (less than 48 hours). I found it easier to activate my account using a laptop/tablet. Needed to change my phone number prior to pairing my mobile, a simple secure process. Transferred money from the UK to my N26 account, easy. I'm not techno savy so I did need a little patience to navigate my way but totally thrilled with my new account and the fact that I'll be saving £40 a month in currency exchange charges. Thank you N26

title: Very good service
text: Very good service. Every day 24h... I am from Greece and I have this bank account to Germany to save some money!!

title: The worst customer service
text: The worst customer service I’ve encountered in a bank. Trying to update my phone number when my card has never been sent to me has proved an impossible task, meaning I can’t access the app. After 3  chat conversations with customer service, the final one ending with the agent literally ending the call mid conversation, I give up. If this is how they treat their potential customers, imagine how they treat their existing customers.
company_reply: Hi,,For security reasons, it is not possible to amend any account sensitive information before your card has been received, as there is a unique "token" on this card that helps to identify you as a customer, so that we can be sure we are speaking with the account holder before any information is amended.,We apologise for any inconvenience that this has caused you.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: No interest in customer needs
text: Customer service seem to be very helpful but the company in general seem to not have customer needs as their priority. I opened my account prior to moving to Germany expecting I would have my card ready to go when I arrived. It's been 16 days and no card. I am still using my American bank cards so I have to deal with international transaction charges and rate conversions that works against me. I discussed this with customer service and they would be willing to order another card but wait another 14 days or expedite for 20 Euros..... I'll find another bank that seem wiling and want to handle my money.
company_reply: Hey George,,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. Your card delivery should not take this long. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact us via Twitter for further assistance! ,Best,,Your N26 support team

title: Great international customer support
text: When I needed support it was fast, precise and efficient. I have everything I need with N26, and now I know I can trust them.

title: Worst experience ever
text: Worst experience ever. After waiting 3 weeks for my ID to be verified, they sent an email stating my account cannot be opened due to legal circumstances. Which ones I do not know. ,Tried contacting them for clarification as I need this account for school, and they just ended the chat.
company_reply: Hi Adriana,,As a licensed mobile bank, we are obliged to securely verify the identity of all potential customers. On occasion, the result of our verification process will determine that you are currently ineligible for an account with us due to legal restrictions. We apologise for any disappointment caused.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Worst customer service ever
text: Absolutely terrible and useless customer service. The worst I have ever encountered. Stay away. 4 emails for them to delete personal data and still just generic copy paste answers and no resolve. Very dodgy processes. If there was 0 star rating they surely deserve it. I regret the moment I had to deal with them.
company_reply: Hi Sgomer,,We apologise for the wait whilst we process the removal of your information. Once you have sent the request from your registered email, rest assured that it will be seen to at the earliest possible date, and you will be informed as soon as it is done.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Excellent
text: Excellent, very good digital bank!

title: Lol what a joke
text: lol their on boarding process is a joke. And kinda rude too lol. Is ok you’re not the only credit card around lol
company_reply: Hi Dan,,Can you kindly elaborate so that we can assist you with this? You can reach out to us via live chat from within the N26 Support Center, from there you will be connected to an agent.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: "occasionally" they won't open accounts for people
text: I opened an account 2 days ago, I sent them my biometric passport info along with clear photos and today I received a message stating they are unable to open an account for me because "occasionally we are unable to open accounts due these restrictions". What "restrictions" ? I never was a N26 client, my country is in your list, so based on your available countries, I'm eligible for an account with you. Why you "occasionally" just collect personal information from people for nothing?,"We would like to thank you for your patience, understanding and interest in N26." Yeah, thank you for collection my personal info for nothing and thank you for wasting my time.,Please delete my personal info from your server.
company_reply: Hi Costinel,,As a licensed mobile bank, we are obliged to securely verify the identity of all potential customers. On occasion, the result of our verification process will determine that you are currently ineligible for an account with us. Please contact us via an official platform, such as our email at support@n26.com about removing your information, as we cannot action this via Trustpilot.,We apologise for any disappointment caused.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Seriously, Avoid N26
text: Opened a Metal Card Account in January. And decided to close it in March (Including sending an email to the support team for account closure.). I've been talking to the chat support and they're always giving reasons such as 'System's down and they're trying their best to fix it.' stuff like that. Now its the end of August and I've just got off chat support and they've frozen my account. GREAT. ,The service is really just appalling and just plain BAD.,Just stick to Revolut, it's way better.
company_reply: Hey Jonathan,,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact us via Twitter so we can help.,Best,,Your N26 support team

title: Excelent card..
text: Excelent card... Miss to obtain my 5 stars because I think it might have the option to add cards to recharge immediatly (like revolut). The exchange rate is better than revolut and is easy to use

title: support non-existent
text: Failure during sign-up.  Technical error during ID verification process (not error OF my verification, but technical error with the app/process itself).  Availability of support is non-existent.  Chat with support person is useless - undertrained and unempowered.  ,Emailed official support email (found from internet search, as its not obviously published on EU website...), but they dont answer that either.,Personally, I dont need this account, as I have Schwab account with fee-free global ATM access, with no FX surcharge added to market FX rates.  And I'm happy to pay for my accounts at other traditional big banks where there are branches on every corner and staff I can call or email, whose offices I can walk in.,For those who rely on this as their primary financial institution, think twice and thrice if you want your money in a place where your only means of contact is a chat box with undertrained agents?,At least try the competing "digital banks", who has better ratings and far fewer problems reported here on N26.  They have the worst consumer rating here, they have by far the worst employee rating on glassdoor... is this a company you want to do busines with?
company_reply: Hi Ralph,,Details of how to contact us are available from directly within our support center, along with most of the Frequently Asked Questions in regards to our service or fixing an issue: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started,All of our agents are trained in-house in the same manner and to the highest quality. Our agents are also offered follow-up training and support to ensure they are always knowledgeable and up to date with all new processes and topics that they will need to assist our customers with. In the event an agent is unsure on a topic they are assisting a customer with, they can always reach out to senior support for help.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Lovely Bank
text: easy, flex. with tons of features.

title: To me it's an awesome bank. I highly recommend!
text: I read many bad reviews about this service, people saying it's a scam etc. I don't know if they use the US service or the EU service. I am using the EU service it's been nothing but perfect. I have no complaints so far. The only time I had a problem where I didn't receive my Maestro card when I ordered it, they solved my problem on the same day. I contacted support on Tuesday morning, card was shipped on the same day, and it arrived on Thursday morning.,I highly recommend this bank. I hope things don't mess up when it gets too popular.

title: Brilliant
text: Brilliant! Set up the account in less than half an hour.

title: Great neo-banking service
text: Great neo-banking service! Everything you could ask from a neo-bank (online bank): efficient, fast, secure, instant notifications every time you use your account and superb customer service.,So, even if you have an issue, at least know this: it will be resolved quickly.,Best customer service I have seen in a while!

title: After a few problems with identity they…
text: After a few problems with identity they solved it and now a am a proud owner of a n26 account they also told me how to use transferwise to move my money from uk pound to euros

title: Absolutely amazing!
text: Excellent banking experience and awesome support team that is quick and professional.

title: Love N26
text: Really big fan of N26. I had to move to Germany from the UK as part of my degree course. It was so handy that I was able to open up a German bank account before I even moved over. Never had any problems and can keep track of my spending much easier than my other bank!

title: Great secondary bank
text: Easy of use, great customer service, cool cards

title: DO NOT BANK WITH N26
text: I tried to close my account and N26 are withholding over 1000 euros from me, and refuse to give me a date when this will be returned.
company_reply: Hi Liz,,We're sorry that the cancellation process took longer than anticipated. Once you send the complete document via email along with details of the account you wish for the funds to be transferred to, we endeavour to reply within 2 days. We're sorry if this did not happen in your case. We recommend transferring the funds out before the cancellation is requested if possible, as this will speed up the process greatly.,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: Transfer of remaining funds / account closure / re verification process
text: I was asked to re-verify my account, tried to do it but it was unsuccessfully because of my residence permit (They asked for 1 year and I only have for 4 months left). I requested the account closure on 21.08. Got the answer that it was starting on 22.08. ,Since then I've been waiting for N26 to transfer my remaining funds (around 1.100€), after speaking uncountable times with customer support by email, twitter and etc; n26 did transfer 37,06€ yesterday (29.08), but as said before, I had 1.100€, mostly in the "spaces" area, so I have no access to the money, as I haven't had access to the app in a week, since I started the re-verification process.,Now I'm almost going crazy because I need my money to pay my bills, my rent payment will be in 3 days and other things, and also to survive! I do hope I will see my money, which was gained with countless hours of hard work, back. ,I get responses by the customer support by email, but all of them just asking me to wait, but I sincerely can not wait anymore. I need the money urgently. I just want this to be over.
company_reply: Hi Lucas,,We would like to take this opportunity to apologise for any inconvenience caused by the re-verification process. We are legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals, and we're sorry that this process did not go smoothly for you. We encourage you to reach out to us via live chat from within the N26 support center so that an agent can advise you on transferring the funds from your Spaces. You can open a chat directly from the article "How to open my N26 account?".,We apologise for the delay in response, and we hope that this issue has been resolved for you. ,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: Excellent and simple online banking
text: Excellent and simple online banking. The best :)

title: This bank has amazing customer service!
text: This bank has amazing customer service.  Bank of America had better hope they never come to the US,  The quality of N26’s service and their focus on customer experience -would cause many customers to switch away from BoA.  This is the best “bank customer service” I have ever experienced.

title: I love N26
text: I love N26. It’s so easy to do banking with them. Sometimes you get little bugs, but their support team know how to resolve the matter quickly and effortlessly. I’m a huge fan as traditional banking in Germany really is archaic. Keep doing great work N26!

title: Very poor service
text: Very poor service, tried to confirm my identity through videochat but service guy was unkind and hung up after help of my friend,just poor, very very bad
company_reply: Hi Loek,,We apologise for this issue you had when verifying. It is absolutely necessary that the call is done by only you so we can ensure that your verification is not tampered with, and it is just you opening the account with no outside influence or pressure. If the agent taking the call becomes aware that another person is present, they are required to end the call. Please go through the verification again by yourself.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: I recommend N26
text: I recommend N26! User friendly banking system! I hadn’t any problem until now!

title: I am satisfied with the service
text: I am satisfied with the service. Only one question - can not print a single transaction PDF. Which is very useful when the payment is compensated by accountancy department at work.

title: Simply stay away - BEWARE
text: Simply stay away. All goes well, until it doesn't, until they randomly decide to block your account and access to your own funds.,Since August 21, 2019 my account is unlawfully blocked. Numerous attempts to contact N26's customer service, gain further insight and solve this issue remained unsuccessful. I am meanwhile seven days without any access to my account. I have to assume that payments I initiated are not processed either. I urged them to take immediate steps and, yet, the only thing their customer agents on their chat are able to say is that my query is being handled, they have no visibility on anything else, and I shall receive an email soon (no ETA). Then, they close the chat. ,Summary:,19.08.2019 – I received an email requesting to re-verify my identity as a routine procedure that all banks have to follow, which I did straight away. In this email it stated that during the re-verification process I would be able to use my N26 card to make purchases or withdrawals, receive money, just would not be able to access my N26 app.,21.08.2019 – Whilst I was trying to pay for my taxi fare, my card was declined and a message on my screen appeared: “We couldn’t process your transaction because your account has been blocked. We’ll email you with details.” I contacted your support team via chat and I was told there was nothing that could be done, my “account was seized” and they couldn’t give me more information apart from the fact that I’d be contacted soon by email. Several agents closed the chat on me without giving me any further information and refusing to escalate this issue. My funds were seized and I didn’t have access to it nor did I have any estimation of when N26 would provide an explanation or transfer my funds to another account. I promptly provided another account number for my money to be transferred.,23.08.2019 – I received an email stating that I haven’t followed the request to verify my identity, resulting in my N26 account being terminated. This is probably from an incorrect template, as I had re-verified my identity on the same date as I received the 1st email (which also stated that I had until the 09.09.2019 to do so. In the same email, there was a request to provide my new account details AGAIN (3rd time) for N26 to transfer my funds.,Between 21.08 and 26.08, several direct debits have been declined and as I haven’t had access to my funds, I have been unable to settle them yet. As of now, I haven’t received my funds in the alternative account number I provided., ,I am elsewise forced to engage legal support and file for injunctive relieve – demanding coverage of any potential costs or damage that will be caused by the unjustified seizure of my account.,It's now the 28th of August and this issue is still pending.
company_reply: Hey Luciana,,We apologise if you were not provided with a follow up regarding your case. Were you able to get your funds transferred to your alternative account? We advise you to reply directly to the email you received regarding this for further assistance. We apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you. ,You can contact us on Twitter or send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Fast and easy customer service
text: Fast and easy customer service, knew exactly what they were talking about and my problem was solved in matter of seconds. Highly suggest these lot.

title: Beware
text: Beware! This bank seems great. So easy to sign up, fast and efficient but this is only half the story. Behind it is a ruthless, uncaring, inefficient, and incompetent banking service. I am 61 years old and never encountered service like this in my life. They are currently holding my money, have closed my account without any good reason, blocked my card and refusing to respond to emails and help requests. I threatened the Police and they suddenly become interested, momentarily, and then reverted to nonsensical responses and now silence. I have no access to money and they refuse to tell me why saying this is 'an internal matter' and they can't tell me. How can closing my account and refusing me access to my money be an internal matter? This is absurd. It is tantamount to theft and they are behaving appallingly. This is a serious German Bank yet it feels like I am in the middle of a Nigerian scam. I am wasting days of precious time and getting nowhere. And still I have no access to my money.,Next day. Great. My review has prompted a reply from N26. ,To N26... you have my email address, you have a bank account to transfer my money to, what is stopping you doing this now? This is absurd to be communicating with you through Trust Pilot. I have given up wanting to know why you have closed my account and blocked my access. You have established multiple times my authenticity. Now, could you please just transfer my money to me and let me know through an email when you have done this.
company_reply: Hi Brent,,We sincerely apologise if this situation has inconvenienced you in any way. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. ,In the event your account is blocked, we will make contact with you via email. For this reason, our customer support team are unable to advise further on these situations via alternative communication channels.,We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We hope that this can be resolved for you in a timely manner, and we will continue this correspondence via email.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Worst service
text: I have tried to close my account now for 2 months and nobody has replied to my support email to their support@ email since July 22nd. I have not received my card either and they keep charging me every month. I have never used or activated the account but I keep getting charged. Chat on their website keeps auto-closing the chat so my issue can never be resolved. Will stick with Revolut.
company_reply: Hi Jessica,,We're sorry to learn this. Please ensure that you have emailed support@n26.com from your registered email address, otherwise the email would not be linked to your account. Alternatively, you can contact us via live chat from within the N26 Support Center, and an agent can advise you further.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Just do it
text: Just do it, it’s really a great bank, it’s for free and most of the extra service are for free or much more cheaper than other banks (specially in germany)  ,they have a great service and friendly professional customer service.

title: Trying to open my account for over 2…
text: Trying to open my account for over 2 weeks. Identification process and team is just useless. Contacted them few time, always the same answer : wait and we will be back to you. Shame for a bank that let you wait over 2 weeks just to open your account. Not suggested.
company_reply: Hi Giorgio,,We apologise for the wait whilst you are trying to open your account.,Our verification process should usually complete within 5 days, as we are sorry that this has not happened in your case. In the event there has been an issue with your verification, we will request that our verification department investigate this and take the necessary action to complete your account set-up. Regrettably, this can take a short while as we work through all requests. Please be assured that we will contact you via email once we have an update.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Terrible customer support.
text: Eurice from customer support is giving misleading information about how your own business works. No polite at all, wasn't able to help on a serious situtation about abnormal charges and negative(!) balance on a debit card(!) while daily transaction limit was 0. Highlight of the conversation was:,-"And we can be here checking all the transactions but your negative balance will not change" that was at least very helpful from a customer support agent when you are asking for help and trying to find out whats is going on.,I also asked for case number and a copy of the conversation and I never got them.
company_reply: Hi,,Thanks for taking the time to leave your feedback.,We sincerely apologise for the experience you have had with us recently. We hope to resolve our customer issues in the most effective way possible, and we regret that this has not happened for you. We will pass on your feedback for review.,We are unable to discuss specific transactions via Trustpilot as we cannot view your account without some necessary verification, but a possible reason for your negative balance when your limit was 0 may be down to some previous payments you had made that were waiting for collection by the merchant. We'd be happy to have another look into this for you again, but would require that you contact us via live chat once more. You can also then request your case number and transcript, and the agent can reach out to a senior in the event they require any assistance with your case.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Almost perfect.
text: Almost perfect.,I've been with N26 as my main bank account since November or December of 2018 and I've been very pleased with my experience so far. ,Design:,The transparent card is amazing, let's be honest. Also the new card designs for the subscription models look really nice. The only downside I see is that my credit card number already faded away, maybe try a different paint? ,App:,Everything you need is in the app, which was well programmed and easy to use. Personally I love to use the 'spaces' feature for budgeting.,Also using 'Cash26' (available in Germany) to deposit cash has been a great experience. By the time I'm out of the store the money has already been put into my bank account.,N26 is one of the few mobile banks I know of that also has a standard web interface you can use from the PC. To me this is very important.,The downsides:,- only 3 (or 5 if you're under 25 or use N26 as your primary bank) free withdrawals per month,- The Maestro card is NOT compatible with Apple Pay / GooglePay even though those systems can work with Maestro (please add this feature, I use my Maestro card a lot),- Customer support is really busy in peak times or when there's a problem affecting multiple users, please hire more people. But even in those hard times the support team tries resolve your problems as fast as possible.

title: Excellent bank
text: Excellent bank. Top of line customer service. iPhone App is well designed. Highly recommended!

title: N26 stole my money - UPDATE
text: I was asked to re verify my account with photo ID. Which I did,  5 days later I still can't access my account with £5k of funds.  Then I get an email saying my application for an account was unsuccessful.,I'm very worried and had no reassurance from N26 and can't speak to a human just online chat rubbish.  I will update when I know more !!,UPDATE!!!,N26 replied to my review very quickly !,They asked me to email my complaint and/or speak to someone online,  I have done both of those more than once 4 days ago and have heard nothing.  ,I'm still £5000 out of pocket,  I've now contacted the financial ombudsmen in the UK and I have completed forms which I have sent back. ,I will update when I hear more.
company_reply: Hey Dave,,Thanks for your review. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Please note you can also contact our Twitter Support. ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Really bad
text: Really bad, because of the verify Identity, is more than 2 weeks I'm waiting for the checking identity. title: Tech is good but customer service is horrendous.
text: Like many others here I've had bad experiences with N26's customer service. The first time while verifying my ID the woman just hung up on me when I kindly asked her to repeat what she had just said, so I had to start a new session and do everything over again. There was no way for me to know her name or report her after, so the customer service representatives aren't held accountable for their actions.,The second time, I had a Metal card which comes with "Premium" customer service, but when I needed to change my phone number, I started a support session on my phone, but had to wait about 30 minutes. During that time my screen turned off and I lost the session, so I started over again but on my computer this time. I waited for an hour, and I was 3rd in place, but it was too late in the day so they just shut down their customer service completely and I had to try again the following day. ,Also note for those who use Spaces and Overdraft. You will be charged for Overdraft even if you have more than enough money to cover the overdraft in your Spaces. I had more than 1k€ in spaces but got charged for my main balance going negative. That's a scam if I ever saw one. ,Overall the app and tech is great, but N26 still falls short in a few too many places.
company_reply: Hi Matthew, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. ,Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise where we need to improve, so we appreciate this. ,For any charges that were incurred,  we can get this sorted for you.  Please come on the chat so we can do this for you. This is available in:,- Your N26 App: in the Service section within your control center - support - Live Chat,- The N26 Web App: https://my.n26.com/, after you logged in,- ​​​​​​​The N26 Support Center. Scroll to the bottom of the page and you will see "Open a chat" in a green box: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/other/how-do-i-contact-n26,Best,,Your N26 support team.

title: The mere fact that almost 20% of…
text: Strong avoid!,The mere fact that almost 20% of reviews here are 1-star should raise alarms in every rationally thinking person. They have millions of customers but on the other hand they block tens of thousands of accounts daily - due to their faulty algorithms which flag transactions for no reason. Furthermore, because of the high volume of blocks and complaints relating to them the customer service is paralyzed. ,My experience is as follows: opened an account, transferred money into it, started using the app and card, used it for three weeks, nothing suspicious nothing illegal. Then one day when I had been using VPN to access television app from my home country, and had forgotten VPN "on" on my phone I opened the N26 app. It instantly asked to verify my Face-ID again, which I did. I also closed my VPN and logged successfully in again. Three hours from that I received an email that my account is going to be closed based on the very same terms which have been covered here in almost every review. ,My assumption is that N26 algorithms flagged my account because based on the IP-addresses it seemed that my account was accessed from two different countries within one minute. This would most likely also explain why a lot of N26 customers have been stranded at airports when all of the sudden their accounts are not working. ,In my case I was lucky. N26 gave me 14 days to empty my account and kept my app and card working. Not everyone is so lucky though. There seems to be three kinds of scenarios. Mine already mentioned, second where all transactions are blocked but the person is paradoxically being asked to empty the account, and third where the account is entirely blocked on the spot.,Good luck with N26 account. I wouldn't trust them. I'm back using old fashioned banks where there's customer service who know what they're talking about and are able to provide a lot more than an apologetic spam letter which is soon sent out as an answer to this review, too.
company_reply: Hey,,As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions. If you have any concerns we advise you to reply directly to the email you received regarding this matter. ,Best,,Your N26 support team

title: Terrible service

There is absolutely no costumer service except for a chat that answers you with automated answers, and if you end up chatting with an actual human, they'll give an even less helpful service than a robot. company_reply: Hi Leonardo,,As a licensed mobile bank, we are legally obliged to run routine checks on user accounts and transactions. The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion this takes longer, as we may have to reach out to you for some necessary information.,We apologise for the experience you had with our customer service. We hope to offer the most efficient customer experience on every occasion, and we regret that this has not happened for you, and would like to learn from this. Please feel free to send an email to support@n26.com if you have any further feedback or require any assistance.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: I CURRENTLY HAVE NO ACCESS TO MY MONEY
text: I CURRENTLY HAVE NO ACCESS TO MY MONEY ,This is the most appalling customer service I have ever experience. I have spent over 3+ hours today contacting customer support. I can currently not log into the app on my phone because I need to change my phone. I have contacted customer support 3 times about this, which is only a chat - there is no other option.,The same thing happens each time. They verify my identity - ask for number on card, number of personal identity card and details of 5th last transaction. ,They then ask me for my new number and provide me with a code and inform me that I will recieve a phone call within 1 hr.,So I don't get a call, I contact customer service AGAIN. I do the same identity verification AGAIN. ,I am told that they did infact try to call me 3 times. I had not 1 missed call!!! They tried to contact me on my old number(which I do not have) and then my new number,... but odly enough I did not have any notification of a missed call.,The employee offers no explanation. Everything is clearly written from a book, unpersonalised and unable to thing for himself. He then GUARANTEES me 100 PER CENT. That all information is now correct and I will receive a phone call within 1 hour.,I RECEIVE NO PHONE CALL.,So as you can imagine by this stage I am fairly frustrated, after hearing lots of bad stories about N26 Customer support I recently decided to take a leap of faith and make N26 my main account.,SO I CURRENTLY HAVE NO ACCESS TO MY MONEY ,SO I contact customer service again. Chat window ops up. SAME VERIFICATION PROCESS. Only to then be informed that ,"no sorry this phone number is being used with a different account you cannot use it",after I assured the employe that, that was in fact my telephone number..,..it turns out she 'had made a small mistake'.,Then much to my frustration she completely disconnects the chat without further support. THIS IS DISGUSTING!!,After this issue is resolved, I am leaving N26 and encouraging any friend or contact to do the same. This is about 12hr now since I have had no access to my account.,SO I try a 4th attempt,SAME PROCESS,SAME VERIFICATION,I ask if I could possibly chat with someone higher up as obviously something with the callback process not working and it is quite important I gain access to my account as I need to pay a few urgent bills. ,The only response I receive is that It will work this time, without doubt!,When I try to express my concern again the employee,FOR THE 4TH TIME DISCONNECTS THE CHAT!!!!!!!!!!!,I AM COMPLETELY AT MY WITS END. WHAT A JOKE FOR A COMPANY. WHAT A JOKE FOR CUSTOMER SERVICE,PLEASE LEARN FROM MY MISTAKE AND DO NOT TRUST THIS INCOMPETENT COMPANY WITH YOUR MONEY!,during this whole process, I did as for a case or reference number. i was informed there was not one. I also asked for email confirmation that they did in fact call me. I was also informed that they could not provide me with this information either!!!!!!!
company_reply: Hey Jessica,,We're sorry for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We understand your disappointment. We apologise that there was a mistake made on our side whilst updating your number in our system. Were you able to get this changed? ,You can contact us on Twitter or send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

This is all my savings in the world (over £10,000) and I’m going to lose a house I need to put a deposit on. I hope it’s not true but I think this is another Northern Rock. They will not let me get to my money.

title: Well thought out process
text: Well thought out process. It was super easy to get an account and the agents throughout the process were helpful.  It all went smoothly and clearly.

title: BEST CARD I HAVE EVER HAD...
text: N26 is the best banking I have every been with , I have the N26 Black which cost 9.90 euros a month , but is well worth it if you travel as there is no commission to pay on foreign currencies ,you get the exact exchange rate and no limits on how many times you withdraw from an ATM machine or purchases you make using your card.,The N26 Black card also comes with many benefits. if you have a problem with anything , the customer services are excellent , and handle your query or dispute in a very friendly and professional manner..,I am very happy with the support I have had in the past , they cannot do enough to help you.,I would never go anywhere without my card.

title: Rejected without any good explanation
text: "You cannot open an account with us due to legal requirements" ,No further explanation given. Wow! I never had any issues opening an account with a bank or credit card company before. ,Thank you for wasting my time.
company_reply: Hey,,As a bank, we have to follow strict legal requirements for every account we open. Unfortunately, occasionally this means we are not able to open accounts due to these restrictions.,We do apologise for any inconvenience this may have caused.,Best,,Your  N26 support team.

title: What rubbish this is
text: What rubbish this is. 0 stars. Signed up for metal card where you get holiday insurance, but good luck getting use of that insurance. You had to have paid EVERYTHING for that holiday through the metal card with proof, otherwise they refuse.,So that was mildly annoying but I can live with it. BUT they suspended my account for 4 MONTHS after i sent a large payment from another bank account so that it actually had some funds in it. They suspended on suspicious activity and I had no access to any of the money in it. After back and forth with the awful support team who just said "we cannot give you any information regarding your account" I left it and gave up. 4 months later I get an email saying your account is now unlocked. HA,Needless to say I have cancelled the subscription and will not be using this ever. Awful communication, service, etc, etc,Monzo is 1,000,000,000 x better
company_reply: Hey Robert,,Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. ,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our agents on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.,Please feel free to reach out to us via email and we will be happy to investigate this with you.,support@N26.com,Best,,Your N26 support team.

title: Budget Bank
text: It's a Startup, so you get what you pay for. The Ryanair of banks. ,They do not have humans in customer care - just bots, which are unable to understand the issue or help. I spent over 2 hours yesterday going in circles from their online chat to my email, ping-ponging back and forth. Like all the recent negative reviews, my issue was with the re-verification. They have locked me out of my account. ,Two stars because up until now it's been fine and easy to use. But my account is frozen and they refuse to help. Incredibly frustrating and hopeless.
company_reply: Hey,,As a licenced bank, we’re legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) We do have a chatbot however you can request to talk to an agent. ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Second time asking for identification
text: Second time asking for identification, My account is placed on ''hold'' while They do ID checks. I have money in my account and they have locked it just to see my ID which Ive already uploaded 6 months ago! Awful company please dont go anywhere near this poor excuse for an online account.
company_reply: Hi Max, ,N26 is legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals. Rest assured that this is a routine procedure that all banks have to follow. Once you have provided your documents for approval, you will be able to use your account as normal whilst we review them. You can receive money, use your N26 debit card for purchases and withdrawals, receive transfers, perform direct debits and avail of any benefits you may have with the account, such as insurance or overdraft. Whilst the re-verification is taking place, you will be unable to initiate a debit transfer, but this will be reinstated as soon as you have been re-verified. ,We apologise for any inconvenience this has caused.,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: I'm using N26 for a year now and so far…
text: I'm using N26 for a year now and so far I'm very happy with it!! All my small daily transactions at supermarkets, coffee shops etc are now paid with N26 I also use it for restaurants and hotels. Its great at giving me a complete listing of all my transactions, the only quibble that I have is that it doesn't link my transactions to gps which can be useful when I'm trying to remember which supermarket I used on a particular day. Apart from that Its also great for transferring money to family members who also use the app. I've also noticed that they give a very good conversion rate when I use the app in the UK

title: Awful service and support
text: Awful service and support. I have been using N26 for around 9 months paying money every month for their 'Metal' service. 3 days ago I got locked out of my account and separated from my funds with no warning. The lock out was due to an apparent 'reverification', a check that they state is routine yet my documents have been denied despite them being the very same ones that I signed up with.  To make matters worse all of the customer service reps I have spoken to via livechat have said that they can't do anything and don't know when I will be able to access my money again. Robbery of my funds with no answer as to when or how I get my money out. ,I strongly urge anybody that is thinking about using N26 to reconsider as behind all of the nice modern branding is an awful service with an even worse customer service department. Don't be fooled by the fake 5 star reviews.
company_reply: Hey Jack, thanks for taking the time to let us know. company_reply: Hey Victoria, ,We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. As a result, we may ask you to verify the origin or source of your funds. If you receive such a request, just send the requested documents via email. There are no exceptions or bypasses for such checks. And in cases of non-compliance, your account may be seized and cancelled.,Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. This practice ensures the safety of our customers and their transactions. The sooner we received the required documentation the faster the checks are done. Here are some tips to speed up the process:,You can provide any receipt, bill, invoice, contract, or similar document that makes it possible for us to clearly identify the transaction in question and its origin and purpose. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots (as long as the original content of the document is easily readable).,Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. If your documents don't clearly support your statements or you miss details, we may have to ask you again. Reply as soon as possible but within 14 days at the latest. Use the email you received from N26 to reply and send attachments. Our Customer Support doesn’t have any additional information on this subject. ,All the best,,Your N26 Support Team

When I describe the issue they just close the chat window. I still have no access to my account and have no access to finish re-verification. no one explained me anything.
company_reply: Hi Maria,,N26 is legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals. Rest assured that this is a routine procedure that all banks have to follow. The process is short and is completed within a few minutes. Please reach out to us via live chat if you are having any issues with re-verification.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: It is really easy get account in N26
text: It is really easy get account in N26. Application has a really nice looking UI and you also have access to desktop version of the site. You also get Apple Pay integration and can use your phone/watch for purchases.,Everything works fine until you suddenly get email stating you have "substantial violation", while the only purchases you did were in groceries and several times online. You feel sad that this happened and decide to get in contact with customer support. And then you understand the full headache of having N26 account. ,Customer support does not give you any explanation on what you did wrong instead they close chat. You get angry and decide to fully close your account and delete your personal data. ,However, it turns out that customer support does not even allow you to close your account earlier. And you end with account you cannot use and support that cannot answer you anything.,Maybe someone will have better experience that me, but personally I will never recommend N26 to no-one.,[UPDATED] Unfortunately I cannot answer anything to N26 reply. Both email and online chat did not want to give any explanation, this is understandable. Though still after dozens of emails I cannot request my account to be closed earlier without any proper reason. All questions asking why this cannot be done lead to no email reply or online chat closes. Overall customer support experience is really bad.
company_reply: Hi Andrei,,We apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. In cases of violation, these checks may indicate that our business relationship must be terminated. This is enacted by a dedicated internal department, and for this reason, customer support cannot advise further.,We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We kindly ask that you respond to the email you would have received from us with any queries you may have.

title: Nobody should want to repeat our…
text: Nobody will want to repeat our experience with N26, 2018-2019,N26 closed account unilaterally within 90 days!,Pre-paid N26 Black account opened online in early August 2018.,Account unilaterally closed by N26 Bank, with fourteen days email advance notice to account-holder, in early November 2018.,Account credit balance on date of forced closure was €4,125.52,N26 gave no reply nor refund despite all contact attempts from Nov. 2018 to Feb. 2019 by the account-holder to secure refund of his balance until he, a UK citizen resident in Spain, complained to the ombudsman’s office of Deutsche Bundesbank (German central bank in Frankfurt) with a log of this banking relationship until April 2019.,On May 24, 2019, N26 repaid the exact balance amount following a brief apology for their six-month delay.,This fast, free, straightforward service by the German central bank for legitimate complaints is outstanding.,I strongly recommend any N26 Bank customer suffering a similar clear-cut case of non-existent or unhelpful customer service from N26 Bank to document their complaint – in meticulous chronological detail – by email to the ombudsman’s office at:,schlichtung@bundesbank dot de,Schlichtungsstelle bei der Deutschen Bundesbank Geschäftsstelle,MY PUBLIC DISCLOSURE,The above facts transpired from August 2018 to May 2019 between N26 Bank GmbH, Klosterstraße 62, D-10179 Berlin, and a close relative of mine following my personal recommendation to try N26 Bank August 2018.,I no longer recommend N26 Bank to anyone, anywhere.,August 9, 2019 – UPDATE,The German central bank, Deutsche Bundesbank, kindly sent my close relative – by mail – a copy of the N26 Bank letter signed by a new N26 managing director on May 27, 2019, explaining N26’s handling of this balance refund. I was stunned to discover a blatant untruth in the N26 response.,N26 stated they telephoned the customer on May 23, 2019, for his bank account because they received no response to their May 15 email requesting his bank details when my relative had responded May 16, 2019, with full Spanish bank documentation – May 15 is a bank holiday in Spain. Email server logs May 15 & 16, 2019, at backoffice.support@n26 dot com bear witness to this fact.,Conclusion,If N26 Bank is capable of making inaccurate statements to Germany’s central bank then what level of service can any customer expect from upstart N26 Bank?,This adds credibility to Trustpilot’s 18% bad reviews.
company_reply: Hi David,,In accordance with European banking processes, N26 is obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts and transactions. We follow these processes to ensure that our user accounts are kept secure. ,We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We kindly ask that you respond to the email you would have received from us with any queries you may have., ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

But I waited a few days then only contacted customer service, they said they will investigate and email me. Waited and waited still no news from them. Contacted them again after a day or two. They checked my account again and the guy said he was not able to tell me what's wrong, bid me farewell and he exited the chat right away. Even if they cannot open my account they could have replied in a less robotic and cold way. All I can say is, what a waste of time and effort.
company_reply: Hey Aida,,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you.,Best,,Your N26 support team.

title: They are a pretty straightforward bank
text: They are a pretty straightforward bank. Easy to use and they keep the promotional crap to a minimum. The banking app is easy to use.

title: Awesome banking service
text: The banking service, my black metal card and the app are awesome. Love that when I pay at the register, the app essentially confirms the payment even before the terminal does. Also, SEPA transfers in both directions are very fast.,The only problem is the quality of the support. While they managed to solve my issue (payment authorisation not refunded within the 12 day maximum limit), I really had to argue my case and was told to just wait another week. That isn't really an acceptable answer.,However, I see that as a symptom of the rapid expansion of the services, so time will tell. Meanwhile, I would still very much recommend N26. At the very least as a secondary account.

title: My Experience with the Mobile Bank N26
text: All in all, I couldn’t be happier with our N26 bank account and credit cards after using them for 2 years. I love using the modern app, the instant notification when we paid for something via one of my two cards, the fast wire transfers, the free Euro cash withdrawals at ATMs and paying no exchange fee when using N26 for payments in other foreign currencies.,The built-in auto-categorization of my spendings also makes tracking expenses a lot easier and save me some time. I highly recommend testing out N26, if you’re looking for a free, modern bank account with tons of useful features and free payments in any currency.

title: I have been using N26 for several…
text: I have been using N26 for several years, from an early onset when the app first appeared. I was at first, and for quite some time, satisfied with their services.,They have, however, changed a lot since then. Firstly, client service disappeared and it is now not possible to talk to any assitant - a service now sold in their "Metal" package!,The App shows weaknesses when it comes to synchronising and transactions, on many occasions, remain 'hung' or pending in the app, practically 'freezing' funds for a minimum of 1 week. (The app's livechat support asked me to wait this long).,International transactions now have to be done from Transferwise from a computer... not much of a tech feat...
company_reply: Hi Daniel, thank you very much for your review. ,We are sorry to hear you had some difficulties to reach out to us, we understand this can be frustrating.,Our customer service is available on phone for all metal account owners, however all our customers can still contact us via live chat 24/7 in English. You can find more options on how to contact us in the following link: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/other/how-to-contact-n26.,About synchronizing the app, the issue you mentioned seems to be a technical one. Usually in order to fix it you can follow this procedure: ,-unpair you device,-uninstall the app ,-switch it off for a couple of minutes ,-install the app,-repair the phone,At this point you should be able to cancel the pending transactions.,We are working to improve Transferwise experience and we are aware that at the moment it might take more time to send a transfer than it does in the App.,We thank you for your understanding and collaboration. ,Your N26 Support team

title: Literally the worst experience I've…
text: Literally the worst experience I've ever had with anything. I opened my account almost two months ago and still haven't received my card. A lot of N26 is tied to their mobile app which you can't access without having received the card. The first card was 'undeliverable' (?), and so I opened up a support chat and was told that they would order me a new one. I paid to have the card sent express as I have over 4000 euros in my account and need to pay rent! Turns out the absolute imbecile I talked to never actually ordered my card, so I was told another one would be ordered and express shipped free of charge. The next day I was yet to receive any confirmation (which I was told I should expect to receive) so I went to the support chat for (literally) the 10th time to find out more. I was assured that it had been ordered, but they offered to help me transfer money out of my n26 account into an account I hold with a REAL bank. An hour later, after taking photos of my passport and entering details upon details about anything and everything, I got to the final step:,"Enter the ten digits on the back of your n26 card",I'm absolutely livid. The customer service rep simply apologised saying he 'was so focused on the problem at hand that [he]'d forgotten that [I] hadn't received a card yet'. ,If I could give n26 negative stars I would. A bunch of complete imbeciles trying to convince people they know what they're doing with a pretty website. STAY AWAY!!!!

text: I would avoid this bank at all costs.,At first I thought it was a good bank but the cracks started to appear. First you cannot make payments to o2 and several other companies due to address issues. I tried to make several purchases online which get declined but the payment is taken and you have to wait up to 10 days to get the money back. I cancelled a direct debit but it was still taken and when I contacted them they said it would take at most 2 days to get my money back, it took a week. I raised a query as to why I couldn’t make payments to o2 and no one has ever bothered replying. I had to find out myself that it’s due to the way the bank stores your address details and why I spoke to an agent on chat I was told that if I want to order things online I need to contact the company prior and change the address format first in order for the payment not to decline. What started off so promising has turned into an absolute nightmare and over the last few months I’ve spent most of the time trying to get my own money back or having to get other people to make my payments or order things for me.

title: It's cool like Starbucks, but scary too

As a college student, it fills that area of sleek, trendy, efficient and minimalist online banking that I crave for. ,I represent a college sports club which was approached with an N26 sponsorship but we rejected their offer due to the bad press they have received. Irrelevant story, I know, but I hope to approach them if I find that I truly support the product.

title: I choose this bank since there is no monthly fee for keeping your account active.
text: I choose this bank since there is no fee for the basic account which makes it so easy, also no fees for the first 5 taking money on ATM machine. I love the online support that you can easily access via mobile application and they are really helpful.,Really satisfying.

title: Amazing no-nonsense Bank that is Customer-Friendly
text: Amazing bank. I had my doubts at first because everyone was saying it is better to have a physical branch. What I immediately noticed is that they communicate well in English and the account was easy to set up. The mastercard came in only a few days later as well.,No appointments and lining up at the bank needed. I opened my account at the office kitchen, during lunch break. That's how easy it is. Customer service representative was great.,Of course, the app is very user-friendly and you get notifications per transaction, without fail so far. I also like the concept of "spaces" so you can set aside and lock money from your urge to spend it. Customer support is also easy to reach and they are very polite. ,All in all, amazing banking experience. Keep it up!

title: Excellent simple bank account
text: Excellent simple bank account. ,It's even easier to load the card onto the ApplePay wallet using the N26 app than Apple's own wallet app. OutApples Apple.,It doesn't have all the bells n whistles but it does what it does and does it well. Spaces, for example, is a super-easy way to ring-fence money for certain things so that you cannot spend that money on something else with your card. I created spaces for my holiday, one for the hotel, one for spending. I can then drag the money back to the main space when I need to.

title: So far so good
text: I’ve had a very positive experience with N26 so far. The account was set up very fast and I received my card in a few days. However, I have had no issues with the bank, so I’m not sure what their customer help services are like. The app is so fuss-free, you can set and change your PIN on the app and, best of all, you get push notifications exactly as and when money has entered or left your account, I personally love it at this moment in time.

title: Love it!

Whilst on holiday I tried to withdraw some money using my N26 card from an atm then decided to cancel the transaction as the withdrawal charge was ridiculous so I decided to try a different atm to see that my card was rejected to insufficient funds and I thought that was odd I have money on the card so tried again again rejected to checked the app to find that the money had been taken off my account! Called the atm company and was told to contact my bank. I gave the atm company all the details I had from the withdrawal and contacted N26. My goodness what an absolute nightmare it’s been! Being told I have to do this and that which I did several times and it didn’t work. Got to the point where I had to fill in a form for a cash back refund or whatever. I was told once the form was sent off they would keep me updated with what was happening and they didn’t have a specific time frame for this. A couple of weeks had passed and hadn’t heard anything so gave them a quick email asking if there were any updates and I got the most blunt and rude reply. Telling me to be patient and they will update when they see any info and there’s no time frame for this. Couple more weeks passed.... nothing. Emailed again saying I was sorry for the bother and asked on the progress and was told that they will get in contact when they can and that it could take up to 36 days from when they send the form off to get the money back. Finally got an email saying that I would receive the credit in my account within the next 12 days. This was 4 days ago. Woke up to an email from them today saying they were closing my account for no apparent reason. I emailed asking why and waiting to hear back. Honestly such a bloody joke!
company_reply: Hey,,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.,If you do not receive your funds from the ATM this does not necessarily mean the money has been taken from your account. It is ''blocked'' and not taken from your account, it takes up to 12 days for the money to get back to the account. If after 12 days the money does no return to your account you will need to send an email with the charge back form filled. Please note that we need a hand written signature. You can send it to support@n26.com,Via this link you will find our charge back form: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/fixing-an-issue/cards/how-to-get-my-money-back-in-case-of-fraud ,Here is some additional info:,https://docs.n26.com/cs/Support+Center/chargeback_required_docs_EN.pdf,We would be more than happy to look into this with you. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) ,Regarding your account closure we kindly ask you to reply to the email you received for any further assistance. ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: I would love to give N26 my banking but...

The documents I have are official Deutsch papers that I use for all identity verification needs here in Deutschland. But apparently there is not a way to use these with N26. I would hope that N26 perhaps restores the PostIdent service or finds another means to accomplish the same task.
company_reply: Hey Alexander, ,We apologise that we are unable to provide you with an account at this time. As a bank, we need to know who you are. That’s why you have to prove your identity with a supported ID document. You can show us your ID in two different ways, photo and video. If your ID isn't on the list, it means we can't offer you an account at this time. ,We would be more than happy to take a closer look into your documents with you. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) ,We cannot accept all Passports nor National ID cards. This is purely down to the lack of security features that appear on some documents. We are constantly seeking to add documents to our list of supported documents. You can follow our @N26 blog and social media accounts to stay up-to-date as all updates will be released there! ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: N26 is a very innovative and modern banking solution
text: N26 is a very innovative and modern banking solution. If you are interested in having that kind of a bank to your side, then this is definitely the bank to go. Mobile payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay, direct feedback via a very well designed mobile app and web-app and a super advanced chatbot that can pretty much answer and solve half of your concerns without even needing to talk to a real human. But if you need to, all agents I work with so far have been very competent, polite and super helpful.,But let me say that you really should want to support and ride the train of digital banking to be content with N26. It is not the best bank in the world, at least for now. It is on a very good path towards becoming it. But based on the fact that the basic account costs you literally 0$, so it's FREE, I can't tell you a reason not to create an account there and just give it a try yourself. And their Mastercards are looking pretty cool. I am very happy with my decision to use N26 as my primary bank account but it's not my one and only. Maybe in the near future.

company_reply: Hey Nelson,,Thanks for your feedback! We regret to hear that you were provided with such customer experience.,A paired smartphone is required to use the N26 account. ,If you didn’t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one.,If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you’ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.,If your country code is outside of the EU, it’s likely that you’ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.,You can find out more about the pairing process and the app itself by reading this Support Center article: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/account/why-didnt-i-receive-my-pairing-code-via-sms,Best regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: I can’t even open an account
text: Well I wasn’t even able to open an account! I had a few initial problems uploading my documents and had to repeat the process a number of times. Nearly 3 weeks and several chats with their support team later I was told the selfie wasn’t good enough. Ok, can I submit another? No, I was told I’d need to wait for the original agent to which I had originally enquired to contact me to tell me my application had been unsuccessful. Ridiculous! So now I’m looking for another bank so I can start all over again. Thanks N26, if I’d known 3 weeks ago what I know now I’d probably have an account already.,*In reply to your response, you have completely misunderstood what I have said. I wasn’t complaining that you have to present ID, I was complaining that until today I wasn’t told that there was an issue with my documents, despite speaking to a number of you customer service agents before. In fact, it’s only due to my dogged determination to try to resolve the issue that I eventually found an agent who was able to supply me with the reason for the delay. company_reply: Hey,,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Unfortunately, these obligations may also prevent us from disclosing any detail around such checks. As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions.,Best,,Your N26 support team

company_reply: Hey Adriano,,Thanks for taking the time to leave your review, and we're sorry to learn that you haven't enjoyed your experience with us thus far.,All of our customer service agents are trained in the same manner and to the highest quality. Our agents are also offered follow-up training and support to ensure they are always knowledgeable and up to date with all new processes and topics that they will need to assist our customers with. In the event an agent is unsure on a topic they are assisting a customer with, they can reach out to senior support for help. You can also refer to our useful support center, which answers a lot of Frequently Asked Questions: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started,It is correct that our Black account has a contract of one year which is stated upon signing up. It is possible to cancel the account without a fee within the legal 14 day revocation period, but once this time has passed, the agreed upon fees must be paid for the remainder of the contract. You can cancel the auto renewal of the Black account in your mobile app by going to My Account > N26 Black > N26 Black ID > Cancel Membership. This must be done at least 30 days before the end of the current contract, and will cancel the subscription for the next year - not the current contract.,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team.

company_reply: Hey Adedeji,,We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems.,As a result, we may ask you to verify the origin or source of your funds. If you receive such a request, just send the requested documents via email. There are no exceptions or bypasses for such checks. And in cases of non-compliance, your account may be seized and cancelled.,Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. This practice ensures the safety of our customers and their transactions. The sooner we received the required documentation the faster the checks are done. ,Best,,Your N26 Team
