text: The services that they offer are fantastic, but like many reviewers here, I had a terrible experience with their customer service. After that, I kept the card because the customer service got better so I gave them a second chance. Now, it has been 19 days since there has been a fraudulent transaction on my account. Cherry on the cake: I am temporarily abroad. They told me to wait for 12 days and explained why. I complied. I send them the dispute forms with the police complaint after the said 12 days. It has been more than a week now and still no response. I want to give them another chance, but how many times am I going to keep doing that? A great innovative banking idea, but very poor execution. Sadly, I will not recommend this bank just based on the fact that they do not take the unauthorized transactions seriously and are not able to reassure the client. I hope my unauthorized transaction will be re-credited back soon. Still waiting...,Update: I was reimbursed 3.5 weeks after the initial unauthorised payment, so changed my rating from a one-star. So it took a while but they came through.
company_reply: Hey Nikhil,,We apologise for keeping you waiting. If you don’t recognize a transaction or you’re sure you didn’t authorize it, blocking your card won’t be enough. In these cases you should immediately:,Order a new card and mark your current one as stolen. Destroy your card by cutting it with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately. Complete a dispute form (EU or UK). We’ll take it from there and do our best to get your money back.,Could you please reach out to our live chat support so we can take a closer look and provide you with an update? ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: I really like the design makes the user…
text: I really like the design makes the user experience really great. However, fancy is not always useful. I ran into a lot of problems not being able to receive USD payment. I think this future would be needed for a company that advertises themselves as global, for young people, mobile etc... This is really annoying and I will probably will go back to my other banks as I often receive payments in different currencies. And nobody has a single clue what the hell "transferwise" is tbh...,Yeah but nobody who sents me money would download transferwise. and tbh i would not either.
company_reply: Hey Sara,,Thanks for your feedback. According to our Terms & Conditions we do not accept incoming SWIFT transfers. We only support SEPA transfers in Euros. It is possible to send money in other currencies using an exchange service, such as that offered by our partner Transferwise. You would need to register to Transferwise. Here is the link: https://transferwise.com,You can read more about this on our support center: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/payments-and-transfers/how-to-make-transfers-in-foreign-currencies,Best,,Your N26 Team

title: n26 illegally holding my funds
text: Started with a N26 because of low costs to withdrawal money in exterior (I had the black paid card). In less then 6 weeks N26 froze the account (I did receive crypto payments on it). I got an email saying: we cannot continue offering you an account, your account will be closed in 2 weeks. In those 2 weeks you have time to withdrawal your remaining funds. Not true, I was not able to make any payment/transfer nor to withdrawal in cash. Endlessly contacted support and chat but no response (chat actually mentioned all time the same: we refer to the mail we have send you, I will close the chat now). Received the mail they will close my account on the 13th of may. 27th of May will be day that the account is officially closed. Now, on June 15 I’m still waiting for N26 to send me the funds that are still in my account (several hundreds of euros). ,They promote with service, technology etc etc but to be honest it is just a scam... holding illegally some persons money for over a month now. ,I send them one last mail (as a holy Mary) begging to send me the money (provided them with alternative Iban account on my name) but still no response. If they don’t solve it the next week, I feel forced to go to court, I’m sure there are more people out there with the same experience (reading different fora) so feel free to join me.

title: Perfect bank
text: Mobile app is easy to use and working perfect! Customer service is really nice and professional. I really like the idea, if I am spending my money (net shopping, transfer, shopping in a mall) it will immediately disappear from my account (at least I see only the amount of the money which is available) which is really good as in germany most of the cases at all other banks, they need 2-5 days till you book the already spent money, so you can think that you have enough money, and after that suddenly you realize that no.

title: Buggy app and terrible customer service
text: I really liked the idea of a bank catering to travelers and expats. So it is utterly incomprehensible to me that they are doing a terrible job at exactly that! I have wasted 5 hours attempting to pair my phone to the app WHILE ON VACATION IN BALI and the issue has still not been solved! All the emails, chats and calls for nothing! This is the third issue now within a couple months and I am seriously considering to close my account ASAP. I feel completely let down by them, but better to find out now before I invest more time in this banking relationship.They really don't seem to get the business is about relationships and trust - especially when it comes to money! You guys have definitely lost mine.

title: I have moved to a different country and…
text: I have moved to a different country and wanted to update the Terms of Service for the particular country I live in. Apparently the only way to do this is to close my current account and open a new one in the country I live in.
company_reply: Hey Christian, ,Thank you for your feedback. ,We do not offer account switching services at the moment, so we are unable to alter the country of your Terms & Conditions, as this pertains to the country you opened the account in.  We do hope to offer this service in future. We can change your legal address, but this will not alter the country in which your terms and conditions are based.,It is possible to move between supported countries and use your account as normal - it is not necessary to close your account if you are simply moving to another country in which we operate, however there are certain features and services that are not available across all countries currently.,We apologise for any inconvenience.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

And they’re “looking into it” however can’t tell me when this will be resolved. Even the man on the live chat seemed like he didn’t know how to respond. ,If N26 read this they’ll probably say what they said to all of you “contact our live chat” .,I actually want this sorted. company_reply: Hi Hamesh,,We are obliged to carry out regular routine checks on accounts and transactions in accordance with European banking processes. The majority of the time, checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. In some cases, we may need longer to investigate. ,We understand the concern you have for the status of your account and the remaining funds,  but we are unable to discuss sensitive information relating to your N26 account via this platform. We will continue this correspondence via email. We hope this can be resolved for you in a timely manner and apologise for any inconvenience.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Terrible Experience Not Just For Myself
text: There's plenty of people that have had their accounts locked away from them, whilst it hasn't happened to me yet I've now deleted the app and no longer use this bank. So that means I am unable close my account! Now I've received an email saying that I have a negative balance (which is the monthlymmembership) and that the email they sent to me would cost £3 which is ridiculous! They'll also suspend my account within 2 months if I don't pay it off. Go ahead! I won't be using you thiefs again.,AVOID THEM AT ALL COSTS!!
company_reply: Hey Chris, thank you for your message.,We apologise if you had a bad experience. Your N26 Black contract lasts 12 months, with a revocation period of 14 days.,In order to close your account, you must pay the remaining monthly fees. Once this is done, we'll be happy to proceed with your cancellation. ,You can find all these informations in your legal documents : https://n26.com/en-eu/legal-documents/black,We hope this message was useful for you.,Regards,,Your N26 Team.

title: Run away is a cardboard bank.
text: Run away is a cardboard bank.,Your money is not safe and they're bullshitting you.,They remove bad comments on facebook.,SOS, I contacted the bundesbank and associations we are hundreds with our money blocked.,And no customer service except a poor email that never answers...,I have been a client with them since June 2017, account opened as a Frenchman but having its tax residence in Morocco.,I declared these elements when I opened the account on the first day.,And since then I haven't had any problems and I've been using my account regularly for 2 years.,Except last night I received an email like hundreds of other people,"Subject: Cancellation of your account,We have recently identified a material breach of our terms and conditions of use on your account. Therefore, we are obliged to close your N26 account, in accordance with Article 19 (3) of our General Terms and Conditions of Use on an extraordinary basis.,The closure of your account will take effect on:,21.06.2019,Your account remains operational until the date indicated. After termination, the use of the account, the application and the accompanying card will no longer be possible.",Example of the bank's customers who received the same email:,Search on Google : 60 Millions de consomateurs N26 comptes fermé,I can understand that a bank wants to close its bank relationship, but I do not understand that it does not respect the notice they gave me in their emails, since they told me that I have until June 21 and that my account remains functional.,Currently my account and card are not functional.,24416.01€ are totaly block without any delay ...,I find myself on the eve of a long weekend with:,- A non-existent customer service that systematically refers us to the email and explains that it is two different services that manage the situation.,- My account is blocked and my assets are frozen.,- I can no longer use my card to pay online, make withdrawals or transfer money.,I am stuck  with no money, no customer service and no one to turn to.,And the bank is unreachable and can't actually answer me when they give me back my money.,Customer service by chat, tells us to see the service by email and cuts the conversation.,Great experience with a cardboard bank.,Even in North Korea, I'm sure we'd have someone answering our phones after blocking our money...,And this is a German bank????,I wonder how Germany, which is so rigorous, can give banking licenses to people like that.,SOS we're in a nightmare,Message for the community manager, no need to give us your copy/paste liest: ,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Rest assured, once the review on your account is complete, an agent will contact you.,Already it is necessary to answer the customer by the customer service.,I haven't received a message from you in two years.,No phone calls, no emails, no text messages.,And the BANG 24'416.01€ of blocked.,And the worst thing is that you write to me in black and white that my account, my card and my application will remain functional until June 21.,Except that's not true, everything's already blocked and I don't have access to my money anymore.,I have tuition fees to pay to AEFE next week for my son. How do I do that?????,I have to renew health insurance and I had planned to go on holiday in July.,How do I do it?????,I begged customer service to let me at least get €500 out of the €24,416.01,Answer we can make no exception.,But that's my money right there. ,But of course you don't care, it's a routine thing and you hide behind conditions that mean everything and nothing.,I have already answered your email, I have already provided my bank details.,An urgent SWIFT transfer is done within the same day.,So there is a problem in your cardboard bank or should I say in your paper bank?,Unless you're a shadow bank????????,Hundreds of people complain on the French forums about having money blocked for weeks and months.,You play with our money on trading programs?,What exactly do you do with the money from your piegons?,I don't even dare to write customer anymore, we are piegons.,And I think the good comments are written by a community manager with fakes profiles.,##### UPDATE 12 JUNE 2019 ####,In any case, my message here has had an effect.,I have finally been contacted and I hope to receive my transfer soon.,The only downside is that they force me to receive my funds on my French account, but it's okay, fortunately I didn't close it.,As soon as I receive my funds, I will delete this post.
company_reply: Hi Jean,,As a licensed bank, we are obliged to abide by European banking processes. We are therefore evolving in a strictly regulated environment. Our teams are obliged to follow the same procedures as all other European banks. This includes carrying out routine checks on user accounts and transactions. We don't close accounts without reason, and we do our best to prevent bad situations for the people affected. We endeavour to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision and advise you on the next steps.,We understand the concern you have for the status of your account and the remaining funds, but we are unable to discuss sensitive information relating to your N26 account via this platform. We will continue this correspondence via email. We hope this can be resolved for you in a timely manner.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

To be honest my friend uses a DKB and its just way way beyond N26. In my experience if you want an example where you should not have an account is N26. Avoid it the best you can. company_reply: Hey Devendra,,Thanks for getting in touch! We are sorry to hear this issue has not been resolved yet.  We are very committed in making this right! We have sent you an email. Could you please take a look? Thank you. ,Best,,Your N26 Team

title: Excellent
text: Excellent! ,Quick and easy Banking. ,Easy account set up. Set up my account on my phone, in less than 10 mins I had a new bank account. All the functions you'd expect, plus new ones I'm still exploring on the app. Had my Debit card in 8 days, had my BIC and IBAN within the 1st hour, was able to change all my direct debits once I had this. I'm still amazed how quick transactions are, I always know how much is in my account, No waiting days for Irish banks to update transactions, I get notifications as I walk out of shops for purchases I've just made. I recently paid a bill online and got a notification form N26 before the companies website confirmation page came up, its that quick. Customer service is very German quick and efficient, can't complain about that.,I'm still finding new stuff to try but so far I'm delighted with them.

title: Very easy to open an account
text: Very easy to open an account. ,Friendly advice when needed. ,Easy to navigate round the app & website. ,Who needs high street banks?

title: Banking made easy.
text: Banking made easy.,Good customer service

title: Doesn't support the most basic functions
text: I really wanted to like N26 and to be able to use it as my primary account but it's just not possible.,It doesn't support the most basic banking functions which I would expect on any bank account (this is all for UK accounts as of 2019-06-03):,* Direct debit is not supported,* No overdraft,* No standing orders,* Cannot save recipient details: This shocked me. It's such an easy feature to add. When I send money to a friend I expect it to be able to remember the contact details so I can use them again in the future.,Finally the big selling point for me was that they supposedly had a fully functional website which I could use to send money and view my transaction history (most challenger banks for some reason don't have this). It turns out this isn't completely true. To send a transaction you still need to confirm on your phone which makes it quite pointless since the reason I want a website is for when I don't have access to my phone.,To end on a positive note: The set up was fast and easy and the support is good. Their app looks pretty as well (although feature wise it could also use quite a bit of improvement).,I will look at N26 again next year and I hope they have fixed all of these issues. If they have then I will gladly give them another try. Oh well, back to a traditional bank for now it seems :(,EDIT: Reply to N26,When I contacted your support I was told that direct debit was not supported (about a month ago). Well I guess that's one less thing stopping me from using N26.,As for the security of paired devices; a phone is not necessary more secure than a computer. Most banks are fine with using a computer without the phone, I see no reason why N26 should be any different. Also if you want extra security you could use a standard like OTP (e.g. with Google Authenticator) that way it is up to the customers if they want to have the app installed on their phone and if they want to have the OTP credentials on other devices like their computers.
company_reply: Hi Keeyan,,Thank you for taking the time to leave this feedback. We value your opinions and suggestions greatly as it is paramount to our growth and development.,We can confirm that it is possible to set up a direct debit with your N26 UK account, however this must be done directly through the merchant by providing them with your N26 details. If a merchant is not accepting these details, please contact us via live chat so that we are aware.,Standing orders, overdrafts, and saving payees are all on our roadmap for N26 UK as we understand they are an important feature for our customers. These features are available in our European app, and we are working hard to implement them for our UK customers soon. ,As we are a mobile bank, it is necessary that you must have your paired mobile device with you when making a transfer. We do this as it is an added security measure for the safety of your account - a transfer can only be actioned when you have selected "confirm" in the one mobile device paired to your account.,We encourage you to email any suggestions you have for improvement to ideas@n26.com, as we love to hear any ideas you may have!,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Great card for holidays
text: This card is brill if travelling to non euro destinations. Great exchange rates and no flat minimum fees for withdrawing cash in USA or U.K. I simply put my holiday cash on this account and withdraw as needed - saves having to get currency in advance. Rates are very fair. ( I bring a credit card or two as well just in case. !) finally I like that you get an immediate notification to your phone/ipad on any spends. There really is no downside - well maybe one - you can only have one card per account.

title: Very good
text: Decided to take a chance opening an account, didn’t know what to expect.   It is so easy to use, security is excellent.  Any misuse of my card and I would know immediately and be able to freeze the card.   I get notifications on my phone as the transaction goes through.  The ability to confirm a purchase in the app     All round very pleased.      Only issue is that some ATM’s won’t accept the cards nor will Pay at the pumps facility in petrol stations     Recently Sainsburys decided to exclude N26 cards for no apparent reason    ,Overall I’m very happy with N26

title: Love it
text: Love it, easy to deal with, log in, transfer, fast and polite customer service

title: Two years and still super bank!

title: Not the right bank for me
text: Not the right bank for me, transfers take to long, the insurance that comes with black doesn't give anything because it's fake and if you don't have enough money for a sepa they will just take 3+ euro from your account because "they (n26)" had to cancel the sepa for you... no thank you, as with most German company's stupid support.
company_reply: Hey Giuseppe,,Thanks for your feedback.,All domestic and international SEPA transfers are completed within one banking day. However, due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer has been made right before a weekend or bank holiday, the time frame will be extended.  ,Regarding our insurance offer. You can read more here: https://n26.com/en-eu/legal-documents/black,If you have any further queries you can contact our insurance partner Allianz directly. They will be more than happy to help!,You can find our pricing list on our support center. Here is the link: https://support.n26.com/read/000001252?locale=en ,We pride ourselves on our service, and are always looking to improve it. We value our customers and understand how important it is to offer exceptional service. ,Best,,Your N26 Team

title: Very happy

I find them refreshing as customer service doesn't seem to exist in Germany. I have been able to draw money without a card when I left it behind at home, withdraw from any ATM instead of walking kilometres to find 'my own'. I recommend them to my friends. Banking is always a tricky business and after trying O2 and seeing the problems my boyfriend has with Postbank, I am extremely happy I went with N26

title: Stolen money from cancer patient
text: The customer service know I suffer from stage 4 cancer , the thing with stage 4 cancer to note is there isn't a stage 5. I had sold some belongings on eBay , transferred the money into my new account from PayPal  to find it never arrived . N26 see it and keep giving me excuse after excuse , I've been waiting 6 weeks and really need the money. The customer service personal are useless. If indeed its not AI.,They are using our money as cashflow for the business , how do I know, my son used to work for them. Totally disgusted and have reported them to police and I am also taking out a legal action against them. I have it on good advice their UK division will be shut down in the next few weeks , if you have money in this bank get it out quick.,They are very bad people , the 2 directors are dishonest men, I hope you sleep well in your beds , soon it will be a prison cell.,Isn't it amazing that after a negative review , they post some crap that there service is amazing from first time posters , again proof that this company is just a Fraud and a front for something much more sinister.,Lets get together and send a message that this will not be tolerated .,If they will steal what little money I have with my health, they will steal and screw anyone over .......you have been warned....................,Eman xx
company_reply: Hey Emanuelle. Thanks for taking the time to pass on your feedback. We appreciate that this is an extremely challenging  situation. We are taking your message very seriously.  We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. We are committed to making this right. Could you please reach out to us via our Live Chat Support? You can do this directly within the mobile app and WebApp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account. An agent will be glad to help out!,Best, ,Your N26 Support Team

title: Great intuitive app with smooth banking experience!

title: Disabled in foreign country with no money
text: It’s not worthy of the one star.,I requested a transfer of £700 to another account. The money never arrived. I’m now left at the airport with no money for a flight, food or accommodation. I am disabled and their online chat is utterly useless and Jessica literally ended our chat, when I requested her to stay as I’m terrified of being alone and having a heart attack.,She just cut me off when I asked if someone in the bank had stolen my money.  I’m distraught and without any money at all in a foreign country.
company_reply: Hey Jacqueline,,We regret to hear this. Once you confirm a debit transfer in the app with your confirmation PIN we do not have the possibility to reverse this transaction. If the money does not bounce back to your account you can request a payment investigation. ,We truly apologise for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We value our customers and understand how important it is to offer exceptional service. We regret that we provided you with bad service and a poor customer experience. We would like to thank you for bringing this to our attention. If this issue has not been resolved could you please reach out to us via our live chat support so we can look into this? ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Name Hamza Shafique
text: Name Hamza Shafique ,Token number: 7477092153,Once again it’s been 4 weeks going into 5th week next for this routine check.,My money froze I need this sorting out ASAP.,I have been very patient now sort it out I have had enough, I have lost my patience with your bank.,The customer services are very poor and very rude, no one emails me back or updating me in regards to anything.,I have sent all the necessary documents to support this routine check 4 weeks back on the same day when you requested for them,Transactions, no one has called me.,DONt be very rude to your customer.,Please sort it out I need my money.,I trust everything is satisfactory however if you have any questions or queries please don’t hesitate to contact us on our direct dial below or email., , ,Thank you , ,Sincerely,, ,Hamza Shafique,+447866007867,UK,USA, Europe, Middle East, Asia

We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Once the review is complete an agent will contact you regarding your access to the account. We have forwarded your message on. ,Regarding your post. We kindly ask for you to either edit it or delete it. Your personal details are visible, please remove them for security purposes. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: N26 has been the easiest bank to sign…
text: N26 has been the easiest bank to sign up to, to use and to talk to without waiting in queues, answers are always clear and while I would not recommend to all, I would say explore more, its a great bank for me. It's an easy to use system that I see other banks adopting parts of and for my business purposes, they are No 1. I'll continue to use use them through thick and thin while they still support me. I know they had some issues; but haven't all the banks back in the UK (PPI) costing them billions, I think N26 is still evolving and as long as my money is secure and I don't do anything stupid it will always be a service that I will bank with (N26) and promote to whom I believe it would be relevant and of benefit to. They are backed by the government and covered like back in the UK under the FSCA so unless you have millions what have you got to lose?

title: Good. Not yet great.
text: Been using the black service for a few months now and the functionality is almost perfect.,The text alerts and the ability to create several savings pots are awesome.,And the benefits received are beyond what the high street banks would offer.,Would be 5 stars if they focused more on features like savings payees rather than apple pay.

title: Useless for the UK
text: Same experience as Rokas.,Not possible to have an IBAN if you live in the UK. ,I'm annoyed because they don't make it clear and online chat people don't know about it so I wasted my time applying. Found getting help pretty painful too.
company_reply: Hey S,,We do not offer an IBAN with UK accounts, as we opted to use an account number and sort code for transfers. If you need to send or receive money in a currency other than GBP, we recommend using TransferWise to do so: https://transferwise.com/,This is a feature which is integrated into our European app for simple foreign currency transfers, and we hope to extend this to the UK in future.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Only good if you have the 'right' nationality. *cough* racist *cough*
text: I wanted to create a Spanish account and was asked to share personal data (including my nationality) and was asked to download the app to only find out that I am not eligible for the bank account.,I have an EU passport, UK settled status, UK driving license, Spanish social security number and NIE.,I am shocked that I could not open an account with this 'future of banking' app. It feels like only some 'correct' and 'right' nationalities are supported which is total nonsense - if it's EU supported, it's EU supported. Lithuanian passports are up with the most secure international documents as well as UK driving license is.,On top of all this the technology makes no sense if it makes you to waste time fill in all the personal data and then tells you, 'sorry you can't use me'. When i spoke to customer service they couldn't even find my account and said that I do not exist as a customer,I hope all my personal data is handled well and will be deleted immediately as per new GDPR regulations.,P.S. customer service representative was very helpful and apologetic, it's unfair to put your employees in such situations.
company_reply: Hey Rokas,,We regret to learn you feel this way. As a bank, we need to know who you are. That’s why you have to prove your identity with a supported passport or ID card. At this time your documents are not supported for verification. We cannot accept all Passports nor National ID cards. This may be due to the lack of security features that appear on some documents or that the document is not accepted for verification at this time. We are constantly seeking to add documents to our verification list of supported documents. You can check via this link if your document is supported: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/account/how-to-prove-my-identity,You can send us an email or contact us via our live chat support so we can delete your sign up attempt. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Good service
text: Good service, its a perfect system that cares about your money, very high technology and easy.

title: Account closing without no reason
text: One day, out of nowhere, you will receive an email that we are terminating your account without any reasons. Customer support has no real human, all are handled by bots, so no real help. bots keep on repeating the same line.,And if you think I did something. So, they are terminating my account, it's wrong, I know more than 10 people who account has been terminated on the same day with the same email. I am pretty sure this reply is also from bot.
company_reply: Hi Andrew,,As a licensed bank, we are obliged to abide by European banking processes. This means we must carry out regular checks on user accounts and transactions. Sometimes, the result of these checks mean that we must end our business relationship with you. In the event this happens, we aim to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of the decision we have made.,When you are connected to a customer support agent, you are speaking with a human in live-time rather than a bot. As these checks are carried out by a dedicated internal department, customer support are unable to advise further on the topic for this reason. We kindly ask you to reply to the email you would have received from us with any questions you may have.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Bank of the Future
text: I have had this bank for just over a year now. It has changed the way I do my shopping, both locally and online. Because it is originally a German bank, it works with a lot of international products and services that my native (Dutch) banks don't generally support.,Overall a great, simple bank with a very good totally free service without hidden fees, and great options for a more premium experience, if that is what you desire.

title: Disappointing
text: Disappointing ,- Lots of hidden fees (new card 6€, of course, a cheap poor quality card will break at some point - others bank issue a second card for free),- 3 € for a return debt (my home bank where I get my sallary charges only 0,68 €),- Once a SEPA is done you can't cancel it, even if it is a few minutes after it is done. Again, my home bank would do it in a few minutes without any hassle. ,- No real customer service. Agents have no clue what they are doing and most understand nothing about banking ,For a second account great. Never as a main bank account. It is an account to play with, not to suit your daily needs.
company_reply: HI Bruno, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. ,Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise where we need to improve, so we appreciate this. ,Best,,Your N26 support team.

title: Money blocked for crypto, they won't give money back
text: Hi,,This is a warning for people wanting to open an account with N26.,I am Pol Smith. My N26 Credit Card ID is XXX,My IBAN is XXX,My date of birth XXX ,(information removed due to N26 security issues),My account has been cancelled in an extremely unfair way. I don't know exactly why N26 decided my account to be cancelled, but I think it must be due to having transferred funds to Coinbase (cryptocurrencies exchange), which was the last wire transfer I tried to do. This transfer was intended to do on 15.05.2019 for the amount of 1,366.27 EUR, and it bounced back the same day. 2 days later, on 17.05.2019, my N26 bank account was blocked and I haven't had access to my money since then.,N26 says they run a "routine check" on accounts to "keep accounts secure". However, they never end the "investigation" while they keeping the money unaccessible on the account.,In any case - according to this Cancellation Email, my account will remain functional up until 31.05.2019, so I should move my full balance before that. Here is an extract from this email:,---,This termination is effective as of: ,31.05.2019 ,Your account remains functional until the stated date. After termination, usage of the account, the app, as well as the card issued with it, is no longer possible. ,We would like to make sure your remaining funds get transfered to you. ,Please transfer your funds to an alternative bank account before the date of termination. ,---,Contrary to what the Cancellation Email says, my N26 account and my N26 credit card have not been functional since then, and therefore I haven't been able to withdraw nor use or transfer my money out of the N26 account.,After having told this issue to N26 several times by email, live chat, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, now N26 are not doing anything in order to give me my money back. They don't let me transfer my money out, the credit card and the account are totally blocked (note it's note 31.05.2019 yet) and N26 email support is not transferring my funds to an alternative bank account even though I sent them the IBAN, BIC and an official proof for my alternative bank account to be mine. I sent these document 7 days ago and about 5 times since then, and still no reply.,Live chat has told me my account is "under investigation" and "being worked on by the appropriate department". However, there is no estimated date, days pass by and there is no estimated day, not even an email or update.,I followed the steps mentioned on the page "How to file a Complaint" from N26 website, but that doesn't seem to make N26 really work on my case or resolve the case either.,N26 say "we must close an account after these checks have been completed". In reality, what N26 does is not answering any emails and keep saying they are "investigating my case". Seems this "investigation process" will never end.,N26 say they are "regulated and licensed bank, we are obliged to adhere to European banking processes. We don't close accounts without a good reason". However, real and non-fraudulent banks don't cancel accounts for trying to make a transfer to a cryptocurrency exchange like Coinbase, like it happened to me. ,N26: is trying to make a transfer to Coinbase a really good reason for which a bank should cancel and block all access to the money from a user, not letting the customer transfer it out?,N26 says "We endeavour to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision". However, in reality they have no phone number to contact, they don't reply emails and by live chat they just say to have "no further information" and just close the chat. Whenever I messaged N26 that this was very urgent as I needed my full balance (2,366.27 EUR) in my account as soon as possible, they either didn't reply or said I should wait to get an email (which never arrives).,I think the only way to make N26 reply to me might be writing this review (at least, I might get an automated reply as they do with all Trustpilot reviews). Or better, maybe the only and "real" solution to get money back might be contacting Ombudsmand, Bafin, etc.,EDIT #1: N26 did reply to this review. According to their reply, I removed sensitive information (Credit card Id,  IBAN and date of birth) of my N26 account in this review. They also mentioned they cant provide further information in here. However, they are not providing information on any channel either,  since I am not being answered by email either.,EDIT #2: (27.05.2019) I just received an email from N26 with the following text:,---,Hey Pol,,Thanks for getting in touch!,I can confirm that we have received your document with your bank details and we already have a dedicated Team handling it now. We will contact you as soon as we have completed this process.,We will try to be as brief as possible, we appreciate your patience.,---,EDIT #3 (28.05.2019) I just received an email from N26 with the following text:,---,Dear Pol, ,Thank you for your emails. ,Please be assured we continue to work on your case. ,As this is a complicated and complex process, it will take time for us to resolve. ,Nevertheless, we have requested this case to be prioritised and will update you as soon as we have more information. ,I sincerely appreciate your continued patience. We will be in touch again soon. ,Kindest Regards,,N26 Complaints Management,---,EDIT #4 (31.05.2019),My account has been fully cancelled. I cannot log into my account anymore, it says "Bad Credentials" now.,I still haven't received a reply from N26 by email.,Live chat says they have "no further information". They cannot even tell me who should I contact or if my case is being worked on: they just close the chat.,I sent another email to N26 (I already sent Support, VIP and Complaints department team about 20 emails).,---,I will keep updating this review until I receive my money back
company_reply: Hi Pol,,We kindly ask that you remove the sensitive account and card information that you have included in your review, in the interest of security. This review is publicly viewable and it is not secure to include details such as these in your post.,We understand the concern you have for the status of your account and the remaining funds, but we are unable to discuss sensitive information relating to your N26 account via this platform.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Trust the negative reviews
text: If you’re reading this please don’t open an account with them. It’s true that the app is beautiful and making an account is (way too) easy. But it just happened to me like so many other people here that they cancelled my account for no reason. No answering to my emails, no answers on the chat, no numbers to call. I had a black account where I bought things that I could get insurance for and now I can’t get an extra insurance because too much time passed since the moment of buying them. DO NOT GET AN ACCOUNT. Consider yourselves warned, they don’t care about any of their clients (and I had a black account, so not even the paying ones)
company_reply: Hi Valentin,,N26 is obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts and transactions. We follow these processes to ensure that our user accounts are kept secure. In some cases, we must close an account after these checks have been completed. ,As a regulated and licensed bank, we are obliged to adhere to European banking processes. We don't close accounts without a good reason, and we do our best to prevent bad situations for the people affected. We endeavour to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision.,We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We hope this can be resolved for you in a timely manner.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: nightmare bank, with glossy tech look
text: They just block your account and are not able to give you any reason.,Trying to get my money back but this seems to be a hard job. Customer service is not able to help and email correspondence is one way traffic, they don’t answer.....,Avoid this bank if you can, theoretically everything is great, in practice it is a nightmare, ,Ps now we are 2 more weeks ahead, still no response on email, no money returned NOTHING ,They are very fast to respond on trustpilot with standard phrases, meaning nothing and just sentences from the Textbook of diplomacy.....
company_reply: Hi Cornelis,,We apologise for any inconvenience that you have faced in relation to our decision to close your account. ,In accordance with European banking processes, we are obliged to carry out routine checks on accounts. Sometimes, the result of these checks show that an account must be closed.  An account is never blocked for no reason, and we aim to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision and to advise you on the next steps.,We understand the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We kindly ask that you respond to the email you would have received from us with any queries you may have.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: GENERAL REVIEW
text: Registration and opening of account was a bit difficult. Some of "identification experts" are arrogant, but there are polite ones too. I would recommend that they have some kind of identification in front of them (number or a name) so that we can send a feedback about their performance. I tried to use CASH26 option to deposit some cash on my account in one of DM stores in Germany. Salesman had no idea what I am talking about. I presume that it takes a bit of time until all N26 partners are accustomed to this. I contacted a support service ones and I was satisfied with informations they provided for me. Overall, I would say that this bank is promising. However, there is a space for improvement.

title: The best bank ever

title: Deleted my account without give me a…
text: Deleted my account without give me a reason.
company_reply: Hi Eric,,Since N26 is a full-fledged banking institution, holding a European banking license since 2016, we must carry out regular routine checks on accounts. In some cases, these checks will indicate that the account must be closed. An account is never blocked for no reason, and we aim to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision and advise you on the next steps.,We apologise for any disappointment caused.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: N26 are FRAUDS!
text: N26 has withheld my student loan for the past month with no good reasonsing! I have informed them and provided them with multiple screen shots and pdf file bank statements showing clearly that the money in question was received from Student Finance England, they have continued to have extremely poor response times and when they do respond, give no progress update, but say your documents are under review. Realistically how long does it take to read a bank statement, definitely not 1 month.,This bank is a FRAUD!,They have left me without any funds to pay my rent at university, making me have to rely on my parents for basic living expenses, even though there is an allocated amount of funds set aside for me by the government to live, but n26 think they should have the money. ,I have reported them to the Financial Ombudsman as my parents cannot give me money forever and I am a student living far from home with no financial stability as n26 has confiscated it from me.,I just want my student loan back
company_reply: Hi William,,As a registered and licensed bank, holding a European banking license since 2016, we must abide by European banking processes when it comes to user accounts. Due to this, routine compliance checks are carried out on user accounts and transactions. The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. In some cases, we may require proof of origin for a transaction, and we are obliged to request this. We endeavour to contact you immediately, in the interest of resolving the issue in a timely manner. We apologise if this has not happened in your case.,In the interest of account security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through this channel. We hope that this can be resolved for you soon, and we will continue this correspondence via email.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: A new banking solution
text: I like to solution to banking. They have a simple to use app and most things can be solved by customer service who do want to listen to you. There are a few things which they need to add to the service to get a higher rating and make them easier, which I have ben told baby customer service are coming:,1) Saving the payment data and the reference - for regular payments it is a problem to keep putting in bank info. You want to be able to save it and then make the payment. Especially if this is a regular payment, such as a credit card or rent payment, which are typically larger value payments. I often send a small amount and then a larger amount once I know the funds have been received. It can be quite scary not being able to do this.,2) Payments to large corporates - It would be good when making a transfer if the large corporate information could be searched so you don't have to go and put it in yourself. some banks have this info and I'm sure N26 could get that as well.,3) Statements - a facility to get monthly statements emailed would be helpful as again I cant see how that can be done. This is important as bank statements become a proof of address as well.,I believe this service is still new but the banking is very good and easy to setup and use. I recommend this to everyone but believe it will be much better once the above are done.

title: Great bank if you value speed and simplicity
text: Great bank if you value the philosophy that secure banking does not have to mean annoying-to-use  and slow banking. The web interface, as well as the app are clean, simple and easy to use. No ridiculously annoying procedures with little extra calculators you have to carry around. Biometrics is enough! No intervention of the bank needed for every little thing. International transfers are done and handled the same as local transfers and take 24h at the most within the SEPA domain.,Support staff is easy and fast to reach through the chat function, but they can be a bit impatient sometimes and don't let you finish your question. Better type up your question before and then cut& past it in the chat window.,I would recommend this bank to anybody living somewhere in the European Union and moves around a lot. No permanent residence address needed, just a valid passport or EU ID card.

title: Good until I had an issue with a transaction
text: Had so far a great experience with them; very easy and fast account opening process. The MasterCard arrived two days later. Account and card do what they are meant to do and their App design and functionality are fab. Sadly, I ran into a spot of trouble with them, when I asked for a direct debit to be reversed. The original message was, that I should see the funds back, “shortly”, then four days later it was within “the next 48 hours”. This did not happen either, and now the communication around the re-credit has become rather elusive. “Real soon” is the best I get. Given that I was so happy with them, this is rather disappointing: As a bank and financial institution their communicated timelines need to be dependable, as I am making representations on the back of those. As always in finance there are repercussions, if I need to backtrack on my promises.,Checking the news, though, it appears, that I am not the only one with this concern as the German BaFin appears to have unearthed similar issues. ,Hopefully they manage to improve around this area, as I can otherwise recommend N26.

Goodluck
company_reply: Hi Helder,,Thank you for your feedback.,There is a monthly fee of £14.90 for our premium metal account which is listed upon signing up for your account, if you choose to opt for premium. In accordance with the terms and conditions of our metal account, there is a 30-day revocation period in which a customer is free to revoke their premium account without incurring any charge from us. Once this 30 day period has passed, the remainder of the contract which was agreed upon must be completed. The choice we give all customers is either to utilise the metal account and its benefits for the period of the contract, or to cancel your account and pay the remainder of the agreed fees for the remaining period.,We are sorry to hear that the delivery of your card was delayed, and we hope you have had no issue with the card since. Please reach out to us if there are any further issues.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

Takes few minutes. ,(+) Blocking cards and restricting use in foreign/domestic stores is a very helpful feature. ,(+) Spaces (along with main account) helps keep savings away from unwanted expenditure.,(+) Instant transfer between N26 accounts. ,(-) Over draft feature does not work for most cases. ,(-) Not sure if you can apply for loan or even receive loans. ,(-) Limits on free ATM withdrawal is very less(2 for most).
company_reply: Hey Biplab,,Thank you for your feedback! We're so glad to hear you have enjoyed your banking experience with us thus far.,At the moment, our overdraft application is an automated process. The app will assess a variety of points to qualify your eligibility, including your credit score and whether N26 is your main account or not. If you are not eligible right now, you can always apply again if your financial circumstances have changed at all.,N26 being your main account is also very important for your limit on ATM withdrawals. It is possible to receive up to 5 free withdrawals per month in Germany with a few factors being included. You can see more about this on our support center: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/fees/how-often-can-i-withdraw-cash-for-free,If you have set up your N26 account in Germany, you can apply for a loan in the "Credit" tab of your mobile app.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Avoid N26

As I should have done myself but was hooked in with the modern marketing.,Like others have experienced, notification of account closure was given without reason after the source of a transaction was required to be proven. This business has no future even if Valentin Stalf believe's otherwise. As a business owner myself, the customer care & communication is everything.

We are obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. Sometimes, the result of these checks show that an account must be closed. In the event this happens, we endeavour to contact you to advise you of the decision with 48 hours.,We apologise for any inconvenience or stress that this decision may have caused you. In the interest of account security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through this channel. We will continue this correspondence through your registered email address.,Best Regards, ,Your N26 Support Team

These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. As a result, we may ask you to verify the origin or source of your funds. If you receive such a request, just send the requested documents via email. There are no exceptions or bypasses for such checks. You will be contacted by email. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Absolute joke of a Bank, do not recommend!
text: Been using N26 for about a year now as a bills account. I make monthly transfers from my personal account on a once or twice monthly basis, never gone over 10 transactions a month.,This month is where N26 has really let me down; I'm moving in with the other half, and we both transferred deposit and first month payment into the account (10th May) totalling £1000 into the account. My payment went through fine, and the other half's not so lucky.,My account has been in review since with the other halfs payment missing from the account completely. We are supposed to be moving in this Friday (17th May), but with no signs of the money being in the account this has caused a lot of stress between us.,I contacted customer services on Saturday (11th May) who informed me the money would be in by Monday (13th May) - didn't happen. Contacted customer services on Tuesday (14th May) Where I was told my account is under investigation and couldn't provide further details.,When this is resolved, I have no doubts at all I'll be closing the account, and won't look back. No sense of urgency in resolving my account issue.,EDIT #1: N26 emailed me 2 mins after posting this review (11:47am), asking to provide addition information. I responded with additional information at 12:01pm. Still no sign of Friday nights transfer within my account after providing screenshots of the transaction from each account - now being asked of proof we're moving house. To which I've provided a screenshot of our application and an email between me and my estate agents confirming contact/move in is on the 17th May. Was this needed, even after providing proof of where the money came from? Eagerly awaiting a further response.,EDIT #2: N26 emailed to confirm they've sent the information over the the relative department (1:44PM) - Still missing payment from the other half, from Friday 10th. The closer it gets to Friday 17th the more stress we are feeling, all from an issue many others have previously talked about. Surely a phone call about this matter would have been far more sufficient if the case is this critical - alike a regular bank?,EDIT #3: N26 emailed again (2:57PM) saying they have completed 'routine checks' and everything should be back as normal. But the payment from the other half is still missing. Very disappointing so far, The response time has defiantly increased since leaving a negative review, yet the underlying problem has yet been resolved - and shouldn't take a bad review to jump on a problem.,EDIT #4: As end of the day draws near (4:15pm), I contacted customer support via the live chat asking if I could have further clarification on where my money was. To be honest the support agent was probably the most helpful agent so far - by providing me with the complaints email and advised the case had in fact not been completed - even after saying I could use my account as normal.,EDIT #5: 5:15pm now, with no further correspondence, or notice when we will receive our money. Formal complaint has been sent to the complaints address now.,EDIT #6: Sent another email as its now the last day until me and the other half move in together (16th at 9:45am), Still missing a £400 payment - Not acceptable.,EDIT #7: We've received a letter from Lloyds Bank (the other half's bank) as they have also investigated and tracked the payment  Confirming N26 have the funds, I've provided everything required and N26 has confirmed everything has been sorted with my account. So, Where is our money? Can't believe it's quicker to investigate and track down the payment rather N26 Just release our money...,EDIT #8: This is getting very long winded, I've had to leave work early due to the stress of moving tomorrow with no money in my account. Are N26 going to cover my losses for today? Doubtful. We are so stresses and is causing tension between me and the other half. Was told via live chat the money could have been refunded - REFUNDED? Imagine if i just sold my car to someone, and the had a car and their money back - you simply can't do that?! I highly suggest N26 give us our money now, a call would be nice about now explaining whats going on.,EDIT #9 (Conclusion): I Finally received my money back on Thursday 16th May at around 4pm. The sheer stress this has caused is beyond belief. I'm still without an explanation and formal apology for the whole fiasco. Will be tying the account up and closing the account in the coming few days.,To be completely honest, N26 does have potential, the app is easy to use and the interface is good, just a shame about customer experience is abysmal.
company_reply: Hi Brandon,,In accordance with certain European banking processes, we are legally obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts and transactions. In the event we require proof of the origin of a transaction, we endeavour to reach out to the affected customer as soon as possible, so as to not delay the process.,It is possible in some cases that a transfer may also fail for a number of reasons. In the event this happens, only the sending bank can track the funds. They need to do this through an official Payment Investigation rather than a Transfer Confirmation, as this will only prove that the transaction has left the sending account, rather than tracking its precise whereabouts. In the event an official Payment Investigation is carried out and states that the funds are with N26, we encourage you email it to us to be reviewed.,We would like to apologise for any stress this situation has put you under. For security reasons, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through this channel. We hope that this can be resolved in a timely manner, and will continue this correspondence via your registered email address.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Try N26 for a secure online banking service
text: I never actually trusted online banking services until I came across an advertisement of an ongoing promo of N26 in an a fitness app I am using. I decided to give it a shot and trust me, I am more than satisfied with the services provided by N26. I have absolute control of my bank account; I can do anything from sending and receiving funds to deactivating and reactivating my debit card on the N26 android app on my phone without bothering to go to the bank. title: Very bad.
text: Very bad.,I opened an account with N26 about 6 months ago, than after 2 months I received an e-mail from them saying that the account was closed because of a substantial violation of the terms and conditions. Very funny because I had not used the card at all and never paid any money in it.,What violation? Because the card had not been used for 2 months?,Or something bad happened with my account without my knowledge and you guys did not want to say it to avoid being talked about.,I replied the e-mail asking for more details of what happened, but never got any response, so very poor customer service.,This is the e-mail I received:,To ensure our customers’ privacy and account safety , we are obliged to run routine checks on accounts and transactions.,Unfortunately, we recently identified a substantial violation of our terms and conditions agreement. ,Section A14.2 of our Terms and Conditions for Banking - UK* states that we reserve the right to terminate user accounts without prior notice in cases of a substantial violation. Accordingly, we are required to terminate your N26 account. This termination is effective immediately.,Usage of the account, the app, as well as the card issued with it, is no longer possible.,Thank you for your understanding.,Kind regards,,N26 Bank GmbH
company_reply: Hi Alessandro,,Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.,In accordance with certain European banking processes, we are obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts and transactions. If the result of these checks shows that your account with us must be closed, we endeavour to contact you via email within 48 hours informing you of our decision, for example with the above email you have attached. ,This process is carried out by a dedicated internal department, and for this reason, our customer support team are unable to advise further on these situations via alternative communication channels.,We apologise for any disappointment caused.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Unbelievably bad customer support
text: Unbelievably bad customer support. Their app wouldn't send me a pairing code (without which you cannot approve any transfers) and customer service REPEATEDLY told me that they could only provide a code over the phone THEN NEVER CALLED. What a wonderful bank that doesn't allow you access to YOUR OWN MONEY.
company_reply: Hi Lion,,Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. This assists us greatly in process development and improvement for the future.,As security is our main priority, we abide by strict verification processes to ensure that your account is kept safe and secure. We have found that, in the interest of account security, providing pairing codes via a phone call once you have been fully verified is the most secure way to pair and unpair the device which grants you full access to your account. We wish to be absolutely sure that we are speaking with the account holder, and a phone call is one of the safest ways to do so. We endeavour to call you within 30 minutes of your request, and we apologise if this has not happened for you on this occasion. ,We will pass your feedback on internally, and we encourage you to email ideas@n26.com with any improvement suggestions that you may have.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: HIDING BEHIND THE LAW. CLEAR EMAIL SEND US YOUR ACOOUNT
text: I know that many out there are judgemental and quick to find fault but what I want anyone reading to do is to focus on the facts below,,N26 has not given a reason for their actions on my account since April 9th - May14th which is 35days.,On April 26th N26 emailed to request for a bank account to transfer my funds. In 15mins replied with authentic documents and bank card photo. which they claimed I should have sent to support and not replied to the email requesting this document. This was May1st,Between May 1-3rd I got confirmation after a online chat that the appropriate department has been forwarded my documents and I will hear from them in 1-2days. Today is May 14th and still no transfer of funds or positive communication.,WHATEVER N26 REASONS ARE, THEY HAVE MADE A DECISION TO SEND MY MONEY. SO WHY GIVE ME A RUN AROUND?,Below are some emails received,    ,Hey Andrew,,Thanks for getting in touch!,Please correspond directly with the email you have received, I am very sorry Customer Service has no information for you at this time.,Have a great day,,Philip,N26 Customer Service ,N26 Bank GmbH | Managing Directors: Markus Gunter, Richard Groeneveld ,Klosterstraße 62 | 10179 Berlin | Germany ,HRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg) | VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096,==============,Hey  Andrew, ,Thanks for your email and for the documents you provided; we forwarded them to the dept. in charge for your folder.,We will come back to you as soon as possible.,Have a nice day, ,N26 Bank GmbH ,Managing Directors: Markus Gunter, Matthias Oetken ,Klosterstraße 62 | 10179 Berlin | Germany ,HRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg) | VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096.,--------------- Original Message ---------------,From,Sent 01.05.2019 11:17,To,Subject: FW: 04908925,  ,From:,Sent: 01 May 2019 09:19,Subject: RE: 04908925, ,Hello,, ,I submitted a bank verified copy of my Nationwide bank statement as requested in less than 15mins of receiving your email requesting that I provide you with this documentation. Note that your N26 bank has previously credited this same account which bears my name, so practically and legally there should be no cause for delay., ,Today is 1st of May which means that any transaction thresholds limiting my/your ability to make transactions is over and I can make transactions in accordance with your terms and conditions., ,I would like to state that as a financial institution in a customer facing industry you have failed to provide any details whatsoever regarding the restrictions placed on my account. So how can I address any dispute or issues arising?, ,I would be forced to take FURTHER STEPS INCLUDING LEGAL ACTION and compensation if you fail to address this issue of releasing my funds promptly., ,Regards,Andrew, ,Sent from Mail for WindoSent: Friday, April 26, 2019 9:1,Subject: 04908925, ,Hey Andrew,,In order to be able to transfer the remaining funds from your N26 account, we kindly ask you to send us an official bank statement of the desired recipient account, with the following information clearly visible:,* Beneficiary Name (name of the account holder),* Account number,* Sort code,Please note that this account should be in your name.,Thank you for your cooperation.,Kind regards,,Your N26 Team,N26 Bank GmbH | Managing Directors: Markus Gunter, Matthias Oetken,Klosterstraße 62 | 10179 Berlin | Germany,HRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg) | VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096. ,ref:_00D24H3gm._5001o3RnyAL:ref,AFTER THE EMAIL AND TRUST PILOT REVIEW,I am glad to comment the utter rudeness from the customer service personnel was not continued.,However, THIS ISSUE HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH EUROPEAN LAW.,YOU INFORMED CUSTOMER THAT ROUTINE CHECKS WERE BEING CONDUCTED ON ACCOUNT from April 9th. ,You N26 said expect email from us.,N26 did not send email until April 26th,The EMAIL CLEARLY STATED PLEASE PROVIDE AN ACCOUNT IN YOUR NAME FOR US TO TRANSFER YOUR FUNDS.,A decision has been made. WHY HIDE UNDER THE PRETEXT OF ROUTINE CHECKS. WHO DOES ROUTINE CHECKS FOR 35DAYS OR AFTER SAYING WE WANT TO TRANSFER YOUR FUNDS????? WHO? ,I WANT MY MONEY AND NOTHING MORE BUT I WILL GO TWITTER AND FACEBOOK NEXT.,LET THE WORLD KNOW HOW YOU TRULY THREAT YOUR CUSTOMERS.
company_reply: Hi Andrew,,Thank you for taking the time to leave your review.,We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you, and that this process has. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. ,We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We will continue this correspondence via your registered email address.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: The is the most simple mobile bank I…
text: The is the most simple mobile bank I have ever used. ,The customer service answers quickly and is very friendly. ,I love the Spaces feature - I am able to put money aside without creating another account or withdraw it.,There are few things to improve though: ,1) It is so irritating that when my fingerprint login doesn't work anymore, but it wants to get the password, I have to go to the settings to confirm AGAIN that I want to use my finger print. Why doesn't the app can learn that? Why the system resets my settings? Isn't this against "usability rules" which says that the user should have control over his/her options/ways of using the system?,2) When I change the category for e.g. Vodafone which is recurrent expense and is taken automatically from my account, the app doesn't learn the new category, but I have the change the category every single time - every month. This is not difficult to implement. It is just couple of rows of code. I think this feature affect on the expenses pie chart also, and that way it has quite big impact on the system. The user needs to make unnecessary acts to keep the expenses pie chart up-to-date, even though it is easy to automise.,3) On website, I have to go to my profile to be able to logout. Why there is no logout possibility in the main navigation / every page. This is against commonly know place to find logout functionality (which preferably should be followed in UX design). It took me a while to find a way to logout and caused frustration. ,But all in all, this is the best solution/system _in Germany_, but not Europe. Take a look of the solution of the Nordic web banks. Don't copy, but e.g. Danske Bank and Nordea have good features, solutions for many of above problems.

company_reply: Hi Lisa,,Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We regret to learn that your experience with us thus far has not been a positive one.,It appears that you have opted for a premium account with us, which does have a monthly fee of 14,90 GBP. The contract for our premium offerings last for a year, although we offer a 30 day revocation period with the UK in which you can revert to a standard account for free if you decide our Metal account is not for you. You can access live chat in your mobile app via My Account > Help > Support Chat, or via a desktop on our web app at https://app.n26.com/login,Live chat is available in the UK from Monday - Saturday from 8am until 9pm.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Easy online banking AND in English (for non-native speakers)
text: I set up my N26 account when arriving in Germany a little over two years ago. The process was relatively simple and all the security checks were done online and via a video call. In comparison, to be a co-signatory on a bank account with Berliner Volksbank, I had two or three trips to the bank, plus a few phone calls. I'm told that setting up a bank account in Germany is pretty painful, and this definitely wasn't the case with N26.,I'm a Black card customer, mostly because of the travel insurances that come with this which means I don't have to think about this when I go to visit friends back in the UK. I enquired about the Metal card because I saw that it had airport lounge benefits. It wasn't so easy to find out the precise details, first via the website, then via customer support, and then being told to call the airport Lounge partner. The end result was that there is a small discount to using airport Lounges (I can't remember exactly now, but it was either 24€ or 28€), and this doesn't really make it worth it for me.,The online interface is pretty intuitive and easy to use. It's a bit frustrating that if I use my computer with a web browser, I still have to authenticate all transactions on my mobile phone, but I assume this is necessary additional security. Again, in comparison, it's a lot easier than Berliner Volksbank.,The "winning feature" though as a non-native German living in Germany is that I can do my banking, including customer support, etc, all in English. This would be less daunting now that I've lived here for two years, but I wouldn't have wanted to deal with that on Day 1 in Germany.

If you have a premium account, it most likely is a twelve-month contract. You will then be asked to pay the remaining fees.,You can find out more information on the following page of our Support Center: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/fixing-an-issue/account/how-to-close-my-account,Best regards,,Your N26 Support Team

company_reply: Hi Lenka,,Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We apologise if you have experienced any inconvenience as a result of the ATM fee you were charged.,We do offer a set amount of free ATM withdrawals per month depending on your location, and once you have availed of all of these free withdrawals, you will be charged 2 EUR per ATM transaction. In the event you have been charged a fee greater than this, this would be a private ATM fee which, sadly, we have no control over, and cannot reject or reverse them, as they are not related to N26 in any way. These are fees which have been decided on by the ATM provider rather than by N26, and they must be clearly listed upon making your withdrawal. To avoid fees such as these, we recommend using our ATM map which can be accessed from within our mobile app, or by only using official bank ATMs where possible.,You can see more in relation to ATM fees via our support center: https://support.n26.com/en-es/fixing-an-issue/cash/why-was-i-charged-an-atm-fee,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: WARNING DO NOT BOTHER WITH THIS COMPANY
text: I read the reviews before opening the account, I went against my better judgement as I thought I would give them a chance.,I put money into my N26 account (only £100, transferred from my Barclays account) and within 24 hours they had frozen my account for 'routine compliance checks',Customer service say they cannot give any information about how long this will be and I cannot access my funds.,PLEASE HEED THIS ADVICE AND DO NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES OPEN AN ACCOUNT WITH N26 THEY ARE THE WORST BANK I HAVE EVER COME ACROSS THEY WILL JUST FREEZE YOUR MONEY FOR ABSOLUTELY NO REASON!!!,EDIT: I can see they have replied below saying that "an account is never blocked for no reason".,This is completely untrue because they have blocked my money for no reason! All I did was transfer £100 pounds from my main current account after I got my wages from my employer and they next thing they have blocked the account.,It has now been 5 days since I replied to their email and still no answer whatsoever, my money is still frozen even though their email states that their checks only take a day!,AS I SAID PREVIOUSLY, BEFORE YOU OPEN AN ACCOUNT WITH N26 PLEASE READ THIS REVIEW AND AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE!!!,IF YOU ARE WANTING A MOBILE BANK OPEN A MONZO ACCOUNT I HAVE HAD ONE FOR A LONG TIME AND NEVER ONCE HAD IT BLOCKED!
company_reply: Hi Jack,,Thank you for taking the time to leave this feedback. ,In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine compliance checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. In some cases, we must close an account after these checks have been completed. An account is never blocked for no reason, and our Customer Service agents do not have information on this subject, as it is processed by another dedicated department, and further information is provided to you exclusively via email. We kindly ask that you respond to the email you will receive from us with any further queries or concerns that you may have about your account.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

text: It's great having a metal card, ran into a few key issue with this card... first of all the app is really quite Buggy, they also make you reset your face ID on your phone and if you travel abroad, don't get me started. ,Most importantly if you aren't happy with it, they make it really painful for you to leave, they charge you a full year worth of fee's before you are allowed to leave. ,All in all really disappointing.
company_reply: Hey Chuck,,Thank you for your feedback. This will assist us greatly in improving our processes and services for the future.,In the interest of account safety and security, we will ask our customers to reset Face/Touch ID every 30 days. In relation to travelling abroad, our card is accepted worldwide with any merchant which accepts Mastercard. To enable payments in a foreign country, you must go to your mobile app via My Account > Card Settings > Payments Abroad, and there should be no issue with making transactions. In the event you run into an issue when making a transaction, you can contact us from within our mobile app via My Account > Help > Support Chat.,We grant a 30 day revocation period when you have opted for a premium Metal or Black account with us. If you decide the account is not for you within that time, you can revert to a free account without charge. Once this 30 day period has passed, it is not possible to revert to a different account without paying the agreed upon fees for the remainder of the contract. ,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Really bad customer service
text: I am really disappointed with N26, I used it for my trip in South America. And one day I woke up someone did two transactions In India for 240€. I really don’t understand the security process of N26, how can I be in Equador one day and some few hours later in India. There should be a way where when you enter a new country the N26 ask for confirmation instead of just giving away money to Stranger especially India as there is a lot of bank fraud going there. The person was able to withdraw money in a ATM without my physical card witch should not be allowed or it should be a fonction that you can allow in N26. ,But what I am the most angry about is when I contacted an agent for help he was really unhelpful and could not understand my situation.  All he said to me was you have to cancel your card, I tried to explain that I was in South America and needed money but he kept repeating the same, and avoiding my question about security. ,In the end I really don’t think that this bank is safe it’s fun because they give you the choice to control your paramètre but it’s seriously missing security features. They add some stuff but forget the most important no one should be able to withdraw money from an ATM without a physical card or it should be linked first with security measure.
company_reply: Hey Daxane,,We apologise for the inconvenience.,You can read more about the act of card skimming by reading this N26 Mag article: https://mag.n26.com/what-is-a-an-atm-skimmer-how-to-protect-your-bank-account-when-withdrawing-cash-e9447e24b809,If you don’t recognise a transaction or you’re sure you didn’t authorise it, blocking your card won’t be enough. We will send you a chargeback form so you can dispute the fraudulent transaction.,You can read more about this here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/cards/how-to-get-my-money-back-in-case-of-fraud,Best regards,,Your N26 Support Team
