title: Dont bother trying to get n26 to help with unauthorised transactions
text: I have so far been very satisfied with n26. I joined just under 2 years ago.,Then on my card recently i had 2 unauthorised transactions. After having about 4 conversations with different agents explaining myself again and again (i dont think they leave notes anywhere on the acvoubt).. a few weeks later they tell me i need to fill a form out. Not an online form. Old school style..print it off..fill it in and sign it and then email it back. After a week they ask me AGAIN for the same information i gave 4 times on the chat. I replied. Then its just again the same questions per email. The chargeback amount is small so i told them to forget it. This is just not worth my time going back and forth having to have 10 different conversations repeating myself over and over again. They make this process very complex and comletely put me off trying to grt my money back. Anyway their reply was simply 'As per your request I have cancelled your chargeback request,'. Couldnt believe it. No acknowledgement that i told them i dont have time to waste on their over complex process where they make you go back and forth a million times. Maybe they just couldnt be bothered helping one of their customers. My normal bank does it better!
company_reply: Hi Shahin,,Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. Feedback such as this is incredibly important for us to improve our processes and services for the future.,We're sorry to learn that the chargeback dispute did not go smoothly for you on this occasion. For future reference, it is not completely necessary for the required chargeback dispute form to be printed out. It can simply be filled in on your computer, signed electronically, and then sent back to us, where it will then be sent to our dedicated specialists to be taken care of. Once you contact us from your registered email address, each correspondence will be recorded to your N26 account so that it can be accessed if you are connected with a different agent, so that they can assist you with your query. We do apologise that this did not happen in relation to your case.,Obviously the communication you have received on this topic is not of the standard you had expected from us, and this is not the type of service we endeavour to provide to our customers. Again, we thank you for the valuable feedback that you have provided us with.,Best Regards,,Your N26 Support Team

text: Amazing service!,Very safe with the option to enable or not services like ATM withdrawal, online payment, etc,Very efficient with a chat to talk to the support team if needed to solve an issue fast.,Good insurance (I already used them for a delayed flight and the service was spot on),*** UPDATE FROM MY PREVIOUS REVIEW ***,The service of N26 went downhill since my last review. I always spend so much time with the chat support trying to unblock it. Sometimes it works, most of the time it doesn't. It gets very frustrating. The card already has features to protect from fraud so i don't understand why there are so many security triggers.,Imagine when you arrive in a country with no possibility to use your credit card to pay or withdraw. title: AVOID Banking equivalent to a tinder date with a Stalker
text: Foolishly responded to free account link on an Instagram add that opened a ‘Free’ N26 account. ,During sign up I was shown the shinny metal card as a card option......so selected the shinny thing .... a few screens later my free account was now £14.50 month, with sketchy details of benefits (lounge access sounded nice but lounge key had zero details online), so I stepped back and instead selected basic card and opened the free version of the account.  ,I received no emails or other correspondence and no card arrived basic or otherwise.,Months later N26 long since forgotten a shinny metal card arrives to my home..,Ok so I guess no one was willing to pay £14.50 for nothing and now everyone gets the metal one......still no such thing as free so I did some research and saw that others had experienced this..... key callout was make sure it’s inactive in the App,So I launched the N26 app and saw that Metal account was indeed active, so I immediately deactivated it.,So to be clear I did not order the metal card and then cancelled the card account I did not as soon as unordered card was unexpectedly received.,Now months later I logged into app because it showed a notifications.... since the card and account was inactive I was curious at the notifications, so sought to read them before deleting them. ,They advised that I owed 2 x £14.50 to N26.....for the unordered card that was cancelled,So I used chat to get in touch....only available means for this bank.,Agent told me that since I did not cancel within 30 days I was now locked into a 12 month contract.,This is my worst ‘banking’ experience.,N26 is like going on a Tinder date with a stalker, sure you went on a date once but you ended the date in the first 10 minutes after realising their was no chemistry between you....,Meanwhile Stalky N26 went and told all its friends your dating and sent you a gift one month later that you did not return.......,So now N26 thinks your married.....,N26 even managed to get an online marriage certificate......... ,sure you did not sign anything.... but N26 saw the way you smiled in that dreamy first date, plus you loved his gift..... so that must mean your married right?,On the plus side I doubt N26’s marriage certificate will stand up to legal scrutiny......... but sadly that won’t get your wasted time back.,Searching trust pilot I see many people were just sent the metal card and then had my above experience even when they ordered the basic card one..... if only I’d done more research before clicking that Instagram ‘FREE BANK ACCOUNT’ link.,You would probably not knowingly date a stalker so don’t enter into any form of interaction with N26, unless that’s your thing. In which case I hope you and N26 have a nice life together.,Plenty of decent online banks that offer the same but without the stalky extortion component. Monzo, Tide etc.
company_reply: Hey Steven,,We offer a Standard account which is free of charge and premium accounts which come with a monthly fee. If you signed up for a Metal account, during the sign up process you would have been asked to confirm and accept the Metal membership terms and conditions. To cancel your N26 Metal account you can do so up to 30 days after you signed up. Once this date has passed you will need to pay the remaining fees. ,You can read more about our revocation process on our support center: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/membership-plans/how-to-cancel-my-n26-black-or-n26-metal-membership,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Account hacked and blocked
text: Account hacked and blocked - N26 doing nothing,I am an N26 customer, for a few months. Last March 15th 2019, I received an automated unsolicited email from N26 indicating that my mobile phone was unpaired from my bank account N26. I knew right away it was  fraud. I contacted N26 instantly with the client service, finding that my account is inaccessible.,The support replied that they transmitted the information to their fraud departement, who will contact with me very shortly.,I didn't receive any reply from them, even if I tried again and again to contact them by email and by chat. I always receive the same answer, telling that they will contact with me shortly.,Until this day, still no answer, no solution.,I'm going to sue them, because it is the only solution left for me to get access to my money again.,I do not understand the lack of communication and the inability of N26 to resolve the problem in a reasonably timely maner ...

title: Reported a fraud
text: My previous transactions were all good, receives approval before fulfilling transaction but not with my last transaction with an online shop.,so i reported immediately since i suspect fraud. I bought an item worth $9 but i was billed €85. My order still tagged unpaid but already debited to my account.,I have also contacted with the merchant with this concern, but I only receive auto reply. No feedback from merchant until now.,There was no clear solution yet to credit back the money on my N26.,i receive 2 emails from n26 with different instructions to resolve it and that will take 12 & 30 days respectively. Really?,there’s a note in the app, that the amount wasn’t settled yet due to exchange rate, however it is already deducted on my balance. My purpose of reporting it was to immediately stop payment if it was not settled yet. However, I was informed that i need to wait for it to be settled first. Like what? how are you going to prevent that fraud when you need to wait for it to finally transfer the money to the fraudster?,solution please!

Before I set up regular freelance work, it takes all the pressure off for me to have a euro account which I actually need for daily life. The application and service are simple, clear and professional. I would recommend it to any friends.

title: Cancelled the account
text: Cancelled the account, received an email confirming it and now I still have to pay £15 a month because I only cancelled it in email and nowhere on the website does it say you have to phone them but it only officially can be cancelled on the phone. Untrustworthy, least transparent bank ever, do not recommend.
company_reply: Hey Elisabeth,,You can cancel a standard account for free by sending an email to support@n26.com. If you have a premium account, it most likely is a twelve-month contract. You will then be asked to pay the remaining fees.,You can find out more information on the following page of our Support Center: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/fixing-an-issue/account/how-to-close-my-account,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Not great when closing down an account
text: Opening the account was easy, and so was receiving the bank card. ,Being a European bank, I was under the impression I would be able to have pound sterlings and euros in the same account. My impression was wrong (that was my own fault), so I decided to close down the account. That's where matters didn't go so smoothly.,I sent back the form required to close down the account and received a confirmation email informing me that my matter would be handled within 1-2 working days. 8 days later and I still hadn't heard back from them, so I contacted the support team. My cancellation request was in a queue, and I would have to wait "a few good days" for it to be handled. ,Overall, I would have expected a smoother experience when closing down the account, and being kept up to date on what's happening with my request.
company_reply: Hey Jonathan,,Thanks for your feedback! We regret to hear that you were provided with such customer experience.	,You can cancel the account for free if you hold a standard one, by sending an email to support@n26.com. If you have a premium account, it most likely is a twelve-month contract. You will then be asked to pay the remaining fees.,You can find out more information on the following page of our Support Center: https://support.n26.com/en-de/fixing-an-issue/account/how-to-close-my-account,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Opened an accountZero Customer service and buggy app
text: Opened an account, was sent my card but when I try to log in on the app its says my phone number is not acceptable and to log ain and connect support.  Of course, I cannot log in.  So I went to their facebook page and they advised I go to their website and open a chat box on the support page.  I did this, it said an agent is on the way.  I left this box open for 3 days and nobody came.  I went back to facebook and the said to try a chat box again.  Did, 6 hours, nothing.  Bad app, faulty service, pointless account.

We do however also offer another option for non-users.,Could you head over to the bottom of this page on a computer: https://support.n26.com/en-de/getting-started/account/how-to-open-my-n26-account?,You'll spot a "start a chat" button below the table. An agent will help you out.,Best regards,,Your N26 Support Team

text: I think when it comes to electronic financial services, this challenger bank is the best by now. They offer good rates for foreign transactions, accounts are free of charge and for business customers there is a cash back of 0.1% for expenses. One of my returned direct debit was charged, and I think it is the weakest side of N26, other than this it is a very good bank.

title: I really love N26 !
text: I really love N26 !,The setup of an account is dead simple. You can do 90% of the registration through your mobile phone and then you activate the account in less than 3 days using the postal service.,The customer support is amazing. I got my problem solved in less than 5 minutes through a live chat.,You have full control over your debit card (card limits, card blocking etc.). You can also transfer money using a third-party, TransferWise, which is also a great advantage.,There's a lot of transparency in the fees. The fees are extremely low compared to traditional banks.,I highly recommend N26 for its great service !

title: I am really satisfied with an N26 bank.

text: This online banking could be good if the customer service was not crap. The people working at n26 don't really know what they are doing or just don't care... Stay away.
company_reply: Hey Craig, ,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Your feedback will help us improve our service.,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Beware ot scammy referral program
text: Overall I am satisfied with the service that N26 provides. However, I have to point out their borderline scam tactique when it comes to their referral program.,N26 disqualifies numerous countries ad hoc from their heavily promoted monetary reward for a friend referral at their own discretion, without any mention to this in the T&C documents available to their customers. ,I have referred several of my friends to the service as I very much believe in the vision of N26 and I want to actively contribute the the success of the Bank in the future. My friends have activated their accounts and have been actively using them for payments meeting all the conditions speciied by N26 for an eligible referral. However I haven't received the monetary reward that N26 commits to in their T&C document.,When i contacted the support team, I was informed that my countrty is not eligible for the referral program (even though I have been able to refer my friends and have been receiving many emails from N26 prompting me to share my personalized referral link with my firends,with a promise of monetary reward) and that I will not receive my monetary reward. There is no mention of my country being ineligible in the T&C document and when I asked for such document, I have simply been told that it does not exist but I still won't receive my award.,I am writing this long review not because of the small monetary incentive which I will not receive, but because of my deep disappointment with the way N26 behaved to me as their customer and the way they addressed this situation. I believe that changing the rules of the referral program at their own discretion without any reference to the T&C documents of N26 is extremely intransparent and promulgates a negative perception of N26, as well as the whole    Fintech industry.,I hope N26 management will take their time to read this review as a constructive feedback from their customer and at the very least will update the T&C document of the referral program to transparently list the countries that are/are not eligible for the referral program and the receival of the monetary award threin referred to.

title: What a disappointment
text: App is fine but overall very unsatisfied with the service. Held 1 year Black card, on the day of renewal there was no way to cancel from their web and did not have access to my mobile app. On a day of renewal they basically sent a link to the TC and said thats how it is, stay on Black for another year or cancel without refund. No flexibility! Because I told them incorrect ID card number (I have 3 passports) they just closed online chat without goodbye or anything. Only way for identity reverification was to send FAX! Or a physical mail copy! The whole online support feels like a automated manufacturing line. Plus the Allianz insurance is rigged too -  all travel purchases have to be made with the card and otherwise your trip is not covered. Also damaged luggage is not covered by the card. So here we go - second year forced to stay on Black card! So dear N26, if you want to make it up for me Im available via the email.
company_reply: Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. ,Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise our upcoming projects, so we appreciate this. ,Can you please send us some more details on what happened via email, to Support@N26.com so we can look into this with you?,Best,,Your N26 support team.

text: Colossal waste of time. Opened an account in Spain to pay all bills related to my Spanish house. But N26 does not operate SEPA, so it refuses all direct debits. Have complained to the regulatory authority - the Bundesbank - and will see what happens.,As an aside, when I opened the account, N26 sent my MasterCard to the wrong address.  It left off from the address label the final digit of my post box number. Took me a long time to track it down. N26 default position is that 'The customer is always wrong',Update: N26 finally sorted out its Spanish operation and all is fine. Will now update to four stars - not five, as it should not have been a problem to start with.

title: Simply closed down account for no reason and kept my remaining income balance.
text: I opened an N26 account when they launched in the UK, and was using them as my main bank account. ,I received an email this morning saying they are closing my account effective immediately and would not give the reason why on my pay day and now my money stuck there with N26! ,I have not used the account for anything other than everyday transactions and was even paying the £15 monthly fee for their Metal card,I would STRONGLY ADVISE all of you do not open an account with this N26. title: Very poor banking experience!
text: Very poor banking experience indeed. Here are the reasons:,-Very very poor customer support. First, there is no way you can talk to a real person if you have a serious problem. The chat is a hit or miss. Most of the times, the chat support agent is not trained and does not know much about the issue you raised.,- They are terribly slow at responding to issues raised by email. After months of no replies and persistent requests for updates, they did reply back with "sorry for the delay; we had issues with our system". Really??!!,- The bank infrastructure has terribly poor security features. I requested umpteen times to have 2-Factor authentication on Twitter, by email, on Facebook and they never cared to consider. That said, money on an N26 account is at 100% risk to being stolen by hackers. There is not way N26 will become my default bank account. I use it for the convenience of seeing my payments in real-time (that's one pro), but that's the risk I take. I do a monthly standing order of a fairly small amount which I then use.,- The bank discriminates on nationalities: I think you try to follow some banking rules but I have no idea where these rules/restrictions come from. Because of my nationality, you said I could not use N26 Invest although you advertised the service is available in Germany. You failed to mention that you are picky on nationalities living in Germany. I contacted BaFin (no issues with my nationality). As a matter of fact, I was able to open my investment accounts with comdirect and Consorsbank. What rules you follow is beyond me. You need to review your policies. ,Botton line: lots of poor experiences. Mobile app is great, but everything around it is really not in good shape.

title: Terrible banking experience
text: This is the first time I’ve ever written a review. I’ve had my Barclays account for almost 20 years and Monzo for 2 and half years now. No problems whatsoever. I signed up with N26, really liked their app and features. Got my wages going in there for the past 4 months and all of a sudden I got this email this morning.,“As a bank, we have to follow strict legal requirements to protect the privacy and safety of our customers. This means that we are required to perform routine checks on all accounts.,We are sorry to inform you that following recent checks, we have had to close your account, effective immediately. ,This means that you will no longer be able to use your N26 account, including the app and card issued. ,If there is a positive balance in your account at the time of closure, please respond directly to this email and we will provide next steps on how to claim this back. ”,Think twice before you open an account with them. I now have to go to my wages department and get all this changed again. I’m sure it will be too late for this month so will definitely be late with my bills this month. My question is why bother opening the account for me if you are going to shut it down?,Stick with the reliable banks. Don’t bother opening an account with a startup that doesn’t know what it’s doing. Monzo and Starling are so much better and more established. Thank God they know what they are doing. I will have to revert back to them. At least I gave N26 a go.
company_reply: Hey,,As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions. ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Awful customer support. Good if you need a bank account fast.
text: I have had two serious issues with N26 customer support that would make me think twice about recommending them. Generally, the problem is customer support doesn't have more information than the FAQ, so if you can't solve the problem yourself, good luck reaching a person who can help you.,1. I transfered a my savings in the US to Germany. My bank said the transfer had completed but N26 told me that they had not received the money and that I should check with the sender. Ok, major life stress that my savings had been lost in transfer. A week later, I received a notification that the money had been received the previous week (when they told me they hadn't received it) and N26 needed some tax / anti-fraud documentation. I had already spent a week hunting down a problem outside of N26, when the problem was internal and Customer Support is instructed to tell customers to fend for themselves.,2. I recently messed up my taxes and my account was garnished (apparently my Steuerberater failed to forward me a mahnung). Same song and dance. What would be something resolved in 24-48 hours at another bank is ongoing and taking more than a week to resolve. Again, contacting their customer service involves them telling me what I already know then terminating chat. I'm lucky my friends will feed me while I can't pay for groceries.,I still think N26 is great for the convenience / speed of setting up an account, but for someone planning on staying in Germany long-term, I'd recommend you open up an account at a reputable bank with real customer service.

title: Huge security gap, unacceptable customer service & communication
text: We’ve been happy clients of N26 Germany since 2016. Until a week ago when the account got blocked out of the blue. Since then we’re finding out that N26 has a huge security gap and horrendous customer service. ,Fraud number on the bank of the MasterCard leads to automated voicemail pointing to chat. Every other bank has a fraud helpline. And where did phone support go? Now it’s only through chat or email. Different chat agents give different information, all chats are shut down without real help. Email reply takes 2 days and contain standard phrases pointing either to chat or to mysterious email sent earlier. ,After 6 days insisting via @N26_support on Twitter an email gets forwarded that chat agents claimed we should have received but that never arrived. The email contains standard blurb about cancellation due to misuse etc AND it was sent to a new fraudulous email address. Clearly someone on N26 side got into our account and changed the registered email address that N26 uses as part of its identification process. What good is fingerprint login when a simple email change allows fraud?,To be clear. We’ve been home all that time, app and card safe 24/7, We use the account to pay bills and receive salary. Very down to earth usage. No online use, no travel abroad.,If N26 actually talked to us, we could help to find out what’s going on. ,We still have no access to our money which btw is illegal under German banking law. German banking authority and Bundesbank have been informed.
company_reply: Hey Judith,,We apologise for the experience you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. We understand your disappointment, and apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused you. We would like to thank you for bringing this to our attention. It will help us improve our operations and services. ,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

text: Hello.,When I found in Germany online bank with modern design and supporting English I was pleasantly surprised... ,We live here for more than a year because of medical purposes and wanted to open bank account to pay for medical services. Eventually 7 days later status changed to "not verified". I visited trustpilot and everything became clear for me. Local hypocrisy and double standards in work. title: Banking in 2019
text: As banking experiences go, this is at a whole new level. ,*Pros*,Setup:,I created a bank account with Santander the same week as creating my N26. The experience was night and day. ,Santander took over 2 hours in person, with me signing at least ten different pieces of paper. When I left, I think I brought with me a squirrel's holiday home with the amount of paperwork. ,N26 took less than 15 minutes on my phone. Just that simple. ,Mobile Experience:,On top of that, their mobile experience is 10x better than any other bank I've used in the past. I spent 30 minutes on the phone with Santander trying to get the limit on my debit card extended. With N26 I can do it right in the app. ,*Cons*,Fraud Detection:,I recently got my card skimmed (or stolen somehow). The thief cleared out my N26 account overnight on a gambling site. N26 have been great with support, and I'm in the process of making a fraud claim to get that money back hopefully.,However, I would have expected better fraud detection. I was just lucky that there wasn't a massive amount of money in that N26 account. I had been considering making my N26 account my main account, but I would need more trust in their fraud detection before committing to putting thousands of Euros in N26. ,*To be clear, I took all the reasonable and expected security steps on my side. I suspect that it got skimmed at a metro station in Valencia.

title: Not a good start and not really ready…
text: Not a good start and not really ready for service.,The process of opening the account was slick and seamless using the cam on the phone to capture proof documentation needed, account number immediately available, very fast push notifications via the app of payments in and out. ,The app (what there is of it) is slick and a couple of nice touches like swiping over the camera to blur out figures if your in a public place),However this is where it breaks down a bit, despite stating on the website 5 - 14 days to receive your debit card (which already feels long compared with standard banks) after 14 days I get an email stating due to logistical problems it could be up to another two weeks, but hopefully not that long, at the end of the two weeks I complained via twitter got another email saying sorry they were having logistical problems it could be another week. So five weeks in and no sign of getting a debit card, given they don’t offer check books this makes the account pretty much useless. ,They don’t participate in the account switch service (presumably they don’t want people leaving easily when they realise how atrocious their service is) which means you have to manually visit each of your DD,s and manually switch them to your new account ( a process I have stopped till I’m sure I’m going to remain a customer) ,Once you do get DD’s into the account there is no way on the website or app to manage them or cancel them, if reports I have read are true you have to get a form, fill in details that are hard to get often involving you contacting the DD payee to ask for details, sign it and send it to support.,Given they are new into the market you may also find companies can’t accept them yet as a DD source although hopefully that will resolve its self fairly soon, so far about a third of my DD’s could not accept N26 as a source. ,There is no way to manage regular payee’s that I can see. ,If reports I have read are true, if you try to cancel your account until their service matures you are slapped with a lifetime ban.,I have read reports of payments (IN) being late or delayed in their systems meaning people default on their outbound payments for bills and mortgages. ,They do not have a 24 x 7 customer service team and if reports I have read are anything to go by their support team have not been educated on the basics of customer service (although I have not experienced this first hand),If you hold or want a euro account they can’t give you a second GBP account. ,Despite the UK market feeling like a lack lustre launch was botched and still waiting for basics to be fixed like getting a card, systems working reliably, and basic banking functions still needing to be enabled, N26 have made big announcements of moving on to its next markets in Brazil and the US. ,In summary - does not feel like a professional outfit, feels like a start up which is not what you want from a bank. I think they are trying to move when they are not ready. In my opinion they are not ready to take over as your primary bank, personally I’m just going to use them as a payment processor for some of my transactions. I started with plans to compleay switch my banking to them but I don’t feel like they are in any way ready for that. They need to do a lot of work on the customer service and realise they are dealing with people’s money, they WILL get mad if you fail to meet your obligations, that goes with the territory and being unable to answer questions in a knolagable way or closing chat windows before customers have finished is not going to win you and good will. ,They need to review their lifetime ban policy when customers decide (probably quite justifiably) that N26 are not ready for service yet. ,They probably should look at not charging yet even for their metal accounts until they really are truly ready to be called a bank with all the basic services. ,They need to get to at least the basic standards of banking functionality, like managing payees DD’s and SO’s before they call themselves a bank. ,They need to plan and evacuate launches much better than they did the UK. ,In my opinion they need to form a customer opinion group and take notice of the feedback they are receiving. ,Finally my advice by all means try them but don’t rely on them, and don’t make my mistake and sign up for their paid for service thinking you can switch to them, they are no way ready to be a bank.
company_reply: Hey Dale,,Thanks for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We really appreciate your thoughts and suggestions! The easiest way to support us with your suggestions is by writing an email to ideas@n26.com. Your ideas will then be collected and directed to the relevant team. We are pleased to hear about your sign up experience. ,Deliveries to the UK can take up to 10 days. At this time Express delivery is not yet available. We apologise that there was an issue with your card delivery. ,Our UK accounts support Direct Debits. Please keep in mind that other UK banks can take up to 6 weeks to update their systems to recognise N26 accepts BACS. You have the ability to reverse a direct debit in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. You can cancel only after the first Direct Debit has been taken out. Simply select the direct debit in question and choose Reverse debit. At this time saving payees is not available. As soon as it is we will inform you. ,We currently don't offer a switching service. It is not yet offered, however you'll be informed as soon as this feature becomes available. You can follow our @N26 blog and social media accounts to stay up-to-date!,We are constantly looking to improve our services. You can read more about our customer service here: https://n26.com/en-de/blog/customer-support-at-n26,We offer a Standard account which is free of charge and premium accounts which come with a monthly fee. You can find our pricing list on our support center. Here is the link: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/account/how-much-does-an-n26-account-cost,Best,,Your N26 Support Team

title: Horrible customer service, general bad attitude
text: In light of my experience, I can not see N26 as serious, trustworthy bank.,Few days after signing up, the application and the internet site were down for good ~15 minutes. in such case, you have absolutely nothing to do, no one to talk to, no way to understand what is going on.,There is no functioning phone number - the number advertised has just annoying recorded message ask you to use the App/Internet site chat. but when thy are down, you just lost.,I managed to got hold of customer service man for people interesting in opening new account. he said that they aware of the failure, and has no prediction for how long will it take to repair it.,when asked politely how am I supposed to know about it, or what to do, he just ended the chat. very rude and unprofessional.,This attitude can barely work for small online shopping site. this can't work for banking. leaving people with no clue what is going on, with no one to talk to or any information. how can you trust such company with your money?,(yes, after a while the application said that there is "planned maintenance", which contradict what the customer service man said (failure) I feel this "scheduled maintenance" claim to be untrustworthy),Imagine one day the failure will not last 15 minutes, but days, weeks, forever? and you won't have anyone to approach. ,They seems to have such attitude which does not fit for banking. I don't feel that the customer is taken seriously or that I this organization can be trusted.   ,I can't recommenced this as main bank, perhaps convenient gimmick. don't put there any amount you can't afford to lose. I don't think those guys understand what being responsible to people money means.

text: Up until now been more that happy with N26. title: Top notch bank with excellent customer service.
text: An excellent bank with all tools necessary for travellers and daily transfers. Very smooth customer service and of course very beautiful credit cards (it's the simple things in life that count).,I have contacted the customer service a couple of times, both for small questions and urgent requests, and every time I was helped smoothly and friendly. The issues were resolved in record time and I never had a feeling of being left in the dark, which is really nice considering it's your money they're working with.,The app works intuitively, and most importantly, has never failed on me. It's both secure and simple, so you can find everything you need in an easy manner. The diagnostics are great, though the automated payment type recognition could use some more refinement, but nothing that a little manual correction can't solve.,As a frequent traveller, it's especially great to have the Mastercard charges dropped. It has saved me quite some money in the long term.,All in all a perfect allround bank with a smooth app and never failing credit card, which is all you need for regular transactions. If necessary, the customer service is great and helps you sort out your issues quickly and accurately.

title: Potential Scam - Be careful
text: Potential Scam - Be careful,First time I heard about N26, it seemed to good to be true. But I still gave it a go. I talked to somebody via video chat to verify, which seemed already very dodgey. Nevertheless I went through the process. Once all said and done I was told the card was on its way and would arrive within 2weeks.,Nothing. No response to my email. So I waited patiently a few more months, nothing whatsoever. It never arrived. I doubt it was ever sent out.,So I didn't keep bothering for obvious reasons.,One year passes, I stumbled over an email from N26, logged into my account to see whats going on.,Looks like they want me to pay now. Absolute insane.,Screenshots:,gyazo.com/ ab3315fe9f1340ea502c66e2e810770e,gyazo.com/ 1dc63cdd830bf0c7fd88ee710742239c,(remove the space after the / ),I can't even believe half of the positive comments here. Can't be just bad luck. ,Be careful guys!

title: Poor customer on-boarding and service
text: Pros,App is pretty slick and nice and easy to navigate.,Cons,Time to open an account - I get there is probably more hoops to jump through as they are a German bank but I had a Monzo account opened in 24 hours. N26 took over a week.,My card - I'm still waiting for it after a month of opening my account.,Customer Services - Is there even any? I've contacted them twice and had no response which instantly makes me think they have problems.,Spaces - While I think it's a great idea to be able to make sub accounts of your main account it falls short when on the standard account model you can only create 2 spaces.,Again Monzo come up trumps here as I've got 4 sub accounts and they dont charge me any extra for it. N26 want an extra £5 a month.,Summary,For a company which is trying to gain market share and traction in an already competitive UK market they've got a lot of customer service issues to sort out and quickly.,People dont want to be kept waiting especially with the new Fintech banking capabilities available from other companies they can onboard customers quickly and with little fuss.,Maybe I just got unlucky but I've already pulled my money out of N26 and gone elsewhere.

title: I would write a review if i could start…
text: I would write a review if i could start using the service but despite many people saying that it takes 10 minutes to open an account, today I received the 4th automated email saying that my documents weren't accepted. It is always the same automated message something along the lines "uugghhhhh something went wrong with your stuff try again", no other information.. what went wrong? what should I be careful about? nothing.. ,To contact customer support you have to have the app, to have the app you have to get your documents registered first. So I guess they expect me to send the same photos for the next 50 years again and again considering the avarage life expectancy in my country. ,After googling the problem here and there and try to find a solution, I realise that they actually have a customer service. But it is on twitter or facebook. I don't know if it can get more lame than that. So if you are not using facebook or twitter don't even think about n26 because f you if you are not addicted to social media. ,Now I totally changed my mind about the service because think about it... Lets say you put 10000 euros to your account, and one day you realized that is 0 .It is suddenly gone. Who will you contact? Some guy on twitter? Some application? Or you can try to answer their noreply mails. This extremely easy to use no headache banking style in the end of the day can make you very very angry. And there is no real person whom you can shout at. ,So.. No thank you. I will pay my 3 euro something monthly fee and have a regular every day normal bank account. Which I can call and go to and write an email.

title: Trust me, the best bank for everyone who hates coventional banks.
text: The best bank, not only in Germany (where the banks are still in stone age), but also comparable to any other modern foreign bank. ,N26 solves all the issues that make you furious about other banks - the balance is updated instantly after payment or transfer, great clean app with categorizing of the expenses, payment with your smartphone with Google pay, super easy to reach support via chat in the app and all done online, spaces function to separate your savings from your current account, easy overdraft for a minimal fee (I paid like 1,5 € for something over 1000 € overdraft) and the best - no fees for a basic account, which is totally fine and sufficient, and no fees for card payments home and abroad. If you despise the cash culture in Germany and are used to paying with a card, then the allowance of 5 withdrawals per month from any ATM is perfectly sufficient.

title: The N26 is a "trustworthy" financial institution. I strongly recommend!
text: I only have good things to say about N26. The N26 Mastercard Debit card is broadly accepted, the web interface, as well as the N26 app, are plenty useful and user-friendly. Thanks to N26 for keeping me living in Ireland in 2018.

title: A breath of fresh air for banking!
text: N26 is easy to set up and even easier to use. The app in intuitive and responsive. It's easy to connect with customer service via chat from the app should you have any queries or need help. Transferring funds is quick and the sub accounts is great for saving for particular things by setting a Target and letting you know your current % of that target. Control over the account is also amazing as you can set spend limits and control where the card can be used. The categorization of purchases is also great for budgeting. Would highly recommend this amazing account to all.

title: Solid Banking Experience
text: I've had my account for almost two months now. Overall I would say that it's a solid banking product.,PROS:,+ Minimalistic app design,+ Prompt customer care,+ Almost no fees (apart from 1.7% on overseas cash withdrawals),+ Instant notifications,+ Monthly spending breakdown / statistics by category,CONS:,- No 24/7 customer care (unlike some of its finch rivals in the UK),- No standing orders (which should be added to the app quite soon hopefully),- No payee management - account details have to be entered manually (which should be added to the app quite soon hopefully)

title: Incompetent personnel
text: I would say I've never experienced such a bad customer service anywhere. I simply gave up the process. Just as a note. As a Romanian citizen, you cannot be part of N26, not with the new biometric passport (nobody tells you that). My verification was stuck. Don't lose your time, I've lost 3 weeks writing emails, getting the most ambiguous and contradictory answers and nobody could take care or at least notify me on the issue. So the last email that I got was telling me that I should suggest the bank to add the Romanian passport in their new ideas section which I found absolutely incredibly annoying. So it might be a quick great bank unless you will have the tiniest problem for which you will lose weeks in anger and nerves with the most incompetent personnel.

If you can bear the verification process, this bank might be right for you.

title: I opened an account with this stupid…
text: I opened an account with this stupid bank and after a week and few days a friend transferred £200 to my account which i purposely left in the account and after a week or so my cousin was unable to meet up her bank opening time and was due to travel the next day and i told her to send the funds she will be needing on holiday to my account that i will take it out for her through the cash machine..At first my pin i set up initially wasn't working so i had to reset and still wasn't working, contact the customer support and they did something and the card worked and i asked them if i can use the maximum withdrawal limit of my card and i was told yes i can.Used the machine after one withdrawal the card keep saying contact card issuer which i did and i was told the problem as been resolved...Next day went to the machine to make a withdrawal and after making a withdrawal same thing happens contact the support, was told all will be fine i should go back after 20mins and still same problem...later that day went to a shop to purchase something of £20 and card declined...I had to contact them again and cos it was a saturday they said i had to wait till monday..Monday morning received an email saying Account cancellation that i violated the terms and condition..Ask for the remains funds in my acct and was told to provide proof/document which i did, contacted them again to ask about the update and was told to send the same document again which i did..i have sent them this proofs and explanation over four times and still no update..i said i will sue this bank and i got an email telling me to send the same document/proof have sent over four times still not response..Its over a month now and still haven't  received the remaining funds left in my account..This bank is not reliable i repeat until you have a problem with them before you can experience this issues..No number to call and when you send an email it takes forever to reply..Still waiting for the remaining amount in my account of £850

title: The best so far, other banks can learn from it.

title: Easy, super peasy
text: I love it, it's so easy to open the account and manage it from mobile. I feel secure, it's super easy to use, much cheaper when I travel, customer service is always helpful and quick to respond.,Been with them for a year now, nothing to complain about, really!

title: From initiating a customer relationship…
text: From initiating a customer relationship and opening an account to using the service (incl. payment card) everything has been very clear and easy. On situations where help desk was needed, my requests were not only answered fast (less than a day via mail, less than a minute via chat) but also resolved immediately (address change, phone number change, ordering of a new card). From ordering the card I received it in less than a week (in Germany) which was also from my point of view very efficient. There was only some delay in sending the automated confirmation pin for pairing a new phone ( the text message which is sent to stated phone number) which resulted to me ordering a new code after the first one didn't arrive after 20min. However, the newly ordered code came then immediately.

title: Very satisfied

title: Love it all the way through
text: I started using N26 about a year ago and it made me hates traditional banking. Moving from one country to another, my need for a physical office for my bank is not existent. I need easily bank details modifications and fast reply support. Obviously also free of charge withdrawals in foreign countries. All that is met by N26 and so far I had very little to complain about, especially because they are improving fast.

title: Worst customer service ever
text: Worst customer service ever, did transactions that was never completed, customer support doesn’t give attention at all and they can never sort any issue they just keep passing you from one department to another very messy service. ,Lost money, didn’t receive it back as I was charged but they didn’t give the money for the merchant. On the chat the attendant just finish the chat in a very rude way. I’m Just trying to use the money that I have in the account to close my account.  They simply don’t care about the clients.

title: So far nothing but disappointment.
text: I tried using the service a year or two ago in Germany as my parents moved there, but we were greeted with an error page during the signup process, and no-one reached out to us about it, so we just forgot.,After that, I convinced my parents to give it another go, and we tried it again in December 2018. During the signup process, we had to wait for someone to show up at the sign-up call to verify our identity, but no one did within 40 minutes and we just lost the patience. We tried it next day and after a few minutes, we got greeted by a rude person on video that we couldn't understand and t hung up on us after a few seconds of miscommunication.,When I tried to sign-up for my personal account in the UK, the experience was fine, and I was told that within 2 days I'll have my account approved. After a week I got an email saying that the demand is high and it will take a bit longer (the app said within 5 days), it has been a couple of weeks now and still nothing.,During this whole experience getting a hold of someone at the company is extremely difficult as I couldn't find a phone number, email to reach them at. Their preferred way of communication is a chat inside the app, but you have to have an approved N26 account (so if you are having issues with sign-up, good luck). I somehow found a web-based chat which was only available within a specific page in their guide, which I found very awkward.,I have absolutely no idea why anyone in the UK would even consider opening an account with them since Starling, Monzo, and Revolut seem like superior choices.

title: The bank that you could ever ask for!
text: The bank that you could ever ask for!,  I have recently joined N26 banking, and it couldn't be more amazing than what I have imagined. The service is so grand that it'll make you kind of hate the traditional banks. The customer service is amazing, helpful, and flexible. Furthermore, the design of both app and website is literally amazing. But, I'm not rating it 5 stars only because of some things that I would love for them to improve or add. The Mastercard Secure system that is linked to your card and their app is abysmal! It rarely works, and when I make purchases they go right through, which is quite disturbing, and it feels like my security is breached while shopping online. Also, I'd love to see the multicurrency option on the N26 platform, because it's a huge plus! Apart from all of this, the BANK IS AMAZING! And the bad reviews given here are just from people who had trouble getting verified so they throw shade on it, and describe it with such negativity that the bank actually doesn't have!  I would strongly advise anyone reading this to join them because it's worth it. Use my link for registration and get the ultimate experience with N26! ,n26'.'com/r/saadeddm3283

title: Long Story Short
text: Long story short, this is a great online banking option for travelers but after some recent experiences with their customer service and their inability to dispute a charge made on my account by a fraudulent website without blocking/re-ordering my card really killed my faith in them as a serious financial institution. It seems that as they grow in size their client support is decreasing. When it comes to resolving problems with my money, I do not appreciate speaking automated chat robots or being told that my bank cannot do anything for me with out causing me great inconvenience. I think banks and other financial institutions should remember that it is our money that allows them to stay in business, so it may be a good idea to protect your clients assets.. All that said I still recommend them as a temporary banking solution for travelers or those without other banking options available. Great company that is growing fast, maybe too fast.

title: It's definitely the best bank I've ever had!
text: It's definitely the best bank I've ever had. All sources are in English, the agents are very helpful and pleasant when I contact them through the online chat, all the changes (even legal) or updates are communicated via emails in easy language, which doesn't want me wish I never got this email in the first place (which is the case with other banks), the transfers and payments are super easy, transparent, and fast. And the master cards are beautiful!,I only miss the option to download statements for a particular transaction with a credit card, instead of the whole month statement. And I can't wait to see new features of the Spaces (something like sub-accounts of the main one) - like sharing a space with someone else.

title: The bank how it should be.
text: The bank how it should be.,Me and my wife use the bank over a year now. Best choice of in our life. We have now absolute and easy control of our finance through the app and the ease of pay with GPay. ,And we don't need to pay fees like we used to do from our old banks.

title: Great and easy bank option!
text: My account was easy to set up but seems secure. I got my card in less than a week! Plus, transfers and bill pay is very easy to do. I've had to use the help feature twice for small things and both times the customer service was fast and helpful.

title: Beware
text: Beware! it's not a real bank. Nice frontend and app, but then may cost you a lot because they don't do the basics a bank does. For example, I receive a cheque. Impossible to cash in... A bank eur to eur transfer from another company, lost and hours trying to resolve. It turns out they only want SEPA transfers, not swift which all other banks accept, but this is not something you control when someone asks you for your Iban. Anyway, they are good at raising money and spending it on plush offices, but the banking basics aren't there, even after several years of existence.

title: Better to put your trust elsewhere
text: From my experience, this lot have a long way to go before they can be considered a fully functional bank.  ,It looks nice and slick and the app does its job pretty well. But if you hit any problems, then things unravel quickly - as others have noted here.  For me, they refused to credit a chunky deposit to my account - even though I had asked in advance if this was ok and provided evidence of where it came from.  It took two weeks to resolve. And through all that time it was impossible to get any replies from their Back Office staff. The in-app chat people are generally friendly but seem disconnected from the actual banking staff, so are of little help in these situations. And there is no phone number available to try and actually talk to someone. ,I wrote a formal complaint to their banking CEO Markus Gunter - no reply.,I messaged their CEO Valentin Stalf on Linkedin - no reply.,In the end they reversed the deposit payment, so at least I got my money back in the end.,And now today I get an email saying my account was being terminated. Well that's just peachy.,So no attempt from them to really look at the problem or raise any dialogue with me to find a solution.  And then it seems they consider me too much of a bother to keep as a customer.,There are far better options available to you - Revolut, TransferWise etc that have much better reputations and people you can speak to when problems arise.

title: The best service
text: The system is easy to use and the support prompt and patient.

title: Upgraded account to metal card and was…
text: Upgraded account to metal card and was instantly charged 16e , told card would be 3 weeks as its christmas , i understand this now probem. I explained that from 24th Decemeber i would be in the UK for 2 months for my employer so if my card is late then i wont be able to recieve it - i was told if no one was home to sign for it they would send it back to HQ and can resend to my address in the UK. ,Card was delivered to address is spain and left in a communal post box !!  i have now had to cancel the card and asked for replacement to be sent onto me in the UK and no one has come back to me , the time the new card comes i will be back in spain and could have used the card on the floor !!! however they are still charging me 16e a month even though i have no card .,Spoke to online chat , women was rude and didnt understand what was going on, she cut me off after 30 minutes of talking as she didnt have answer to any questions ,still no card and still no phone call or email but they keep taking the 16e a month !

title: GOOD SUPPORT SERVICE
text: I contacted the agent through the chat, for knowing if my bank account and card were activated, she checked it up and replied that all was ok; fast and very good support service

title: Never found banking so easy!
text: Never found banking so easy. It's the perfect option for travelers. From the fees to the customer care or the app, it has got everything you want. Since taking the leap, I never looked back. You control everything and you get good and quick help when an issue arises. I definitely recommend it. One of the best decision I took.

title: Still no card!!!!
text: Opened my account late Dec and still mid Jan, no card. Sent them a mail about this but no response. Talked in online chat today and they say they have a backlog. Communicate this then!!!! Instead they send me ridiculous e-mails like top up your account. Errr no, not until I can use the money. Very poor introduction to an institution you should be able to trust.

title: Slower than the slowest!
text: Sadly I have to agree with Ollie. I was really impressed with N26 in Germany but am still waiting for my account to be opened in the UK. No response after 5 days - other than the app being stuck on “we are still checking your documents”. Every bank in the UK can do better than that - and Monzo managed it in minutes!

title: Easy to get started
text: Easy to get started, everything happens when they say, the app is great, the security spot on. Banking as it should be.

title: The online banking interface is so easy…
text: The online banking interface is so easy to use and designed so efficiently that you actually enjoy it. Customer support is fast and friendly. I also keep getting the same reviews from my friends who also enjoy using N26.

title: Unbelievably bad customer service!
text: I created an account two weeks ago having liked the idea of the spending analysis, app and financial control having smart bank account offers.,However, I still haven't had an account set up after two weeks of radio silence, no card  and customer service tells me the delay would deffinately be resolved in 2 days, 3 days ago... I am exasperated with this pathetic attempt to complete a basic administrative task such a create a new user account, and from this experience I am certainly not going to continue to get involved with this headache of a company.,It is a shame as I genuinely wanted to see what N26 has to offer and was very keen to find an alternative to monzo so was very hopeful. However I think N26 make it very clear to us all: their competitors simply do it better than them... There are so many better mobile banks on the market and N26 want you to know it. There are mobile banks that get back to you quickly and set up accounts swiftly and simply generate a passive service to help you manage your finances and offer reassurence through good customer care..... My advice is simple listen to all the bad reviews from. People who have had a similar experience to me..... look at what N26s staff are trying to tell you.... DO NOT USE THIS  HOPLESS, STRESSFUL, TIME CONSUMING WASTE OF TIME... Nice idea... Badly executed

title: Effective
text: Quick, simple to use, and straight to the point. There are no complicated barriers of entry, no complex tiered subscription plans or fees. Their support team very quickly fixed a small issue I had, and whilst the documents verification process failed multiple times on me, it came down to a videocall (directly in the app itself) that helped me validate correctly in a matter of minutes.

title: Good service
text: Easy to use, friendly customer service. The only and obvious problem is that there is no option for personal contact. But that being part of the concept you can't really complain about it. I have only had good experiences with N26 who are always ready to help me when needed.

title: They blocked my acount
text: They blocked my acount telling  me that there was a violation of the contractual agreement, but they didn't say exactly what this violation was.,I guess that maybe the reason was that recently I withdrew more frequently from ATM.,When I contact them via chat they close it immediately and provide no further explanation.,They said they'll be transfering my money to the bank I have designed, but this is taking more than a week now.

title: Good services and client support
text: Good services and client support,Pros:,- Open the account was easy and fast.,- Their customer support is good.,- Mobile app,Cons:,- they do not offer shared account

title: Not a great start!
text: Not a great start! Opened an account on the 07th of January and the app is telling me they are checking my documents and it will take 2 business days! That’s me now on 36 days! There is not a contact number listed any where! The help center is also rather unhelpful. Some help would be nice.

title: This bank is a joke.
text: This bank is a joke.,I was victim of fraud as someone used my debit card details online and spent a big amount.,I disputed the transactions and ordered a replacement debit card.,The bank asked me to fill in dispute forms which I did. The bank told me that they would send the forms to Mastercard for review. Two days later, I received an email from N26 bank that my dispute has been approved by Mastercard and I will get my money back in 3 days.,However, after 3 days, there was no money in my bank and the bank 'seized my account'. I was given no reason whatsoever. After several days, I received an email from bank asking me to provide some personal details to confirm my identity and source of funds.,I provided the requested information on the same day.,Two days later, I received another email from N26 that the checks on my account were successful and my account was 'fully operational'.,I asked again about the status of the dispute I had raised. But no reply.,Next day, I received yet another email from N26 support team that my account has been closed with immediate effect.,I was given no reason why they did so. I was given no response to my dispute. I have been asking them again and again to give me my money back but there is a complete silence.,To make things worse, there is no telephone line where you could call and complain.,This bank is a scam. ,Please stay away; your money is not safe with them.

title: N26 is great
text: N26 is great.  I can do most of the things I need without having to go to a bank and this including opening the account.  Also, I do not pay any charges when I transfer money to pay my rent for example, even when the recipient uses another bank.,You need to be careful as N26 only permits 5 free withdrawals from the ATMs.  Also, my N26 card is not accepted everywhere, such as places where they only accept debit cards.  Finally, the card is basically a Master-Card.  There can be places where they only take VISA, in which case you cannot pay with your N26 card.

title: I needed a bank that offered easy…highly recommended *****
text: I needed a bank that offered easy online use, a debit card, contactless payments.,N26 offered everything I needed and more!,I have read mixed reviews but I can happily say that I have not experienced any of the issues that I’ve seen in the bad reviews. My money goes in fine, I can use my card everywhere and withdraw money from ATM points.,I am able to move my money about within my account into my designated ‘spaces’ designed to help manage my money. ,I’ve had to speak to the customer support via the ‘chat’ section on the app and was with an advisor within seconds who after a few security questions was able to assist me and they did so quickly giving me all the information I required. ,I not normally someone that writes reviews but I am so over impressed by my new account I couldn’t not express this!,If your thinking about getting an account with chip and pin, contactless, use everywhere and you want to easily be able to manage your account then this is the account for you!,You get a seethrough card that looks stylish and a sleek!,You download the N26 app that is easy to use and secure to your fingerprint (if your phone offers this) or use a personal password.,Highly recommended!! *****

title: Terrible Customer Support
text: Customer Support experience:,1. Click on the Chat button in the web.,2. Tell the bot that I need a confirmation for my transaction.,3. Bot didn't help.,4. Wait for human.,5. Human asks again, "How can I help?",6. "I want a confirmation for one transaction.",7. CS advices me to check Statistics page in the app.,8. I'm browsing the app to find where the Statistics page is....,9. I get dropped from the chat for inactivity.,10. Start a chat again.,11. Do the steps 2-7 again. Including CS asking me again, "How can I help?" after bot failed to process the request and my previous conversation got dropped because of inactivity.,...,19. I'm on the Statistics page.,20. CS: "Press and hold on the transaction",21. Me: "Nothing is happening",22. CS: "Is it a transfer or card payment?",23. Me: "Card payment.",24. CS: "We do not provide that.",25. I need it for the customs authorities.,26. You can print the whole month statement and highlight the transaction.,27. But I do not want to share my whole month statement with a third party. I need it only for this one transaction.,28. Sorry, we do not provide that currently.,29. Could you please explain me why is it not possible?,30. Got dropped from the chat....,This is one experience from today. I don't remember ever having smooth CS experience with N26. If you never need to talk their CS, it's an OK app to use.

text: Tried to open a Uk account. I have accounts with Monzo, Starling, Revolut and a couple of traditional banks. title: Awful experience
text: Awful experience, I mistakenly transferred some money from my account to a non existent bank account number.  I expected this money to bounce back as it should.  a week later i checked and still noting returned.  ,I contacted N26 who said they had no idea where this money was and would investigate,  Weeks and weeks went by and every time i contacted to support team via the messenger service it was the same fob off "its being looked into, we will update you soon" plus the customer service function were incredibly rude and even cut me off a few times when i had reached out again.,I will be contacting them daily until i have my money back as it is clearly a issue with N26 as i have already been in touch with the bank sent to and they have confirmed that the account i sent the money to is an inactive account.,Do not go near this bank for day to day banking as they clearly have no clue how to treat customers!

title: Update at the bottom. was 1* now 4*
text: Opened a metal account almost a month ago. Have contacted N26 on the phone and via the online chat feature a number of times. ,The phone calls didn't resolve the issue but the people on the phone were friendly and professional.,However still no card. All I'm given is a link to UPS tracking, then told the card has not arrived from the manufacturer. So I'm being given a tracking link to something the N26 themselves don't have. ,There are no timescales to when I can expect my card. Rather the support staff say I will have it ASAP or soon. Also in the most recent exchange the support staff assured me that I "could use the account the fully".,When I challenged them on how I make atm withdrawals without a card, they simply offered me the email address to make a complaint. ,As it stands, I have signed up to a paid account with a host of benefits that I can not access.,Update,So the card finally arrived, just in time for my holiday. Works like a charm. Didn't have any issues using it abroad. The app kept me up to date with all transactions through instant alerts. Most of the reasons for calling my traditional bank, I can manage myself through the app. ,Not sure if the production and delivery issues with the metal card have been resolved, but now I have the card. Very happy with the functionality of the card and account.

title: Fantastic service

title: Perhaps the most comfortable banking experience in the whole of Europe
text: N26 has been my bank of choice for the last 4 years, and I have not once regretted signing up. They have never charged me a penny, and even though they have restricted their product considerably since launch, they are still above the competition in my book. It has been a very user-friendly experience for me, and I feel like a valued customer each time I contact support. Which hasn't been often mind you, because once you have signed up and been verified, the product basically just works.,Pros:,- No recurrent fees,- Full checking account,- Debit MasterCard,- Easily manageable app,- Enable/Disable access to MasterCard in full or in part with the touch of a button,- Send money without a banking address with MoneyBeam,- No foreign currency fee,- Fast responsive customer support,Cons:,- Credit rating might hurt you now when trying to sign up, didn't in the beginning,- Google Play dependency (not desirable for Custom ROM lovers like myself) ,- Only 3-5 ATM withdrawals per month in Germany (unlimited in the beginning),- Cash withdrawal now comes with a fee in some countries,The cons are not that important to me, that's why I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a basic checking account with some nice bonus features sprinkled on top.

title: Unbelievable Negligence UK
text: Simply Ridiculous, money was sent by BACS which they do not support , that's fine. But my money hasn't been returned over 14 days and as far as I am concerned . That is theft . Do not use this bank

title: Banking as it should be
text: Online banking as it should be: simple, fast, easy. The main caveat is that the MasterCard provided is a debit card and not a credit card. Not that it bothers me to see my bank account being debited immediately, but some merchants do not accept debit cards for securing a deposit and only accept credit cards (e.g. hotels, car rentals, ...). Support via the mobile app is great due to the tight integration. Would like to see more services being offered in markets other than Germany (I use it Luxembourg) and would like to have more ATMs support money withdrawal (very little ATMs in Luxembourg allow to withdraw money using the N26 MasterCard debit card - so far ING ATMs work but there are very little such ATMs available throughout Luxembourg).

title: Highly recommend N26... Very competitive and progressive!
text: Highly recommend N26... It is a very progressive service... international outlook, very competitive charges, good travel cover, super simple and effective saving "space" idea towards goals etc, very good customer support... All in all I'm very happy and looking forward to future updates to the service!

title: Very poor service
text: Very poor service - account opened quickly and easily and ran ok for a while. ,Don’t try and do transfers on a weekend - they just don’t work - when they do if there has been a problem with it - it shows on your statement but doesn’t tell you whether they have taken it or not. It has NO pending payments method. ,Off their own back they said their systems aren’t up to scratch and don’t have the facility to show pending or bounced payments. ,The downside to this is that you never actually know what your balance is as it shows pending payments as proper payments on you statements so these are are subject to change. ,My account was closed by then as I used my card on two occasions and had cancelled card transactions on both because I had a credit balance but apparently I had no money!!!!! Down to their poor functioning systems not showing me a live balance it causes errors - stay away from this company!,Also if you need any help you have to do it through an online chat which is slow and cumbersome. For one query I had someone tell me that they were going to get back to me - no one did - I had to call NatWest who could tell me what they were doing wrong. ,N26 is a brilliant idea but sadly lacking and more like a Mickey Mouse bank - a bit all mouth and no trousers. ,Just stick to your normal bank - much easier.

title: N26 banking app in UK
text: I was recommended N26 by a friend and I was intrigued and excited about this new (to me) virtual banking app. Application through N26 app was easy (free download in Apple app store or Android app store). N26 is a German bank but with UK banking licence, UK sort code and UK bank account numbers. BACs wage payments can also be set-up if this is your only bank. My new Mastercard card arrived made from very cool see thru plastic. Black and metal cards also available apparently. I transferred some money from my Barclays bank account to my N26 bank account as a test and it was instantly available. App is easy to use and navigate. N26 staff on hand if you have a problem. I used the chat function to ask a few additional questions. Mastercard is contactless once you've used it in an ATM. Pin number chosen by me through the app. Excellent banking concept.

title: Wolf in sheep’s clothing.
text: As a lot of Uk consumers do already thanks to the FCA constantly advertising, make sure you read the t&c’s!! ,Basically marked up as a bank but more of a glorified payday loan structure to its corporation.,There is no banking as such but for nearly £15 a month you can have an account with which you can do virtually nothing?? ,Unlike main stream uk banks that offer breakdown cover & a dozen other benefits for a lesser fee plus free spending abroad so it actually offers nothing by comparison.,No direct debits,no standing orders Etc but surprise surprise there are plenty of fees!,I question half of the reviews that have been left on trust pilot & looking at the list of CEO’s & reviews of its former employees I’d rather give my money & personal details to my 10 year old than these but your choice.,Target market definitely sub prime sector that are desperate for a few quid to try & make it seem more attractive to investors & generate more revenue.,Stay clear & stick to the main stream banks.

title: Complete shambles
text: Totally useless! ,Poor app platform. As this is an app based bank that isn't a good start. ,Paying money to another account requires you to type in the account details of the person or company each time you want to make a payment. Every account I have used has had the ability to store the payee's details for future payments.,Worst of all they can not provide the services they offer. ,Every day I had my card it was blocked when trying to use the ATM. Now N26 does have a ridiculous ATM limit, but if its offered you expect it to work at least once. ,After numerous chats to customer service I made a complained to try and get the matter resolved. The response was to shut the account without explanation. I guess it's better to run from your mistake then to admit the bank has one,As of this moment I have yet to receive the balance that was in the account at the time it was shut. And no response to the email asking for it to be returned. I will be interested to know what the FSA and the banking ombudsman have to say about this!!,Looking for a app only bank try Starling or Monzo,If you want to look at how not to run an app only bank sign up Now!!!!
