title: Customer support chat
text: I contacted the customer support chat so many times, but I got so many incorrect answers, false promises and also inconsistent answers (if you ask the same question twice you get a totally different answer). It is jus unbelievable. ,I filled in the feedback form quite extensively 3 weeks ago with all the issues and some suggestions. I did not get any feedback from it, because it went to the department "ideas". I contacted them and I have to email them again with all the information that was in the feedback form, because they cannot access the feedback form from the department "ideas".

title: They are good if you need to open an…
text: They are good if you need to open an account quickly and without much bureaucracy. ,But their customer service is terrible. I had a problem with an withdraw that I canceled on an ATM and they took the amount from my account anyway, I went on the web chat and they said in 5 days my money would be returned, which didn’t happen. I contacted them again and said I was traveling and needed the money and they asked me for things that the other attendent did not say I would need and that it usually takes 12 day, not 5 as the previous guy said. In conclusion, I still don’t have my money back and they qere not helpful at all!

title: Account opening refusal
text: I was an early sign up to N26 at the end of 2017 to get early access to the UK launch this year. I patiently waited for my invite went though application process and waited for verification. 7 days later l get a curt refusal with no explanation.,I have an excellent credit history so am mystified by the refusal. I am not bitter, just  very disappointed as the account promised so much. I will stick with Bunq for Euro payments and Revolut to get my Euro back to UK.

title: Absolutely abhorrent - avoid like the plague
text: I try not to leave bad reviews as I know how bad they can reflect on the brand, but in this particular case it really warrants it. So here goes. ,Completely terrible from the start, first of all the verification process took well over three days, during the sign up process it implies that the verification process is a quick and simple process. From my experience it really wasn’t. ,In the end it got activated so I thought I’d give N26 a go. What a terrible mistake that was. ,Most banks in the UK now support faster payments, meaning that if somebody sends you money, majority of the time it’ll be with you in seconds, again for me it wasn’t. Two different people wired me significant sums of money which when I went on chat to N26 support to see where my money was they told me it could take up to two hours. ,So I waited...and nothing. I then got told that due to some regulations it can actually take up to the next working day, which really frustrated me as I’d been onto chat about 5 times at this point and been given different answers. ,Luckily the money cleared another few hours later into the account. ,So, like any normal person I needed to make a couple of purchases on the net, first purchase went through fine, second one not so much. The card kept getting declined, over and over and over again. I had been onto N26 support about 10 different times at this point (I got many answers saying that the cards been unlocked and wait ten minutes, to blames on the retailer, until the last advisor just gave up and blamed MasterCard). ,I don’t say this lightly but N26 is the worst FinTech bank I know of. It’s just all marketing and a slick interface. Support and actual use of the account is terrible, it’s unfinished and needs a lot of work. ,When a bank can’t even provide its users with basic banking functions, like transferring money and spending you know to stay away.,I’ve used Starling, Monzo and Revlout and they’re great. They all have they’re own pros but N26 has nothing but cons. ,Please, for the love of god stay away from this bank, just save your time and money and use one of these other banks mentioned above if you want to use a challenger bank.

title: Transfer Lost
text: I sent a transfer of 4000 pounds to a client form my bank not knowing N26 only accepts Euro payments through SEPA. The client did not receive the funds and had to push the customer service to even acknowledge that a payment of 4000 pounds had been received and rejected, but not credited to their account. It apparently did not show up on the statement.,In order to have them accept payment, either an amendment is needed to convert to Euros and deposit in his account, or if rejected, have the funds sent back to the originator's account, so I can convert it to Euros and resend send it.,After several weeks the funds have not been returned, nor have they been converted and credited his account and neither of us can find out what happened to those funds or where they are.,So unprofessional, and I will be contacting the regulators in Germany to lodge a detailed complaint.,Very dissatisfied and I am recommending no one should use this company as there is no way to contact them and their customer service is appalling.

title: Don't Bother
text: Terrible service,, i am in the UK and applied for the N26 account , and got an email the following day saying,, sorry we cant open an account, with no explanation and basicly a dont bother us again letter, no explanation no reasons , just a go away letter,, i have existing bank accounts and credit cards , on arrears and savings , cant even pay actual cash into this account,, read many dodgy reports about N26, freezing money and closing accounts for no reason also customer service non existant and only give stock answers,  if you want a top service internet bank, where you are not just a number and 24 hour uk phone support, use First Direct,, they care about the customers not about getting money out of you.,The only good thing about this bank account is the transparent card they issue,, and that is where it stops being cool

title: Refrain from signing up
text: I have had very mixed experiences with number26 bank (hereafter referred to as “N26”). When I joined N26, I thought I would be relieved of annoying bank policies that made no sense. I thought N26 was more transparent, helpful and dynamic. I was happy when I received my free card and decided to upgrade to Black. That would make it even better, right?,Well, it turned out I was wrong. N26 isn’t quite in the business of making a better bank experience for customers, it’s rather in the ‘make money quick’ business. This has been evident to me through various experiences.,First of all, don’t bother contacting Customer Support. They will be able to chat FAQ answers to you, but won’t go an inch father for you. My card broke after about 7 months, I’ve never had something like that before (as in their cards would last years) with my previous banks. I contacted N26 Support in the hope they could do something for me since I had been a Black member for a while, but all they could do was refer to the app and indicate that I had to pay.,N26 tries to lock you into contracts. Black or Metal runs at least a year and renews a MONTH before the expiration of the first year. And yes, they do send unclear emails regarding the cancellation, for which you only have a four week timeframe. They send one email. One.,I’m very disappointed in N26 and I wish things had turned out differently.

title: Echo all the other reviews
text: Echo all the other reviews. Told I couldn’t have an account, no real reason given and no way of finding out why.,Never been turned down for any bank account, don’t have and credit issues and on the electoral roll at the home I live in and own.,Insulting email and have a sense they are not telling the full truth why they are turning so many down.

title: Absolute Garbage !
text: Like many others on here, I applied for an account, and a week later received an email saying they wouldn't open an account, and not to bother them again.,Well, there is certainly no danger of me contacting them again, they can be sure of that !,I'll be sticking to Revolut !!!!!

title: customer support is horrible
text: customer support is horrible. They never do what they say they will do.

title: it is an incredibly bad service
text: it is an incredibly bad service, not only the customer service, but caps for foreign currencies..,I have decided to stop using their services and have decided to sign up with revolut

title: On 23rd October I opened a joint…
text: On 23rd October I opened a joint account at the Berlin branch and immediately transferred 100€ to establish the account. On the 26th October I received notification, with no clear justification, that my account had been closed. Since then I have been trying to get my 100€ balance transferred back to my account with no success - all I get is excuses and they have now stopped responding to my emails. I am a pensioner and this money is important to me. I would appreciate any advice on what action to take next?

title: Had an email from back office last…
text: Had an email from back office last week, locked all my funds with no reply - very worrying.

title: AVOID THEM LIKE THE PLAGUE.
text: Started good then when my account had substantial money they just freezed it It has been more than three weeks now I have received NO explanation or any type of communication. They do NOT answer emails and there is no telephone number to call. LOOKS JUST LIKE A BIG SCUM.,AVOID THEM LIKE THE PLAGUE.,I plan to prepare a lawsuit against them anyone that wants to join please join facebook group "Claims against N26 Bank"

title: Totally useless. Certainly no Monzo or Starling bank. Possible scam?
text: Totally useless. Spent the time applying and just received and email saying:,'Apologies, but we aren’t able to open you an N26 account. As a bank we have to follow strict legal requirements for every account we open. Unfortunately, this decision is final and our Customer Support cannot make an exception or help you further.,Thanks again for your interest in N26 and we wish you all the best.,Your N26 Team',What a terrible reply. ,BTW I currently have a mortgage, 2 credit cards with substantial credit limits along with a credit score of the top 10% in the UK.... ,I'm not that bothered because I was only really wanting to see what this German bank had to offer. What a bunch of jokers. You can't reply to a customer like that without a reason. ,I'll stick to using Monzo or Starling if I was you.,Now I'm just concerned that this was possibly a total scam and worried about how my data is being used! Probably going to report them to ico.org.uk tomorrow.

title: Echoing all the reviews below
text: Echoing all the reviews below. Their 'customer service' wording makes it look like I am the guilty party. They didn't even bother running a credit check against me. Had high hopes but  I am gone for good.

title: Like many others i was eagerly awaiting…
text: Like many others i was eagerly awaiting to sign up for an account and completed my application Friday. Today received an email saying they can't open an account for me and not bother contacting customer services as they will not be able to help. I've never had a issue opening an account before let alone a rejection without a reason. Looks like i will be staying with Fire.com and revolut. Very bad impression for starting out in the UK.

title: It's a no from me (and them)
text: I'm afraid I'm gonna join the side of the poor reviews. Kept waiting for ages to sign up and then got a blunt/rude email just saying no and that no matter what I do, I should never sign up again essentially. Not a great first impression and not one I'll bother with again.

title: Bad communication & bad customer service
text: I recently received an invite to join the UK version on N26, which I expressed an interest in a long time ago.,Submitted pictures of my driving licence at different angles as requested, 5 days later I receive a very blunt email: “Apologies, but we aren’t able to open you an N26 account. As a bank we have to follow strict legal requirements for every account we open. Unfortunately, this decision is final and our Customer Support cannot make an exception or help you further.”,No explanations as to why, just good bye. I tried the customer services just to see if it was possible to just get a reason as to why this happened via their web chat, the agent pretty much regurgitated the email above and then closed the chat on me immediately. Tried to sign up again to use a different form of ID (only thing I could think it could have been for my rejection), but after entering name and birth date it says there are issues with info I provided and to contact customer services, so it seems they have completely blocked/cut me off.,Terrible experience and terrible service. No issues that my application wasn't accepted, but big issues that I received no communications during the verification process to check/query with me any issues, then when rejected being totally cut off without any reasons being provided.,Was really looking forward to trying N26 out, but I will now be advising people to try elsewhere. I'd recommend Starling Bank or Monzo instead, both far superior in the customer service department, and their products are great.

title: Computer says no!
text: Computer says no. ,I received an invitation to open an account as I’d expressed interest some time ago.,Submitted my identity documents and uploaded my selfie as requested and 5 days later I get an email saying, “Apologies, but we aren’t able to open you an N26 account. As a bank we have to follow strict legal requirements for every account we open. Unfortunately, this decision is final and our Customer Support cannot make an exception or help you further.”,Final that’s it goodbye. I suspect as I’m shaved headed on my ID document and now I’ve regrown my hair their verification software rejected me. Pity they haven’t the courtesy to explain why. ,If this is an indication of how they’d deal with my business I’m pleased NOT to have an account with them.

title: Irresponsible bank
text: I used the N26 as my primary account for 3 months. I received my payments, made transfers, made withdrawals I used every day to buy something, at last, it was the perfect bank. Until one day I received a rude email saying that my account would be blocked and excluded in 10 days. This happened the week I was to receive my salary. Of course, because of the blocked account, I was exactly 26 days without receiving 1 cent because of this irresponsible bank. I would not recommend anyone to a bank that SUDDEN decides to delete your account with all your money deposited. And I mean, the reason they blocked and deleted my account was that "we can."

title: Bizarre experience
text: Bizarre experience. Tried to open an account but failed the verification process. I can only assume that it was because I know have a short beard instead of being clean shaven in my driving licence photo. This was the message I received  “Apologies, but we aren’t able to open you an N26 account. As a bank we have to follow strict legal requirements for every account we open. Unfortunately, this decision is final and our Customer Support cannot make an exception or help you further”. Hopefully they will destroy my personal data immediately. Avoid!

title: This is the worst bank for customer…
text: This is the worst bank for customer service. I have been trying to track a payment I made out of my N26 account that was subsequently reversed back to N26 37 days ago and N26 cannot tell me where this money is now. Apparently they are 'unable' to track incoming payments. An 'investigation' charge of €15 was taken off me for them to look into it and apart from the odd email telling me they are still looking into it, I have now been told an 'investigation' will take 60 days! Stay very far away from this company.

title: Opened an account. Closed it a few days later
text: Opened an account. 5 days later received two separate emails telling me my address details had been changed, and to contact them if the changes weren't made by me. I contacted them. Agent seemed very confused by the security clearance process. Eventually passed it and moved on to my problem. Agent could neither confirm nor deny the address they held for me, even when I offered it, nor if it had been changed as suggested by their emails. This was my first correspondence with N26, and after five minutes I'd lost all confidence in their internal processes. Closed my account.

title: Will not go with this bank!!
text: Will not go with this bank!!!  Began the verification process speaking with an impatient and rude customer service representative who spoke difficult to understand Russian English.  She would not accept a picture of my ID for verification and insisted I would need to use a better phone( currently using Note 3) and she couldn't do anything else.  After this occurred, I found the reviews posted here and subsequently decided not to go with them.

title: Their service is super slow
text: Their service is super slow. 4 weeks after verifying the identity on a post office and 2 weeks after sending a complain I only hear that they will investigate, but nothing has been solved yet.

title: 5 months no comms, Account b/locked
text: Account locked, card blocked, no reason given. No reply via email, customer support knows nothing about it and tells me to wait. It's been 5 months now.,I suggest everyone takes it on Twitter, they are quite sensitive to negative posts on Social Media (I have been blocked by them)

title: Blocked my account with no reason
text: Blocked my account with no reason, did not respond to emails, support disconnected without providing any help. Had to get a lawyer involved to get my money back.,Would never trust them with my money again. Avoid!

title: Terrible experience with their support
text: Terrible experience with their support. Unhelpful, takes forever to answer. Also the N26 metal card is a scam. They charge you 45 Euros to resend a card if it's lost or damaged due to its poor quality. Revolut is better.

title: This bank is the worst ever!
text: This bank is the worst ever!! You can't block contactless payments and the terms of the agreement say it's only possible do 5 transactions without a pin. Unfortunately that's not true. It goes until there is no money on your account. On top of that you can't call the rude customer service. You can only chat with them and they always ask the same questions within one conversation.,In my case the bank takes € 3 every time because someone stole my money by using my bankcard without a pin. Now that the money is stolen direct payments don't go through and N26 is charging me instead of themselves.,This is absurd and on top of that they want you to fill in a form, per transaction. In my case 81 forms and the form extremely long..,I can't believe they have an official bank license,In total 1611€ gone. After they are aware of the malfunction of their system they didn't change it. Up till now you can use contactless payments for over 5 times. The IT is a disaster!

title: Super et en plus super belle carte…

title: Bad service from N26's partners - Black card is not worth it
text: So let's start at the beginning.,I used to love this company and got all my friends to sign up with them as well. I'm an expat working in Ireland and its so difficult to open bank accounts, but N26 made it so easy. The interface is easy, the app is easy and I received my card within a few days.,My problems started when I moved over to the black card (premium). I then realized how slooow customer service is and what astonished me the most was the bad service received from Allianz (their travel insurance partner). Although I understand N26 don't have any control over Allianz, its been 4 and a half weeks, 4 emails to Allianz and no reply from them whatsoever. N26 must still take responsibility since i'm paying them the monthly fee and not Allianz (my contract is with N26).,I emailed N26 about the issue and they just apologizes all the time but don't sort the issue out. ,I reported my incident on the 8th of October. Its been a month now without any reply from Allianz.,I still like N26 but will recommend getting the normal bank account and under no circumstances the Black card as I thought service will increase, but its non-existent.

text: They make you go through all the registration process and at the final step tell you that your Nationality is not supported. ,If it is not supported, then better tell the customer before wasting their time. There are better, customer friendly banks working on the same model.

title: Termination of account with no reasons
text: I've opened my N26 account in the middle of October. 1 week later I received an email said that on November 7 my account will be terminated because I've violated some rules. I asked what did I violate (I didn't even use the card, the only operation was receiving 10 euros from my own Revolut account) and support service didn't even reply on my emails, they didn't clarify anything in chat (literally said "Read our rules, goodbye") and that's all. It's impossible to contact them, impossible to get any clarifications. Great idea, awful service. 1/5

The only phone number that works is this one: +49 162 4362311,I would not recommend to rely on this bank.

text: It's been more than a month now I am trying to contact customer service for an issue I have in my account and their chat system is either busy or failing. ,this is definitely the worst service I have ever received.,I emailed them they don't reply and it's an online bank, which means there is NO place to visit and NO easy way to contact.,I don't recommend at all !!!! ,Number26 was good but now it's very bad.

title: Sudden Termination of Account
text: I started the process of setting up an account with N26 in July. Apart from the passport verification needing a couple of attempts it was pretty straight forward.,I had made the bank account my main current account. I was very happy with the design of the application. Very smooth and had really cool features.,Then on the 17th of October I got an Email telling me that the bank was terminating my contract by the end of October because I had violated the usage contract. Despite numerous attempts by me the organisation has not disclosed what the violation was.,I had made this Bank Account my main account with my salary getting paid into it and all my bills being paid from it by direct debit. Two weeks is a very short period to change to a new bank.,I feel very annoyed with the communication and very sad that I will not get to continue to use the web and phone app.

title: great new bank
text: been a member for about a year, only good things to say about this bank. easy to control and transfer money, easy to get any issue resolved via chat. and everywhere i go, i get compliments on how cool the card looks. still going through some growing pains, but one of the best banks i have dealt with.

title: Rubbish

Then nothing eventually said didn't accept SWIFT and is stated in the T&C.that was a month ago the bank ignores all requests to return. Now chasing with German regulator who said they are having many problems with N26. Their customer service area make Ryanair look good avoid

company_reply: Hi. We're sorry you encountered this issue. The app will work on phones running operating systems newer than Android 5.0 or iOS 9.

title: N26 are THIEVES - run away as fast as you can
text: I've lost over €1000 because I didn't take all these recent bad reviews of N26 seriously. Do not open account in N26 and if you already did, take your money somewhere else ASAP.,I've been N26 client for 4 months now. Personal account. Everything worked fine until this week. ,* Get ready that you will be investigated like terrorist for ordinary amounts of money from/to your closest family member /in EU/. You will be asked to provide invoice or paper contract and explanation of both source of funds and purpose of transactions. (No joke). Send your mother €2000 and you're done.,* Get ready that your money will be FROZEN without any warnings. ,* Based on what I read here, get ready that your money will be STOLEN for ever. Forget 100K EU guarantee. It's a lie.,* All info you'll get from support is bullsh*t or no reply,This bank is built to rob ordinary people and they hide behind EU/German AML law. ,I'm surprised that no legal authority took action against N26 already.,UPDATE Sunday Oct 7th,While I couldn't make SEPA transaction via iPhone nor web last days as they blocked it (red notification "Error"), today I tried my luck with ATM and my N26 MC - for the first time, as I used N26 as diversification account. ,I tried KBC Belgium ATM with €200 withdrawal and to my surprise it gave me my money! Great. €800 left. I tried again with €800 and it said rejected. ,Then I got idea to try ATM of different bank, so I went to Raiffeisen Vienna with €500 withdrawal and bingo! Now it started to be exciting. €300 left. I went to Erste ATM, tried €200, it said: daily limit overrun. I opened N26 app and my daily limit was 1600. Strange math, but I raised it to 2500 and finally Erste gave me €200. Tomorrow I will ask N26 to close my account, so I have left them €100 in case they want to charge me €63 for that plastic card of value of €2.50.,I would never say that one day I will experience that feeling of 1929, when you get your own money from the bank and you feel like you just won the lottery.

text: I would avoid at all costs. Useless customer support. ,They messed up at and wont even correct it nor put me in touch with a manager to escalate it.,Pathetic.

title: TERRIBLE COMPANY... STAY AWAY FROM IT!
text: Hi,,Long story short.,I signed up for a private bank account.,After a few days I opened a new business in Ireland and I wanted to create a "business" bank account with N26. ,I went to their web site and found out that it is not possible having a private and a business account at the same time.,I then closed my personal private bank account in order to be "in compliance" with their rule and tried to sign up for the business one.,Unfortunately the system didn't allow me to do it so I tried to call them and here I found the first problem: NO TELEPHONE NUMBER WHATSOEVER!!!,Then after struggling a lot I found online their email support (I COULDN'T FIND IT IN THEIR WEB SITE). I then contacted them explaining the situation and this was their COLD and SHORT reply (copy and paste):,---,Unfortunately you are not able to open a new account after closing the previous account. We hope this changes sometime in the future but at the moment you can not create a new account after closing the previous one. ,Have a great day,,---,I then replied letting them know that what they said WAS NOT WRITTEN ANYWHERE in their web site and asked for a valid technical explanation (see my email copy and paste below),---,Thanks for letting me know.,Whilst I was expecting this reply I honestly don't think this is fair. I have never seen a bank with this kind of policy and, beside your answer, no valid technical explanation has been given to me yet. ,I am simply getting penalized just because I wanted to be in compliance with the rules that your company has created.,Unless you are able to provide me with a valid technical explanation, can you please escalate this to your manager? I really need a business account.,Thanks.,Looking forward to hearing from you,---,After that I have got another COLD and CARELESS reply (see copy and paste below):,---,Thanks for getting in touch and i understand your concern. I will forward this as a feedback and yes we will get back to you when we can offer you a business account. ,Have a great day,,---,So basically I'm now in their black list just because I followed THEIR RULE and I still DID NOT GET a valid answer.,The truth is "THEY ARE IN MY BLACK LIST" and I will never stop spreading bad words about them between all my family members (lot), all my co-workers and all the social medias as the treatment I have received is simply DISRESPECTFUL and UNFAIR. ,TERRIBLE COMPANY!,STAY AWAY FROM IT

title: N26 offers a very convenient service…but with issues
text: N26 offers a very convenient service that is really flexible. Its always my go to credit card in foreign countries when other cards dont work due to stupid limit issues but N26 works usually without any issues in most places and the best part is you can see the transactions immediately in the app.,One thing that sucks is customer service because as a online bank its so hard to get in touch with them and the only way is via chat where you wait in a queue anywhere from 45 mins to 2 hour to get something resolved. I hope they will consider having a 24/7 phone helpline number as traditional banks do to improve customer access and issue resolution.

title: Dishonest, misleading, unprofessional, and opaque!
text: Dishonest and misleading!,I am trying to obtain a residency permit and I have discovered that in order to get health insurance I need an in-country bank. My visa-free clock is ticking so time is a factor for me.,According to the website it takes 1 business day to verify your identification documents. On the 2nd and 3rd business days I contacted them (via their online chat) and got no information from the unhelpful and disinterested staff.,4 business days later I get an email stating that they will not allow me to open an account with them, offering no explanation whatsoever.,I post the email here, and note how professional their tone is in the greeting:,----------------------------------------------------------------,Hey Richard, ,thank you for your interest in N26.,Unfortunately, due to internal guidelines, we can not grant your application for account opening.,I hereby confirm the closure of your user account.,We thank you for your understanding.,-------------------------------------------------------------------------,I can't say I've ever received an email from a business that starts with "hey.",Frankly, I am happy that I will not be banking with them, they are clearly very lax, unprofessional, misleading, and uninterested in their customers. I dodged a bullet here.

title: absoluteley awful
text: absoluteley awful - i have never had sucha bad customer experience with any customer in any sector. i have had an issue for 1 month now - i am trying to set up a savings acconut; the money has gone from my current account and the savings account, after 1 month is still not set up. the money has simply gone from one of my accounts to where no one seems to be able to tell me. i cannot get any substantive response from their complaints department or so called customer support.,i have escalated it to the german canking authorities (BaFin) and i will take it to my lawyers this week if it is not resolved., I would never, never recommend them,shame i cannot give them negative stars

title: Perfect assistance
text: Perfect assistance. ,Problem occured cause Paypal hasn't been the best recently, n26's assistance was extremely helpful and they kept me updated with what was going on. Very pleased with Yosta specifically and I'm confident if anything goes wrong in the future they will make sure it gets fixed asap.

title: Pretty bad first impression!
text: Pretty bad first impression!,The company advertises transparency, but I felt they were dishonest right when trying to open a Metal account: they tell you can open a bank account in 8 minutes, but it's just the amount of time you take to fill a form to give them away your data. After that they tell you that you still have to install their app (which my device had problems to do), just to find out you might need to go to a post office to send them your identity proof. I mean, really? I thought they were a DIGITAL bank.,I went then to the post office today, just to find out their misleading instructions made me lack a document. So I have to go once again if I want to open the account... oh well, seems like those "8 minutes" are way beyond hours by now.,The worst part is that they actually provide you with a link for the customer support, but that simply leads you to a F.A.Q. page. Great customer care.,Why would I conclude my registration at all?

title: An excellent and simple  bank. Highly recommended.
text: An excellent bank, the best for someone looking for simple modern, and 0 trouble banking services. Polite, fast, and straight forward. ,If you are looking for investment banking that is probably not the bank for you.

title: Bad customer support
text: During the sign up process to open a bank acocunt, a photo of the id card is required.,My phone back camera is broken and the app doesn't support document upload neither front camera.,Reached out to support to request them to provide an alternative form of contact for me to send them the documentation and they suggested I'd use a friend's phone.... Great support. Went with another alternative in the end.

title: N26 its a joke guys take all the bad reviews serious..
text: These Clowns will close your account without any justification. I lost alot of money because of these clowns dont trust them with anything  N26 will just waste your time.

title: If I could give this bank a minus 10 I…
text: If I could give this bank a minus 10 I would. It’s incredibly hard to reach them, when you do they don’t provide any logical answers. In the end they refused to open my account claiming “my type of passport” was not in their system. Whatever they meant by that. I’m even concerned about the legitimacy of this business. It’s very strange that after they got a hold of my personal information they refused to open an account giving a non-sense explanation.,Reading other reviews and the replies from their costumer dis-service, I’m perplexed that they even give you attitude in their replies, showing their true colors for all to see here.

title: This bank has no.support or customer service
text: Hello, my account has been frozen, chat will not help, 25emails have gone unanswered. I am now taking this to the media and the banking regulator.

title: Charged me 25 euros for express…
text: Charged me 25 euros for express delivery(2 days) but I had to go to Dublin to retrive it myself on the 3rd day. Told me to take my issue with the 3rd party(ups delivery) like they don't have any responsability for their collaboration. They told they cannot refund my 25 euros, simply it cannot be done, impossible :)) Petty bank for 25 euros that would have made a customer happy and maybe bring them a good review. GG N26.

title: Terrible customer care
text: Today I have contacted company n26 to make my bank account. and I have been so stressed while the ID verification process because of the cheap attitudes of the staffs. I have tried 5 times of ID verification and have experience unrespectful attitudes. The way they talk, speed, explanations, and none of them were good enough for me, it just seemed like these staffs were picked up from a street and put on a chair with microphones with out any test or interview. I have called 3 staffs and the way every single staff talked was hard for me to understand. I’m from korea which means I’m not an native English speaker and I may not have a good exent or pronounciation, but I could atleast understand what people are talking about. I have just came here for my daughter’s school, and needed to make a bank account to receive 5800 euros per month and 26000 euros per year for my daughter’s school from my husband and I wanted to go through this with your company, but now it seems like I don’t need your company because I may loose my money when your company is bankrupted

title: One month before I applied n26 card and…
text: One month before I applied n26 card and still showing verification progress why i dont know .whenever i talks with customers care they said Unfortunately, we cannot offer you an account due to legal requirements. Please note that our Customer Service cannot help you any further or make an exception for you. Why even i provided everything?? Who help if customers care doesn’t know

title: Worse than useless
text: After about 4 months of use, N26 canceled my account with no advance warning, claiming the account was used in violation of the terms of service, but refusing to say anything else. I hired a lawyer, who after reviewing my account statement said he can't see anything wrong with it, however even if I prevailed in court, it would only result in the cancellation taking two months instead of being immediate. Since at that time it was almost two months after cancellation and they returned my balance, that's the end of it for me.,I wasted many hours trying to figure out what happened. I still don't know how they came to the conclusion to cancel the contract or of they were even telling me the truth. As far as I can tell, it's entirely possible that they, rather than me, were the violators of the terms of service. I don't really care if they are incompetent or have something against me being their customer, their own ToS gives them an option to end the contract amicably (two months advance notice), which they didn't.This was the worst bank experience that I ever had and I can't recommend N26 to anyone.

title: First impressions not good
text: Paid for express delivery of my new N26 Metal card.  I got a UPS link confirming delivery but that's where it's all gone very wrong.,Nobody at N26 knows when the card will be sent.  Customer service, whilst polite, is useless.,Customer service is no better than Revolut which is the company I left because they also couldn't supply me with a metal card.,If this is how they welcome new customers, I can't see my relationship with them lasting very long.

title: N26.com is a FRAUD !!! Horrible bank, useless customer service.
text: Horrible bank service. Useless customer service.,Stay away from N26.com they seem to be a total fraud !!!,I was supposed to receive a transfer of 105K euro; N26 has received it but it has not credited the money to my account; it has been more than a month now.,Every time I call customer service they tell me they don't have any information and they cannot do anything; every email I send to N26 back-office regarding my case, it's completely ignored (I don't even get a response back).,I now have contacted the Interpol and I have hired a lawyer to get my money back.

title: They don't give up
text: They don't give up! Still spam and threats to pay them 63 Euros or else!. Or else what? ,N26, if you reading this, I'm advising you to grant my request: Taking me off your mailing list that is, OR ELSE! I WILL SPAM YOU DAY IN DAY OUT!!! GET THE F.....CK OUT!!!!!!!!!!

title: This Company is simply awful
text: This Company is simply awful, I have the same Problem as other customers. Completed everything online verification etc..,Never received any further contact from them and simply forgot about the whole experience.,Next Thing i get is an email demanding money for something i never received. I am severley disabled and this is causing a great deal of unnecessary stress and they could not care less.,Do not fall into the same trap. I will take my chance with them in court if neceassary, thank god for lawyer insurance.,I agreed to a contract that you did not fulfill.,And as I said I am not paying for something I have never had.,This is causing me too much stress and I will not enter into further communication on this matter.,I have made my position very clear.,Thank you for being such a caring company regarding your customers.,Regards,Robert B,--,Sent from myMail for Android,Friday, 24 August 2018, 10:31a.m. +02:00 from support,  , ,Hey Robert,,We cannot waive this fee. You have agreed to a contract. The account is open. If the card didn't arrive, it is your responsibility to let us know this so we can reorder it or locate the lost one. The benefits of the Black account are accessible without a card.,I've outlined your options in the last two emails. Please let us know how you'd like to proceed.,Have a great day,,Caitriona,N26 Customer Service,Klosterstraße 62 | 10179 Berlin,--------------- Original Message ---------------,From:,Sent: 24.08.2018 09:05,To: n26,Subject: Re[2]: RE: Confirmation 02496358,  ,Please cancel this account. I have never received your side of the contract being the card.,There is no valid contract and this is very stressful for me. I am severely disabled with a very serious heart condition and this is making unnecessary stress.,Please delete my information and that will be an end to it.,Many thanks, best regards.,Robert B,--,Sent from myMail for Android,Wednesday, 15 August 2018, 11:31a.m. +02:00 from support,  , ,Hey Robert! ,Thanks for getting back to us. ,The N26 Black account has a minimum contract period of 12 months. As the legal revocation period of 14 days has already passed you have two options: ,1. You can cancel your account immediately and we will debit the remaining monthly fees. Please be aware that by closing your account immediately, all of the additional N26 Black account features will also cease to have effect at the same time. We kindly ask you to make sure that there are sufficient funds in the account if you choose this option. ,2. You can keep your account and only cancel the additional N26 Black features at the end of your contract.,Please let me know which option you choose. ,You can find more information about this topic in our Support Center: ,Have a great day,,Caitriona ,N26 Customer Service ,Klosterstraße 62 | 10179 Berlin,--------------- Original Message ---------------,From: ],Sent: 15.08.2018 11:28,To: support,Subject: Re: RE: Confirmation 02496358,  ,No I have never received a card.,I am sorry but I am severely disabled and can not deal with all this back and forth.,I am not paying for something that I have never had.,Please just cancel everything and forget about it.,Thank you,Robert B,--,Sent from myMail for Android,Wednesday, 15 August 2018, 11:24a.m. +02:00 from suppor,  , ,Hey Robert,,Thanks for getting in touch!,So you never received your card? Can you please contact us via chat so we can reorder this card for you?,You can access our chat via:,- Your phone using the Service section in the N26 app,- The internet by visiting ,Our chat hours are 8:00am to 9:00pm, Monday to Friday and 8:00am to 8:00pm on Saturday.,Have a great day,,Caitriona,N26 Customer Service,Klosterstraße 62 | 10179 Berlin

title: For NO REASONS EXPLAINED they don't…
text: For NO REASONS EXPLAINED they don't allow me to open an account with them. ,I received an email where they write that they can't open an account and the Customer Service will not support me further more!!!,NO OTHER EXPLANATION!!!,I'm Italian since birth, never had any kind of issue with law, I'm a honest person and they treat me like a criminal.,Obviously I tried to contact them and, like says on the email, they couldn't give any support. ,Now, I guess the issue is, because I'm coming from a region in Italy, were two languages are spoken, the ID card is different from the regular ones, has different color and it's written in two languages, italian and german. I explain that to the support, and they said that for sure the system couldn't recognize it, but they can't do anything about that, because the system is German. ,No other options!!!!!,No request for an other document, no explanation, simply cut it off.

No card, no tracking code, nothing.,Last support person actually told me "UPS doesn't do tracking codes to Tenerife" - well, I run a business here and I can tell you that I have gotten tracking codes from UPS for stuff sent to here.,Last promise to send was to a different address, just to try that, but the card was never sent and the person never got back to me.,Today I contacted them again to give them a final try and the support person just ended the chat because I wanted to get some answers and told to someone higher up in the system.

I lost everything and I am Killing Myself Today

title: N26 Banque no1!
text: Super, simple élégant, facile a prendre en main, super support rien a dire.

title: Terrible Customer Service for a new Fintech company
text: I had nothing but terrible experience with their customer service thinking they are bank police and threatening me with their talk of giving my account to authorities if I don't pay their fees because I moved countries and through the process of trying to cancel which was a massive headache, I wanted to cancel my subscription before ever even using their online bank. For a new fintech banking, they have completely got it wrong when it comes to customer service. Getting away from conventional banking systems means the customer experience should be better, cheaper and more pleasant. They do nothing of such and try to lock in people for a few euros at the cost of a terrible customer experience. I will make sure to tell the world not to ever sign up with them.,Notice how you can't even review them on their facebook page? or make comments?

title: Are they going belly up?
text: Last month I was informed that my account will be terminated for no specific reason., ,I contacted them and I also contacted BaFin (the German regulator) to complain. BaFin responded immediately, asking me to file a complaint as they informed me that terminating bank accounts in German banks requires at least two months notice; thus it appears that N26's action to terminate with a shorter notice is illegal., ,The account was operating fine past N26's deadline so I thought that everything is fine thanks to BaFin’s intervention. I received my payroll money there, did a transfer,  but as I went to withdraw 2000 euros my account was blocked. 10 days ago they informed me that my account has been indeed terminated. They offered to transfer my moneys (over 2500 euros) to another account. I provided them the account number on the 1st of August but they have kept the moneys. Their customer “support” is unable to provide me with details about when the transfer will take place; they continuously say that my request is with their “backoffice”. In all my requests I receive this (identical) message:, ,“Hey Dimitrios!,Thanks for your email. ,I have already sent your details over to our back office team and they will be in touch with you shortly. ,Thank you,,Emily,N26 Customer Service ,Klosterstraße 62 | 10179 Berlin”, ,Tried to call them with my registered phone and customer number to be left in the queue waiting for over 25 minutes! They eventually picked up the phone when I opted to not key my customer code., ,Yet, a friend of mine who faced similar termination but only had a few euros in their account he got them back. So I am wondering if they are going belly up or if they are penalizing me for communicating with the German regulator (to whom they have yet to respond!!!)., ,“Hey N26” what are you going to do?

title: I changed my mind on opening account…
text: I changed my mind on opening account after filling out their application.  I never confirmed the card.  I was contacted repeatedly to confirm the card.  I told them I did not want the card.  I was told I must take the card.  Card was destroyed, never confirmed or used.  ,Today I received letter from a collections company for EUR 63,27!

title: Account Frozen for Purchasing Bitcoin on p2p Exchange
text: Also had my account frozen for spending my own money purchasing Bitcoin. Terrible service. After months of asking for clarification, now I have funds stuck in the account without any means of getting my remaining balance out. Terrible service through and through.

title: Never received card, company refuses to send a replacement.
text: The company sent my card to an address where I never received it. Since  then, for months, I have been trying unsuccessfully to contact them. Their phone number never works and their in-app live chat support requires me to put in the number of the card I never received to access. They have been sending me nasty letters about my account being overdrawn and me needing to pay them money. This would all be resolved if they would simply SEND ME A DEBIT CARD, but this is something they are clearly incapable of doing. I was able to reach them on the phone once, only once, and they refused to send a card to me. Avoid this company, it is not worth the trouble and they have no interest in helping their customers with the simplest of problems.

title: All was fine until my account got…
text: All was fine until my account got hacked. Since then, I've spent two months trying to get the stolen funds returned to my account. At a traditional bank, this is a straightforward process, but not with N26. Oh no. Thankfully I'm only missing €400, but I'm very thankful I don't use N26 as my primary bank. ,I've now sent them disputed payment sheet four times (once to each agent), and still nothing.

title: Super banque !
text: Super banque !! Au top!! Vive N26

title: CASH 26 blocked me from my funds
text: Tried using their CASH26 withdrawal system for the first time to pay my rent and the linked barcode they sent didn't work. After speaking with two separate employees I was informed it's a glitch in the system and that there would be no way for me to access my own funds for 24 hours until they are able to cancel and refund the money they had already withdrawn from my account. They provided no additional resources or apology. Clearly they're still figuring things out....

title: Compelled to write a review
text: I have been compelled to write a review due to all the negative reviews (as you know, most people write negative reviews but those with positive experiences never think to write them). I opened my account in April 2018, and so far I can say it has been great. I am notified all the time of outgoing transactions and credits to my account. Most important settings can be modified on the fly in the app (e.g. daily withdrawal limit, overseas transactions, etc). This already removes the need to call customer service in most cases. The only downside I can observe so far is that the Maestro is not a German EC card. I actually have no idea why they offer a Maestro card at all - it's very stupid actually. But mostly, this account is great!

title: Metal account is a joke 14.90 a month…
text: Metal account is a joke 14.90 a month for what a bit of metal surrounded with cheap plastic it looks terrible no since I got it’s in January and I take good care of it ,  they have a new one now all metal was told that existing account holders would get a replacement for 10 Euro in June well it was mid July and nothing so I called lol no answer then send 4 emails two weeks later thats right as a “premium” account customer mmmm no it’s going to cost 60 Euro and there  is a long waiting list weeks , months maybe year with this crowd I was told that there was nothing wrong with the 1st metal card then why are they issuing a new one lol ,I have been with them for since Dec 2015 here in Germany, they where ok ish then but now forget it.  Go to ING-DIBA if in Germany they may not be Latte, vegan Hipster banking but the are a real grown up bank for real life.

title: Please do not bank with N26 for your…
text: Please do not bank with N26 for your own health.,They blocked my account for approximately two months without any communication about what was going on which is not even the worst bit.,They have now cancelled my account and have hold of my funds which is a significant amount without any reply about how to get this back.,N26 have literally stolen my money and are ignoring all my attempts to get in touch and retrieve this. I am now having to take the legal route at a lot of unnecessary stress to myself and my fiancee as they have our wedding savings.,Absolute disgrace and I never complain about companies normally.

title: THIEVES!!
text: THIEVES!!! won't cooperate on missing payments when they money is clearly with them for the last 2 weeks, confirmed by payees bank.

title: DO NOT SIGN UP WITH THEM.
text: DO NOT SIGN UP WITH THEM.,Currently in week 5 of waiting for my account to be verified — a process that was supposed to take "up to 3 days". ,Go with one of the established players. N26 is writing cheque's that they cannot cash.

title: Internet Bank with growing pains
text: Key facts: ,- N26 doesn’t save you from private fees of some ATMs (in my case 6 EUR for withdrawing 10 EUR),- customer support is slow in responding via email and I mean really slow: at least 8 days no answer,- waiting time for reaching the customer support chat agent is at least 30 - 45 min waiting,- slow response time of the customer support reps in the chat app as well,- application is buggy,- customer support can’t read about previous issues you had with the company, even if it was just an hour ago, which shows that they have some serious system issues,Update October 2019: N26 resolved the issues mentioned above, except the ATM fees, customer service works better now, even though they still can’t help you to solve standard issues quickly,Long story:,First, N26 is not offering entirely free withdrawals, something you don’t expect from a company that openly advertises their free withdrawals at any ATM. Once I was withdrawing 10 EUR on an ATM in a Kiosk and was impatiently clicking through their never ending amount of questions, confidently knowing that I don’t need to pay withdrawal fees anywhere I ignored whatever was written there, ten questions later I was finally able to withdraw my 10 EUR and received a notification from the N26 app that 16 EUR were withdrawn from my account… wait a second… 16 EUR? Holy ****, I just paid 60% to withdraw some money. I was then trying to reach N26 customer support how it can happen that I have to pay fees while I am in my NO FEE withdrawal limit, after 20 minutes waiting I lost my internet connection and after reconnecting I couldn’t even find the chat icon anymore, so I wrote an email and then again… waiting… after eight days waiting and checking several times in the app if the chat icon would reappear in the support section, I was finally lucky, the chat icon came back and again I contacted the customer support team and waited in line … for 30 minutes! Once I finally reached the customer support team I was told that there are exceptions and of course, I would find them in the fine print… well if I had only known that before. ,Second, the app is not always working, for instance when you want to pay something online in an online shop and you get prompted to approve the transaction in your app, but instead, when you open your app, you receive an error message. So you contact the customer support… and again… you wait for 30 min… then finally it was my turn and the customer support rep told me to reinstall the app, which I did, and again, the same error pops up, so again I contact the customer support and again wait for 30 minutes. No, not this time, this time I even waited for 45 minutes… however, the customer support rep told me that he is not able to read about the previous issue and I have to explain him the entire problem again, after explaining him the problem again he told me that he can’t help me with this issue and I shall contact the support team via email with detailed information about my phone maker and model. I was pretty surprised by that answer because I don’t even have an exotic smartphone, just a usual iPhone 7.,Overall N26 bank feels like a cheap and buggy budget airline which has a pretty design but you can feel that they save money on every corner of the business, for instance as mentioned above, customer service, missing system capabilities and application stability. After this experience I decided that I will move on to another online bank. They should have saved the money on marketing and invest it in customer support and a good DevOps team.,Update October 2019: if you haven’t paired your N26 app to your phone you can’t approve online payments at some occasions, an error message shows up that something unexpected happened and that they are looking into it (which they actually don’t do, otherwise customer service would be aware of it) a standard issue, the customer service though is still not aware of that. However, availability of CS and internal systems improved greatly

title: A 5-star bank
text: A 5-star bank. Nothing more to say. Everything just works the way it should. Thank you!

title: Customer Service inadequate
text: I opened an account  9 months ago. I Added important amounts to the account. So far so good.,When making some important money transfers, It was not clear to me if the transfers really were made, I chatted with a customer service person and the answer was confusing. A second customer service person could not help much either. I wrote an email and it took several weeks before I got an answer; the transfers were made and they sent me a confirmation.,Now I have a new question about a non standard situation and after more than two weeks I have no answer. I tried to contact customer service via Chat, but no success; the only message on the screen is that an agent is underway.,I could not find any phone number to contact the N26 bank.,This customer service is that bad that I will have to transfer all my money to another bank.,Directly  after I wrote the above, I got contact with their customer service online (chat). This time the response was quick and all my questions were answered immediately. I also got a phone number I can call if necessary. The only critic that remains is the sluggish response by e-mail. I decided to wait and see, before transferring my funds.

title: So far it's the best bank i've dealt with.
text: I haven't had any major problems with n26, they understood my needs and they didn't make setting up an account next to impossible. My money is always there I don't see my money going away to fees i'm very satisfied so far. The only problems would be sometimes I experienced the service not working late night and CASH26 didn't work when I was in Germany.,I had major problems with BUNQ and their poor customer service.

title: The impression i got was as if n26 is…
text: The impression i got was as if n26 is your typical young marketing call center but with the elements of stereo typical post nazi german xenophobic minded staff who think they are the bank police yet can not verify anything but your address.,its not as simple singing up with them if your in the uk

title: Flawless
text: Flawless in service, app stability, execution of transaction. Use it with my iphone.

title: Trust levels aren't quite there yet!
text: I opened my account easily enough. However, it has taken 3 attempts over 2 months to order my card, first by UPS, then regular mail... which never turned up! I'm on my third attempt and this time they have sent it express without charge which is supposed to arrive in 3 working days. The first customer service rep I encountered was unbelievably rude and ended our chat before he even resolved the problem! (I guess it was the online equivalent to hanging up the phone while you are still talking!) I wrote a long complaint letter and sent the chat transcript. Another rep got back to me by email to help. The last rep I chatted with today was very helpful. So, mixed feelings on their service.  I am still dubious though, hence I came to look at others' reviews. It is worrying that there are so many negative ones and I am wondering if I should just scrap it altogether before I start transacting through them.

title: Horrible service
text: Horrible service! I broke my shoulder and I went 71cent under. They closed my account and wouldn't let me speak to a manager.

title: Very blatant bad faith actors
text: I arranged an incoming wire transfer which was held up after being identified as 'unusual'.  What followed was several weeks of frustrating communication, their customer service takes on average 4 days to respond, and were very clearly stalling the process for their own economic benefit.  The funds were required for a time-sensitive contact, and I had to scramble to find an alternative source.  ,N26 is the type of organization that would rather make a quick buck by acting in bad faith than hold onto a customer.  This attitude does not bode well for the future, and there is far better competition in the field now.  It is a shame to see N26 fall by the wayside, they were a pioneer, and operated smoothly with good customer service a couple of years ago.

title: Don't do it, seriously.
text: Opened an account about a month a go, they never got back to me, so I contacted their customer service, they said it was being processed and that they'd get back to me by the week's end, it's been over 2 weeks. I never got a confirmation email or anything, the worst bank in the world.

title: Fast and easy to open but you cannot fund it via wired funds....
text: I opened an account at N26 because it was fast and easy to do so. So far everything has been smooth. No issues with payments going through or cash withdrawals. The downside of having this account, for me at least, is that I am unable to have funds wired from the United States directly into the account.  Since I am employed by a US company and all of my banking is currently there, it really doesn't work well for me.  At this point the only way that I have been able to get funds in there is to transfer them to my friend's German bank account and to have my friend transfer the funds to N26.  If it weren't for that, I would be perfectly satisfied.

title: Unreliable and worst customer service ever
text: One of the worst customer service ever. They will cheat you, and mislead you in any way they can. If I could I would have given 0 star. ,Not sure why anybody would use them given that there are really good alternatives. I switched to Revolut and I'm very happy with them. They are decent people and they value their customers, unlike these highly unreliable people. Tbh, I wish I had read comments in here before trying them out, there are so many bad reviews.

title: Amazing Customer Service!
text: Great customer service! Was just talking to a guy called Donal in the in-app messaging service and found him very helpful with my millions of questions. Was my second interaction with the customer service team and can only say positive things about them!

title: Terrible customer experience
text: Terrible customer experience. Lock you out of your own account. No number to file complains.

title: They closed the account and take you money with 0 explanations
text: The worst costumer service and all operations managed by (I imagine) trainees. No customer support at all. You send an email, they don't reply. You use Facebook's Messenger, they don't reply. You chat through the app with someone who roughly speaks English and the answer is... "I can't help you, is out of my reach". ,The specific situation with me is the following one. I made a transfer of a significant amount to a German lawyer, in Germany, to his German bank. I received an email from N26 asking for documentation justifying the payment. It was not like a transfer to an Iranian living in Afganistan, but fair enough: in a couple of hours I send them contracts, etc. But they had already closed my account!!! And five days after replying to them and sending complaints through all few means available... still no reply. My account has a confortable amount of money and it's closed and they don't reply nor give me back the money. ,I'm receiving mails and calls from clients saying they tried to pay me and the answer was "closed account". They take my money, damage my reputation and don't care about it. Despicable

title: Awful support
text: Awful support. Can't register my account for 2 weeks. They deleted my account after first try and never told me what was the cause of problem. Now after 2 weeks when I talked with support for 5 times they finally say that my card can't be delivered to my work address and that was the problem. Now they should delete my account again so I can register again but only after 7 days. Please do not use that company if you don't wanna get cancer. I hope they don't provide same quality support for example when your card info was stolen...

title: Abusive behavior blocking access to your own funds without any explanation.
text: Be warned- this is no professional banking service provider:  They can block your access to your money and give no reason for weeks afterwards.  I am still waiting for 'Back office' to contact me, and my multiple requests to make a formal complaint have been ignored.  They may look like a 'mobile bank' but there professionalism and service is that of a failing internet start up. My poorest banking experience of my life and it's still unresolved.

title: REPLY FROM N26:
text: REPLY FROM N26:,Hey Branislav. Could you make sure all the steps in this Support center article were followed?,We can't offer the referral if any of them hasn't been.,MY ANSWER:,YES, I AM SURE!,ANSWER FROM N26 SUPPORT:,Thanks for getting in touch!,We are experiencing an issue with the referral program in Slovakia. We do not have further information on this matter. I apologize for the inconvenient.

title: The support center only answer what conveys
text: The support center answered quickly all of my doubts about how I could purchase online (I was having problems with the confirmation on the app), but now I have to cancel 2 transactions because I was charged but did not receive the product, and besides not finding any information about how to cancel transactions in their website, the support center said they would take a while to answer my email because they have many emails to answer.
company_reply: Hey Ana! We are sorry about how long it took to answer your email. ,Card transactions always happen in two steps. In the 1st step the merchant blocks a specific amount. In the 2nd step the merchant collects the money. The authorization will expire automatically after a maximum of 10 days if the merchant doesn't collect the funds. You can check final transactions on your PDF statements by clicking the arrow next to your usable balance in the mobile app.,We can send you a chargeback form if you don't recoup the funds within this period.

title: Really bad customer service
text: Really bad customer service, with no care for anything. I've got an email saying my current balance is insufficient for the upcoming direct debit and I would have to pay an extra charge.,Even though I transferred 10 minutes later from my dutch account within 1 business day, I will still have to pay the extra charge.,Why do they send the email to saying that you have to pay in the current day, if they know I live in Netherlands, and they are from Germany, therefore that transaction would take 1 business day.
company_reply: Hey Francisco, we're sorry to read this. The 3€ is for informing you that a direct debit will be refused due to insufficient funds.

title: Avoid N26 if you don't want frustration in your daily life.
text: N26 really wants to be "the app bank" and disrupt old fashioned banking by offering a sleek and affordable service. But they are failing to do so and have not yet realised that they've become what they say they want to disrupt: a conventional bank.,The app has many bugs. 3D secure often doesn't work. Sometimes payments don't work. Other times the debit card doesn't work. Duplicate charges for the same thing happens every now and then. There are issues with payments where the card needs to be authorised and an amount booked: I've experienced paying for gas, 100€ was booked, I only bought 30€ worth of gas, but it took about a week for the remainder 70€ to be refunded.,Banking needs to just work and you need to feel safe and secure and trust that you will be able to make easy quick payments at any time. N26 is not like that and often you will be frustrated by all the things that don't exactly work seamlessly. You will often have to uninstall the app, unlink your smartphone, reinstall the app, re-link your smartphone in order to get things to work. Too bad of you're trying to buy a ticket for a train leaving in 5 minutes or if you're standing at a coffee shop trying to pay, with a long queue of people behind you.,At least you know that when things don't work, there's a team of skilled and helpful customer support agents ready to chat with you at any time. NOT! N26 is the company where I've experienced the rudest, most inefficient and careless customer support in my life. They have no empathy and will rather insult your intelligence than admit something is wrong on their side. If you have a an issue that's just a little more complex than a simple question about the product, it will take several months to resolve your issue. Emails are not answered and sometimes the same email is answered by several different agents, all saying something different. There is no connection between the customer support you receive though chat, phone an email, for each of these you will have a different ticket number.,N26 also has the habit of changing terms and conditions and pricing quite often and in many cases you won't even be informed or asked to accept the changes. Let's say live in Spain and you've signed up to be a customer in Spain but N26 has repeatedly failed to deliver your debit card and for the 3rd attempt you happen to be in another country for a month and ask for the card to be delivered there: the terms and conditions and pricing applied to your account will be changed from Spain to that other country you happen to be in, and you will not even be informed about this.,I recommend you to look elsewhere, if what you want is a sleek modern bank that just works and that has your back.
company_reply: Hey John, we're sorry you've experienced such hassles using N26. ,The application functions by pairing a phone to it and this pairing quality can vary with certain models or makes, which explains why uninstalling the app and repairing your phone is necessary and efficient. ,Card transactions always happen in two steps. In the first step the merchant blocks a specific amount. In the second step the merchant collects the money. Gas stations are no different and the maximum amount is blocked when you insert your card. The authorization will expire automatically after a maximum of 10 days.,We ship cards to countries within the Eurozone only and the shipping address counts in determining which conditions apply.,We suggest sending your feedback to ideas@n26.com!

title: 2 Months to receive the card (and still nothing)
text: The title says everything. I already ordered the card twice and when I ask in the chat what happend they just say to wait more. They suggest me to use the express delivery, but I'll not pay for the Bank mistake in delivery the card, and of course, they will not give me the express delivery. Then I'll need to wait more two weeks, and if I lucky I'll receive the card...
company_reply: Hey André. We're sorry you had to wait such a long time before receiving the card. The card is shipped to the address used when signing up and we can't modify the card's trajectory once it's been sent. Have you since then received your card?

title: Don't open an N26 account, NEVER!!!
text: I saw many reviews with my same impressions of this bank account: useless and thieves!!!,I never received the credit card also after sending them messages. They continued to charge fee on the account only to have opened it, but i was unable to use it because i had never received the card! When I ask them for support, they replied after different months saying that i never asked again to have the card (that is a lie, i have the mail with the request i did)!,Howsoever, I cannot waste time following them so i decided to pay the remaining months in the way i can close the account (NO ONE SAY TO ME THAT I WAS OBLIGED TO PAY 12 MONTH, NO ONE SAY IT AT THE BEGINNING) and also this procedures it's going to take some time because they are always late on reply to me.,Summarising:,never decide to open an N26 account, they are only thieves, unprofessional and very bad at customer service! ,The only thing that makes me happy is that they will fast and easily go to bankrupt.
company_reply: Hey Giorgio. We're a bit perplexed about this review. We wish to apologise for the time you waited for the card.,Card shipments vary in time depending on the country you reside in and we rely on national postal services for deliveries. We can reorder cards if you contact us via telephone or chat, not through email as it's not as safe as the first two channels. ,The Black account is a twelve-month contract and you'll have to pay the remaining fees in order to cancel it. This is advertised on most if not all documentation. You can find it here for instance: https://docs.n26.com/legal/01+DE/06+Black/en/02black-terms-and-conditions-en.pdf,Our Support center also states the year-long minimum period: https://support.n26.com/read/000001390?locale=en

title: Easy to use & modern app, but poor customer support
text: I really like the app. It's easy to use and modern, although it sometimes has critical problems.,That being said, their customer support is very poor and makes the company and the service feel untrustworthy.,First of all, different staff answer completely differently on one thing. That makes it very difficult, time consuming and annoying to resolve issues.,Also, they never apologise even if it is clearly their fault. Instead, they say something patronising like "I can do blablabla for you!" when that's what they must do to resolve an issue, but not something extra they kindly do for me.
company_reply: Hey Thomas. We hope you can accept our apologies on behalf of our customer support agents. We suggest heading over to our Facebook and Twitter Support pages whenever you're in difficulty. Our agents will be able to help you out.

title: Payments declined for no reason -No Support reachable in days

title: Horrible video conference signup…
text: Horrible video conference signup process. Took me 30 minutes, though I did nothing wrong. I imagine a less tech savvy person to spend a lot of time on this, or simply failing to sign up.,It's just a very slow and needlessly complicated process. When you visit a bank, they don't analyze your passport quality in detail.,But it accepts people from many nations across Europe, so it's one of few banks that actually creates almost pan-European competition. This is very positive, hope they expand the offer to all EEA nations.,The bank has a free MasterCard debit card, but offers no savings account. Also it limits number of free withdrawals. So DKB bank is normally a better option, or Ferratum. But Ferratum only accepts people BORN in the nation where they reside! So if you have German passport and live in Belgium, you cannot open an account. Only if you ALWAYS live in Germany until death :-) This is just absurd, at least n26 is not that absurd. But I do read that non-Europeans living in Europe are blocked, like people with Indian passports.,I like that transactions are dated also by time, so you know when money arrives on your account - not just by date. But lack of savings account, makes Ferratum generally a more attractive offer. I therefore don't use my account every month, but has it as a backup.
company_reply: Hey Thomas, thanks for your feedback. ,N26 welcomes customers from around the world. We are obligated to verify your identity by checking a passport or national ID card before opening an account. Unfortunately, our verification partner is currently unable to verify all verification ID documents. We're sorry, but we won't be able to offer you an account at this point.,To your other point, it is our goal to continually grow our business and to offer our customers more products. However, we don't have any further information on your inquiry about saving accounts at this moment.

title: Beware of the shiny golden apple...
text: While they are somehow trying to say that an Internet Bank is better because it is faster, there are some functionalities they cannot perform as well as a normal bank since they are lacking physical offices and their own ATMs. If you are accustomed to normal German banks, this Bank may be good but can also prove to be a tiny bit inflexible.
