Unfortunately our verification partner is currently unable to verify passports from your home country. We're sorry but we won't be able to offer you an account at this point in time.

title: Great after a rocky start...
text: *** updated April 25th ****,After a less than stellar start eventually able to use account , with the sole exception of lack of Apple Pay support which I believe is an Apple issue, I’ve been very happy with the service,*** original review ***,Having recently joined N26 (as a black account holder) my experiences with their customer service has been consistently terrible.  cards not delivered for one month but service fees charged and unable to cancel (or use) account.,Unfortunately what seems to have been a good idea / innovative FinTech offering seems beset with legacy banking disdain for the customer
company_reply: Hey Conor,,we're sorry to hear that but please get in touch with our support team again, and we will refund your N26 Black fee for the first months.

title: Awful, Avoid like the plague!
text: Quite possibly the WORST customer service I have ever encountered.,Avoid this company like the plague, staff are unhelpful and rude!,I had been shopping around for an online bank and came across N26 as a potential, everything looked good on paper so I decided to try the online application....,After inputting my name and date of birth I was told that my application could not continue and I should contact customer support, trying to contact the support team leads you into a loop of FAQ's but very little information on how to actually get in touch.,Finally I managed to source a phone number and the fun began, I spoke to an incredibly bored sounding young man who advised me that I had previously attempted to open an account but as my address details were incorrect I had to go back in via my e mail address and start again then my account would be opened and I would get my card ASAP.,Brilliant, or so I thought, however, as I had apparently attempted to open the account over a year ago, I had no recollection of my original password, no problem, I will simply click the link to re set my password.... THIS LINK DOES NOT WORK,So, once again I called the number and spoke to an English Advisor called Chris, Chris advised me that he couldn't reset my password, but no problem as it was a while ago he could request for my previous application to be deleted and I could reapply, unfortunately the deletions were only done once a week on a Saturday.,I waited until the following Tuesday and tried again, once again the application did not work.,I couldn't find the number again but managed to eventually find an option for live chat...,Spoke to John, who couldn't have cared less, once again I was told that I would have to wait another week for my profile to be deleted, but apparently now deletions are done on a friday.... by this point my blood is starting to boil and I am losing confidence by the minute.  I explained to John that I had already requested this, he advised me that I would just have to do it again and be patient.,I asked to speak to a manager, John assured me that a manager would call me back ASAP however John was unable to give me a name or a number and ended the chat...... ,This was yet another lie, As I am STILL waiting for N26 to call me!,After waiting a considerable amount of time with no call from the mystery manager, I got on chat again and this time spoke to Chiana she advised me that managers do not speak to customers as they are busy doing management things and If i thought about it, surely that would make sense..... (Wow),I asked her for head offices number so I could complain that way,Finally I spoke to someone on the phone, once again, we went through all of the rigmarole of what was going on, to this point not a single person has apologised for the time wasting, the lack of service or the fact that no one seems to know what is actually going on,Finally I was told that I cannot have an account, I asked why, I have good credit and earn a good salary, but no reason was provided, I asked what the reason was, I was told that the agent that I was speaking to did not know why and would not put me through to anyone else to offer any justification,The only thing I can think is that they do not want my money.,quite possibly the worst company I have encountered for Customer service and I will be assuring that I do not recommend them to anyone looking for a bank account
company_reply: Hey Tori, we're really sorry that you were put in such discomfort. We'll forward your feedback to the corresponding department.

title: I’m lovin it
text: No problems whatsoever, the app works beautifully and the account opening was the best one I have ever experienced. ,I have 2 other online banks and this is the best one I have experienced.,So far so good.

title: REALLY bad CS assistance
text: I never had to write saying how sad and angry I am with a company.  But as N26 refuses to talk to me by email, phone, online chat and also is saying that my account will be deleted soon with no explanations I am pushed to do so. I’ve been using N26 as my main bank account for the last 2 years, before it was even a bank, never had a problem and was always a good client. I believed in this new relationship with a bank since the beginning, I recommended to friends and family to open their own accounts, I have friends working for N26 and I don’t know why this is happening. In the end, I miss a lot to have a place to go and talk to someone face to face because when they ignore you they do it for good. I work in IT and this is REALLY not the way you treat your client. The #nobullshit bank is causing a lot of trouble to their own clients, old clients, good clients, for no good reason. Please, check everything before open an account at N26 and make it your main account! N26, I am still waiting (it's been a month) for a reason why you will end my account.
company_reply: He Carolina, in accordance with our General Terms and Conditions, we have the right to terminate your access to the N26 App.,We make it a principle not to comment on any rumours. We only can say every cancellation happened for a good reason after a thorough examination.

title: Great experience
text: Great experience, easy to open an account, no monthly cost, and everything is manageable per app. Customer service is also responsive and very helpful.

title: Not very proffessional
text: I have the card for about half a year now. The payments and money transfer were all ok, that's why I recommended it to 2 of my friends via the "Invite Friends" program. Both friends ordered the card and topped it up with money. And then the story starts to complicate. The "Invite Friends" promises to give you (me) 15€ for each friend (and it was 30€ during the Christmas time). I NEVER saw this money. Contacted the support team and they say the "Invite Friends" program currently doesn't work. I don't care if it currently doesn't work - it worked (or at least was presented as working) when I invited my friends. And besides - although they said the program currently doesn't work they are still misleading the customers with 15€ reward on an "Invite Friends" page. At least they should remove that statement. ,Honestly, I'm quite disappointed with the customer service, especially because they're a bank and shouldn't afford such flaws. We're talking about money here and SCAM-ing people is the last thing you should do in a financial business.,If anyone from the N26 is reading this please contact me so we can sort this out.,GM
company_reply: Hey Gregor, due to operational and technical reasons the paid refer-a-friend program is currently disabled in some countries. We're sorry for the inconvenience and bad experience so far. We'll remain transparent and inform our customers as soon as we're able to share more information.

title: A bank like a bank should be nowadays!
Dig beyond the surface and it's a mess
text: When you peel back the layers beyond the cool app and flashy upgrades, you find a company utterly incompetent at basic service. Their partnership with Allianz is all talk: good luck getting a response if you have a claim and N26 won't do anything to help. Their partnership with Clark is useless. They don't manage anything for you. It takes up to a week to get email support responses and they usually just apologize but not solve your problem. But what really annoyed me most is it takes over two weeks to get a new card in the mail. They actually deactivated my old card before I received my new card and so I had online payments bouncing and all types of drama. I absolutely hate when companies proritize all these bells and whistles but can't get the basics right.

title: Best Bank Ever

title: Everything started out well
text: Everything started out well, easy to set up and the app was great. Over the last year though the holes in N26 have appeared and they are pretty major. The fraud that occurred on my accounts and those others who started around the same time is near at 100%, after money is stolen you are made to submit scanned documents, wait an unknown length of time to get your money back and pay for the privilege of getting your card back, 25 euro if you want to receive it in under 2 weeks. ,Receiving money internationally when not using Transfer Wise is complicated and full of flaws, the team at N26 do not know and are not equipped to give the answers required. I have money that is going to be lost in the system for 3 weeks thanks to the wrong information supplied by the team and website.,My account has been blocked more than once for no reason, the customer service hours make it impossible to do anything when this situation arises also.,Yes it is easy, but in reality its a terrible bank, if you are looking to do anything other than get settled in a new country stay clear. ,The operation is a pretty shambolic.,The response below even shows how terrible the info is, they do not accept all SEPA transfers! Even the apology doesn't have the correct information.
company_reply: Hey Thomas,,we're really sorry that you were put in such discomfort. For now, we offer a SEPA-only account. For incoming and outgoing transfers outside the SEPA zone, please use a service like TransferWise. We hope for your understanding for this inconvenience!

As soon as I have new information about your request, I will get back to you.". It is outrageous, especially to lock money before New Year‘s Eve celebrations! I ask to resolve this issue and thinking to advice other friends of mine who use this bank to choose another one.

title: So far I have mixed feelings about this …
text: So far I have mixed feelings about this service. ,+ Have received my first transaction and worked just fine ,+ Have made first transfer, havent heard of feedback if recipient has already reveived the funds though, but seems like all should be well ,+ App is simple and easy to use, nice design,- Incompetent customer care staff. Initially when signed up, took about 2 weeks to finally get some straight forward answers and assistance from staff,- Came across very rude CS agent (almost certain name was Alex). For the first time ever I felt rather disgusted by how Im spoken to, considering he didn`t bother to even try to understand what my concern is. Wasted lots of time trying to explain to him what my concern is, seemed like he is just replying for the sake of it. Threatened to close the chat after I highlighted ONE word in caps letters (no intention to be rude or "shout"), which I found hilarious and disgusting. Anyway.. Alex will learn, maybe. ,- Could not complete transfer via computer, solution from CS -> use App without gathering any feedback if this is IT issue, if account settings need to be amended etc. If I`m using computer, obviously it is more convenient for me to do so, so was surprised noone would even bother to check why the transaction would not work via computed (was receiving pop up window saying "access denied" without any further info). ,So far so good, despite the customer service.

title: N26 terminates account for purchasing Bitcoin
text: I opened an account with N26 and deposited money into my account monthly. I then decided to purchase some bitcoin using N26 MoneyBeam (buying from another N26 user), and a few days later I was interrogated by N26 staff via e-mail with regard to my Bitcoin purchase.,I explained everything as requested and provided all requested documentation, but my account was terminated with immediate effect, with a vague excuse of being in breach of their T&Cs. I looked through their T&Cs and couldn't find what I would have been in violation of, and repeated requests for clarification were ignored.,Stay away from N26, they've terrible customer service and despite being an online bank, apparently still living in the past.
company_reply: Hey Jimmi, thank you for your honest feedback, we're really sorry that you were put in a negative situation. Currently, we don't offer any kind of cryptocurrencies integration and promote the option to buy or sell cryptocurrencies with your N26 account regarding the German Anti Money Laundering Act.

title: One of the Best Banks Out There
text: N26 is one of the best banks I've ever used. Personally, I find big traditional banks highly repulsive, so an efficient online bank was the obvious choice. Here's how it compares to Revolut. ,Most importantly for me, N26 processes its card payments using the Mastercard rate, which is much better than the infamous in-house Revolut one. In other words, for every 100 EUR foreign currency payment I make using the Revolut card, I lose roughly 1 EUR versus if I made it using the N26 card. ,In addition, certain online retailers (including some in the UK) couldn't process the payment made by the Revolut card, while the N26 card worked just fine. It might have to do with Revolut card being Prepaid versus N26 card being Debit. ,This is purely personal preference, but I find the N26 Mastercard to be much more visually appealing than the Revolut one. Although, quite the opposite is true for their premium cards. ,N26 also has a better customer service

title: N26 is amazing

title: N26 is incredible
text: N26 is incredible! Everything seems easy with this bank ! Starting by opening the account ! It's so fast and easy. Just be aware that you need 2 proofs of identity. The staff is really nice, and seems happy to help you. ,When I want to have a look on my account history, I am enjoyed every time : the design is clear, simple, modern. I know immediately where I paid something and how much. The AI behind the classification is working very well and I have nothing to correct. ,The merchants are surprise and like my transparent credit card, ahaha. Also, I love the push notifications ! It's maybe the point I prefer the most, because the transaction is instantly recorded and not in two or three days, maybe more. No bad surprise ! ,Then, when I need to transfer money, nothing is easier ! I just need to enter the Bank account information (BAI), and I pay in the currency I want (if the account is not in Euro-zone). The TransferWise's fees are really cheap, and the transfers are made in 24h ! The BAI are saved, so I don't need to ask N26 to authorise the future receiver, and authorise the transfer ! Time saving ! ,I am just waiting for the savings being available in my country, and little overdraft authorisation.,Thank you N26.

company_reply: Hey Michael, we're really sorry that you were put in such discomfort. Due to some changes and in the regulations, all banks are obliged to adjust to this new set of rules. All incoming transfers should arrive since the recipient name can still be associated with the account holder, however the bigger the difference the more likely it is that a payment might be rejected.

title: Absolutely avoid! DISGUSTING customer service
text: Absolutely avoid! They don't give a **** about you,Nowhere can you see that they do not support SWIFT transfers.,I went to my local bank and sent the money using the details they provided. Everything went smoothly and the money left my local account but never arrived in Germany.,When I contacted N26, they told me that SWIFT transactions maybe work, but aren't guaranteed to work. They wouldn't move a finger to try and locate my money and they don't think they mislead customers. They send you their articles that explain that you should use Transferwise but don't say that they don't support SWIFT.,The result - worse exchange rate, paid commission and you have to exchange your money back to local currency and then back to Euro. Other reviews have mentioned the long time it takes to get the money - they said it should "probably take 10 days". They don't know how their systems work and they don't want to pass my complaint to a higher authority. DISGUSTING. 0 empathy for someone who's sent 1/2 of his money and doesn't have it in either of his accounts. Just go for a real bank if you're moving to Germany and avoid disappointment from your bank in your first days...

title: Nice concept but awful operation
text: The basic idea of N26 is quite nice. It's very handy for daily use apart from one thing; their debit card is not that weird German "EC Karte" so some shops and restaurants refuse your N26 debit card. But it's ok since I hate this crappy format anyway and avoid shops who only accept them as much as possible.,The real problems with N26 are the investment account and their customer support.,Obviously they have way too less support staff in terms of both number and qualification. When I had a problem (which is not yet solved btw) and wrote an email to them, I got a response 10 days later. And the response was like "we will investigate the issue and get back to you when we have any updates", which provides no information.,And the problem with the investment account is even worse. The app says it takes 3-5 days to open an investment account. Now I still don't have my account after 2 month. I've been writing to them via email and chat every week and I've been always getting responses like "It will take a week more" or "I reckon it will be fixed in a couple of days" but all of them turned out to be false.,In conclusion; basic idea and features are cool, but the CUSTOMER SUPPORT IS HORRIBLE. They are too friendly even in case of very serious problem, they lie and they do nothing to solve the problem.

text: Fairly reliable bank. I only had a few hiccups as they are new and were still building policy and discovering how things work within a global context. The hold is returned but only after 10 days. This was almost catastrophic for my trip and N26 had no information at the time that this situation might happen. There was nothing much they could do but it changed how I use my Mastercard when traveling internationally.

title: Poor customer experience
text: Poor customer experience. Looks cool, but lacks transparency. ,I opened an account online and went through the entire registration process. I went for the black option, and expected to be able to receive my salary there. I selected Spain as my country of residence, as they recently opened there. ,To my surprise, once the registration process was finalized, I received a german IBAN, when I was expecting a spanish one. Nowhere was it clearly stated during the registration process that this would be a german IBAN.  Even though Spanish businesses are lawfully obliged to accept SEPA IBANs, most of them refuse non-spanish ones. So I got stuck with this German IBAN, and could not cancel the contract until at least the end of the 1st year. ,After contacting customer support, I was told that there is a 14 days cancellation period. I was never informed of this by the registration officer, even though I clearly stated my problem. ,Summary: Disappointed by the lack of transparency, and the lack of flexibility when addressing directly my problem to the customer service. Lost money and time. Will make sure to share my experience with people interested in N26.

title: Read this review before you open an account!
text: Decent online banking interface with relatively simple features. However, if you need to get support (and trust me you will) YOU ARE SCREWED! I don't know if it's because I am an English speaking customer, but their support does not answer phone calls and they definitely don't answer emails. If you need something done quickly like a new card, some technical issues solved, or transfer problems then expect this to take 2-3 weeks before you get a resolution. ,I finally gave up on them last month and asked them to close my account. They sent an automated reply saying that I will hear back from them in 1-2 business days. It has been a month and no response. I still get emails from them, one of which was an email saying that if I don't provide my TaxID (since they became a sanctioned banking institution in Germany this is now required) or THEY WILL REPORT ME TO THE AUTHORITIES. This wouldn't have been an issue if they had just closed the account a month ago when I asked them to. ,THANKS NUMBER26 FOR BEING A HUGE PAIN IN THE BUTT!

title: Good
text: Money transfers to other banks are really quick. ,Push notifications for every transaction in real time are fantastic. ,Charges are low, and it's possible to use the account without any cost. I can understand why they've had to introduce some over the last year.,Paying for stuff in other currencies is so much cheaper than other banks. It's nice to also be able to see the original amount and the actual exchange rate used. ,Customer support, the few times I have had to contact them, have been pretty quick to respond. Perhaps I've had really easy questions compared to others. ,I've been using N26 since the wire card days and I never had any issues at time of switchover or after. ,My card arrived promptly in the post to Ireland, first time.,Right now, I feel the app design has taken a turn for the worst. There is so much white being used everywhere it can be hard to distinguish at a quick glance. It also seems less stable and prone to more glitches than it used to. ,Bugs can sometimes take time to be fixed. For example, the statistics page on the website hasn't been working for months. ,Most of the newest products that they've launched are Germany only. Come on N26, if you want to be a pan European bank then you need to overcome the challenges and launch these products in other countries. How hard is it to have a savings account that anyone can open?,While I enjoy using N26 and would recommend it to people, they could fall behind other banks if they can't launch their products outside Germany.

title: Absolutely Appalling

I told them that I wanted another couriered, my negative balance wiped (resultant from 2 months insurance subscription), and insurance for my upcoming 4day business trip to Italy that I would be covered for had I been able to book the trip with my N26 card.  Nicolas responded "I'll send you another card - you can expect it in a couple of weeks".  I honestly couldn't believe it.,AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!

title: Avoid at all costs!
text: This so called bank is a bunch of crooks, their customer service staff is lazy and will copy and paste responses, when you disagree with it or ask for additional help, they will dismiss you. They claimed the merchant took it but they didn't. N26 did. I asked him how can I close my account? He told me I could go to their support page and read about it... UMM HELLO IS THIS NOT SUPPORT? Just horrible horrible. ,Same happened before and somebody by the Name of Dani also dismissed me. I honestly don't see a future for this so called bank. Take your business elsewhere!

title: you can't wire money from the US to the account
text: They currently don't accept payments from the USA! Your money will be stuck for a week and then send back. I change back to a real bank who is grown up enough to work internationally.

title: App is anything but innovative in 2016-2017
text: I joined after the migration mess and I live in NL. At first i was drinking the coolaid and recommended everyone to join this bank. I travel a lot. But man, this is actually a much more old fashioned bank than traditional banks! Reason: (1) their app might have been cool when in launched in 2015, it has been surpassed easily in 2016 by the apps of all traditional banks, at least the ones I know like ING. (2) customer service is non-existent, i have a pending issue since early January, they have been dead silent for 9 weeks now. ,To elaborate on point 1:,1A their app is anything but intuitive. Forget what well-known tech and finance blogs write. It's simply not true. The app is slow, doesn't have a clear visual when it's loading, scrolling through your expenses can be horrible unless you have a very fast 4G connection all the time, the filter feature is very cool but completely hidden by a button barely visible after you hit the search button (i bet 90% of the users don't even know it exists).,1B There are also real problems with the app. For instance, unlike any other (debit) creditcard app, N26 is the *ONLY* app in the world that does not distinguish CC authorizations/reservations from actual payments. This can lead to serious problems. You could for example see 4 payments to  1 hotel, same amount each, not knowing which one was the payment, if any (!) And not knowing what the hell is going on. Even Amex totally crap 1980 style app clearly marks authorisations.,1C not all users experience this showstopper issue but I certainly do (on Android): you cannot save account numbers. Normally N26 will store the account number but only after a successful payment has been made. Unfortunately i have used the app for 6 months now, no account number has been stored. And having to type in all bank details every time i need to pay for a service or send someone money is extremely annoying! I have send screenshots and details of this bug 5 months ago, got a confirmation from Support they would forward it to the right department. I have emailed them 4 times since, no response. ,With all app updates since 2015, no actual useful features have been introduced. N26 app is the *LEAST INNOVATIVE* app of 2016 and so far 2017. Their Dutch (now going European) competitor BUNQ bank is actually doing much better with an innovative app that receives useful updates with new features all the time + BUNQ has realtime, in-app, real-person (no bot) Customer Service! It's just their business model (and price, paying a couple of cents for each local payment became too expensive for me ) that still keeps me using N26 mostly.,As an example of missing innovation: ,BUNQ introduced a feature that will hold all pre-authorised monthly payments (like ISP, Netflix, energy etc) , an Android notification comes in requiring you to confirm these payments. The first time you approve, you have the ability to approve all feature pre-auth payments and even set a limit so if your mobile phone provider suddenly charge you double, it will be blocked and you will have to confirm it first. This is how payments should be! This is something N26 should have come up with in 2016. But they didn't. ,But knowing all this, i still use N26 for 2 simple reasons:,1: it is free and cheaper than other banks when traveling (I use it together with Revolut).,2: it gives realtime info on your CC (although not being able to see if it's an authorisation is extremely bad).,So it is definitely usable and if you just need the cheapest possible bank, this will do but be aware of extremely bad Support (basically non existent), an old, non-intuitive app, no way to identify authorisations, and no improvements to the app for over a year. Fix all the above and you'll have happy customers instead of just a huge amount of new customers and angry old customers. ,Black:,The paid subscription (N26 Black) is absolutely not worth it, it doesn't solve any of the mentioned issues so it's a no go. It is not available in NL yet but I have read the German offering thoroughly and definitely not worth it, as travel insurance there are much better similar prices options (even cheaper). But i guess people are used to the buyer protection with their old CC's and that's what makes them choose Black.

title: I opened an account here after they …
text: I opened an account here after they migrated from Wirecard Accounts to their own banking accounts.,I am yet surprised about the good working banking here. Good App with all functions you need, 100 EUR cash deposits free monthly in Germany, working Debit Mastercard and the registration procedure was easy and fast.,Only things that could be improved: a German Girocard is missing, unfortunately many shops and restaurants accept no Maestro or Mastercard but only Girocard in Germany and cash withdrawals at ATMs limited to 3 per month is quite unflexible. With a Girocard and a few more free ATM withdrawals I'd consider to use my account as my main current account.

title: I am very satisfied with their service
text: I am very satisfied with their service. There were small issues when migrating from Wiredbank to their own bank, but apart from that their Uex of the application (Android version) is very smooth and friendly. I use the service optionally in Austria, therefore I did not experience the issues described by others. Considering that this is a free service, people should be more positive and patient. Keep up the good work!

title: Same Story as some people writing here.
text: Same Story as some people writing here.,The Bank has switched to from Wirebank to N26 and gave our new Debit Cards (black one). I activated this one mid of december and did not used it until now.,Now I received a mail that I have to pay for the pay rent. When I loged in I saw that ~19€ are in Minus, because they charged me monthly 4,90€ (January twice) and the account is in Minus now.,Now they are two issues. 1.) this 4,90€ are now charged monthly for one year without the possibility to quit. If I quit I have to pay the whole year.   This is what the not very friendly chat told me. 2.) This is a debit card and now they are going into minus and are charging me for that.,There is no obligingness at N26. I feel very cheated now.

title: Only positive experiences!
text: Only positive experiences!,And nice to handle in everyday life.

title: Nice bank!
text: I use N26. I have the Maestrocard and Mastercard and I am very happy with it. Opening the account was very easy. Banktransfers are very fast. Exchange rates are good also. They have a nice way to transfer money outside the Euro zone, which is very nice and cost effective.

title: The future of banking
text: Easy to use, intuitive, and ready for the future.  I'm well enjoying using the services of this bank. I've chosen for N26, as the bank for my international travels and international transactions, as my Maestro card from another bank was a hassle to use abroad. Using the Debit Mastercard from N26 I won't have any problems using ATMs abroad, which is a big plus. The app is good, and the second money is deducted from your account, it gives you a notificaiton on your phone, so your're always aware of what is happening to your money. ,The bank is less personal than traditional bank, due to its all online service, and therefore might rise suspicion that it is a scam by some people. However, this bank is not a scam. I've been using their services for the past few months, and I don't see anything wrong with it.

title: Am very much enjoying N26
text: I don't understand all the bad reviews, I have come across no issues, it's much better put together then the Irish banks I'm with and the app/notifications are great. Also it's cover by the german banking scheme up to 100,000, which I made sure off before joining. Obviously it's needs some improvements, customer service needs a focus, but every bank has issues, N26 isn't that bad in the grand scheme of things.

title: N26 is a nice trap
text: it used to be all free when they just launched their bank. Now it is as expensive as any other bank. What's the point then? Lying to customers to attract them then changing the policies 1 year after.

title: Worst banking experience ever!
text: Who decided that this joke of a company can call themselves a bank!? It's the worst combination of German incapability of dealing with people + criminal "bankers". This is absolutely NOT a bank and your money will not be safe with this organization. I would advise everyone that is a customer right now to take your money out before it's too late. People who are considering to become a customer, just don't!

title: A poor excuse for a bank
text: Never bank here !!! ,They are incompetent , I made the mistake of banking here for a year and never again will I make this mistake ! They take years to make money transfers and when you call customer service , you will be greeted with rude people who hang up on you . I've never dealt with a bank with such poor service . Please don't make the same mistake I did

title: Good - but greater focus on customer service needed!
text: I have used the app and banking services for several months and I am impressed with the general efficiency and clarity of service. Yes, it has had some teething issues and I too was irritated by the transfer from Wirebank when they achieved their own banking licence, but it has vastly improved since that time. I was disappointed that charges are to be introduced, but I can see that near dormant accounts are of little use to anyone, so will happily pay the new charge as I believe their quality of service is generally good.,My only concern is that as time has progressed the customer service is getting worse. There is an arrogance that wasn't there before and messages such as "We are very busy and there will be a delay ...etc" don't give me confidence. The last time I contacted them, I had to wait for 4 days for a reply - after sending a reminder. Not good enough for an online bank.,I still recommend N26 although I have knocked one star off this review. There are competitors, such as Bunq, which are well worth looking at and offer better service. Make sure that you have a decent phone, a little understanding of how app based banks work before you jump aboard.

title: Good Product, Bad Service
text: I'm fan of N26 Bank, is smart, clean and secure, the big problem is with client service.,2 days of more to get response, and then the response is a faq guide.,This company are forget he has a bank and the clients have money in the bank, if the client have issues with card during a travel or restaurant, N26 need response urgently.

title: Dont do it!!
text: Dont open your account with N26 if you can!!! ,They lie, are NEVER available and when you lose your phone you are left on your own. But they wont give a damn about that.,Before opening the account I asked the support about charges and they said there were none. After some more research in the internet I found an article pointing out some of these charges would occure. Asking the agent again, she confirmed there are these charges. WHY did she lie before?,Then whenever you have an issue it takes for them like over a week to reply and they will only reply one of your questions and with their already existing sentences. After asking more specific the agent again figured out she was wrong. Until then she still answered only one of my questions. ,Then my phone got stolen in south america and I have no access to my account, cannot unlink my phone without calling. But of course it is expensive making an international phone call without a phone! ,Its a unacceptable and what they allow themselves should not been called bank! Its just a joke. A joke they make with your money.,I am so disappointed!!!!

title: A complete joke of an organisation
text: This company is a real joke of an organisation. ,They claim to be able to set you up within 7 minutes, but in truth are utterly incompetent, and did not accept my British passport as proof of identity after spending more than 30 minutes of my time on the phone to them.,Although they advertise in English, their reps call you and immediately start talking in German. It's almost a con how deceitful their marketing stance is.,It seems they have also sold my telephone number to tele marketers, as I am now regularly receiving calls from random financial institutions across Europe and other "data research" organisations.,I would avoid this company like the plague and find better online banks elsewhere...

title: Unacceptable for a bank
text: This is a joke of a bank. Don't waste your time. Their app does work only on the latest smartphones. You can't do anything with the online banking only. They closed our account as we could not migrate to their new accounts as the app does not work on our smartphones. And now they do not provide any support to get the outstanding balance.

title: Good at end.
text: I opened a bank account without any problems. I successfully transfered money to N26 using SEPA transfer in 1 or 2 days. Then, I haven't received my N26 black credit card after 15 days. However, they charged me the 5.90 euros subscription. I contacted the customer support and they told me that it was because there was no name on my mailbox. I asked on German Quora if it was true they told me it is not true. I asked the french post (because i live in france) to tell me if it was the problem and they told me it is not the problem. Furthermore, I sent a message to their support team to tell them that the format of their french address was wrong and that the number had to be before the street on a french address like 23 rue du pont while they send their mails to rue du pont 23,They ignored my comment. However, after 9 days I received my black N26 card. ,I transferred money from and to N26. They are fast. They respect the SEPA transfer and they never block the transfers. I transferred up to 2000 euros and I didn't face issues about due diligence.,I give 5 stars because my credit card has never been blocked and no SEPA transfers have been blocked even if I heavely used the N26 cards and transfers.

title: Nice idea, terrible customer service
text: The rates look competitive compared to similar services, but customer service is almost non existent. After 3 days I finally reached someone who told me he couldn't help or even suggest a possible solution (I just needed to check that my delivery details for a debit card were correct). He essentially called me a liar when i explained that it had taken 3 days to reach someone and I'd hoped for a little more advice... guess I'll just wait to see if my card turns up. ,If you can find a number or an e-mail address (takes some searching), don't expect to be answered.

title: broken
text: signed up, gave all my details via video including my passport and received nothing in the 5 months since.

title: Excellent Banking but Usual FinTech Startup Pains
text: Every banking transaction has worked as expected. Their app continually improves and now seems polished. Withdrawals, deposits and notifications are fast. I've never had any problems with their debit MasterCard. That said, if you have an issue not addressed by their FAQ, good luck on getting timely answers and service. I can cautiously recommend them.

title: Impossible to even get a message through to customer service.  THEY SUCK!!!
text: My card doesn't work and they don't even allow you to send customer service a message.   ,They force you to go to the help files with standard questions but if something does not work then you are screwed.

title: Worst customer service ever!!!!
text: I was a client of N26 for quite some time. When N26 got its official license all customers had to transfer their account. Was it not only the horrible app that doesn't work at all, when I called them they said they arranged the transfer for me. But when the deadline came that my account would be closed, I called them where my new card was and if everything went right. They told me that I didn't transfer my account, which the employee of N26 clearly told me she did on the phone. They didn't come up with any solution at all and said I had to wait and then MAYBE I could open a new account. They were very rude on the phone, I have never experienced worse customer service than this. If you want all your customers to go to another bank then keep up this awfull appalling customer service!

title: So disappointed Customer service appalling.
text: My experience with N26 started so well. I loved the concept and the control one had over one's card. ,But then disaster...... When they actually become a bank.,I received my new card, but every attempt to get it registered failed.,It became almost impossible to talk to any one about this.,The phone was never answered and after waiting for 20mins or more I would be cut off.,More then a week after emails sent I would still be waiting for a reply.,I did get through once by phone and followed all instructions to try to rectify the situation. No luck. In the meantime my wife was having the same problem.,I did get one email response, finally, but no follow up to my reply. ,I had no choice but to transfer our funds out of our accounts.,WILL NOT RECOMMEND TO ANY ONE.

title: Nice idea but it is a complete disaster in execution
text: In the first months I joined N26 I actually enjoyed the bank and the experience. It was a fresh take on banking and we all know that we need something fresh when it comes to banking since regular banks just suck.,I knew that there would be some troubles since N26 is a startup and still growing but boy I had no idea what I was getting myself into. But one thing after another.,First of all I really don't like the fact that they release new unstable features. Guys this is supposed to be a god damn bank and not some toy that I don't mind if it stops working for a day or two. A lot of their stuff either doesn't work at all, isn't supported in your country or is "temporarily unavailable and they are working on fixing the issue",See the problem with that is that I need my bank account to work. I don't care what kind of problems you have. Every bank manages to run smoothly but N26 just simply doesn't work pretty often. They have issues where you cannot access your account or even sometimes not use your card at all because of internal issues.,Second I want to rant about the "MasterCard" which is not a real MasterCard as they state it. It is not accepted in a lot of places which say that they accept MasterCard payments. This applies to online shops and local stores.,My worst experience so far was by far my trip to England. There I apparently got scamed ? All my money was taken from my account because it seems like some guy withdraw all my money at an ATM even though I haven't lost my card. Despite being broke and stuck with no money at all in England for four weeks I called N26 (Had to call them 4 times because I was waiting for about 1 hour each in their line because apparently they don't have enough workers) and the gentlemen told me not to worry locked my card and send me a new one at my address back at home and he ensured me that I will get my money back within 14 days since it was not me who took out the money.,3 months and 10 calls later I got my money back... (I didn't actually expect to get it back after 3 months but I was positively surprised) so I started spending money again yay.,2 days later they took the money away again and there I was sitting with a negative account balance without even activating the feature to go below zero. I called them again and they once again told me to wait 14 days. ,2 months later I got my money back again but this time I was done with this god damn bank and about to close my account.,After some research I found out that a lot of people got scamed like me with an N26 account. Some of them from the exact same merchant as me which I find very shady but if you ask N26 directly they of course just tell you that it is a coincidence.,Besides that everything that seemed to make N26 appealing was taken away with the new bank accounts.,Now the free tier doesn't offer free international withdrawals anymore and I find it interesting that the free account doesn't cover ATM withdrawal theft anymore which is a huge warning sign for me. ,You have to pay for the premium card if you want to protect yourself from theft which is absurd.,I could go on and on and on but I think you get the bigger picture.,N26 is a joke. They are a startup experiment which I doubt will survive in a 10 year stretch. They are unreliable, unsecure and sometimes even unreachable when it comes to customer support and when it comes to banking and choosing this bank as your go to bank you will have a hard time.

title: Don't trust berlin hipsters
text: N26 is the perfect example of what you get when hipster morons businessmen-wannabes try get into serious business, like banking.,They have f'ed up everything they can:,1. Design is actually quite horrible. I've used several banking apps and this is really a bad one. Combined with constant crashes there is no joy of using it.,2. They roll out half-baked features that are buggy (buzzword "MVP") - the newly added feature "N26 invest" has "+" sign hardwired into the GUI in the field of your performance. So when performance is negative, you get "+-" :),App constantly crashes and most certainly can't work with semi-stable internet connection (EDGE/GRPS),3. Desktop app is a second-class citizen. very rudimentary interface, redicilous tab navigation, fixed (!) comma sign in the cash field, etc. etc.,4. They haven't told that their IBAN will be temporary. I've moved everything to this piece of crap only to find myself moving again. And it is not easy in Germany. Most services require a written letter to change your IBAN.,5. They actively conceal the fact that their maestro card is not a real german "EC" card. Technically they are not lying, but this is a clear marketing deception, which was critisized. Be ready for your card not being accepted A LOT.,6. Their support is ridicilous. Can only help with basic issues. Also, they ask for your card number for an identity confirmation :D you know, the information you see when you are already logged in the webapp and you don't have to have a card to "identify" yourself.

title: My money was stolen
text: My money are stolen and the bank send me the e-mail I need pay for stolen money.,I have debit card and even I am in minus. When I allow it?,Really bad bank ever.,GO AWAY OF THIS BRAND!!!
